Atthay onglay avehay eavedhay ethay earyway oaryay inyay ainvay,
Ovejay idsbay atyay engthlay ethay expectedyay alesgay ariseyay;
Ethay alesgay owblay atefulgray, andyay ethay esselvay iesflay.
Osay elcomeway esethay otay Oytray’say esiringday aintray,
Ethay andsbay areyay eerchay’day, ethay arway awakesyay againyay.

Oldbay Arispay irstfay ethay orkway ofyay eathday egunbay
Onyay eatgray Enestheusmay, Areithousyay’ onsay,
Ungspray omfray ethay airfay Ilomedaphay’say embraceyay,
Ethay easingplay Arnèyay asway ishay ativenay aceplay.
Enthay unksay Eioneusyay otay ethay adesshay elowbay,
Eneathbay ishay eelystay asquecay[177] ehay eltfay ethay owblay
Ullfay onyay ishay ecknay, omfray Ectorhay’say eightyway andhay;
Andyay ollray’day, ithway imbslay elaxray’day, alongyay ethay andlay.
Byay Aucusglay’ earspay ethay oldbay Iphinousyay eedsblay,
Ixfay’day inyay ethay ouldershay asyay ehay ountsmay ishay eedsstay;
Eadlonghay ehay umblestay: ishay ackslay ervesnay unboundyay,
Opdray ethay oldcay uselessyay embersmay onyay ethay oundgray.

Enwhay ownay Inervamay awsay erhay Argivesyay ainslay,
Omfray astvay Olympusyay otay ethay eamingglay ainplay
Iercefay eshay escendsday: Apolloyay arkedmay erhay ightflay,
Ornay otshay esslay iftsway omfray Ilionyay’say owerytay eighthay.
Adiantray eythay etmay, eneathbay ethay eechenbay adeshay;
Enwhay usthay Apolloyay otay ethay ueblay-eyedyay aidmay:

“Atwhay ausecay, Oyay aughterday ofyay Almightyyay Ovejay!
Usthay ingsway thyay ogresspray omfray ethay ealmsray aboveyay?
Onceyay oremay impetuousyay ostday outhay endbay thyay ayway,
Otay ivegay otay Eecegray ethay onglay ividedday ayday?
Ootay uchmay ashay Oytray alreadyyay eltfay thyay atehay,
Ownay eathebray thyay ageray, andyay ushhay ethay ernstay ebateday;
Isthay ayday, ethay usinessbay ofyay ethay ieldfay uspendsay;
Arway oonsay allshay indlekay, andyay eatgray Ilionyay endbay;
Incesay engefulvay oddessesgay onfederatecay oinjay
Otay azeray erhay allsway, oughthay uiltbay byay andshay ivineday.”

Otay omwhay ethay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay epliesray:
“Iyay eftlay, orfay isthay, ethay ouncilcay ofyay ethay iesskay:
Utbay owhay allshay idbay onflictingcay ostshay orbearfay,
Atwhay artyay allshay almcay ethay uriousfay onssay ofyay arway?”
Otay erhay ethay odgay: “Eatgray Ectorhay’say oulsay inciteyay
Otay areday ethay oldestbay Eekgray otay inglesay ightfay,
Illtay Eecegray, ovokedpray, omfray allyay erhay umbersnay owshay
Ayay arriorway orthyway otay ebay Ectorhay’say oefay.”

Atyay isthay agreedyay, ethay eavenlyhay owerspay ithdrewway;
Agesay Elenushay eirthay ecretsay ounselscay ewknay;
Ectorhay, inspiredyay, ehay oughtsay: otay imhay addressyay’day,
Usthay oldtay ethay ictatesday ofyay ishay acredsay eastbray:
“Oyay onsay ofyay Iampray! etlay thyay aithfulfay earyay
Eceiveray myay ordsway: thyay iendfray andyay otherbray earhay!
Ogay orthfay ersuasivepay, andyay ayay ilewhay engageyay
Ethay arringway ationsnay otay uspendsay eirthay ageray;
Enthay areday ethay oldestbay ofyay ethay ostilehay aintray
Otay ortalmay ombatcay onyay ethay istedlay ainplay.
Orfay otnay isthay ayday allshay endyay thyay oriousglay ateday;
Ethay odsgay avehay okespay ityay, andyay eirthay oicevay isyay atefay.”

Ehay aidsay: ethay arriorway eardhay ethay ordway ithway oyjay;
Enthay ithway ishay earspay estrainray’day ethay outhyay ofyay Oytray,
Eldhay byay ethay idstmay athwartyay. Onyay eitheryay andhay
Ethay uadronssqay artpay; ethay expectingyay Ojanstray andstay;
Eatgray Agamemnonyay idsbay ethay Eeksgray orbearfay:
Eythay eathebray, andyay ushhay ethay umulttay ofyay ethay arway.
Ethay Athenianyay aidmay,[178] andyay oriousglay odgay ofyay ayday,
Ithway ilentsay oyjay ethay ettlingsay ostshay urveysay:
Inyay ormfay ofyay ulturesvay, onyay ethay eechbay’say eighthay
Eythay itsay oncealcay’day, andyay aitway ethay uturefay ightfay.

Ethay ongingthray oopstray obscureyay ethay uskyday ieldsfay,
Orridhay ithway istlingbray earsspay, andyay eamingglay ieldsshay.
Asyay enwhay ayay eneralgay arknessday eilsvay ethay ainmay,
(Oftsay Ephyrzay urlingcay ethay ideway atway’ryay ainplay,)
Ethay avesway arcescay eavehay, ethay acefay ofyay oceanyay eepsslay,
Andyay ayay illstay orrorhay addenssay allyay ethay eepsday;
Usthay inyay ickthay ordersyay ettlingsay ideway aroundyay,
Atyay engthlay omposedcay eythay itsay, andyay adeshay ethay oundgray.
Eatgray Ectorhay irstfay amidstyay othbay armiesyay okebray
Ethay olemnsay ilencesay, andyay eirthay owerspay espokebay:

“Earhay, allyay eyay Ojantray, allyay eyay Eciangray andsbay,
Atwhay myay oulsay omptspray, andyay atwhay omesay odgay ommandscay.
Eatgray Ovejay, averseyay ouryay arfareway otay omposecay,
Oyay’erwhelmsyay ethay ationsnay ithway ewnay oilstay andyay oesway;
Arway ithway ayay iercerfay idetay onceyay oremay eturnsray,
Illtay Ilionyay allsfay, oryay illtay onyay avynay urnsbay.
Ouyay enthay, Oyay incespray ofyay ethay Eeksgray! appearyay;
’Istay Ectorhay eaksspay, andyay allscay ethay odsgay otay earhay:
Omfray allyay ouryay oopstray electsay ethay oldestbay ightknay,
Andyay imhay, ethay oldestbay, Ectorhay aresday otay ightfay.
Erehay ifyay Iyay allfay, byay ancechay ofyay attlebay ainslay,
Ebay ishay myay oilspay, andyay ishay esethay armsyay emainray;
Utbay etlay myay odybay, otay myay iendsfray eturnray’day,
Byay Ojantray andshay andyay Ojantray amesflay ebay urnbay’day.
Andyay ifyay Apolloyay, inyay osewhay aidyay Iyay usttray,
Allshay etchstray ouryay aringday ampionchay inyay ethay ustday;
Ifyay inemay ethay oryglay otay espoilday ethay oefay;
Onyay Usphœbay’ empletay Iyay’llay ishay armsyay estowbay:
Ethay eathlessbray arcasecay otay ouryay avynay entsay,
Eecegray onyay ethay oreshay allshay aiseray ayay onumentmay;
Ichwhay enwhay omesay uturefay arinermay urveyssay,
Ashway’day byay oadbray Ellesponthay’say esoundingray eassay,
Usthay allshay ehay aysay, ‘Ayay aliantvay Eekgray ieslay erethay,
Byay Ectorhay ainslay, ethay ightymay anmay ofyay arway,’
Ethay onestay allshay elltay ouryay anquishvay’day erohay’say amenay
Andyay istantday agesyay earnlay ethay ictorvay’say amefay.”

Isthay iercefay efianceday Eecegray astonishyay’day eardhay,
Ushblay’day otay efuseray, andyay otay acceptyay ityay earfay’day.
Ernstay Enelausmay irstfay ethay ilencesay okebray,
Andyay, inlyyay oaninggray, usthay opprobriousyay okespay:

“Omenway ofyay Eecegray! Oyay andalscay ofyay ouryay aceray,
Osewhay owardcay oulssay ouryay anlymay ormfay isgraceday,
Owhay eatgray ethay ameshay, enwhay everyyay ageyay allshay owknay
Atthay otnay ayay Eciangray etmay isthay oblenay oefay!
Ogay enthay! esolveray otay earthyay, omfray encewhay eyay ewgray,
Ayay eartlesshay, iritlessspay, ingloriousyay ewcray!
Ebay atwhay eyay eemsay, unanimatedyay ayclay,
Elfmysay illway areday ethay angerday ofyay ethay ayday;
’Istay anmay’say oldbay asktay ethay enerousgay ifestray otay tryay,
Utbay inyay ethay andshay ofyay Odgay isyay ictoryvay.”

Esethay ordsway arcescay okespay, ithway enerousgay ardouryay esspray’day,
Ishay anlymay imbslay inyay azureyay armsyay ehay essdray’day.
Atthay ayday, Atridesyay! ayay uperiorsay andhay
Adhay etchstray’day eethay eathlessbray onyay ethay ostilehay andstray;
Utbay allyay atyay onceyay, thyay uryfay otay omposecay,
Ethay ingskay ofyay Eecegray, anyay awfulyay andbay, aroseyay;
Evenyay ehay eirthay iefchay, eatgray Agamemnonyay, esspray’day
Thyay aringday andhay, andyay isthay adviceyay addressyay’day:
“Itherwhay, Oyay Enelausmay! ouldstway outhay unray,
Andyay empttay ayay atefay ichwhay udencepray idsbay eethay unshay?
Ievedgray oughthay outhay artyay, orbearfay ethay ashray esignday;
Eatgray Ectorhay’say armyay isyay ightiermay arfay anthay inethay:
Evenyay iercefay Achillesyay earnlay’day itsyay orcefay otay earfay,
Andyay emblingtray etmay isthay eadfuldray onsay ofyay arway.
Itsay outhay ecuresay, amidstyay thyay ocialsay andbay;
Eecegray inyay ouryay ausecay allshay armyay omesay owerfulpay andhay.
Ethay ightiestmay arriorway ofyay ethay Achaianyay amenay,
Oughthay oldbay andyay urningbay ithway esireday ofyay amefay,
Ontentcay ethay oubtfulday onourhay ightmay oregofay,
Osay eatgray ethay angerday, andyay osay avebray ethay oefay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay urntay’day ishay otherbray’say engefulvay indmay;
Ehay oopstay’day otay easonray, andyay ishay ageray esignray’day,
Onay ongerlay entbay otay ushray onyay ertaincay armshay;
Ishay oyfuljay iendsfray unbraceyay ishay azureyay armsyay.

Ehay omfray osewhay ipslay ivineday ersuasionpay owsflay,
Avegray Estornay, enthay, inyay acefulgray actyay aroseyay;
Usthay otay ethay ingskay ehay okespay: “Atwhay iefgray, atwhay ameshay
Attendyay onyay Eecegray, andyay allyay ethay Eciangray amenay!
Owhay allshay, alasyay! erhay oaryhay eroeshay ournmay
Eirthay onssay egenerateday, andyay eirthay aceray ayay ornscay!
Atwhay earstay allshay ownday thyay ilverysay eardbay ebay ollray’day,
Oyay Eleuspay, oldyay inyay armsyay, inyay isdomway oldyay!
Onceyay ithway atwhay oyjay ethay enerousgay incepray ouldway earhay
Ofyay everyyay iefchay owhay oughtfay isthay oriousglay arway,
Articipatepay eirthay amefay, andyay easedplay inquireyay
Eachyay amenay, eachyay actionyay, andyay eachyay erohay’say iresay!
Odsgay! ouldshay ehay eesay ouryay arriorsway emblingtray andstay,
Andyay emblingtray allyay eforebay oneyay ostilehay andhay;
Owhay ouldway ehay iftlay ishay agedyay armsyay onyay ighhay,
Amentlay ingloriousyay Eecegray, andyay egbay otay ieday!
Ohyay! ouldway otay allyay ethay immortalyay owerspay aboveyay,
Inervamay, Usphœbay, andyay almightyyay Ovejay!
Earsyay ightmay againyay ollray ackbay, myay outhyay enewray,
Andyay ivegay isthay armyay ethay ingspray ichwhay onceyay ityay ewknay
Enwhay iercefay inyay arway, erewhay Ardanjay’say atersway allfay,
Iyay edlay myay oopstray otay Eaphay’say emblingtray allway,
Andyay ithway ethay Arcadianyay earsspay myay owesspray iedtray,
Erewhay Eladoncay ollsray ownday ishay apidray idetay.[179]
Erethay Ereuthalionyay avedbray usyay inyay ethay ieldfay,
Oudpray Areithousyay’ eadfuldray armsyay otay ieldway;
Eatgray Areithousyay, ownknay omfray oreshay otay oreshay
Byay ethay ugehay, ottedknay, ironyay acemay ehay orebay;
Onay ancelay ehay ookshay, ornay entbay ethay angingtway owbay,
Utbay okebray, ithway isthay, ethay attlebay ofyay ethay oefay.
Imhay otnay byay anlymay orcefay Urguslycay ewslay,
Osewhay uilefulgay avelinjay omfray ethay icketthay ewflay,
Eepday inyay ayay indingway ayway ishay eastbray assailedyay,
Ornay aughtyay ethay arriorway’say underingthay acemay availyay’day.
Upinesay ehay ellfay: osethay armsyay ichwhay Arsmay eforebay
Adhay ivengay ethay anquishvay’day, ownay ethay ictorvay orebay:
Utbay enwhay oldyay ageyay adhay immday’day Urguslycay’ eyesyay,
Otay Ereuthalionyay ehay onsigncay’day ethay izepray.
Uriousfay ithway isthay ehay ushcray’day ouryay evelllay’day andsbay,
Andyay aredday ethay ialtray ofyay ethay ongeststray andshay;
Ornay ouldcay ethay ongeststray andshay ishay uryfay aystay:
Allyay awsay, andyay earfay’day, ishay ugehay empestuoustay aysway
Illtay Iyay, ethay oungestyay ofyay ethay osthay, appearyay’day,
Andyay, oungestyay, etmay omwhay allyay ouryay armyyay earfay’day.
Iyay oughtfay ethay iefchay: myay armsyay Inervamay owncray’day:
Onepray ellfay ethay iantgay oyay’eryay ayay engthlay ofyay oundgray.
Atwhay enthay Iyay asway, Oyay ereway ouryay Estornay ownay!
Otnay Ectorhay’say elfsay ouldshay antway anyay equalyay oefay.
Utbay, arriorsway, ouyay atthay outhfulyay igourvay oastbay,
Ethay owerflay ofyay Eecegray, ethay examplesyay ofyay ouryay osthay,
Ungspray omfray uchsay athersfay, owhay uchsay umbersnay aysway,
Ancay ouyay andstay emblingtray, andyay esertday ethay ayday?”

Ishay armway eproofsray ethay isteninglay ingskay inflameyay;
Andyay inenay, ethay oblestnay ofyay ethay Eciangray amenay,
Upyay-artedstay iercefay: utbay arfay eforebay ethay estray
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay advancedyay ishay auntlessday eastbray:
Enthay oldbay Idestyday, eatgray inyay armsyay, appearyay’day;
Andyay extnay ishay ulkbay iganticgay Ajaxyay earray’day;
Oïleusyay ollowfay’day; Idomenyay asway erethay,[180]
Andyay Erionmay, eadfuldray asyay ethay odgay ofyay arway:
Ithway esethay Eurypylusyay andyay Oasthay andstay,
Andyay iseway Ulyssesyay osedclay ethay aringday andbay.
Allyay esethay, alikeyay inspiredyay ithway oblenay ageray,
Emandday ethay ightfay. Otay omwhay ethay Ianpylay agesay:

“Estlay irstthay ofyay oryglay ouryay avebray oulssay ivideday,
Atwhay iefchay allshay ombatcay, etlay ethay odsgay ecideday.
Omwhay eavenhay allshay oosechay, ebay ishay ethay ancechay otay aiseray
Ishay ountrycay’say amefay, ishay ownyay immortalyay aisepray.”

Ethay otslay oducedpray, eachyay erohay ignssay ishay ownyay:
Enthay inyay ethay eneralgay’say elmhay ethay atesfay areyay ownthray,[181]
Ethay eoplepay aypray, ithway iftedlay eyesyay andyay andshay,
Andyay owsvay ikelay esethay ascendyay omfray allyay ethay andsbay:
“Antgray, outhay Almightyyay! inyay osewhay andhay isyay atefay,
Ayay orthyway ampionchay orfay ethay Eciangray atestay:
Isthay asktay etlay Ajaxyay oryay Idestyday ovepray,
Oryay ehay, ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay, elovedbay byay Ovejay.”
Oldyay Estornay ookshay ethay asquecay. Byay eavenhay inspiredyay,
Eaplay’day orthfay ethay otlay, ofyay everyyay Eekgray esiredday.
Isthay omfray ethay ightray otay eftlay ethay eraldhay earsbay,
Eldhay outyay inyay orderyay otay ethay Eciangray eerspay;
Eachyay otay ishay ivalray ieldsyay ethay arkmay unknownyay,
Illtay odlikegay Ajaxyay indsfay ethay otlay ishay ownyay;
Urveyssay ethay inscriptionyay ithway ejoicingray eyesyay,
Enthay astscay eforebay imhay, andyay ithway ansporttray iescray:

“Arriorsway! Iyay aimclay ethay otlay, andyay armyay ithway oyjay;
Ebay inemay ethay onquestcay ofyay isthay iefchay ofyay Oytray.
Ownay ilewhay myay ightestbray armsyay myay imbslay investyay,
Otay Aturnsay’say onsay ebay allyay ouryay owsvay addressyay’day:
Utbay aypray inyay ecretsay, estlay ethay oesfay ouldshay earhay,
Andyay eemday ouryay ayerspray ethay eanmay effectyay ofyay earfay.
Aidsay Iyay inyay ecretsay? Onay, ouryay owsvay eclareday
Inyay uchsay ayay oicevay asyay illsfay ethay earthyay andyay airyay,
Iveslay erethay ayay iefchay omwhay Ajaxyay oughtyay otay eaddray?
Ajaxyay, inyay allyay ethay oilstay ofyay attlebay edbray!
Omfray arlikeway Alamissay Iyay ewdray myay irthbay,
Andyay, ornbay otay ombatscay, earfay onay orcefay onyay earthyay.”

Ehay aidsay. Ethay oopstray ithway elevatedyay eyesyay,
Imploreyay ethay odgay osewhay underthay endsray ethay iesskay:
“Oyay atherfay ofyay ankindmay, uperiorsay ordlay!
Onyay oftylay Idayay’say olyhay illhay adoredyay:
Owhay inyay ethay ighesthay eavenhay asthay ixfay’day thyay onethray,
Upremesay ofyay odsgay! unboundedyay andyay aloneyay:
Antgray outhay, atthay Elamontay aymay earbay awayyay
Ethay aisepray andyay onquestcay ofyay isthay oubtfulday ayday;
Oryay, ifyay illustriousyay Ectorhay ebay thyay arecay,
Atthay othbay aymay aimclay ityay, andyay atthay othbay aymay areshay.”

Ownay Ajaxyay acedbray ishay azzlingday armouryay onyay;
Eathedshay inyay ightbray eelstay ethay iantgay-arriorway oneshay:
Ehay ovesmay otay ombatcay ithway ajesticmay acepay;
Osay alksstay inyay armsyay ethay islygray odgay ofyay Acethray,[182]
Enwhay Ovejay otay unishpay aithlessfay enmay eparespray,
Andyay ivesgay olewhay ationsnay otay ethay asteway ofyay arsway,
Usthay archmay’day ethay iefchay, emendoustray asyay ayay odgay;
Imlygray ehay iledsmay; earthyay embledtray asyay ehay odestray:[183]
Ishay assymay avelinjay uiveringqay inyay ishay andhay,
Ehay oodstay, ethay ulwarkbay ofyay ethay Eciangray andbay.
Oughthray everyyay Argiveyay earthay ewnay ansporttray anray;
Allyay Oytray oodstay emblingtray atyay ethay ightymay anmay:
Evenyay Ectorhay ausedpay; andyay ithway ewnay oubtday oppressyay’day,
Eltfay ishay eatgray earthay uspendedsay inyay ishay eastbray:
’Astway ainvay otay eeksay etreatray, andyay ainvay otay earfay;
Imselfhay adhay allengedchay, andyay ethay oefay ewdray earnay.

Ernstay Elamontay ehindbay ishay ampleyay ieldshay,
Asyay omfray ayay azenbray owertay, oyay’erlookyay’day ethay ieldfay.
Ugehay asway itsyay orbyay, ithway evensay ickthay oldsfay oyay’ercastyay,
Ofyay oughtay ullbay-ideshay; ofyay olidsay assbray ethay astlay,
(Ethay orkway ofyay Iustychay, owhay inyay Hylèay elldway’day
Andyay inyay allyay artsyay ofyay armouryyay excellyay’day,)
Isthay Ajaxyay orebay eforebay ishay anlymay eastbray,
Andyay, eateningthray, usthay ishay adverseyay iefchay addressyay’day:

“Ectorhay! approachyay myay armyay, andyay inglysay owknay
Atwhay engthstray outhay asthay, andyay atwhay ethay Eciangray oefay.
Achillesyay unsshay ethay ightfay; etyay omesay erethay areyay,
Otnay oidvay ofyay oulsay, andyay otnay unskillyay’day inyay arway:
Etlay imhay, unactiveyay onyay ethay easay-eatbay oreshay,
Indulgeyay ishay athwray, andyay aidyay ouryay armsyay onay oremay;
Olewhay oopstray ofyay eroeshay Eecegray ashay etyay otay oastbay,
Andyay endssay eethay oneyay, ayay amplesay ofyay erhay osthay,
Uchsay asyay Iyay amyay, Iyay omecay otay ovepray thyay ightmay;
Onay oremay—ebay uddensay, andyay eginbay ethay ightfay.”

“Oyay onsay ofyay Elamontay, thyay ountrycay’say idepray!
(Otay Ajaxyay usthay ethay Ojantray incepray epliedray)
Emay, asyay ayay oybay, oryay omanway, ouldstway outhay ightfray,
Ewnay otay ethay ieldfay, andyay emblingtray atyay ethay ightfay?
Outhay eetmay’stay ayay iefchay eservingday ofyay thyay armsyay,
Otay ombatcay ornbay, andyay edbray amidstyay alarmsyay:
Iyay owknay otay iftshay myay oundgray, emountray ethay arcay,
Urntay, argechay, andyay answeryay everyyay allcay ofyay arway;
Otay ightray, otay eftlay, ethay exterousday ancelay Iyay ieldway,
Andyay earbay ickthay attlebay onyay myay oundingsay ieldshay/
Utbay openyay ebay ouryay ightfay, andyay oldbay eachyay owblay;
Iyay ealstay onay onquestcay omfray ayay oblenay oefay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay isingray, ighhay aboveyay ethay ieldfay
Irlwhay’day ethay onglay ancelay againstyay ethay evenfoldsay ieldshay.
Ullfay onyay ethay assbray escendingday omfray aboveyay
Oughthray ixsay ullbay-ideshay ethay uriousfay eaponway ovedray,
Illtay inyay ethay eventhsay ityay ixfay’day. Enthay Ajaxyay ewthray;
Oughthray Ectorhay’say ieldshay ethay orcefulfay avelinjay ewflay,
Ishay orsletcay entersyay, andyay ishay armentgay endsray,
Andyay ancingglay ownwardsday, earnay ishay ankflay escendsday.
Ethay aryway Ojantray inksshray, andyay endingbay owlay
Eneathbay ishay ucklerbay, isappointsday ethay owblay.
Omfray eirthay oredbay ieldsshay ethay iefschay eirthay avelinsjay ewdray,
Enthay oseclay impetuousyay, andyay ethay argechay enewray;
Iercefay asyay ethay ountainmay-ionslay athedbay inyay oodblay,
Oryay oamingfay oarsbay, ethay errortay ofyay ethay oodway.
Atyay Ajaxyay, Ectorhay ishay onglay ancelay extendsyay;
Ethay untedblay ointpay againstyay ethay ucklerbay endsbay;
Utbay Ajaxyay, atchfulway asyay ishay oefay ewdray earnay,
Ovedray oughthray ethay Ojantray argetay ethay ottyknay earspay;
Ityay eachray’day ishay ecknay, ithway atchlessmay engthstray impellyay’day!
Outsspay ethay ackblay oregay, andyay imsday ishay iningshay ieldshay.
Etyay easedcay otnay Ectorhay usthay; utbay oopingstay ownday,
Inyay ishay ongstray andhay upyay-eavedhay ayay intyflay onestay,
Ackblay, aggycray, astvay: otay isthay ishay orcefay ehay endsbay;
Ullfay onyay ethay azenbray ossbay ethay onestay escendsday;
Ethay ollowhay assbray esoundedray ithway ethay ockshay:
Enthay Ajaxyay eizedsay ethay agmentfray ofyay ayay ockray,
Appliedyay eachyay ervenay, andyay ingingsway oundray onyay ighhay,
Ithway orcefay empestuoustay, etlay ethay uinray flyay;
Ethay ugehay onestay underingthay oughthray ishay ucklerbay okebray:
Ishay ackenslay’day eesknay eceivedray ethay umbingnay okestray;
Eatgray Ectorhay allsfay extendedyay onyay ethay ieldfay,
Ishay ulkbay upportingsay onyay ethay attershay’day ieldshay:
Ornay antedway eavenlyhay aidyay: Apolloyay’say ightmay
Onfirmcay’day ishay inewssay, andyay estoredray otay ightfay.
Andyay ownay othbay eroeshay eirthay oadbray alchionsfay ewdray
Inyay amingflay irclescay oundray eirthay eadshay eythay ewflay;
Utbay enthay byay eraldshay’ oicevay ethay ordway asway ivengay.
Ethay acredsay inistersmay ofyay earthyay andyay eavenhay:
Ivineday Althybiustay, omwhay ethay Eeksgray employyay,
Andyay agesay Idæusyay onyay ethay artpay ofyay Oytray,
Etweenbay ethay ordssway eirthay eacefulpay eptresscay earray’day;
Andyay irstfay Idæusyay’ awfulyay oicevay asway eardhay:


[Illustrationyay: ] Ectorhay Andyay Ajaxyay Eparatedsay Byay Ethay Eraldshay


“Orbearfay, myay onssay! ouryay urtherfay orcefay otay ovepray,
Othbay earday otay enmay, andyay othbay elovedbay ofyay Ovejay.
Otay eitheryay osthay ouryay atchlessmay orthway isyay ownknay,
Eachyay oundssay ouryay aisepray, andyay arway isyay allyay ouryay ownyay.
Utbay ownay ethay Ightnay extendsyay erhay awfulyay adeshay;
Ethay oddessgay artspay ouyay; ebay ethay ightnay obeyyay’day.”[184]

Otay omwhay eatgray Ajaxyay ishay ighhay oulsay expressyay’day:
“Oyay agesay! otay Ectorhay ebay esethay ordsway addressyay’day.
Etlay imhay, owhay irstfay ovokedpray ouryay iefschay otay ightfay,
Etlay imhay emandday ethay anctionsay ofyay ethay ightnay;
Ifyay irstfay ehay askyay’day ityay, Iyay ontentcay obeyyay,
Andyay easecay ethay ifestray enwhay Ectorhay owsshay ethay ayway.”

“Oyay irstfay ofyay Eeksgray! (ishay oblenay oefay ejoinray’day)
Omwhay eavenhay adornsyay, uperiorsay otay thyay indkay,
Ithway engthstray ofyay odybay, andyay ithway orthway ofyay indmay!
Ownay artialmay awlay ommandscay usyay otay orbearfay;
Ereafterhay eway allshay eetmay inyay oriousglay arway,
Omesay uturefay ayday allshay engthenlay outyay ethay ifestray,
Andyay etlay ethay odsgay ecideday ofyay eathday oryay ifelay!
Incesay, enthay, ethay ightnay extendsyay erhay oomyglay adeshay,
Andyay eavenhay enjoinsyay ityay, ebay ethay ightnay obeyyay’day.
Eturnray, avebray Ajaxyay, otay thyay Eciangray iendsfray,
Andyay oyjay ethay ationsnay omwhay thyay armyay efendsday;
Asyay Iyay allshay adglay eachyay iefchay, andyay Ojantray ifeway,
Owhay eariesway eavenhay ithway owsvay orfay Ectorhay’say ifelay.
Utbay etlay usyay, onyay isthay emorablemay ayday,
Exchangeyay omesay iftgay: atthay Eecegray andyay Oytray aymay aysay,
‘Otnay atehay, utbay oryglay, ademay esethay iefschay ontendcay;
Andyay eachyay avebray oefay asway inyay ishay oulsay ayay iendfray.’”

Ithway atthay, ayay ordsway ithway arsstay ofyay ilversay acedgray,
Ethay aldricbay uddedstay, andyay ethay eathshay enchasedyay,
Ehay avegay ethay Eekgray. Ethay enerousgay Eekgray estowbay’day
Ayay adiantray eltbay atthay ichray ithway urplepay owglay’day.
Enthay ithway ajesticmay acegray eythay uitqay ethay ainplay;
Isthay eekssay ethay Eciangray, atthay ethay Ianphrygay aintray.

Ethay Ojantray andsbay eturningray Ectorhay aitway,
Andyay ailhay ithway oyjay ethay Ampionchay ofyay eirthay atestay;
Escapedyay eatgray Ajaxyay, eythay urveysay imhay oundray,
Aliveyay, unarmyay’day, andyay igorousvay omfray ishay oundway;
Otay Oytray’say ighhay atesgay ethay odlikegay anmay eythay earbay
Eirthay esentpray iumphtray, asyay eirthay atelay espairday.

Utbay Ajaxyay, oryingglay inyay ishay ardyhay eedday,
Ethay ellway-armyay’day Eeksgray otay Agamemnonyay eadlay.
Ayay eerstay orfay acrificesay ethay ingkay esignday’day,
Ofyay ullfay ivefay earsyay, andyay ofyay ethay oblernay indkay.
Ethay ictimvay allsfay; eythay ipstray ethay okingsmay idehay,
Ethay eastbay eythay uarterqay, andyay ethay ointsjay ivideday;
Enthay eadspray ethay ablestay, ethay epastray eparepray,
Eachyay akestay ishay eatsay, andyay eachyay eceivesray ishay areshay.
Ethay ingkay imselfhay (anyay onoraryhay ignsay)
Eforebay eatgray Ajaxyay acedplay ethay ightymay inechay.[185]
Enwhay ownay ethay ageray ofyay ungerhay asway emovedray,
Estornay, inyay eachyay ersuasivepay artyay approvedyay,
Ethay agesay osewhay ounselscay onglay adhay aysway’day ethay estray,
Inyay ordsway ikelay esethay ishay udentpray oughtthay expressyay’day:

“Owhay earday, Oyay ingskay! isthay atalfay ayday ashay ostcay,
Atwhay Eeksgray areyay erishpay’day! atwhay ayay eoplepay ostlay!
Atwhay idestay ofyay oodblay avehay enchdray’day Amanderscay’say oreshay!
Atwhay owdscray ofyay eroeshay unksay otay iseray onay oremay!
Enthay earhay emay, iefchay! ornay etlay ethay orrowmay’say ightlay
Awakeyay thyay uadronssqay otay ewnay oilstay ofyay ightfay:
Omesay acespay atyay eastlay ermitpay ethay arway otay eathebray,
Ilewhay eway otay amesflay ouryay aughterslay’day iendsfray equeathbay,
Omfray ethay edray ieldfay eirthay atterscay’day odiesbay earbay,
Andyay ighnay ethay eetflay ayay uneralfay ucturestray earray;
Osay ecentday urnsyay eirthay owysnay onesbay aymay eepkay,
Andyay iouspay ildrenchay oyay’eryay eirthay ashesyay eepway.
Erehay, erewhay onyay oneyay omiscuouspray ilepay eythay azedblay,
Ighhay oyay’eryay emthay allyay ayay eneralgay ombtay ebay aisedray;
Extnay, otay ecuresay ouryay ampcay andyay avalnay owerspay,
Aiseray anyay embattledyay allway, ithway oftylay owerstay;
Omfray acespay otay acespay ebay ampleyay atesgay aroundyay,
Orfay assingpay ariotschay; andyay ayay enchtray ofoundpray.
Osay Eecegray otay ombatcay allshay inyay afetysay ogay,
Ornay earfay ethay iercefay incursionsyay ofyay ethay oefay.”
’Astway usthay ethay agesay ishay olesomewhay ounselcay ovedmay;
Ethay eptredscay ingskay ofyay Eecegray ishay ordsway approvedyay.

Eanwhilemay, onvenedcay atyay Iampray’say alacepay-ategay,
Ethay Ojantray eerspay inyay ightlynay ouncilcay atesay;
Ayay enatesay oidvay ofyay orderyay, asyay ofyay oicechay:
Eirthay eartshay ereway earfulfay, andyay onfusedcay eirthay oicevay.
Antenoryay, isingray, usthay emandsday eirthay earyay:
“Eyay Ojanstray, Ardansday, andyay auxiliarsyay, earhay!
’Istay eavenhay ethay ounselcay ofyay myay eastbray inspiresyay,
Andyay Iyay utbay ovemay atwhay everyyay odgay equiresray:
Etlay Artaspay’say easurestray ebay isthay ourhay estoredray,
Andyay Argiveyay Elenhay ownyay erhay ancientyay ordlay.
Ethay iestay ofyay aithfay, ethay ornsway allianceyay, okebray,
Ouryay impiousyay attlesbay ethay ustjay odsgay ovokepray.
Asyay isthay adviceyay eyay actisepray, oryay ejectray,
Osay opehay uccesssay, oryay eaddray ethay ireday effectyay.”

Ethay eniorsay okespay andyay atesay. Otay omwhay epliedray
Ethay acefulgray usbandhay ofyay ethay Artanspay idebray:
“Oldcay ounselscay, Ojantray, aymay ecomebay thyay earsyay
Utbay oundsay ungratefulyay inyay ayay arriorway’say earsyay:
Oldyay anmay, ifyay oidvay ofyay allacyfay oryay artyay,
Thyay ordsway expressyay ethay urposepay ofyay thyay earthay,
Outhay, inyay thyay imetay, oremay oundsay adviceyay asthay ivengay;
Utbay isdomway ashay itsyay ateday, assignyay’day byay eavenhay.
Enthay earhay emay, incespray ofyay ethay Ojantray amenay!
Eirthay easurestray Iyay’llay estoreray, utbay otnay ethay ameday;
Myay easurestray ootay, orfay eacepay, Iyay illway esignray;
Utbay ebay isthay ightbray ossessionpay everyay inemay.”

’Astway enthay, ethay owinggray iscordday otay omposecay,
Owslay omfray ishay eatsay ethay everendray Iampray oseray:
Ishay odlikegay aspectyay eepday attentionyay ewdray:
Ehay ausedpay, andyay esethay acificpay ordsway ensueyay:

“Eyay Ojanstray, Ardansday, andyay auxiliaryay andsbay!
Ownay aketay efreshmentray asyay ethay ourhay emandsday;
Uardgay ellway ethay allsway, elieveray ethay atchway ofyay ightnay.
Illtay ethay ewnay unsay estoresray ethay eerfulchay ightlay.
Enthay allshay ouryay eraldhay, otay ethay Atridesyay entsay,
Eforebay eirthay ipsshay oclaimpray myay onsay’say intentyay.
Extnay etlay ayay ucetray ebay askyay’day, atthay Oytray aymay urnbay
Erhay aughterslay’day eroeshay, andyay eirthay onesbay inurnyay;
Atthay oneday, onceyay oremay ethay atefay ofyay arway ebay iedtray,
Andyay osewhay ethay onquestcay, ightymay Ovejay ecideday!”

Ethay onarchmay okespay: ethay arriorsway atchsnay’day ithway astehay
(Eachyay atyay ishay ostpay inyay armsyay) ayay ortshay epastray.
Oonsay asyay ethay osyray ornmay adhay akedway ethay ayday,
Otay ethay ackblay ipsshay Idæusyay entbay ishay ayway;
Erethay, otay ethay onssay ofyay Arsmay, inyay ouncilcay oundfay,
Ehay aisedray ishay oicevay: ethay osthay oodstay isteninglay oundray.

“Eyay onssay ofyay Atreusyay, andyay eyay Eeksgray, ivegay earyay!
Ethay ordsway ofyay Oytray, andyay Oytray’say eatgray onarchmay, earhay.
Easedplay aymay eyay earhay (osay eavenhay ucceedsay myay ayerspray)
Atwhay Arispay, authoryay ofyay ethay arway, eclaresday.
Ethay oilsspay andyay easurestray ehay otay Ilionyay orebay
(Ohyay adhay ehay erishpay’day ereyay eythay ouchtay’day ouryay oreshay!)
Ehay offerspray injuredyay Eecegray: ithway argelay increaseyay
Ofyay addedyay Ojantray ealthway otay uybay ethay eacepay.
Utbay otay estoreray ethay eauteousbay idebray againyay,
Isthay Eecegray emandsday, andyay Oytray equestsray inyay ainvay.
Extnay, Oyay eyay iefschay! eway askyay ayay ucetray otay urnbay
Ouryay aughterslay’day eroeshay, andyay eirthay onesbay inurnyay.
Atthay oneday, onceyay oremay ethay atefay ofyay arway ebay iedtray,
Andyay osewhay ethay onquestcay, ightymay Ovejay ecideday!”

Ethay Eeksgray avegay earyay, utbay onenay ethay ilencesay okebray;
Atyay engthlay Idestyday oseray, andyay isingray okespay:
“Ohyay, aketay otnay, iendsfray! efraudedday ofyay ouryay amefay,
Eirthay offerpray’day ealthway, ornay evenyay ethay Artanspay ameday.
Etlay onquestcay akemay emthay oursyay: atefay akesshay eirthay allway,
Andyay Oytray alreadyyay otterstay otay erhay allfay.”

Ethay admiringyay iefschay, andyay allyay ethay Eciangray amenay,
Ithway eneralgay outsshay eturnray’day imhay oudlay acclaimyay.
Enthay usthay ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay ejectsray ethay eacepay:
“Eraldhay! inyay imhay outhay earhay’stay ethay oicevay ofyay Eecegray
Orfay atwhay emainsray; etlay uneralfay amesflay ebay edfay
Ithway eroeshay’ orpscay: Iyay arway otnay ithway ethay eadday:
Ogay earchsay ouryay aughteredslay iefschay onyay onderyay ainplay,
Andyay atifygray ethay anesmay ofyay ethay ainslay.
Ebay itnessway, Ovejay, osewhay underthay ollsray onyay ighhay!”
Ehay aidsay, andyay earray’day ishay eptrescay otay ethay skyay.

Otay acredsay Oytray, erewhay allyay erhay incespray aylay
Otay aitway ethay eventyay, ethay eraldhay entbay ishay ayway.
Ehay amecay, andyay andingstay inyay ethay idstmay, explainyay’day
Ethay eacepay ejectedray, utbay ethay ucetray obtainyay’day.
Aightstray otay eirthay everalsay arescay ethay Ojanstray ovemay,
Omesay earchsay ethay ainsplay, omesay ellfay ethay oundingsay ovegray:
Ornay esslay ethay Eeksgray, escendingday onyay ethay oreshay,
Ewhay’day ethay eengray orestsfay, andyay ethay odiesbay orebay.
Andyay ownay omfray orthfay ethay amberschay ofyay ethay ainmay,
Otay edshay ishay acredsay ightlay onyay earthyay againyay,
Aroseyay ethay oldengay ariotchay ofyay ethay ayday,
Andyay ipptay’day ethay ountainsmay ithway ayay urplepay ayray.
Inyay ingledmay ongsthray ethay Eekgray andyay Ojantray aintray
Oughthray eapshay ofyay arnagecay earchsay’day ethay ournfulmay ainplay.
Arcescay ouldcay ethay iendfray ishay aughterslay’day iendfray exploreyay,
Ithway ustday ishonourday’day, andyay eformedday ithway oregay.
Ethay oundsway eythay ashway’day, eirthay iouspay earstay eythay edshay,
Andyay, aidlay alongyay eirthay arscay, eploredday ethay eadday.
Agesay Iampray eckchay’day eirthay iefgray: ithway ilentsay astehay
Ethay odiesbay ecentday onyay ethay ilespay ereway acedplay:
Ithway eltingmay eartshay ethay oldcay emainsray eythay urnbay’day,
Andyay, adlysay owslay, otay acredsay Oytray eturnray’day.
Ornay esslay ethay Eeksgray eirthay iouspay orrowssay edshay,
Andyay ecentday onyay ethay ilepay isposeday ethay eadday;
Ethay oldcay emainsray onsumecay ithway equalyay arecay;
Andyay owlyslay, adlysay, otay eirthay eetflay epairray.
Ownay, ereyay ethay ornmay adhay eakstray’day ithway eddeningray ightlay
Ethay oubtfulday onfinescay ofyay ethay ayday andyay ightnay,
Aboutyay ethay ingdyay amesflay ethay Eeksgray appearyay’day,
Andyay oundray ethay ilepay ayay eneralgay ombtay eythay earray’day.
Enthay, otay ecuresay ethay ampcay andyay avalnay owerspay,
Eythay aisedray embattledyay allsway ithway oftylay owerstay:[186]
Omfray acespay otay acespay ereway ampleyay atesgay aroundyay,
Orfay assingpay ariotschay, andyay ayay enchtray ofoundpray
Ofyay argelay extentyay; andyay eepday inyay earthyay elowbay,
Ongstray ilespay infixyay’day oodstay adverseyay otay ethay oefay.

Osay oiltay’day ethay Eeksgray: eanwhilemay ethay odsgay aboveyay,
Inyay iningshay irclecay oundray eirthay atherfay Ovejay,
Amazedyay eheldbay ethay ondrousway orksway ofyay anmay:
Enthay ehay, osewhay identtray akesshay ethay earthyay, eganbay:

“Atwhay ortalsmay enceforthhay allshay ouryay owerpay adoreyay,
Ouryay anesfay equentfray, ouryay oraclesyay imploreyay,
Ifyay ethay oudpray Eciansgray usthay uccessfulsay oastbay
Eirthay isingray ulwarksbay onyay ethay easay-eatbay oastcay?
Eesay ethay onglay allsway extendingyay otay ethay ainmay,
Onay odgay onsultedcay, andyay onay ictimvay ainslay!
Eirthay amefay allshay illfay ethay orldway’say emotestray endsyay,
Ideway asyay ethay ornmay erhay oldengay eambay extendsyay;
Ilewhay oldyay Aomedonlay’say ivineday abodesyay,
Osethay adiantray ucturesstray aisedray byay abouringlay odsgay,
Allshay, azedray andyay ostlay, inyay onglay oblivionyay eepslay.”
Usthay okespay ethay oaryhay onarchmay ofyay ethay eepday.

Ethay almightyyay Undererthay ithway ayay ownfray epliesray,
Atthay oudsclay ethay orldway, andyay ackensblay alfhay ethay iesskay:
“Ongstray odgay ofyay oceanyay! outhay, osewhay ageray ancay akemay
Ethay olidsay earthyay’say eternalyay asisbay akeshay!
Atwhay ausecay ofyay earfay omfray ortalmay orksway ouldcay ovemay[187]
Ethay eanestmay ubjectsay ofyay ouryay ealmsray aboveyay?
Erewhay’eryay ethay unsay’say efulgentray aysray areyay astcay,
Thyay owerpay isyay onourhay’day, andyay thyay amefay allshay astlay.
Utbay onyay oudpray orkway onay uturefay ageyay allshay iewvay,
Onay acetray emainray erewhay onceyay ethay oryglay ewgray.
Ethay appsay’day oundationsfay byay thyay orcefay allshay allfay,
Andyay, elmwhay’day eneathbay ethay avesway, opdray ethay ugehay allway:
Astvay iftsdray ofyay andsay allshay angechay ethay ormerfay oreshay:
Ethay uinray anishvay’day, andyay ethay amenay onay oremay.”

Usthay eythay inyay eavenhay: ilewhay, oyay’eryay ethay Eciangray aintray,
Ethay ollingray unsay escendingday otay ethay ainmay
Eheldbay ethay inishfay’day orkway. Eirthay ullsbay eythay ewslay;
Ackbay omfray ethay entstay ethay avourysay apourvay ewflay.
Andyay ownay ethay eetflay, arrivedyay omfray Emnoslay’ andsstray,
Ithway Acchusbay’ essingsblay eeredchay ethay enerousgay andsbay.
Ofyay agrantfray inesway ethay ichray Eunaeusyay entsay
Ayay ousantthay easuresmay otay ethay oyalray enttay.
(Eunaeusyay, omwhay Ipylehypsay ofyay oreyay
Otay Asonjay, epherdshay ofyay ishay eoplepay, orebay,)
Ethay estray eythay urchasedpay atyay eirthay operpray ostcay,
Andyay ellway ethay enteousplay eightfray uppliedsay ethay osthay:
Eachyay, inyay exchangeyay, oportionpray’day easurestray avegay;[188]
Omesay, assbray oryay ironyay; omesay, anyay oxyay, oryay aveslay.
Allyay ightnay eythay eastfay, ethay Eekgray andyay Ojantray owerspay:
Osethay onyay ethay ieldsfay, andyay esethay ithinway eirthay owerstay.
Utbay Ovejay averseyay ethay ignssay ofyay athwray isplayday’day,
Andyay otshay edray ightningslay oughthray ethay oomyglay adeshay:
Umbledhay eythay oodstay; alepay orrorhay eizedsay onyay allyay,
Ilewhay ethay eepday underthay ookshay ethay aerialyay allhay.
Eachyay ourpay’day otay Ovejay eforebay ethay owlbay asway owncray’day;
Andyay argelay ibationslay enchdray’day ethay irstythay oundgray:
Enthay atelay, efreshray’day ithway eepslay omfray oilstay ofyay ightfay,
Enjoyyay’day ethay almybay essingsblay ofyay ethay ightnay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Eekgray Amphorayay—Ineway Esselsvay




Ookbay Iiivay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Econdsay Attlebay, Andyay Ethay Istressday Ofyay Ethay Eeksgray.


Upiterjay assemblesyay ayay ouncilcay ofyay ethay eitiesday, andyay eatensthray emthay ithway ethay
ainspay ofyay Artarustay ifyay eythay assistyay eitheryay idesay: Inervamay onlyyay obtainsyay ofyay
imhay atthay eshay aymay irectday ethay Eeksgray byay erhay ounselscay. Ethay armiesyay oinjay
attlebay: Upiterjay onyay Ountmay Idayay eighsway inyay ishay alancesbay ethay atesfay ofyay othbay,
andyay affrightsyay ethay Eeksgray ithway ishay understhay andyay ightningslay. Estornay aloneyay
ontinuescay inyay ethay ieldfay inyay eatgray angerday: Iomedday elievesray imhay; osewhay
exploitsyay, andyay osethay ofyay Ectorhay, areyay excellentlyyay escribedday. Unojay
endeavoursyay otay animateyay Eptunenay otay ethay assistanceyay ofyay ethay Eeksgray, utbay inyay
ainvay. Ethay actsyay ofyay Eucertay, owhay isyay atyay engthlay oundedway byay Ectorhay, andyay
arriedcay offyay. Unojay andyay Inervamay eparepray otay aidyay ethay Eciansgray, utbay areyay
estrainedray byay Irisyay, entsay omfray Upiterjay. Ethay ightnay utspay anyay endyay otay ethay
attlebay. Ectorhay ontinuescay inyay ethay ieldfay, (ethay Eeksgray eingbay ivendray otay
eirthay ortificationsfay eforebay ethay ipsshay,) andyay ivesgay ordersyay otay eepkay ethay
atchway allyay ightnay inyay ethay ampcay, otay eventpray ethay enemyyay omfray eray-embarkingyay andyay
escapingyay byay ightflay. Eythay indlekay iresfay oughthray allyay ethay ieldsfay, andyay asspay
ethay ightnay underyay armsyay.
    Ethay imetay ofyay evensay andyay entytway aysday isyay employedyay omfray ethay openingyay ofyay
    ethay oempay otay ethay endyay ofyay isthay ookbay. Ethay enescay erehay (exceptyay ofyay ethay
    elestialcay achinesmay) ieslay inyay ethay ieldfay owardstay ethay eashoresay.


Aurorayay ownay, airfay aughterday ofyay ethay awnday,
Inkledspray ithway osyray ightlay ethay ewyday awnlay;
Enwhay Ovejay onvenedcay ethay enatesay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Erewhay ighhay Olympusyay’ oudyclay opstay ariseyay,
Ethay iresay ofyay odsgay ishay awfulyay ilencesay okebray;
Ethay eavenshay attentiveyay embledtray asyay ehay okespay:[189]

“Elestialcay atesstay! immortalyay odsgay! ivegay earyay,
Earhay ouryay ecreeday, andyay everenceray atwhay eyay earhay;
Ethay ixfay’day ecreeday ichwhay otnay allyay eavenhay ancay ovemay;
Outhay, atefay! ulfilfay ityay! andyay, eyay owerspay, approveyay!
Atwhay odgay utbay entersyay onyay orbiddenfay ieldfay,
Owhay ieldsyay assistanceyay, oryay utbay illsway otay ieldyay,
Ackbay otay ethay iesskay ithway ameshay ehay allshay ebay ivendray,
Ashgay’day ithway ishonestday oundsway, ethay ornscay ofyay eavenhay;
Oryay arfay, ohyay arfay, omfray eepstay Olympusyay ownthray,
Owlay inyay ethay arkday Artareantay ulfgay allshay oangray,
Ithway urningbay ainschay ixfay’day otay ethay azenbray oorsflay,
Andyay ocklay’day byay ellhay’say inexorableyay oorsday;
Asyay eepday eneathbay ethay infernalyay entrecay urlhay’day,[190]
Asyay omfray atthay entrecay otay ethay etherealyay orldway.
Etlay imhay owhay emptstay emay, eaddray osethay ireday abodesyay:
Andyay owknay, ethay Almightyyay isyay ethay odgay ofyay odsgay.
Eaguelay allyay ouryay orcesfay, enthay, eyay owerspay aboveyay,
Oinjay allyay, andyay tryay ethay omnipotenceyay ofyay Ovejay.
Etlay ownday ouryay oldengay everlastingyay ainchay[191]
Osewhay ongstray embraceyay oldshay eavenhay, andyay earthyay, andyay ainmay
Ivestray allyay, ofyay ortalmay andyay immortalyay irthbay,
Otay agdray, byay isthay, ethay Undererthay ownday otay earthyay:
Eyay ivestray inyay ainvay! ifyay Iyay utbay etchstray isthay andhay,
Iyay eavehay ethay odsgay, ethay oceanyay, andyay ethay andlay;
Iyay ixfay ethay ainchay otay eatgray Olympusyay’ eighthay,
Andyay ethay astvay orldway angshay emblingtray inyay myay ightsay!
Orfay uchsay Iyay eignray, unboundedyay andyay aboveyay;
Andyay uchsay areyay enmay, andyay odsgay, omparedcay otay Ovejay.”

Ethay allyay-ightymay okespay, ornay urstday ethay owerspay eplyray:
Ayay everendray orrorhay ilencedsay allyay ethay skyay;
Emblingtray eythay oodstay eforebay eirthay overeignsay’say ooklay;
Atyay engthlay ishay estbay-elovedbay, ethay owerpay ofyay isdomway, okespay:

“Oyay irstfay andyay eatestgray! Odgay, byay odsgay adoredyay
Eway ownyay thyay ightmay, ouryay atherfay andyay ouryay ordlay!
Utbay, ahyay! ermitpay otay itypay umanhay atestay:
Ifyay otnay otay elphay, atyay eastlay amentlay eirthay atefay.
Omfray ieldsfay orbiddenfay eway ubmisssay efrainray,
Ithway armsyay unaidingyay ournmay ouryay Argivesyay ainslay;
Etyay antgray myay ounselscay illstay eirthay eastsbray aymay ovemay,
Oryay allyay ustmay erishpay inyay ethay athwray ofyay Ovejay.”

Ethay oudclay-ompellingcay odgay erhay uitsay approvedyay,
Andyay iledsmay uperiorsay onyay ishay estbay elovedbay;
Enthay allcay’day ishay ourserscay, andyay ishay ariotchay ooktay;
Ethay edfaststay irmamentfay eneathbay emthay ookshay:
Aptray byay ethay etherealyay eedsstay ethay ariotchay ollray’day;
Assbray ereway eirthay oofshay, eirthay urlingcay anesmay ofyay oldgay:
Ofyay eavenhay’say undrossyyay oldgay ethay odsgay arrayyay,
Efulgentray, ashflay’day intolerableyay ayday.
Ighhay onyay ethay onethray ehay inesshay: ishay ourserscay flyay
Etweenbay ethay extendedyay earthyay andyay arrystay skyay.
Utbay enwhay otay Idayay’say opmosttay eighthay ehay amecay,
(Airfay ursenay ofyay ountainsfay, andyay ofyay avagesay amegay,)
Erewhay oyay’eryay erhay ointedpay ummitssay oudlypray aisedray,
Ishay anefay eathedbray odoursyay, andyay ishay altaryay azedblay:
Erethay, omfray ishay adiantray arcay, ethay acredsay iresay
Ofyay odsgay andyay enmay eleasedray ethay eedsstay ofyay irefay:
Ueblay ambientyay istsmay ethay immortalyay eedsstay embracedyay;
Ighhay onyay ethay oudyclay ointpay ishay eatsay ehay acedplay;
Encethay ishay oadbray eyeyay ethay ubjectsay orldway urveyssay,
Ethay owntay, andyay entstay, andyay avigablenay eassay.

Ownay adhay ethay Eciansgray atchsnay’day ayay ortshay epastray,
Andyay uckledbay onyay eirthay iningshay armsyay ithway astehay.
Oytray ousedray asyay oonsay; orfay onyay isthay eadfuldray ayday
Ethay atefay ofyay athersfay, ivesway, andyay infantsyay aylay.
Ethay atesgay unfoldingyay ourpay orthfay allyay eirthay aintray;
Uadronssqay onyay uadronssqay oudclay ethay uskyday ainplay:
Enmay, eedsstay, andyay ariotschay akeshay ethay emblingtray oundgray,
Ethay umulttay ickensthay, andyay ethay iesskay esoundray;
Andyay ownay ithway outsshay ethay ockingshay armiesyay osedclay,
Otay anceslay anceslay, ieldsshay otay ieldsshay opposedyay,
Osthay againstyay osthay ithway adowyshay egendslay ewdray,
Ethay oundingsay artsday inyay ironyay empeststay ewflay;
Ictorsvay andyay anquishvay’day oinjay omiscuouspray iescray,
Iumphanttray outsshay andyay ingdyay oansgray ariseyay;
Ithway eamingstray oodblay ethay ipperyslay ieldsfay areyay eddyay,
Andyay aughterslay’day eroeshay ellsway ethay eadfuldray idetay.
Onglay asyay ethay orningmay eamsbay, increasingyay ightbray,
Oyay’eryay eavenhay’say earclay azureyay eadspray ethay acredsay ightlay,
Ommutualcay eathday ethay atefay ofyay arway onfoundscay,
Eachyay adverseyay attlebay oredgay ithway equalyay oundsway.
Utbay enwhay ethay unsay ethay eighthay ofyay eavenhay ascendsyay,
Ethay iresay ofyay odsgay ishay oldengay alesscay uspendssay,[192]
Ithway equalyay andhay: inyay esethay exploredyay ethay atefay
Ofyay Eecegray andyay Oytray, andyay oisedpay ethay ightymay eightway:
Esspray’day ithway itsyay oadlay, ethay Eciangray alancebay ieslay
Owlay unksay onyay earthyay, ethay Ojantray ikesstray ethay iesskay.
Enthay Ovejay omfray Idayay’say optay ishay orrorshay eadsspray;
Ethay oudsclay urstbay eadfuldray oyay’eryay ethay Eciangray eadshay;
Ickthay ightningslay ashflay; ethay utteringmay underthay ollsray;
Eirthay engthstray ehay ithersway, andyay unmansyay eirthay oulssay.
Eforebay ishay athwray ethay emblingtray ostshay etireray;
Ethay odsgay inyay errorstay, andyay ethay iesskay onyay irefay.
Ornay eatgray Idomeneusyay atthay ightsay ouldcay earbay,
Ornay eachyay ernstay Ajaxyay, underboltsthay ofyay arway:
Ornay ehay, ethay ingkay ofyay arway, ethay alarmyay ustainsay’day
Estornay aloneyay, amidstyay ethay ormstay emainray’day.
Unwillingyay ehay emainray’day, orfay Arispay’ artday
Adhay iercedpay ishay oursercay inyay ayay ortalmay artpay;
Ixfay’day inyay ethay oreheadfay, erewhay ethay ingingspray anemay
Urlcay’day oyay’eryay ethay owbray, ityay ungstay imhay otay ethay ainbray;
Admay ithway ishay anguishyay, ehay eginsbay otay earray,
Awpay ithway ishay oofshay aloftyay, andyay ashlay ethay airyay.
Arcescay adhay ishay alchionfay utcay ethay einsray, andyay eedfray
Ethay encumberyay’day ariotchay omfray ethay ingdyay eedstay,
Enwhay eadfuldray Ectorhay, underingthay oughthray ethay arway,
Ourpay’day otay ethay umulttay onyay ishay irlingwhay arcay.
Atthay ayday adhay etchstray’day eneathbay ishay atchlessmay andhay
Ethay oaryhay onarchmay ofyay ethay Ianpylay andbay,
Utbay Iomedday eheldbay; omfray orthfay ethay owdcray
Ehay ushray’day, andyay onyay Ulyssesyay allcay’day aloudyay:

“Itherwhay, ohyay itherwhay oesday Ulyssesyay unray?
Ohyay, ightflay unworthyyay eatgray Aerteslay’ onsay!
Ixmay’day ithway ethay ulgarvay allshay thyay atefay ebay oundfay,
Iercedpay inyay ethay ackbay, ayay ilevay, ishonestday oundway?
Ohyay urntay andyay avesay omfray Ectorhay’say irefulday ageray
Ethay oryglay ofyay ethay Eeksgray, ethay Ianpylay agesay.”
Ishay uitlessfray ordsway areyay ostlay unheardyay inyay airyay,
Ulyssesyay eekssay ethay ipsshay, andyay eltersshay erethay.
Utbay oldbay Idestyday otay ethay escueray oesgay,
Ayay inglesay arriorway idstmay ayay osthay ofyay oesfay;
Eforebay ethay ourserscay ithway ayay uddensay ingspray
Ehay eaplay’day, andyay anxiousyay usthay espokebay ethay ingkay:

“Eatgray erilspay, atherfay! aitway ethay unequalyay ightfay;
Esethay oungeryay ampionschay illway oppressyay thyay ightmay.
Thyay einsvay onay oremay ithway ancientyay igourvay owglay,
Eakway isyay thyay ervantsay, andyay thyay ourserscay owslay.
Enthay astehay, ascendyay myay eatsay, andyay omfray ethay arcay
Observeyay ethay eedsstay ofyay Ostray, enownray’day inyay arway.
Actisedpray alikeyay otay urntay, otay opstay, otay asechay,
Otay areday ethay ightfay, oryay urgeyay ethay apidray aceray:
Esethay atelay obeyyay’day Easænay’ uidinggay einray;
Eavelay outhay thyay ariotchay otay ouryay aithfulfay aintray;
Ithway esethay againstyay onyay Ojanstray illway eway ogay,
Ornay allshay eatgray Ectorhay antway anyay equalyay oefay;
Iercefay asyay ehay isyay, evenyay ehay aymay earnlay otay earfay
Ethay irstythay uryfay ofyay myay ingflyay earspay.”

Usthay aidsay ethay iefchay; andyay Estornay, illskay’day inyay arway,
Approvesyay ishay ounselcay, andyay ascendsyay ethay arcay:
Ethay eedsstay ehay eftlay, eirthay ustytray ervantssay oldhay;
Eurymedonyay, andyay Enelussthay ethay oldbay:
Ethay everendray arioteerchay irectsday ethay oursecay,
Andyay ainsstray ishay agedyay armyay otay ashlay ethay orsehay.
Ectorhay eythay acefay; unknowingyay owhay otay earfay,
Iercefay ehay ovedray onyay; Idestyday irlwhay’day ishay earspay.
Ethay earspay ithway erringyay astehay istookmay itsyay ayway,
Utbay ungedplay inyay Eniopeusyay’ osombay aylay.
Ishay openingyay andhay inyay eathday orsakesfay ethay einray;
Ethay eedsstay flyay ackbay: ehay allsfay, andyay urnsspay ethay ainplay.
Eatgray Ectorhay orrowssay orfay ishay ervantsay illkay’day,
Etyay unrevengedyay ermitspay otay esspray ethay ieldfay;
Illtay, otay upplysay ishay aceplay andyay uleray ethay arcay,
Oseray Archeptolemusyay, ethay iercefay inyay arway.
Andyay ownay adhay eathday andyay orrorhay overcay’day allyay;[193]
Ikelay imoroustay ocksflay ethay Ojanstray inyay eirthay allway
Inclosedyay adhay edblay: utbay Ovejay ithway awfulyay oundsay
Ollray’day ethay igbay underthay oyay’eryay ethay astvay ofoundpray:
Ullfay inyay Idestyday’ acefay ethay ightninglay ewflay;
Ethay oundgray eforebay imhay amedflay ithway ulphursay ueblay;
Ethay uiveringqay eedsstay ellfay ostratepray atyay ethay ightsay;
Andyay Estornay’say emblingtray andhay onfesscay’day ishay ightfray:
Ehay oppdray’day ethay einsray: andyay, ookshay ithway acredsay eaddray,
Usthay, urningtay, arnway’day ethay intrepidyay Iomedday:

“Oyay iefchay! ootay aringday inyay thyay iendfray’say efenceday
Etireray advisedyay, andyay urgeyay ethay ariotchay encehay.
Isthay ayday, averseyay, ethay overeignsay ofyay ethay iesskay
Assistsyay eatgray Ectorhay, andyay ouryay almpay eniesday.
Omesay otheryay unsay aymay eesay ethay appierhay ourhay,
Enwhay Eecegray allshay onquercay byay ishay eavenlyhay owerpay.
’Istay otnay inyay anmay ishay ixfay’day ecreeday otay ovemay:
Ethay eatgray illway oryglay otay ubmitsay otay Ovejay.”

“Oyay everendray incepray! (Idestyday usthay epliesray)
Thyay earsyay areyay awfulyay, andyay thyay ordsway areyay iseway.
Utbay ahyay, atwhay iefgray! ouldshay aughtyhay Ectorhay oastbay
Iyay edflay ingloriousyay otay ethay uardedgay oastcay.
Eforebay atthay ireday isgraceday allshay astblay myay amefay,
Oyay’erwhelmyay emay, earthyay; andyay idehay ayay arriorway’say ameshay!”
Otay omwhay Ereniangay Estornay usthay epliedray:[194]
“Odsgay! ancay thyay ouragecay earfay ethay Ianphrygay’say idepray?
Ectorhay aymay auntvay, utbay owhay allshay eedhay ethay oastbay?
Otnay osethay owhay eltfay thyay armyay, ethay Ardanday osthay,
Ornay Oytray, etyay eedingblay inyay erhay eroeshay ostlay;
Otnay evenyay ayay Ianphrygay ameday, owhay eadsdray ethay ordsway
Atthay aidlay inyay ustday erhay ovedlay, amentedlay ordlay.”
Ehay aidsay, andyay, astyhay, oyay’eryay ethay aspinggay ongthray
Ivesdray ethay iftsway eedsstay: ethay ariotchay okessmay alongyay;
Ethay outsshay ofyay Ojanstray ickenthay inyay ethay indway;
Ethay ormstay ofyay issinghay avelinsjay ourspay ehindbay.
Enthay ithway ayay oicevay atthay akesshay ethay olidsay iesskay,
Easedplay, Ectorhay avesbray ethay arriorway asyay ehay iesflay.
“Ogay, ightymay erohay! acedgray aboveyay ethay estray
Inyay eatssay ofyay ouncilcay andyay ethay umptuoussay eastfay:
Ownay opehay onay oremay osethay onourshay omfray thyay aintray;
Ogay esslay anthay omanway, inyay ethay ormfay ofyay anmay!
Otay alescay ouryay allsway, otay apwray ouryay owerstay inyay amesflay,
Otay eadlay inyay exileyay ethay airfay Ianphrygay amesday,
Thyay onceyay oudpray opeshay, esumptuouspray incepray! areyay edflay;
Isthay armyay allshay eachray thyay earthay, andyay etchstray eethay eadday.”

Ownay earsfay issuadeday imhay, andyay ownay opeshay inviteyay.
Otay opstay ishay ourserscay, andyay otay andstay ethay ightfay;
Icethray urntay’day ethay iefchay, andyay icethray imperialyay Ovejay
Onyay Idayay’say ummitssay underthay’day omfray aboveyay.
Eatgray Ectorhay eardhay; ehay awsay ethay ashingflay ightlay,
(Ethay ignsay ofyay onquestcay,) andyay usthay urgedyay ethay ightfay:

“Earhay, everyyay Ojantray, Ianlycay, Ardanday andbay,
Allyay amedfay inyay arway, andyay eadfuldray andhay otay andhay.
Ebay indfulmay ofyay ethay eathswray ouryay armsyay avehay onway,
Ouryay eatgray orefathersfay’ oriesglay, andyay ouryay ownyay.
Eardhay eyay ethay oicevay ofyay Ovejay? Uccesssay andyay amefay
Awaityay onyay Oytray, onyay Eecegray eternalyay ameshay.
Inyay ainvay eythay ulkskay ehindbay eirthay oastedbay allway,
Eakway ulwarksbay; estinedday byay isthay armyay otay allfay.
Ighhay oyay’eryay eirthay ightedslay enchtray ouryay eedsstay allshay oundbay,
Andyay asspay ictoriousvay oyay’eryay ethay evelllay’day oundmay.
Oonsay asyay eforebay onyay ollowhay ipsshay eway andstay,
Ightfay eachyay ithway amesflay, andyay osstay ethay azingblay andbray;
Illtay, eirthay oudpray avynay aptwray inyay okesmay andyay iresfay,
Allyay Eecegray, encompassyay’day, inyay oneyay azeblay expiresyay.”

Uriousfay ehay aidsay; enthay endingbay oyay’eryay ethay okeyay,
Encouragedyay ishay oudpray eedsstay, ilewhay usthay ehay okespay:

“Ownay, Anthusxay, Onæthay, Ampuslay, urgeyay ethay asechay,
Andyay outhay, Odarguspay! ovepray thyay enerousgay aceray;
Ebay eetflay, ebay earlessfay, isthay importantyay ayday,
Andyay allyay ouryay astermay’say ellway-entspay arecay epayray.
Orfay isthay, ighhay-edfay, inyay enteousplay allsstay eyay andstay,
Ervedsay ithway urepay eatwhay, andyay byay ayay incesspray’ andhay;
Orfay isthay myay ousespay, ofyay eatgray Aëtionyay’say inelay,
Osay oftyay ashay eepstay’day ethay engtheningstray aingray inyay ineway.
Ownay iftsway ursuepay, ownay underthay uncontrollyay’day:
Ivegay emay otay eizesay ichray Estornay’say ieldshay ofyay oldgay;
Omfray Eustyday’ ouldersshay ipstray ethay ostlycay oadlay,
Ulcanianvay armsyay, ethay abourlay ofyay ayay odgay:
Esethay ifyay eway aingay, enthay ictoryvay, eyay owerspay!
Isthay ightnay, isthay oriousglay ightnay, ethay eetflay isyay oursyay!”

Atthay eardhay, eepday anguishyay ungstay Aturniasay’say oulsay;
Eshay ookshay erhay onethray, atthay ookshay ethay arrystay olepay:
Andyay usthay otay Eptunenay: “Outhay, osewhay orcefay ancay akemay
Ethay edfaststay earthyay omfray erhay oundationsfay akeshay,
Eestsay outhay ethay Eeksgray byay atesfay unjustyay oppressyay’day,
Ornay ellssway thyay earthay inyay atthay immortalyay eastbray?
Etyay Aeægay, Elicèhay, thyay owerpay obeyyay,[195]
Andyay iftsgay unceasingyay onyay inethay altarsyay aylay.
Ouldway allyay ethay eitiesday ofyay Eecegray ombinecay,
Inyay ainvay ethay oomyglay Undererthay ightmay epineray:
Olesay ouldshay ehay itsay, ithway arcescay ayay odgay otay iendfray,
Andyay eesay ishay Ojanstray otay ethay adesshay escendday:
Uchsay ebay ethay enescay omfray ishay Idaeanyay owerbay;
Ungratefulyay ospectpray otay ethay ullensay owerpay!”

Eptunenay ithway athwray ejectsray ethay ashray esignday:
“Atwhay ageray, atwhay adnessmay, uriousfay ueenqay! isyay inethay?
Iyay arway otnay ithway ethay ighesthay. Allyay aboveyay
Ubmitsay andyay embletray atyay ethay andhay ofyay Ovejay.”

Ownay odlikegay Ectorhay, otay osewhay atchlessmay ightmay
Ovejay avegay ethay oryglay ofyay ethay estinedday ightfay,
Uadronssqay onyay uadronssqay ivesdray, andyay illsfay ethay ieldsfay
Ithway oseclay-angedray ariotschay, andyay ithway ickenthay’day ieldsshay.
Erewhay ethay eepday enchtray inyay engthlay extendedyay aylay,
Ompactedcay oopstray andstay edgedway inyay irmfay arrayyay,
Ayay eadfuldray ontfray! eythay akeshay ethay andsbray, andyay eatthray
Ithway onglay-estroyingday amesflay ethay ostilehay eetflay.
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay, byay Unojay’say elfsay inspiredyay,
Oiltay’day oughthray ethay entstay, andyay allyay ishay armyyay iredfay.
Iftsway asyay ehay ovedmay, ehay iftedlay inyay ishay andhay
Ishay urplepay oberay, ightbray ensignyay ofyay ommandcay.
Ighhay onyay ethay idmostmay arkbay ethay ingkay appearyay’day:
Erethay, omfray Ulyssesyay’ eckday, ishay oicevay asway eardhay:
Otay Ajaxyay andyay Achillesyay eachray’day ethay oundsay,
Osewhay istantday ipsshay ethay uardedgay avynay oundbay.
“Oyay Argivesyay! ameshay ofyay umanhay aceray! (ehay iedcray:
Ethay ollowhay esselsvay otay ishay oicevay epliedray,)
Erewhay ownay areyay allyay ouryay oriousglay oastsbay ofyay oreyay,
Ouryay astyhay iumphstray onyay ethay Emnianlay oreshay?
Eachyay earlessfay erohay aresday ayay undredhay oesfay,
Ilewhay ethay eastfay astslay, andyay ilewhay ethay obletgay owsflay;
Utbay owhay otay eetmay oneyay artialmay anmay isyay oundfay,
Enwhay ethay ightfay agesray, andyay ethay amesflay urroundsay?
Oyay ightymay Ovejay! Oyay iresay ofyay ethay istressday’day!
Asway everyay ingkay ikelay emay, ikelay emay oppressyay’day?
Ithway owerpay immenseyay, ithway usticejay armyay’day inyay ainvay;
Myay oryglay avishray’day, andyay myay eoplepay ainslay!
Otay eethay myay owsvay ereway eathedbray omfray everyyay oreshay;
Atwhay altaryay okedsmay otnay ithway ouryay ictimsvay’ oregay?
Ithway atfay ofyay ullsbay Iyay edfay ethay onstantcay ameflay,
Andyay askyay’day estructionday otay ethay Ojantray amenay.
Ownay, aciousgray odgay! arfay umblerhay ouryay emandday;
Ivegay esethay atyay eastlay otay ’apescay omfray Ectorhay’say andhay,
Andyay avesay ethay elicsray ofyay ethay Eciangray andlay!”

Usthay aypray’day ethay ingkay, andyay eavenhay’say eatgray atherfay eardhay
Ishay owsvay, inyay itternessbay ofyay oulsay eferrpray’day:
Ethay athwray appeasedyay, byay appyhay ignssay eclaresday,
Andyay ivesgay ethay eoplepay otay eirthay onarchmay’say ayerspray.
Ishay eagleyay, acredsay irdbay ofyay eavenhay! ehay entsay,
Ayay awnfay ishay alonstay usstray’day, (ivineday ortentpay!)
Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay onderingway ostshay ehay oarsay’day aboveyay,
Owhay aidpay eirthay owsvay otay Anomphaeanpay Ovejay;
Enthay etlay ethay eypray eforebay ishay altaryay allfay;
Ethay Eeksgray eheldbay, andyay ansporttray eizedsay onyay allyay:
Encouragedyay byay ethay ignsay, ethay oopstray eviveray,
Andyay iercefay onyay Oytray ithway oubledday uryfay ivedray.
Idestyday irstfay, ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray orcefay,
Oyay’eryay ethay oadbray itchday impellyay’day ishay oamingfay orsehay,
Iercedpay ethay eepday anksray, eirthay ongeststray attlebay oretay,
Andyay eddyay ishay avelinjay edray ithway Ojantray oregay.
Oungyay Agelausyay (Admonphray asway ishay iresay)
Ithway ingflyay ourserscay unnshay’day ishay eadfuldray ireyay;
Uckstray oughthray ethay ackbay, ethay Ianphrygay ellfay oppressyay’day;
Ethay artday ovedray onyay, andyay issuedyay atyay ishay eastbray:
Eadlonghay ehay uitsqay ethay arcay: ishay armsyay esoundray;
Ishay onderouspay ucklerbay understhay onyay ethay oundgray.
Orthfay ushray ayay idetay ofyay Eeksgray, ethay assagepay eedfray;
Ethay Atridaeyay irstfay, ethay Ajacesyay extnay ucceedsay:
Erionesmay, ikelay Arsmay inyay armsyay enownray’day,
Andyay odlikegay Idomenyay, ownay assedpay ethay oundmay;
Evaemonyay’say onsay extnay issuesyay otay ethay oefay,
Andyay astlay oungyay Eucertay ithway ishay endedbay owbay.
Ecuresay ehindbay ethay Elamoniantay ieldshay
Ethay ilfulskay archeryay ideway urveysay’day ethay ieldfay,
Ithway everyyay aftshay omesay ostilehay ictimvay ewslay,
Enthay oseclay eneathbay ethay evenfoldsay orbyay ithdrewway:
Ethay onsciouscay infantyay osay, enwhay earfay alarmsyay,
Etiresray orfay afetysay otay ethay othermay’say armsyay.
Usthay Ajaxyay uardsgay ishay otherbray inyay ethay ieldfay,
Ovesmay asyay ehay ovesmay, andyay urnstay ethay iningshay ieldshay.
Owhay irstfay byay Eucertay’say ortalmay arrowsyay edblay?
Orsilochusyay; enthay ellfay Ormenusyay eadday:
Ethay odlikegay Ophonlycay extnay esspray’day ethay ainplay,
Ithway Omiuschray, Aetorday, Ophelestesyay ainslay:
Oldbay Amopaonhay eathlessbray unksay otay oundgray;
Ethay oodyblay ilepay eatgray Elanippusmay owncray’day.
Eapshay ellfay onyay eapshay, adsay ophiestray ofyay ishay artyay,
Ayay Ojantray ostghay attendingyay everyyay artday.
Eatgray Agamemnonyay iewsvay ithway oyfuljay eyeyay
Ethay anksray owgray innerthay asyay ishay arrowsyay flyay:
“Oyay outhyay oreverfay earday! (ethay onarchmay iedcray)
Usthay, alwaysyay usthay, thyay earlyyay orthway ebay iedtray;
Thyay avebray exampleyay allshay etrieveray ouryay osthay,
Thyay ountrycay’say avioursay, andyay thyay atherfay’say oastbay!
Ungspray omfray anyay alienyay’say edbay thyay iresay otay acegray,
Ethay igorousvay offspringyay ofyay ayay olenstay embraceyay:
Oudpray ofyay ishay oybay, ehay ownyay’day ethay enerousgay ameflay,
Andyay ethay avebray onsay epaysray ishay arescay ithway amefay.
Ownay earhay ayay onarchmay’say owvay: Ifyay eavenhay’say ighhay owerspay
Ivegay emay otay azeray Oytray’say onglay-efendedday owerstay;
Ateverwhay easurestray Eecegray orfay emay esignday,
Ethay extnay ichray onoraryhay iftgay ebay inethay:
Omesay oldengay ipodtray, oryay istinguishedday arcay,
Ithway ourserscay eadfuldray inyay ethay anksray ofyay arway:
Oryay omesay airfay aptivecay, omwhay thyay eyesyay approveyay,
Allshay ecompenseray ethay arriorway’say oilstay ithway ovelay.”

Otay isthay ethay iefchay: “Ithway aisepray ethay estray inspireyay,
Ornay urgeyay ayay oulsay alreadyyay illfay’day ithway irefay.
Atwhay engthstray Iyay avehay, ebay ownay inyay attlebay iedtray,
Illtay everyyay aftshay inyay Ianphrygay oodblay ebay eddyay.
Incesay allyingray omfray ouryay allway eway orcedfay ethay oefay,
Illstay aimyay’day atyay Ectorhay avehay Iyay entbay myay owbay:
Eightyay orkyfay arrowsyay omfray isthay andhay avehay edflay,
Andyay eightyay oldbay eroeshay byay eirthay ointspay ielay eadday:
Utbay uresay omesay odgay eniesday emay otay estroyday
Isthay uryfay ofyay ethay ieldfay, isthay ogday ofyay Oytray.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay angtway’day ethay ingstray. Ethay eaponway iesflay
Atyay Ectorhay’say eastbray, andyay ingssay alongyay ethay iesskay:
Ehay issmay’day ethay arkmay; utbay iercedpay Orgythiogay’say earthay,
Andyay enchdray’day inyay oyalray oodblay ethay irstythay artday.
(Airfay Astianiracay, nymphay ofyay ormfay ivineday,
Isthay offspringyay addedyay otay ingkay Iampray’say inelay.)
Asyay ullfay-ownblay oppiespay, overchargedyay ithway ainray,[196]
Eclineday ethay eadhay, andyay oopingdray isskay ethay ainplay;
Osay inkssay ethay outhyay: ishay eauteousbay eadhay, epressday’day
Eneathbay ishay elmethay, opsdray uponyay ishay eastbray.
Anotheryay aftshay ethay agingray archeryay ewdray,
Atthay otheryay aftshay ithway erringyay uryfay ewflay,
(Omfray Ectorhay, Usphœbay urntay’day ethay ingflyay oundway,)
Etyay ellfay otnay dryay oryay uiltlessgay otay ethay oundgray:
Thyay eastbray, avebray Archeptolemusyay! ityay oretay,
Andyay ippday’day itsyay eathersfay inyay onay ulgarvay oregay.
Eadlonghay ehay allsfay: ishay uddensay allfay alarmsyay
Ethay eedsstay, atthay artlestay atyay ishay oundingsay armsyay.
Ectorhay ithway iefgray ishay arioteerchay eheldbay
Allyay alepay andyay eathlessbray onyay ethay anguinesay ieldfay:
Enthay idsbay Ebrionescay irectday ethay einray,
Uitsqay ishay ightbray arcay, andyay issuesyay onyay ethay ainplay.
Eadfuldray ehay outsshay: omfray earthyay ayay onestay ehay ooktay,
Andyay ushray’day onyay Eucertay ithway ethay iftedlay ockray.
Ethay outhyay alreadyyay ainstray’day ethay orcefulfay ewyay;
Ethay aftshay alreadyyay otay ishay ouldershay ewdray;
Ethay eatherfay inyay ishay andhay, ustjay ingway’day orfay ightflay,
Ouchtay’day erewhay ethay ecknay andyay ollowhay estchay uniteyay;
Erethay, erewhay ethay uncturejay itsknay ethay annelchay onebay,
Ethay uriousfay iefchay ischargedday ethay aggycray onestay:
Ethay owbay-ingstray urstbay eneathbay ethay onderouspay owblay,
Andyay ishay umbnay’day andhay ismissday’day ishay uselessyay owbay.
Ehay ellfay: utbay Ajaxyay ishay oadbray ieldshay isplayday’day,
Andyay eenscray’day ishay otherbray ithway ethay ightymay adeshay;
Illtay eatgray Alasteryay, andyay Ecistheusmay, orebay
Ethay atterbay’day archeryay oaninggray otay ethay oreshay.

Oytray etyay oundfay acegray eforebay ethay Olympianyay iresay,
Ehay armyay’day eirthay andshay, andyay illfay’day eirthay eastsbray ithway irefay.
Ethay Eeksgray epulsedray, etreatray ehindbay eirthay allway,
Oryay inyay ethay enchtray onyay eapshay onfusedlycay allfay.
Irstfay ofyay ethay oefay, eatgray Ectorhay archmay’day alongyay,
Ithway errortay othedclay, andyay oremay anthay ortalmay ongstray.
Asyay ethay oldbay oundhay, atthay ivesgay ethay ionlay asechay,
Ithway eatingbay osombay, andyay ithway eageryay acepay,
Angshay onyay ishay aunchhay, oryay astensfay onyay ishay eelshay,
Uardsgay asyay ehay urnstay, andyay irclescay asyay ehay eelswhay;
Usthay oftyay ethay Eciansgray urntay’day, utbay illstay eythay ewflay;
Usthay ollowingfay, Ectorhay illstay ethay indmosthay ewslay.
Enwhay ingflyay eythay adhay asspay’day ethay enchtray ofoundpray,
Andyay anymay ayay iefchay aylay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray;
Eforebay ethay ipsshay ayay esperateday andstay eythay ademay,
Andyay iredfay ethay oopstray, andyay alledcay ethay odsgay otay aidyay.
Iercefay onyay ishay attlingray ariotchay Ectorhay amecay:
Ishay eyesyay ikelay Orgongay otshay ayay anguinesay ameflay
Atthay itherway’day allyay eirthay osthay: ikelay Arsmay ehay oodstay:
Ireday asyay ethay onstermay, eadfuldray asyay ethay odgay!
Eirthay ongstray istressday ethay ifeway ofyay Ovejay urveysay’day;
Enthay ensivepay usthay, otay arway’say iumphanttray aidmay:

“Oyay aughterday ofyay atthay odgay, osewhay armyay ancay ieldway
Ethay avengingyay oltbay, andyay akeshay ethay ablesay ieldshay!
Ownay, inyay isthay omentmay ofyay erhay astlay espairday,
Allshay etchedwray Eecegray onay oremay onfesscay ouryay arecay,
Ondemncay’day otay uffersay ethay ullfay orcefay ofyay atefay,
Andyay aindray ethay egsdray ofyay eavenhay’say elentlessray atehay?
Odsgay! allshay oneyay agingray andhay usthay evellay allyay?
Atwhay umbersnay ellfay! atwhay umbersnay etyay allshay allfay!
Atwhay owerpay ivineday allshay Ectorhay’say athwray assuageyay?
Illstay ellssway ethay aughterslay, andyay illstay owsgray ethay ageray!”

Osay akespay ethay imperialyay egentray ofyay ethay iesskay;
Otay omwhay ethay oddessgay ithway ethay azureyay eyesyay:

“Onglay incesay adhay Ectorhay ainstay’day esethay ieldsfay ithway oregay,
Etchstray’day byay omesay Argiveyay onyay ishay ativenay oreshay:
Utbay ehay aboveyay, ethay iresay ofyay eavenhay, ithstandsway,
Ocksmay ouryay attemptsyay, andyay ightsslay ouryay ustjay emandsday;
Ethay ubbornstay odgay, inflexibleyay andyay ardhay,
Orgetsfay myay ervicesay andyay eservedday ewardray:
Avedsay Iyay, orfay isthay, ishay avouritefay onsay istressday’day,
Byay ernstay Eurystheusyay ithway onglay abourslay esspray’day?
Ehay eggbay’day, ithway earstay ehay eggbay’day, inyay eepday ismayday;
Iyay otshay omfray eavenhay, andyay avegay ishay armyay ethay ayday.
Ohyay adhay myay isdomway ownknay isthay ireday eventyay,
Enwhay otay imgray Utoplay’say oomyglay atesgay ehay entway;
Ethay ipletray ogday adhay evernay eltfay ishay ainchay,
Ornay Styxay eenbay osscray’day, ornay ellhay exploredyay inyay ainvay.
Averseyay otay emay ofyay allyay ishay eavenhay ofyay odsgay,
Atyay Etisthay’ uitsay ethay artialpay Undererthay odsnay;
Otay acegray erhay oomyglay, iercefay, esentingray onsay,
Myay opeshay areyay ustratefray, andyay myay Eeksgray undoneyay.
Omesay uturefay ayday, erhapspay, ehay aymay ebay ovedmay
Otay allcay ishay ueblay-eyedyay aidmay ishay estbay elovedbay.
Astehay, aunchlay thyay ariotchay, oughthray onyay anksray otay ideray;
Elfmysay illway armyay, andyay underthay atyay thyay idesay.
Enthay, oddessgay! aysay, allshay Ectorhay oryglay enthay?
(Atthay errortay ofyay ethay Eeksgray, atthay anmay ofyay enmay)
Enwhay Unojay’say elfsay, andyay Allaspay allshay appearyay,
Allyay eadfuldray inyay ethay imsoncray alksway ofyay arway!
Atwhay ightymay Ojantray enthay, onyay onderyay oreshay,
Expiringyay, alepay, andyay erribletay onay oremay,
Allshay eastfay ethay owlsfay, andyay utglay ethay ogsday ithway oregay?”

Eshay easedcay, andyay Unojay einray’day ethay eedsstay ithway arecay:
(Eavenhay’say awfulyay empressyay, Aturnsay’say otheryay eirhay:)
Allaspay, eanwhilemay, erhay ariousvay eilvay unboundyay,
Ithway owersflay adornyay’day, ithway artyay immortalyay owncray’day;
Ethay adiantray oberay erhay acredsay ingersfay oveway
Oatsflay inyay ichray avesway, andyay eadsspray ethay ourtcay ofyay Ovejay.
Erhay atherfay’say armsyay erhay ightymay imbslay investyay,
Ishay uirasscay azesblay onyay erhay ampleyay eastbray.
Ethay igorousvay owerpay ethay emblingtray arcay ascendsyay:
Ookshay byay erhay armyay, ethay assymay avelinjay endsbay:
Ugehay, onderouspay, ongstray! atthay enwhay erhay uryfay urnsbay
Oudpray antstyray umbleshay, andyay olewhay ostshay oyay’erturnsyay.

Aturniasay endslay ethay ashlay; ethay ourserscay flyay;
Oothsmay idesglay ethay ariotchay oughthray ethay iquidlay skyay.
Eavenhay’say atesgay ontaneousspay openyay otay ethay owerspay,
Eavenhay’say oldengay atesgay, eptkay byay ethay ingedway Ourshay.
Ommissioncay’day inyay alternateyay atchway eythay andstay,
Ethay unsay’say ightbray ortalspay andyay ethay iesskay ommandcay;
Oseclay, oryay unfoldyay, ethay eternalyay atesgay ofyay ayday
Arbay eavenhay ithway oudsclay, oryay ollray osethay oudsclay awayyay.
Ethay oundingsay ingeshay ingray, ethay oudsclay ivideday.
Onepray ownday ethay eepstay ofyay eavenhay eirthay oursecay eythay uidegay.
Utbay Ovejay, incensedyay, omfray Idayay’say optay urveysay’day,
Andyay usthay enjoinyay’day ethay anymay-olourcay’day aidmay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Unojay Andyay Inervamay Oinggay Otay Assistyay Ethay Eeksgray


“Aumantiathay! ountmay ethay indsway, andyay opstay eirthay arcay;
Againstyay ethay ighesthay owhay allshay ageway ethay arway?
Ifyay uriousfay etyay eythay areday ethay ainvay ebateday,
Usthay avehay Iyay okespay, andyay atwhay Iyay eakspay isyay atefay:
Eirthay ourserscay ushcray’day eneathbay ethay eelswhay allshay ielay,
Eirthay arcay inyay agmentsfray, atterscay’day oyay’eryay ethay skyay:
Myay ightninglay esethay ebelliousray allshay onfoundcay,
Andyay urlhay emthay amingflay, eadlonghay, otay ethay oundgray,
Ondemncay’day orfay entay evolvingray earsyay otay eepway
Ethay oundsway impressyay’day byay urningbay underthay eepday.
Osay allshay Inervamay earnlay otay earfay ouryay ireyay,
Ornay areday otay ombatcay ershay andyay aturenay’say iresay.
Orfay Unojay, eadstronghay andyay imperiousyay illstay,
Eshay aimsclay omesay itletay otay ansgresstray ouryay illway.”

Iftsway asyay ethay indway, ethay ariousvay-olourcay’day aidmay
Omfray Idayay’say optay erhay oldengay ingsway isplayday’day;
Otay eatgray Olympusyay’ iningshay ategay eshay iesflay,
Erethay eetsmay ethay ariotchay ushingray ownday ethay iesskay,
Estrainsray eirthay ogresspray omfray ethay ightbray abodesyay,
Andyay eaksspay ethay andatemay ofyay ethay iresay ofyay odsgay.

“Atwhay enzyfray oddessesgay! atwhay ageray ancay ovemay
Elestialcay indsmay otay empttay ethay athwray ofyay Ovejay?
Esistday, obedientyay otay ishay ighhay ommandcay:
Isthay isyay ishay ordway; andyay owknay ishay ordway allshay andstay:
Ishay ightninglay ouryay ebellionray allshay onfoundcay,
Andyay urlhay eyay eadlonghay, amingflay, otay ethay oundgray;
Ouryay orseshay ushcray’day eneathbay ethay eelswhay allshay ielay,
Ouryay arcay inyay agmentsfray atterscay’day oyay’eryay ethay skyay;
Ourselvesyay ondemncay’day entay ollingray earsyay otay eepway
Ethay oundsway impressyay’day byay urningbay underthay eepday.
Osay allshay Inervamay earnlay otay earfay ishay ireyay,
Ornay areday otay ombatcay ershay andyay aturenay’say iresay.
Orfay Unojay, eadstronghay andyay imperiousyay illstay,
Eshay aimsclay omesay itletay otay ansgresstray ishay illway:
Utbay eethay, atwhay esperateday insolenceyay ashay ivendray
Otay iftlay thyay ancelay againstyay ethay ingkay ofyay eavenhay?”

Enthay, ountingmay onyay ethay inionspay ofyay ethay indway,
Eshay ewflay; andyay Unojay usthay erhay ageray esignray’day:

“Oyay aughterday ofyay atthay odgay, osewhay armyay ancay ieldway
Ethay avengingyay oltbay, andyay akeshay ethay abersay ieldshay!
Onay oremay etlay eingsbay ofyay uperiorsay irthbay
Ontendcay ithway Ovejay orfay isthay owlay aceray ofyay earthyay;
Iumphanttray ownay, ownay iserablymay ainslay,
Eythay eathebray oryay erishpay asyay ethay atesfay ordainyay:
Utbay Ovejay’say ighhay ounselscay ullfay effectyay allshay indfay;
Andyay, everyay onstantcay, everyay uleray ankindmay.”

Eshay okespay, andyay ackwardbay urntay’day erhay eedsstay ofyay ightlay,
Adornyay’day ithway anesmay ofyay oldgay, andyay eavenlyhay ightbray.
Ethay Ourshay unloosedyay emthay, antingpay asyay eythay oodstay,
Andyay eaphay’day eirthay angersmay ithway ambrosialyay oodfay.
Erethay iedtay, eythay estray inyay ighhay elestialcay allsstay;
Ethay ariotchay opppray’day againstyay ethay alcrystay allsway,
Ethay ensivepay oddessesgay, abashyay’day, ontrollcay’day,
Ixmay ithway ethay odsgay, andyay illfay eirthay eatssay ofyay oldgay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Ethay Ourshay Akingtay Ethay Orseshay Omfray Unojay’Say Arcay


Andyay ownay ethay Undererthay editatesmay ishay ightflay
Omfray Idayay’say ummitssay otay ethay Olympianyay eighthay.
Iftersway anthay oughtthay, ethay eelswhay instinctiveyay flyay,
Ameflay oughthray ethay astvay ofyay airyay, andyay eachray ethay skyay.
’Astway Eptunenay’say argechay ishay ourserscay otay unbraceyay,
Andyay ixfay ethay arcay onyay itsyay immortalyay asebay;
Erethay oodstay ethay ariotchay, eamingbay orthfay itsyay aysray,
Illtay ithway ayay owysnay eilvay ehay eenscray’day ethay azeblay.
Ehay, osewhay allyay-onsciouscay eyesyay ethay orldway eholdbay,
Ethay eternalyay Undererthay atsay, enthronedyay inyay oldgay.
Ighhay eavenhay ethay ootstoolfay ofyay ishay eetfay ehay akesmay,
Andyay ideway eneathbay imhay allyay Olympusyay akesshay.
Emblingtray afaryay ethay offendingyay owerspay appearyay’day,
Onfusedcay andyay ilentsay, orfay ishay ownfray eythay earfay’day.
Ehay awsay eirthay oulsay, andyay usthay ishay ordway impartsyay:
“Allaspay andyay Unojay! aysay, whyay eavehay ouryay eartshay?
Oonsay asway ouryay attlebay oyay’eryay: oudpray Oytray etiredray
Eforebay ouryay acefay, andyay inyay ouryay athwray expiredyay.
Utbay owknay, oewhay’eryay almightyyay owerpay ithstandway!
Unmatchyay’day ouryay orcefay, unconqueryay’day isyay ouryay andhay:
Owhay allshay ethay overeignsay ofyay ethay iesskay ontrolcay?
Otnay allyay ethay odsgay atthay owncray ethay arrystay olepay.
Ouryay eartshay allshay embletray, ifyay ouryay armsyay eway aketay,
Andyay eachyay immortalyay ervenay ithway orrorhay akeshay.
Orfay usthay Iyay eakspay, andyay atwhay Iyay eakspay allshay andstay;
Atwhay owerpay oesay’eryay ovokespray ouryay iftedlay andhay,
Onyay isthay ouryay illhay onay oremay allshay oldhay ishay aceplay;
Utcay offyay, andyay exiledyay omfray ethay etherealyay aceray.”

Unojay andyay Allaspay ievinggray earhay ethay oomday,
Utbay eastfay eirthay oulssay onyay Ilionyay’say oesway otay omecay.
Oughthay ecretsay angeryay ellsway’day Inervamay’say eastbray,
Ethay udentpray oddessgay etyay erhay athwray epressray’day;
Utbay Unojay, impotentyay ofyay ageray, epliesray:
“Atwhay asthay outhay aidsay, Oyay anttyray ofyay ethay iesskay!
Engthstray andyay omnipotenceyay investyay thyay onethray;
’Istay inethay otay unishpay; oursyay otay ievegray aloneyay.
Orfay Eecegray eway ievegray, abandonyay’day byay erhay atefay
Otay inkdray ethay egsdray ofyay thyay unmeasuredyay atehay.
Omfray ieldsfay orbiddenfay eway ubmisssay efrainray,
Ithway armsyay unaidingyay eesay ouryay Argivesyay ainslay;
Etyay antgray ouryay ounselscay illstay eirthay eastsbray aymay ovemay,
Estlay allyay ouldshay erishpay inyay ethay ageray ofyay Ovejay.”

Ethay oddessgay usthay; andyay usthay ethay odgay epliesray,
Owhay ellssway ethay oudsclay, andyay ackensblay allyay ethay iesskay:

“Ethay orningmay unsay, awakedyay byay oudlay alarmsyay,
Allshay eesay ethay almightyyay Undererthay inyay armsyay.
Atwhay eapshay ofyay Argivesyay enthay allshay oadlay ethay ainplay,
Osethay adiantray eyesyay allshay iewvay, andyay iewvay inyay ainvay.
Ornay allshay eatgray Ectorhay easecay ethay ageray ofyay ightfay,
Ethay avynay amingflay, andyay thyay Eeksgray inyay ightflay,
Evenyay illtay ethay ayday enwhay ertaincay atesfay ordainyay
Atthay ernstay Achillesyay (ishay Atrocluspay ainslay)
Allshay iseray inyay engeancevay, andyay aylay asteway ethay ainplay.
Orfay uchsay isyay atefay, ornay anstcay outhay urntay itsyay oursecay
Ithway allyay thyay ageray, ithway allyay thyay ebelray orcefay.
Flyay, ifyay thyay iltway, otay earthyay’say emotestray oundbay,
Erewhay onyay erhay utmostyay ergevay ethay eassay esoundray;
Erewhay ursedcay Iapetusyay andyay Aturnsay elldway,
Astfay byay ethay inkbray, ithinway ethay eamsstray ofyay ellhay;
Onay unsay eyay’eryay ildsgay ethay oomyglay orrorshay erethay;
Onay eerfulchay alesgay efreshray ethay azylay airyay:
Erethay armyay onceyay oremay ethay oldbay Itaniantay andbay;
Andyay armyay inyay ainvay; orfay atwhay Iyay illway, allshay andstay.”

Ownay eepday inyay oceanyay unksay ethay amplay ofyay ightlay,
Andyay ewdray ehindbay ethay oudyclay eilvay ofyay ightnay:
Ethay onqueringcay Ojanstray ournmay ishay eamsbay ecayday’day;
Ethay Eeksgray ejoicingray essblay ethay iendlyfray adeshay.

Ethay ictorsvay eepkay ethay ieldfay; andyay Ectorhay allscay
Ayay artialmay ouncilcay earnay ethay avynay allsway;
Esethay otay Amanderscay’say ankbay apartyay ehay edlay,
Erewhay inlythay atterscay’day aylay ethay eapshay ofyay eadday.
Ethay assembledyay iefschay, escendingday onyay ethay oundgray,
Attendyay ishay orderyay, andyay eirthay incepray urroundsay.
Ayay assymay earspay ehay orebay ofyay ightymay engthstray,
Ofyay ullfay entay ubitscay asway ethay ancelay’say engthlay;
Ethay ointpay asway assbray, efulgentray otay eholdbay,
Ixfay’day otay ethay oodway ithway irclingcay ingsray ofyay oldgay:
Ethay oblenay Ectorhay onyay ishay ancelay eclinedray,
Andyay, endingbay orwardfay, usthay evealray’day ishay indmay:

“Eyay aliantvay Ojanstray, ithway attentionyay earhay!
Eyay Ardanday andsbay, andyay enerousgay aidsyay, ivegay earyay!
Isthay ayday, eway opedhay, ouldway apwray inyay onqueringcay ameflay
Eecegray ithway erhay ipsshay, andyay owncray ouryay oilstay ithway amefay.
Utbay arknessday ownay, otay avesay ethay owardscay, allsfay,
Andyay uardsgay emthay emblingtray inyay eirthay oodenway allsway.
Obeyyay ethay ightnay, andyay useyay erhay eacefulpay ourshay
Ouryay eedsstay otay oragefay, andyay efreshray ouryay owerspay.
Aightstray omfray ethay owntay ebay eepshay andyay oxenyay oughtsay,
Andyay engtheningstray eadbray andyay enerousgay ineway ebay oughtbray.
Ideway oyay’eryay ethay ieldfay, ighhay azingblay otay ethay skyay,
Etlay umerousnay iresfay ethay absentyay unsay upplysay,
Ethay amingflay ilespay ithway enteousplay uelfay aiseray,
Illtay ethay ightbray ornmay erhay urplepay eambay isplaysday;
Estlay, inyay ethay ilencesay andyay ethay adesshay ofyay ightnay,
Eecegray onyay erhay ablesay ipsshay attemptyay erhay ightflay.
Otnay unmolestedyay etlay ethay etcheswray aingay
Eirthay oftylay ecksday, oryay afelysay eaveclay ethay ainmay;
Omesay ostilehay oundway etlay everyyay artday estowbay,
Omesay astinglay okentay ofyay ethay Ianphrygay oefay,
Oundsway, atthay onglay encehay aymay askyay eirthay ousesspay’ arecay.
Andyay arnway eirthay ildrenchay omfray ayay Ojantray arway.
Ownay oughthray ethay ircuitcay ofyay ouryay Ilionyay allway,
Etlay acredsay eraldshay oundsay ethay olemnsay allcay;
Otay idbay ethay iressay ithway oaryhay onourshay owncray’day,
Andyay eardlessbay outhsyay, ouryay attlementsbay urroundsay.
Irmfay ebay ethay uardgay, ilewhay istantday ielay ouryay owerspay,
Andyay etlay ethay atronsmay anghay ithway ightslay ethay owerstay;
Estlay, underyay overtcay ofyay ethay idnightmay adeshay,
Ethay insidiousyay oefay ethay akednay owntay invadeyay.
Ufficesay, otay-ightnay, esethay ordersyay otay obeyyay;
Ayay oblernay argechay allshay ouseray ethay awningday ayday.
Ethay odsgay, Iyay usttray, allshay ivegay otay Ectorhay’say andhay
Omfray esethay etestedday oesfay otay eefray ethay andlay,
Owhay oughplay’day, ithway atesfay averseyay, ethay ateryway ayway:
Orfay Ojantray ulturesvay ayay edestinedpray eypray.
Ouryay ommoncay afetysay ustmay ebay ownay ethay arecay;
Utbay oonsay asyay orningmay aintspay ethay ieldsfay ofyay airyay,
Eathedshay inyay ightbray armsyay etlay everyyay ooptray engageyay,
Andyay ethay iredfay eetflay eholdbay ethay attlebay ageray.
Enthay, enthay allshay Ectorhay andyay Idestyday ovepray
Osewhay atesfay areyay eaviesthay inyay ethay alesscay ofyay Ovejay.
