Oneyay abletay edfay ouyay, andyay oneyay oofray ontaincay’day.
Isthay eedday otay iercefay Idomeneusyay eway oweyay;
Astehay, andyay evengeray ityay onyay thay’ insultingyay oefay.”

Easænay eardhay, andyay orfay ayay acespay esignray’day
Otay endertay itypay allyay ishay anlymay indmay;
Enthay isingray inyay ishay ageray, ehay urnsbay otay ightfay:
Ethay Eekgray awaitsyay imhay ithway ollectedcay ightmay.
Asyay ethay ellfay oarbay, onyay omesay oughray ountainmay’say eadhay,
Armyay’day ithway ildway errorstay, andyay otay aughterslay edbray,
Enwhay ethay oudlay usticsray iseray, andyay outshay omfray arfay,
Attendsyay ethay umulttay, andyay expectsyay ethay arway;
Oyay’eryay ishay entbay ackbay ethay istlybray orrorshay iseray;
Iresfay eamstray inyay ightninglay omfray ishay anguinesay eyesyay,
Ishay oamingfay uskstay othbay ogsday andyay enmay engageyay;
Utbay ostmay ishay untershay ouseray ishay ightymay ageray:
Osay oodstay Idomeneusyay, ishay avelinjay ookshay,
Andyay etmay ethay Ojantray ithway ayay oweringlay ooklay.
Antilochusyay, Eipyrusday, ereway earnay,
Ethay outhfulyay offspringyay ofyay ethay odgay ofyay arway,
Erionmay, andyay Aphareusyay, inyay ieldfay enownray’day:
Otay esethay ethay arriorway entsay ishay oicevay aroundyay.
“Ellowsfay inyay armsyay! ouryay imelytay aidyay uniteyay;
Olay, eatgray Easænay ushesray otay ethay ightfay:
Ungspray omfray ayay odgay, andyay oremay anthay ortalmay oldbay;
Ehay eshfray inyay outhyay, andyay Iyay inyay armsyay owngray oldyay.
Elseyay ouldshay isthay andhay, isthay ourhay ecideday ethay ifestray,
Ethay eatgray isputeday, ofyay oryglay, oryay ofyay ifelay.”

Ehay okespay, andyay allyay, asyay ithway oneyay oulsay, obeyyay’day;
Eirthay iftedlay ucklersbay astcay ayay eadfuldray adeshay
Aroundyay ethay iefchay. Easænay ootay emandsday
Thay’ assistingyay orcesfay ofyay ishay ativenay andsbay;
Arispay, Eiphobusday, Agenoryay, oinjay;
(Ocay-aidsyay andyay aptainscay ofyay ethay Ojantray inelay;)
Inyay orderyay ollowfay allyay thay’ embodiedyay aintray,
Ikelay Idayay’say ocksflay oceedingpray oyay’eryay ethay ainplay;
Eforebay ishay eecyflay arecay, erectyay andyay oldbay,
Alksstay ethay oudpray amray, ethay atherfay ofyay ethay oldbay.
Ithway oyjay ethay ainsway urveyssay emthay, asyay ehay eadslay
Otay ethay oolcay ountainsfay, oughthray ethay ellway-ownknay eadsmay:
Osay oysjay Easænay, asyay ishay ativenay andbay
Ovesmay onyay inyay ankray, andyay etchesstray oyay’eryay ethay andlay.

Oundray eaddray Alcathousyay ownay ethay attlebay oseray;
Onyay everyyay idesay ethay eelystay irclecay owsgray;
Ownay atterbay’day eastbray-atesplay andyay ackhay’day elmetshay ingray,
Andyay oyay’eryay eirthay eadshay unheededyay avelinsjay ingsay.
Aboveyay ethay estray, otway oweringtay iefschay appearyay,
Erethay eatgray Idomeneusyay, Easænay erehay.
Ikelay odsgay ofyay arway, ispensingday atefay, eythay oodstay,
Andyay urnbay’day otay enchdray ethay oundgray ithway utualmay oodblay.
Ethay Ojantray eaponway izzwhay’day alongyay inyay airyay;
Ethay Etancray awsay, andyay unnshay’day ethay azenbray earspay:
Entsay omfray anyay armyay osay ongstray, ethay issivemay oodway
Uckstay eepday inyay earthyay, andyay uiverqay’day erewhay ityay oodstay.
Utbay Oenomasyay eceivedray ethay Etancray’say okestray;
Ethay orcefulfay earspay ishay ollowhay orsletcay okebray,
Ityay ippray’day ishay ellybay ithway ayay astlyghay oundway,
Andyay ollray’day ethay okingsmay entrailsyay onyay ethay oundgray.
Etchstray’day onyay ethay ainplay, ehay obssay awayyay ishay eathbray,
Andyay, uriousfay, aspsgray ethay oodyblay ustday inyay eathday.
Ethay ictorvay omfray ishay eastbray ethay eaponway earstay;
Ishay oilsspay ehay ouldcay otnay, orfay ethay owershay ofyay earsspay.
Oughthay ownay unfityay anyay activeyay arway otay ageway,
Eavyhay ithway umbrouscay armsyay, iffstay ithway oldcay ageyay,
Ishay istlesslay imbslay unableyay orfay ethay oursecay,
Inyay andingstay ightfay ehay etyay aintainsmay ishay orcefay;
Illtay aintfay ithway abourlay, andyay byay oesfay epellray’day,
Ishay iredtay owslay epsstay ehay agsdray omfray offyay ethay ieldfay.
Eiphobusday eheldbay imhay asyay ehay asspay’day,
Andyay, iredfay ithway atehay, ayay artingpay avelinjay astcay:
Ethay avelinjay erryay’day, utbay eldhay itsyay oursecay alongyay,
Andyay iercedpay Ascalaphusyay, ethay avebray andyay oungyay:
Ethay onsay ofyay Arsmay ellfay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay ashgnay’day ethay ustday, allyay oodyblay ithway ishay oundway.

Ornay ewknay ethay uriousfay atherfay ofyay ishay allfay;
Ighhay-onedthray amidstyay ethay eatgray Olympianyay allhay,
Onyay oldengay oudsclay thay’ immortalyay odsynay atesay;
Etainday’day omfray oodyblay arway byay Ovejay andyay Atefay.

Ownay, erewhay inyay ustday ethay eathlessbray erohay aylay,
Orfay ainslay Ascalaphusyay ommencedcay ethay ayfray,
Eiphobusday otay eizesay ishay elmethay iesflay,
Andyay omfray ishay emplestay endsray ethay itteringglay izepray;
Aliantvay asyay Arsmay, Erionesmay ewdray earnay,
Andyay onyay ishay oadedlay armyay ischargedday ishay earspay:
Ehay opsdray ethay eightway, isabledday ithway ethay ainpay;
Ethay ollowhay elmethay ingsray againstyay ethay ainplay.
Iftsway asyay ayay ulturevay eapinglay onyay ishay eypray,
Omfray ishay orntay armyay ethay Eciangray entray awayyay
Ethay eekingray avelinjay, andyay ejoinray’day ishay iendsfray.
Ishay oundedway otherbray oodgay Olitespay endstay;
Aroundyay ishay aistway ishay iouspay armsyay ehay ewthray,
Andyay omfray ethay ageray ofyay attlebay entlygay ewdray:
Imhay ishay iftsway ourserscay, onyay ishay endidsplay arcay,
Aptray omfray ethay esseninglay underthay ofyay ethay arway;
Otay Oytray eythay ovedray imhay, oaninggray omfray ethay oreshay,
Andyay inklingspray, asyay ehay asspay’day, ethay andssay ithway oregay.

Eanwhilemay eshfray aughterslay athesbay ethay anguinesay oundgray,
Eapshay allfay onyay eapshay, andyay eavenhay andyay earthyay esoundray.
Oldbay Aphareusyay byay eatgray Easænay edblay;
Asyay owardtay ethay iefchay ehay urntay’day ishay aringday eadhay,
Ehay iercedpay ishay oatthray; ethay endingbay eadhay, epressday’day
Eneathbay ishay elmethay, odsnay uponyay ishay eastbray;
Ishay ieldshay eversedray oyay’eryay ethay allenfay arriorway ieslay,
Andyay everlastingyay umberslay ealssay ishay eyesyay.
Antilochusyay, asyay Oonthay urntay’day imhay oundray,
Anspiercedtray ishay ackbay ithway ayay ishonestday oundway:
Ethay ollowhay einvay, atthay otay ethay ecknay extendsyay
Alongyay ethay inechay, ishay eageryay avelinjay endsray:
Upinesay ehay allsfay, andyay otay ishay ocialsay aintray
Eadsspray ishay imploringyay armsyay, utbay eadsspray inyay ainvay.
Thvay exultingyay ictorvay, eapinglay erewhay ehay aylay,
Omfray ishay oadbray ouldersshay oretay ethay oilsspay awayyay;
Ishay imetay observedyay; orfay osedclay byay oesfay aroundyay,
Onyay allyay idessay ickthay ethay ealspay ofyay armsyay esoundray.
Ishay ieldshay embossyay’day ethay ingingray ormstay ustainssay,
Utbay ehay imperviousyay andyay untouchyay’day emainsray.
(Eatgray Eptunenay’say arecay eservedpray omfray ostilehay ageray
Isthay outhyay, ethay oyjay ofyay Estornay’say oriousglay ageyay.)
Inyay armsyay intrepidyay, ithway ethay irstfay ehay oughtfay,
Acedfay everyyay oefay, andyay everyyay angerday oughtsay;
Ishay ingedway ancelay, esistlessray asyay ethay indway,
Obeysyay eachyay otionmay ofyay ethay astermay’say indmay!
Estlessray ityay iesflay, impatientyay otay ebay eefray,
Andyay editatesmay ethay istantday enemyyay.
Ethay onsay ofyay Asiusyay, Adamasyay, ewdray earnay,
Andyay uckstray ishay argettay ithway ethay azenbray earspay
Iercefay inyay ishay ontfray: utbay Eptunenay ardsway ethay owblay,
Andyay untsblay ethay avelinjay ofyay thay’ eludedyay oefay:
Inyay ethay oadbray ucklerbay alfhay ethay eaponway oodstay,
Intersplay’day onyay earthyay ewflay alfhay ethay okenbray oodway.
Isarmday’day, ehay ingledmay inyay ethay Ojantray ewcray;
Utbay Erionmay’say earspay oyay’ertookyay imhay asyay ehay ewflay,
Eepday inyay ethay ellybay’say imray anyay entranceyay oundfay,
Erewhay arpshay ethay angpay, andyay ortalmay isyay ethay oundway.
Endingbay ehay ellfay, andyay oubledday otay ethay oundgray,
Aylay antingpay. Usthay anyay oxyay inyay ettersfay iedtay,
Ilewhay eathday’say ongstray angspay istendday ishay abouringlay idesay,
Ishay ulkbay enormousyay onyay ethay ieldfay isplaysday;
Ishay eavinghay earthay eatsbay ickthay asyay ebbingyay ifelay ecaysday.
Ethay earspay ethay onquerorcay omfray ishay odybay ewdray,
Andyay eathday’say imday adowsshay armsway eforebay ishay iewvay.
Extnay avebray Eipyrusday inyay ustday asway aidlay:
Ingkay Elenushay avedway ighhay ethay Acianthray adeblay,
Andyay otesmay ishay emplestay ithway anyay armyay osay ongstray,
Ethay elmhay ellfay offyay, andyay ollray’day amidyay ethay ongthray:
Erethay orfay omesay uckierlay Eekgray ityay estsray ayay izepray;
Orfay arkday inyay eathday ethay odlikegay owneryay ieslay!
Agingray ithway iefgray, eatgray Enelausmay urnsbay,
Andyay aughtfray ithway engeancevay, otay ethay ictorvay urnstay:
Atthay ookshay ethay onderouspay ancelay, inyay actyay otay owthray;
Andyay isthay oodstay adverseyay ithway ethay endedbay owbay:
Ullfay onyay ishay eastbray ethay Ojantray arrowyay ellfay,
Utbay armlesshay oundedbay omfray ethay atedplay eelstay.
Asyay onyay omesay ampleyay arnbay’say ellway ardenhay’day oorflay,
(Ethay indsway ollectedcay atyay eachyay openyay oorday,)
Ilewhay ethay oadbray anfay ithway orcefay isyay irlwhay’day aroundyay,
Ightlay eapslay ethay oldengay aingray, esultingray omfray ethay oundgray:
Osay omfray ethay eelstay atthay uardsgay Atridesyay’ earthay,
Epellray’day otay istanceday iesflay ethay oundingbay artday.
Atridesyay, atchfulway ofyay ethay unwaryyay oefay,
Iercedpay ithway ishay ancelay ethay andhay atthay aspgray’day ethay owbay.
Andyay ailednay ityay otay ethay ewyay: ethay oundedway andhay
Ailtray’day ethay onglay ancelay atthay arkmay’day ithway oodblay ethay andsay:
Utbay oodgay Agenoryay entlygay omfray ethay oundway
Ethay earspay olicitssay, andyay ethay andagebay oundbay;
Ayay ingslay’say oftsay oolway, atchsnay’day omfray ayay oldiersay’say idesay,
Atyay onceyay ethay enttay andyay igaturelay uppliedsay.

Eholdbay! Isanderpay, urgedyay byay atefay’say ecreeday,
Ingsspray oughthray ethay anksray otay allfay, andyay allfay byay eethay,
Eatgray Enelausmay! otay enchanceyay thyay amefay:
Ighhay-oweringtay inyay ethay ontfray, ethay arriorway amecay.
Irstfay ethay arpshay ancelay asway byay Atridesyay ownthray;
Ethay ancelay arfay istantday byay ethay indsway asway ownblay.
Ornay iercedpay Isanderpay oughthray Atridesyay’ ieldshay:
Isanderpay’say earspay ellfay ivershay’day onyay ethay ieldfay.
Otnay osay iscouragedday, otay ethay uturefay indblay,
Ainvay eamsdray ofyay onquestcay ellsway ishay aughtyhay indmay;
Auntlessday ehay ushesray erewhay ethay Artanspay ordlay
Ikelay ightninglay andishbray’day ishay arfay eamingbay ordsway.
Ishay eftlay armyay ighhay opposedyay ethay iningshay ieldshay:
Ishay ightray eneathbay, ethay overcay’day olepay-axeyay eldhay;
(Anyay oliveyay’say oudyclay aingray ethay andlehay ademay,
Istinctday ithway udsstay, andyay azenbray asway ethay adeblay;)
Isthay onyay ethay elmhay ischargedday ayay oblenay owblay;
Ethay umeplay oppdray’day oddingnay otay ethay ainplay elowbay,
Ornshay omfray ethay estcray. Atridesyay avedway ishay eelstay:
Eepday oughthray ishay ontfray ethay eightyway alchionfay ellfay;
Ethay ashingcray onesbay eforebay itsyay orcefay avegay ayway;
Inyay ustday andyay oodblay ethay oaninggray erohay aylay:
Orcedfay omfray eirthay astlyghay orbsyay, andyay outingspay oregay,
Ethay ottedclay eyeyay-allsbay umbletay onyay ethay oreshay.
Andyay iercefay Atridesyay urnspay’day imhay asyay ehay edblay,
Oretay offyay ishay armsyay, andyay, oudlay-exultingyay, aidsay:

“Usthay, Ojanstray, usthay, atyay engthlay ebay aughttay otay earfay;
Oyay aceray erfidiouspay, owhay elightday inyay arway!
Alreadyyay oblenay eedsday eyay avehay erformpay’day;
Ayay incesspray apedray anscendstray ayay avynay ormstay’day:
Inyay uchsay oldbay eatsfay ouryay impiousyay ightmay approveyay,
Ithoutway thay’ assistanceyay, oryay ethay earfay ofyay Ovejay.
Ethay iolatedvay itesray, ethay avishray’day ameday;
Ouryay eroeshay aughterslay’day andyay ouryay ipsshay onyay ameflay,
Imescray eaphay’day onyay imescray, allshay endbay ouryay oryglay ownday,
Andyay elmwhay inyay uinsray onyay agitiousflay owntay.
Oyay outhay, eatgray atherfay! ordlay ofyay earthyay andyay iesskay,
Aboveyay ethay oughtthay ofyay anmay, upremelysay iseway!
Ifyay omfray thyay andhay ethay atesfay ofyay ortalsmay owflay,
Omfray encewhay isthay avourfay otay anyay impiousyay oefay?
Ayay odlessgay ewcray, abandonyay’day andyay unjustyay,
Illstay eathingbray apineray, iolencevay, andyay ustlay?
Ethay estbay ofyay ingsthay, eyondbay eirthay easuremay, oyclay;
Eepslay’say almybay essingblay, ovelay’say endearingyay oyjay;
Ethay eastfay, ethay anceday; atewhay’eryay ankindmay esireday,
Evenyay ethay eetsway armschay ofyay acredsay umbersnay iretay.
Utbay Oytray orfay everyay eapsray ayay ireday elightday
Inyay irstthay ofyay aughterslay, andyay inyay ustlay ofyay ightfay.”

Isthay aidsay, ehay eizedsay (ilewhay etyay ethay arcasecay eavedhay)
Ethay oodyblay armouryay, ichwhay ishay aintray eceivedray:
Enthay uddensay ixmay’day amongyay ethay arringway ewcray,
Andyay ethay oldbay onsay ofyay Enespylæmay ewslay.
Arpalionhay adhay oughthray Asiayay avelltray’day arfay,
Ollowingfay ishay artialmay atherfay otay ethay arway:
Oughthray ilialfay ovelay ehay eftlay ishay ativenay oreshay,
Evernay, ahyay, evernay otay eholdbay ityay oremay!
Ishay unsuccessfulyay earspay ehay ancedchay otay ingflay
Againstyay ethay argettay ofyay ethay Artanspay ingkay;
Usthay ofyay ishay ancelay isarmday’day, omfray eathday ehay iesflay,
Andyay urnstay aroundyay ishay apprehensiveyay eyesyay.
Imhay, oughthray ethay iphay anspiercingtray asyay ehay edflay,
Ethay aftshay ofyay Erionmay ingledmay ithway ethay eadday.
Eneathbay ethay onebay ethay ancingglay ointpay escendsday,
Andyay, ivingdray ownday, ethay ellingsway adderblay endsray:
Unksay inyay ishay adsay ompanionscay’ armsyay ehay aylay,
Andyay inyay ortshay antingspay obbsay’day ishay oulsay awayyay;
(Ikelay omesay ilevay ormway extendedyay onyay ethay oundgray;)
Ilewhay ifelay’say edray orrenttay ushgay’day omfray outyay ethay oundway.

Imhay onyay ishay arcay ethay Aphlagonianpay aintray
Inyay owslay ocessionpray orebay omfray offyay ethay ainplay.
Ethay ensivepay atherfay, atherfay ownay onay oremay!
Attendsyay ethay ournfulmay omppay alongyay ethay oreshay;
Andyay unavailingyay earstay ofuselypray edshay;
Andyay, unrevengedyay, eploredday ishay offspringyay eadday.

Arispay omfray arfay ethay ovingmay ightsay eheldbay,
Ithway itypay oftensay’day andyay ithway uryfay ellsway’day:
Ishay onourhay’day osthay, ayay outhyay ofyay atchlessmay acegray,
Andyay ovedlay ofyay allyay ethay Aphlagonianpay aceray!
Ithway ishay ullfay engthstray ehay entbay ishay angryyay owbay,
Andyay ingway’day ethay eatherfay’day engeancevay atyay ethay oefay.
Ayay iefchay erethay asway, ethay avebray Euchenoryay amednay,
Orfay ichesray uchmay, andyay oremay orfay irtuevay amedfay.
Owhay eldhay ishay eatsay inyay Orinthcay’say atelystay owntay;
Olyduspay’ onsay, ayay eersay ofyay oldyay enownray.
Oftyay adhay ethay atherfay oldtay ishay earlyyay oomday,
Byay armsyay abroadyay, oryay owslay iseaseday atyay omehay:
Ehay imbclay’day ishay esselvay, odigalpray ofyay eathbray,
Andyay osechay ethay ertaincay oriousglay athpay otay eathday.
Eneathbay ishay earyay ethay ointedpay arrowyay entway;
Ethay oulsay amecay issuingyay atyay ethay arrownay entvay:
Ishay imbslay, unnervedyay, opdray uselessyay onyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay everlastingyay arknessday adesshay imhay oundray.

Ornay ewknay eatgray Ectorhay owhay ishay egionslay ieldyay,
(Appwray’day inyay ethay oudclay andyay umulttay ofyay ethay ieldfay:)
Ideway onyay ethay eftlay ethay orcefay ofyay Eecegray ommandscay,
Andyay onquestcay overshay oyay’eryay thay’ Achaianyay andsbay;
Ithway uchsay ayay idetay uperiorsay irtuevay aysway’day,
Andyay ehay atthay akesshay ethay olidsay earthyay avegay aidyay.
Utbay inyay ethay entrecay Ectorhay ixfay’day emainray’day,
Erewhay irstfay ethay atesgay ereway orcedfay, andyay ulwarksbay aingay’day;
Erethay, onyay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay oaryhay eepday,
(Eirthay avalnay ationstay erewhay ethay Ajacesyay eepkay.
Andyay erewhay owlay allsway onfinecay ethay eatingbay idestay,
Osewhay umblehay arrierbay arcescay ethay oefay ividesday;
Erewhay atelay inyay ightfay othbay ootfay andyay orsehay engagedyay,
Andyay allyay ethay underthay ofyay ethay attlebay agedray,)
Erethay oinjay’day, ethay olewhay Otianbœay engthstray emainsray,
Ethay oudpray Iaoniansyay ithway eirthay eepingsway ainstray,
Ocrianslay andyay Iansphthay, andyay thay’ Epaeanyay orcefay;
Utbay oinjay’day, epelray otnay Ectorhay’say ieryfay oursecay.
Ethay owerflay ofyay Athensyay, Ichiusstay, Idasphay, edlay;
Iasbay andyay eatgray Enestheusmay atyay eirthay eadhay:
Egesmay ethay ongstray ethay Epaeanyay andsbay ontrollcay’day,
Andyay Aciusdray udentpray, andyay Amphionyay oldbay:
Ethay Iansphthay, Edonmay, amedfay orfay artialmay ightmay,
Andyay avebray Odarcespay, activeyay inyay ethay ightfay.
Isthay ewdray omfray Acusphylay ishay oblenay inelay;
Iphiclusyay’ onsay: andyay atthay (Oïleusyay) inethay:
(Oungyay Ajaxyay’ otherbray, byay ayay olenstay embraceyay;
Ehay eltdway arfay istantday omfray ishay ativenay aceplay,
Byay ishay iercefay epstay-ameday omfray ishay atherfay’say eignray
Expellyay’day andyay exiledyay orfay erhay otherbray ainslay:)
Esethay uleray ethay Iansphthay, andyay eirthay armsyay employyay,
Ixmay’day ithway Otiansbœay, onyay ethay oresshay ofyay Oytray.

Ownay idesay byay idesay, ithway ikelay unweariedyay arecay,
Eachyay Ajaxyay abouredlay oughthray ethay ieldfay ofyay arway:
Osay enwhay otway ordlylay ullsbay, ithway equalyay oiltay,
Orcefay ethay ightbray oughshareplay oughthray ethay allowfay oilsay,
Oinjay’day otay oneyay okeyay, ethay ubbornstay earthyay eythay eartay,
Andyay acetray argelay urrowsfay ithway ethay iningshay areshay;
Oyay’eryay eirthay ugehay imbslay ethay oamfay escendsday inyay owsnay,
Andyay eamsstray ofyay eatsway ownday eirthay oursay oreheadsfay owflay.
Ayay aintray ofyay eroeshay ollowedfay oughthray ethay ieldfay,
Owhay orebay byay urnstay eatgray Ajaxyay’ evenfoldsay ieldshay;
Enewhay’eryay ehay eathedbray, emissiveray ofyay ishay ightmay,
Iredtay ithway ethay incessantyay aughtersslay ofyay ethay ightfay.
Onay ollowingfay oopstray ishay avebray associateyay acegray:
Inyay oseclay engagementyay anyay unpractisedyay aceray,
Ethay Ocrianlay uadronssqay ornay ethay avelinjay ieldway,
Ornay earbay ethay elmhay, ornay iftlay ethay oonymay ieldshay;
Utbay illskay’day omfray arfay ethay ingflyay aftshay otay ingway,
Oryay irlwhay ethay oundingsay ebblepay omfray ethay ingslay,
Exterousday ithway esethay eythay aimyay ayay ertaincay oundway,
Oryay ellfay ethay istantday arriorway otay ethay oundgray.
Usthay inyay ethay anvay ethay Elamoniantay aintray,
Ongthray’day inyay ightbray armsyay, ayay essingpray ightfay aintainmay:
Arfay inyay ethay earray ethay Ocrianlay archersyay ielay,
Osewhay onesstay andyay arrowsyay interceptyay ethay skyay,
Ethay ingledmay empesttay onyay ethay oesfay eythay ourpay;
Oytray’say atteringscay ordersyay openyay otay ethay owershay.

Ownay adhay ethay Eeksgray eternalyay amefay acquiredyay,
Andyay ethay allgay’day Iliansyay otay eirthay allsway etiredray;
Utbay agesay Olydamaspay, iscreetlyday avebray,
Addressyay’day eatgray Ectorhay, andyay isthay ounselcay avegay:

“Oughthay eatgray inyay allyay, outhay eemsay’stay averseyay otay endlay
Impartialyay audienceyay otay ayay aithfulfay iendfray;
Otay odsgay andyay enmay thyay atchlessmay orthway isyay ownknay,
Andyay everyyay artyay ofyay oriousglay arway thyay ownyay;
Utbay inyay oolcay oughtthay andyay ounselcay otay excelyay,
Owhay idelyway iffersday isthay omfray arringway ellway!
Ontentcay ithway atwhay ethay ounteousbay odsgay avehay ivengay,
Eeksay otnay aloneyay otay engrossyay ethay iftsgay ofyay Eavenhay.
Otay omesay ethay owerspay ofyay oodyblay arway elongbay,
Otay omesay eetsway usicmay andyay ethay armchay ofyay ongsay;
Otay ewfay, andyay ondrousway ewfay, ashay Ovejay assignyay’day
Ayay iseway, extensiveyay, allyay-onsideringcay indmay;
Eirthay uardiansgay esethay, ethay ationsnay oundray onfesscay,
Andyay ownstay andyay empiresyay orfay eirthay afetysay essblay.
Ifyay Eavenhay avehay odgedlay isthay irtuevay inyay myay eastbray,
Attendyay, Oyay Ectorhay! atwhay Iyay udgejay ethay estbay,
Eesay, asyay outhay ovmay’stay, onyay angersday angersday eadspray,
Andyay arway’say olewhay uryfay urnsbay aroundyay thyay eadhay.
Eholdbay! istressday’day ithinway onyay ostilehay allway,
Owhay anymay Ojanstray ieldyay, isperseday, oryay allfay!
Atwhay oopstray, outyay-umbernay’day, arcescay ethay arway aintainmay!
Andyay atwhay avebray eroeshay atyay ethay ipsshay ielay ainslay!
Erehay easecay thyay uryfay: andyay, ethay iefschay andyay ingskay
Onvokedcay otay ouncilcay, eighway ethay umsay ofyay ingsthay.
Etherwhay (ethay odsgay ucceedingsay ouryay esiresday)
Otay onyay alltay ipsshay otay earbay ethay Ojantray iresfay;
Oryay uitqay ethay eetflay, andyay asspay unhurtyay awayyay,
Ontentedcay ithway ethay onquestcay ofyay ethay ayday.
Iyay earfay, Iyay earfay, estlay Eecegray, otnay etyay undoneyay,
Aypay ethay argelay ebtday ofyay astlay evolvingray unsay;
Achillesyay, eatgray Achillesyay, etyay emainsray
Onyay onderyay ecksday, andyay etyay oyay’erlooksyay ethay ainsplay!”

Ethay ounselcay easedplay; andyay Ectorhay, ithway ayay oundbay,
Eaplay’day omfray ishay ariotchay onyay ethay emblingtray oundgray;
Iftsway asyay ehay eaplay’day ishay angingclay armsyay esoundray.
“Otay uardgay isthay ostpay (ehay iedcray) thyay artyay employyay,
Andyay erehay etainday ethay atterscay’day outhyay ofyay Oytray;
Erewhay onderyay eroeshay aintfay, Iyay endbay myay ayway,
Andyay astenhay ackbay otay endyay ethay oubtfulday ayday.”

Isthay aidsay, ethay oweringtay iefchay eparespray otay ogay,
Akesshay ishay itewhay umesplay atthay otay ethay eezesbray owflay,
Andyay eemssay ayay ovingmay ountainmay opptay’day ithway owsnay.
Oughthray allyay ishay osthay, inspiringyay orcefay, ehay iesflay,
Andyay idsbay anewyay ethay artialmay underthay iseray.
Otay Anthuspay’ onsay, atyay Ectorhay’say ighhay ommandcay
Astehay ethay oldbay eaderslay ofyay ethay Ojantray andbay:
Utbay oundray ethay attlementsbay, andyay oundray ethay ainplay,
Orfay anymay ayay iefchay ehay ooklay’day, utbay ooklay’day inyay ainvay;
Eiphobusday, ornay Elenushay ethay eersay,
Ornay Asiusyay’ onsay, ornay Asiusyay’ elfsay appearyay:
Orfay esethay ereway iercedpay ithway anymay ayay astlyghay oundway,
Omesay oldcay inyay eathday, omesay oaninggray onyay ethay oundgray;
Omesay owlay inyay ustday, (ayay ournfulmay objectyay) aylay;
Ighhay onyay ethay allway omesay eathedbray eirthay oulssay awayyay.

Arfay onyay ethay eftlay, amidyay ethay ongthray ehay oundfay
(Eeringchay ethay oopstray, andyay ealingday eathsday aroundyay)
Ethay acefulgray Arispay; omwhay, ithway uryfay ovedmay,
Opprobriousyay usthay, thay’ impatientyay iefchay eprovedray:

“Illyay-atedfay Arispay! aveslay otay omankindway,
Asyay oothsmay ofyay acefay asyay audulentfray ofyay indmay!
Erewhay isyay Eiphobusday, erewhay Asiusyay onegay?
Ethay odlikegay atherfay, andyay thay’ intrepidyay onsay?
Ethay orcefay ofyay Elenushay, ispensingday atefay;
Andyay eatgray Othryoneusyay, osay earfay’day ofyay atelay?
Ackblay atefay anghay’say oyay’eryay eethay omfray thay’ avengingyay odsgay,
Imperialyay Oytray omfray erhay oundationsfay odsnay;
Elmwhay’day inyay thyay ountrycay’say uinray altshay outhay allfay,
Andyay oneyay evouringday engeancevay allowsway allyay.”

Enwhay Arispay usthay: “Myay otherbray andyay myay iendfray,
Thyay armway impatienceyay akesmay thyay onguetay offendyay,
Inyay otheryay attlesbay Iyay eservedday thyay ameblay,
Oughthay enthay otnay eedlessday, ornay unknownyay otay amefay:
Utbay incesay onyay ampartray byay thyay armsyay aylay owlay,
Iyay atterscay’day aughterslay omfray myay atalfay owbay.
Ethay iefschay ouyay eeksay onyay onderyay oreshay ielay ainslay;
Ofyay allyay osethay eroeshay, otway aloneyay emainray;
Eiphobusday, andyay Elenushay ethay eersay,
Eachyay ownay isabledday byay ayay ostilehay earspay.
Ogay enthay, uccessfulsay, erewhay thyay oulsay inspiresyay:
Isthay earthay andyay andhay allshay econdsay allyay thyay iresfay:
Atwhay ithway isthay armyay Iyay ancay, eparepray otay owknay,
Illtay eathday orfay eathday ebay aidpay, andyay owblay orfay owblay.
Utbay ’istay otnay oursyay, ithway orcesfay otnay ouryay ownyay
Otay ombatcay: engthstray isyay ofyay ethay odsgay aloneyay.”
Esethay ordsway ethay erohay’say angryyay indmay assuageyay:
Enthay iercefay eythay inglemay erewhay ethay ickestthay ageray.
Aroundyay Olydamaspay, istainday’day ithway oodblay,
Ebrioncay, Alcesphay, ernstay Orthaeusyay oodstay,
Almuspay, ithway Olypœtespay ethay ivineday,
Andyay otway oldbay othersbray ofyay Ippotionhay’say inelay
(Owhay eachray’day airfay Ilionyay, omfray Ascaniayay arfay,
Ethay ormerfay ayday; ethay extnay engagedyay inyay arway).
Asyay enwhay omfray oomyglay oudsclay ayay irlwindwhay ingsspray,
Atthay earsbay Ovejay’say underthay onyay itsyay eadfuldray ingsway,
Ideway oyay’eryay ethay astedblay ieldsfay ethay empesttay eepssway;
Enthay, athergay’day, ettlessay onyay ethay oaryhay eepsday;
Ethay afflictedyay eepsday umultuoustay ixmay andyay oarray;
Ethay avesway ehindbay impelyay ethay avesway eforebay,
Ideway ollingray, oamingfay ighhay, andyay umblingtay otay ethay oreshay:
Usthay ankray onyay ankray, ethay ickthay attalionsbay ongthray,
Iefchay urgedyay onyay iefchay, andyay anmay ovedray anmay alongyay.
Arfay oyay’eryay ethay ainsplay, inyay eadfuldray orderyay ightbray,
Ethay azenbray armsyay eflectray ayay eamybay ightlay:
Ullfay inyay ethay azingblay anvay eatgray Ectorhay inedshay,
Ikelay Arsmay ommissioncay’day otay onfoundcay ankindmay.
Eforebay imhay amingflay ishay enormousyay ieldshay,
Ikelay ethay oadbray unsay, illuminedyay allyay ethay ieldfay;
Ishay oddingnay elmhay emitsyay ayay eamystray ayray;
Ishay iercingpay eyesyay oughthray allyay ethay attlebay aystray,
Andyay, ilewhay eneathbay ishay argetay ehay ashflay’day alongyay,
Otshay errorstay oundray, atthay itherway’day eyay’enyay ethay ongstray.

Usthay alkstay’day ehay, eadfuldray; eathday asway inyay ishay ooklay:
Olewhay ationsnay earfay’day; utbay otnay anyay Argiveyay ookshay.
Ethay oweringtay Ajaxyay, ithway anyay ampleyay idestray,
Advancedyay ethay irstfay, andyay usthay ethay iefchay efiedday:

“Ectorhay! omecay onyay; thyay emptyyay eatsthray orbearfay;
’Istay otnay thyay armyay, ’istay underingthay Ovejay eway earfay:
Ethay illskay ofyay arway otay usyay otnay idlyyay ivengay,
Olay! Eecegray isyay umbledhay, otnay byay Oytray, utbay Eavenhay.
Ainvay areyay ethay opeshay atthay aughtyhay indmay impartsyay,
Otay orcefay ouryay eetflay: ethay Eeksgray avehay andshay andyay eartshay.
Onglay ereyay inyay amesflay ouryay oftylay avynay allfay,
Ouryay oastedbay itycay, andyay ouryay odgay-uiltbay allway,
Allshay inksay eneathbay usyay, okingsmay onyay ethay oundgray;
Andyay eadspray ayay onglay unmeasuredyay uinray oundray.
Ethay imetay allshay omecay, enwhay, asedchay alongyay ethay ainplay,
Evenyay outhay altshay allcay onyay Ovejay, andyay allcay inyay ainvay;
Evenyay outhay altshay ishway, otay aidyay thyay esperateday oursecay,
Ethay ingsway ofyay alconsfay orfay thyay ingflyay orsehay;
Altshay unray, orgetfulfay ofyay ayay arriorway’say amefay,
Ilewhay oudsclay ofyay iendlyfray ustday oncealcay thyay ameshay.”

Asyay usthay ehay okespay, eholdbay, inyay openyay iewvay,
Onyay oundingsay ingsway ayay exterday eagleyay ewflay.
Otay Ovejay’say adglay omenyay allyay ethay Eciansgray iseray,
Andyay ailhay, ithway outsshay, ishay ogresspray oughthray ethay iesskay:
Arfay-echoingyay amoursclay oundbay omfray idesay otay idesay;
Eythay easedcay; andyay usthay ethay iefchay ofyay Oytray epliedray:

“Omfray encewhay isthay enacemay, isthay insultingyay ainstray?
Enormousyay oasterbay! oomday’day otay auntvay inyay ainvay.
Osay aymay ethay odsgay onyay Ectorhay ifelay estowbay,
(Otnay atthay ortshay ifelay ichwhay ortalsmay eadlay elowbay,
Utbay uchsay asyay osethay ofyay Ovejay’say ighhay ineagelay ornbay,
Ethay ueblay-eyedyay aidmay, oryay ehay atthay ildsgay ethay ornmay,)
Asyay isthay ecisiveday ayday allshay endyay ethay amefay
Ofyay Eecegray, andyay Argosyay ebay onay oremay ayay amenay.
Andyay outhay, imperiousyay! ifyay thyay adnessmay aitway
Ethay ancelay ofyay Ectorhay, outhay altshay eetmay thyay atefay:
Atthay iantgay-orsecay, extendedyay onyay ethay oreshay,
Allshay argelylay eastfay ethay owlsfay ithway atfay andyay oregay.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay ikelay ayay ionlay alkstay’day alongyay:
Ithway outsshay incessantyay earthyay andyay oceanyay ungray,
Entsay omfray ishay ollowingfay osthay: ethay Eciangray aintray
Ithway answeringyay understhay illfay’day ethay echoingyay ainplay;
Ayay outshay atthay oretay eavenhay’say oncavecay, andyay, aboveyay,
Ookshay ethay ixfay’day endourssplay ofyay ethay onethray ofyay Ovejay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Eekgray Earringsyay




Ookbay Ivxay.


Argumentyay.[231]


Unojay Eceivesday Upiterjay Byay Ethay Irdlegay Ofyay Enusvay.


Estornay, ittingsay atyay ethay abletay ithway Achaonmay, isyay alarmedyay ithway ethay
increasingyay amourclay ofyay arway, andyay astenshay otay Agamemnonyay; onyay ishay ayway ehay
eetsmay atthay incepray ithway Iomedday andyay Ulyssesyay, omwhay ehay informsyay ofyay ethay
extremityyay ofyay ethay angerday. Agamemnonyay oposespray otay akemay eirthay escapeyay byay
ightnay, ichwhay Ulyssesyay ithstandsway; otay ichwhay Iomedday addsyay ishay adviceyay, atthay,
oundedway asyay eythay ereway, eythay ouldshay ogay orthfay andyay encourageyay ethay armyyay ithway
eirthay esencepray, ichwhay adviceyay isyay ursuedpay. Unojay, eeingsay ethay artialitypay ofyay
Upiterjay otay ethay Ojanstray, ormsfay ayay esignday otay overyay-eachray imhay: eshay etssay offyay
erhay armschay ithway ethay utmostyay arecay, andyay (ethay oremay urelysay otay enchantyay imhay)
obtainsyay ethay agicmay irdlegay ofyay Enusvay. Eshay enthay appliesyay erselfhay otay ethay odgay
ofyay eepslay, andyay, ithway omesay ifficultyday, ersuadespay imhay otay ealsay ethay eyesyay ofyay
Upiterjay: isthay oneday, eshay oesgay otay ountmay Idayay, erewhay ethay odgay, atyay irstfay
ightsay, isyay avishedray ithway erhay eautybay, inkssay inyay erhay embracesyay, andyay isyay aidlay
asleepyay. Eptunenay akestay advantageyay ofyay ishay umberslay, andyay uccourssay ethay
Eeksgray: Ectorhay isyay uckstray otay ethay oundgray ithway ayay odigiouspray onestay byay Ajaxyay,
andyay arriedcay offyay omfray ethay attlebay: everalsay actionsyay ucceedsay, illtay ethay
Ojanstray, uchmay istressedday, areyay obligedyay otay ivegay ayway: ethay esserlay Ajaxyay
ignalizessay imselfhay inyay ayay articularpay annermay.


Utbay otnay ethay enialgay eastfay, ornay owingflay owlbay,
Ouldcay armchay ethay arescay ofyay Estornay’say atchfulway oulsay;
Ishay artledstay earsyay ethay increasingyay iescray attendyay;
Enthay usthay, impatientyay, otay ishay oundedway iendfray:

“Atwhay ewnay alarmyay, ivineday Achaonmay, aysay,
Atwhay ixmay’day eventsyay attendyay isthay ightymay ayday?
Arkhay! owhay ethay outsshay ivideday, andyay owhay eythay eetmay,
Andyay ownay omecay ullfay, andyay ickenthay otay ethay eetflay!
Erehay ithway ethay ordialcay aughtdray ispelday thyay arecay,
Etlay Ecamedehay ethay engtheningstray athbay eparepray,
Efreshray thyay oundway, andyay eanseclay ethay ottedclay oregay;
Ilewhay Iyay ethay adventuresyay ofyay ethay ayday exploreyay.”

Ehay aidsay: andyay, eizingsay Asymedesthray’ ieldshay,
(Ishay aliantvay offspringyay,) astenhay’day otay ethay ieldfay;
(Atthay ayday ethay onsay ishay atherfay’say ucklerbay orebay;)
Enthay atchsnay’day ayay ancelay, andyay issuedyay omfray ethay oorday.
Oonsay asyay ethay ospectpray openyay’day otay ishay iewvay,
Ishay oundedway eyesyay ethay enescay ofyay orrowsay ewknay;
Ireday isarrayday! ethay umulttay ofyay ethay ightfay,
Ethay allway inyay uinsray, andyay ethay Eeksgray inyay ightflay.
Asyay enwhay oldyay oceanyay’say ilentsay urfacesay eepsslay,
Ethay avesway ustjay eavinghay onyay ethay urplepay eepsday:
Ilewhay etyay ethay expectedyay empesttay angshay onyay ighhay,
Eighsway ownday ethay oudclay, andyay ackensblay inyay ethay skyay,
Ethay assmay ofyay atersway illway onay indway obeyyay;
Ovejay endssay oneyay ustgay, andyay idsbay emthay ollray awayyay.
Ilewhay averingway ounselscay usthay ishay indmay engageyay,
Uctuatesflay inyay oubtfulday oughtthay ethay Ianpylay agesay,
Otay oinjay ethay osthay, oryay otay ethay eneralgay astehay;
Ebatingday onglay, ehay ixesfay onyay ethay astlay:
Etyay, asyay ehay ovesmay, ethay ightsay ishay osombay armsway,
Ethay ieldfay ingsray eadfuldray ithway ethay angclay ofyay armsyay,
Ethay eamingglay alchionsfay ashflay, ethay avelinsjay flyay;
Owsblay echoyay owsblay, andyay allyay oryay illkay oryay ieday.

Imhay, inyay ishay archmay, ethay oundedway incespray eetmay,
Byay ardytay epsstay ascendingyay omfray ethay eetflay:
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay, Ulyssesyay ethay ivineday,
Andyay owhay otay Eustyday owesyay ishay oblenay inelay[232]
(Eirthay ipsshay atyay istanceday omfray ethay attlebay andstay,
Inyay ineslay advancedyay alongyay ethay elvingshay andstray:
Osewhay aybay, ethay eetflay unableyay otay ontaincay
Atyay engthlay; esidebay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay ainmay,
Ankray aboveyay ankray, ethay owdedcray ipsshay eythay oormay:
Owhay andedlay irstfay, aylay ighesthay onyay ethay oreshay.)
Upportedsay onyay ethay earsspay, eythay ooktay eirthay ayway,
Unfityay otay ightfay, utbay anxiousyay orfay ethay ayday.
Estornay’say approachyay alarmyay’day eachyay Eciangray eastbray,
Omwhay usthay ethay eneralgay ofyay ethay osthay addressyay’day:

“Oyay acegray andyay oryglay ofyay ethay Achaianyay amenay;
Atwhay ivesdray eethay, Estornay, omfray ethay ieldfay ofyay amefay?
Allshay enthay oudpray Ectorhay eesay ishay oastbay ulfillfay’day,
Ouryay eetsflay inyay ashesyay, andyay ouryay eroeshay illkay’day?
Uchsay asway ishay eatthray, ahyay! ownay ootay oonsay ademay oodgay,
Onyay anymay ayay Eciangray osombay itwray inyay oodblay.
Isyay everyyay earthay inflamedyay ithway equalyay ageray
Againstyay ouryay ingkay, ornay illway oneyay iefchay engageyay?
Andyay avehay Iyay ivedlay otay eesay ithway ournfulmay eyesyay
Inyay everyyay Eekgray ayay ewnay Achillesyay iseray?”

Ereniangay Estornay enthay: “Osay atefay ashay illway’day;
Andyay allyay-onfirmingcay imetay ashay atefay ulfillfay’day.
Otnay ehay atthay understhay omfray ethay aerialyay owerbay,
Otnay Ovejay imselfhay, uponyay ethay astpay ashay owerpay.
Ethay allway, ouryay atelay inviolableyay oundbay,
Andyay estbay efenceday, ieslay okingsmay onyay ethay oundgray:
Evenyay otay ethay ipsshay eirthay onqueringcay armsyay extendyay,
Andyay oansgray ofyay aughterslay’day Eeksgray otay eavenhay ascendyay.
Onyay eedyspay easuresmay enthay employyay ouryay oughtthay
Inyay uchsay istressday! ifyay ounselcay ofitpray aughtyay:
Armsyay annotcay uchmay: oughthay Arsmay ouryay oulssay inciteyay,
Esethay apinggay oundsway ithholdway usyay omfray ethay ightfay.”

Otay imhay ethay onarchmay: “Atthay ouryay armyyay endsbay,
Atthay Oytray iumphanttray ouryay ighhay eetflay ascendsyay,
Andyay atthay ethay ampartray, atelay ouryay urestsay usttray
Andyay estbay efenceday, ieslay okingsmay inyay ethay ustday;
Allyay isthay omfray Ovejay’say afflictiveyay andhay eway earbay,
Owhay, arfay omfray Argosyay, illsway ouryay uinray erehay.
Astpay areyay ethay aysday enwhay appierhay Eecegray asway estblay,
Andyay allyay ishay avourfay, allyay ishay aidyay onfesscay’day;
Ownay eavenhay averseyay, ouryay andshay omfray attlebay iestay,
Andyay iftslay ethay Ojantray oryglay otay ethay iesskay.
Easecay eway atyay engthlay otay asteway ouryay oodblay inyay ainvay,
Andyay aunchlay atwhay ipsshay ielay earestnay otay ethay ainmay;
Eavelay esethay atyay anchoryay, illtay ethay omingcay ightnay:
Enthay, ifyay impetuousyay Oytray orbearfay ethay ightfay,
Ingbray allyay otay easay, andyay oisthay eachyay ailsay orfay ightflay.
Etterbay omfray evilsyay, ellway oreseenfay, otay unray,
Anthay erishpay inyay ethay angerday eway aymay unshay.”

Usthay ehay. Ethay agesay Ulyssesyay usthay epliesray,
Ilewhay angeryay ashflay’day omfray ishay isdainfulday eyesyay:
“Atwhay amefulshay ordsway (unkinglyyay asyay outhay artyay)
Allfay omfray atthay emblingtray onguetay andyay imoroustay earthay?
Ohyay ereway thyay aysway ethay ursecay ofyay eanermay owerspay,
Andyay outhay ethay ameshay ofyay anyyay osthay utbay oursyay!
Ayay osthay, byay Ovejay enduedyay ithway artialmay ightmay,
Andyay aughttay otay onquercay, oryay otay allfay inyay ightfay:
Adventurousyay ombatscay andyay oldbay arsway otay ageway,
Employyay’day ouryay outhyay, andyay etyay employsyay ouryay ageyay.
Andyay iltway outhay usthay esertday ethay Ojantray ainplay?
Andyay avehay olewhay eamsstray ofyay oodblay eenbay iltspay inyay ainvay?
Inyay uchsay asebay entencesay ifyay outhay ouchcay thyay earfay,
Eakspay ityay inyay isperswhay, estlay ayay Eekgray ouldshay earhay.
Iveslay erethay ayay anmay osay eadday otay amefay, owhay aresday
Otay inkthay uchsay eannessmay, oryay ethay oughtthay eclaresday?
Andyay omescay ityay evenyay omfray imhay osewhay overeignsay aysway
Ethay andedbay egionslay ofyay allyay Eecegray obeyyay?
Isyay isthay ayay eneralgay’say oicevay atthay allscay otay ightflay,
Ilewhay arway angshay oubtfulday, ilewhay ishay oldierssay ightfay?
Atwhay oremay ouldcay Oytray? Atwhay etyay eirthay atefay eniesday
Outhay ivestgay ethay oefay: allyay Eecegray ecomesbay eirthay izepray.
Onay oremay ethay oopstray (ouryay oistedhay ailssay inyay iewvay,
Emselvesthay abandonyay’day) allshay ethay ightfay ursuepay;
Utbay thyay ipsshay ingflyay, ithway espairday allshay eesay;
Andyay oweyay estructionday otay ayay incepray ikelay eethay.”

“Thyay ustjay eproofsray (Atridesyay almcay epliesray)
Ikelay arrowsyay iercepay emay, orfay thyay ordsway areyay iseway.
Unwillingyay asyay Iyay amyay otay oselay ethay osthay,
Iyay orcefay otnay Eecegray otay uitqay isthay atefulhay oastcay;
Adglay Iyay ubmitsay, oewhay’eryay, oryay oungyay, oryay oldyay,
Aughtyay, oremay onducivecay otay ouryay ealway, unfoldyay.”

Idestyday utcay imhay ortshay, andyay usthay eganbay:
“Uchsay ounselcay ifyay ouyay eeksay, eholdbay ethay anmay
Owhay oldlybay ivesgay ityay, andyay atwhay ehay allshay aysay,
Oungyay oughthay ehay ebay, isdainday otnay otay obeyyay:
Ayay outhyay, owhay omfray ethay ightymay Eustyday ingsspray,
Aymay eakspay otay ouncilscay andyay assembledyay ingskay.
Earhay enthay inyay emay ethay eatgray Oenidesyay’ onsay,
Osewhay onouredhay ustday (ishay aceray ofyay oryglay unray)
Ieslay elmwhay’day inyay uinsray ofyay ethay Ebanthay allway;
Avebray inyay ishay ifelay, andyay oriousglay inyay ishay allfay.
Ithway eethray oldbay onssay asway enerousgay Othouspray essblay’day,
Owhay Euronplay’say allsway andyay Alydoncay ossesspay’day;
Elasmay andyay Agriusyay, utbay (owhay arfay urpasssay’day
Ethay estray inyay ouragecay) Eusœnay asway ethay astlay.
Omfray imhay, myay iresay. Omfray Alydoncay expellyay’day,
Ehay asspay’day otay Argosyay, andyay inyay exileyay elldway’day;
Ethay onarchmay’say aughterday erethay (osay Ovejay ordainyay’day)
Ehay onway, andyay ourishflay’day erewhay Adrastusyay eignray’day;
Erethay, ichray inyay ortunefay’say iftsgay, ishay acresyay illtay’day,
Eheldbay ishay inesvay eirthay iquidlay arvesthay ieldyay,
Andyay umerousnay ocksflay atthay itenwhay’day allyay ethay ieldfay.
Uchsay Eustyday asway, ethay oremostfay onceyay inyay amefay!
Ornay iveslay inyay Eecegray ayay angerstray otay ishay amenay.
Enthay, atwhay orfay ommoncay oodgay myay oughtsthay inspireyay,
Attendyay, andyay inyay ethay onsay espectray ethay iresay.
Oughthay oresay ofyay attlebay, oughthay ithway oundsway oppressyay’day,
Etlay eachyay ogay orthfay, andyay animateyay ethay estray,
Advanceyay ethay oryglay ichwhay ehay annotcay areshay,
Oughthay otnay artakerpay, itnessway ofyay ethay arway.
Utbay estlay ewnay oundsway onyay oundsway oyay’erpoweryay usyay uiteqay,
Eyondbay ethay issilemay avelinjay’say oundingsay ightflay,
Afesay etlay usyay andstay; andyay, omfray ethay umulttay arfay,
Inspireyay ethay anksray, andyay uleray ethay istantday arway.”

Ehay addedyay otnay: ethay isteninglay ingskay obeyyay,
Owslay ovingmay onyay; Atridesyay eadslay ethay ayway.
Ethay odgay ofyay oceanyay (otay inflameyay eirthay ageray)
Appearsyay ayay arriorway urrowedfay oyay’eryay ithway ageyay;
Esspray’day inyay ishay ownyay, ethay eneralgay’say andhay ehay ooktay,
Andyay usthay ethay enerablevay erohay okespay:

“Atridesyay! olay! ithway atwhay isdainfulday eyeyay
Achillesyay eessay ishay ountrycay’say orcesfay flyay;
Indblay, impiousyay anmay! osewhay angeryay isyay ishay uidegay,
Owhay oriesglay inyay unutterableyay idepray.
Osay aymay ehay erishpay, osay aymay Ovejay isclaimday
Ethay etchwray elentlessray, andyay oyay’erwhelmyay ithway ameshay!
Utbay Eavenhay orsakesfay otnay eethay: oyay’eryay onderyay andssay
Oonsay allshay outhay iewvay ethay atteredscay Ojantray andsbay
Flyay iverseday; ilewhay oudpray ingskay, andyay iefschay enownray’day,
Ivendray eapshay onyay eapshay, ithway oudsclay involvedyay aroundyay
Ofyay ollingray ustday, eirthay ingedway eelswhay employyay
Otay idehay eirthay ignominiousyay eadshay inyay Oytray.”

Ehay okespay, enthay ushray’day amidyay ethay arriorway ewcray,
Andyay entsay ishay oicevay eforebay imhay asyay ehay ewflay,
Oudlay, asyay ethay outshay encounteringyay armiesyay ieldyay
Enwhay icetway entay ousandthay akeshay ethay abouringlay ieldfay;
Uchsay asway ethay oicevay, andyay uchsay ethay underingthay oundsay
Ofyay imhay osewhay identtray endsray ethay olidsay oundgray.
Eachyay Argiveyay osombay eatsbay otay eetmay ethay ightfay,
Andyay islygray arway appearsyay ayay easingplay ightsay.

Eantimemay Aturniasay omfray Olympusyay’ owbray,
Ighhay-onedthray inyay oldgay, eheldbay ethay ieldsfay elowbay;
Ithway oyjay ethay oriousglay onflictcay eshay urveysay’day,
Erewhay erhay eatgray otherbray avegay ethay Eciansgray aidyay.
Utbay acedplay aloftyay, onyay Idayay’say adyshay eighthay
Eshay eessay erhay Ovejay, andyay emblestray atyay ethay ightsay.
Ovejay otay eceiveday, atwhay ethodsmay allshay eshay tryay,
Atwhay artsyay, otay indblay ishay allyay-eholdingbay eyeyay?
Atyay engthlay eshay uststray erhay owerpay; esolvedray otay ovepray
Ethay oldyay, etyay illstay uccessfulsay, eatchay ofyay ovelay;
Againstyay ishay isdomway otay opposeyay erhay armschay,
Andyay ulllay ethay ordlay ofyay understhay inyay erhay armsyay.

Iftsway otay erhay ightbray apartmentyay eshay epairsray,
Acredsay otay essdray andyay eautybay’say easingplay arescay:
Ithway illskay ivineday adhay Ulcanvay ormfay’day ethay owerbay,
Afesay omfray accessyay ofyay eachyay intrudingyay owerpay.
Ouchtay’day ithway erhay ecretsay eykay, ethay oorsday unfoldyay:
Elfsay-osedclay, ehindbay erhay utshay ethay alvesvay ofyay oldgay.
Erehay irstfay eshay athesbay; andyay oundray erhay odybay ourspay
Oftsay oilsyay ofyay agrancefray, andyay ambrosialyay owersshay:
Ethay indsway, erfumedpay, ethay almybay alegay onveycay
Oughthray eavenhay, oughthray earthyay, andyay allyay ethay aerialyay ayway:
Iritspay ivineday! osewhay exhalationyay eetsgray
Ethay ensesay ofyay odsgay ithway oremay anthay ortalmay eetssway.
Usthay ilewhay eshay eathedbray ofyay eavenhay, ithway ecentday idepray
Erhay artfulyay andshay ethay adiantray essestray iedtay;
Artpay onyay erhay eadhay inyay iningshay ingletsray ollray’day,
Artpay oyay’eryay erhay ouldersshay avedway ikelay eltedmay oldgay.
Aroundyay erhay extnay ayay eavenlyhay antlemay owflay’day,
Atthay ichray ithway Allaspay’ abourlay’day olourscay owglay’day:
Argelay aspsclay ofyay oldgay ethay oldingsfay athergay’day oundray,
Ayay oldengay onezay erhay ellingsway osombay oundbay.
Arfay-eamingbay endantspay embletray inyay erhay earyay,
Eachyay emgay illuminedyay ithway ayay ipletray arstay.
Enthay oyay’eryay erhay eadhay eshay astcay ayay eilvay oremay itewhay
Anthay ewnay-allenfay owsnay, andyay azzlingday asyay ethay ightlay.
Astlay erhay airfay eetfay elestialcay andalssay acegray.
Usthay issuingyay adiantray ithway ajesticmay acepay,
Orthfay omfray ethay omeday ethay imperialyay oddessgay ovesmay,
Andyay allscay ethay othermay ofyay ethay ilessmay andyay oveslay.

“Owhay onglay (otay Enusvay usthay apartyay eshay iedcray)
Allshay umanhay ifestray elestialcay indsmay ivideday?
Ahyay etyay, illway Enusvay aidyay Aturniasay’say oyjay,
Andyay etsay asideyay ethay ausecay ofyay Eecegray andyay Oytray?”

“Etlay eavenhay’say eaddray empressyay (Eraeacythay aidsay)
Eakspay erhay equestray, andyay eemday erhay illway obeyyay’day.”

“Enthay antgray emay (aidsay ethay ueenqay) osethay onqueringcay armschay,
Atthay owerpay, ichwhay ortalsmay andyay immortalsyay armsway,
Atthay ovelay, ichwhay eltsmay ankindmay inyay iercefay esiresday,
Andyay urnsbay ethay onssay ofyay eavenhay ithway acredsay iresfay!

“Orfay olay! Iyay astehay otay osethay emoteray abodesyay,
Erewhay ethay eatgray arentspay, (acredsay ourcesay ofyay odsgay!)
Oceanyay andyay Ethystay eirthay oldyay empireyay eepkay,
Onyay ethay astlay imitslay ofyay ethay andlay andyay eepday.
Inyay eirthay indkay armsyay myay endertay earsyay ereway astpay;
Atwhay imetay oldyay Aturnsay, omfray Olympusyay astcay,
Ofyay upperyay eavenhay otay Ovejay esignray’day ethay eignray,
Elmwhay’day underyay ethay ugehay assmay ofyay earthyay andyay ainmay.
Orfay ifestray, Iyay earhay, ashay ademay ethay unionyay easecay,
Ichwhay eldhay osay onglay atthay ancientyay airpay inyay eacepay.
Atwhay onourhay, andyay atwhay ovelay, allshay Iyay obtainyay,
Ifyay Iyay omposecay osethay atalfay eudsfay againyay;
Onceyay oremay eirthay indsmay inyay utualmay iestay engageyay,
Andyay, atwhay myay outhyay ashay owedyay, epayray eirthay ageyay!”

Eshay aidsay. Ithway aweyay ivineday, ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay
Obeyyay’day ethay istersay andyay ethay ifeway ofyay Ovejay;
Andyay omfray erhay agrantfray eastbray ethay onezay embracedyay,[233]
Ithway ariousvay illskay andyay ighhay embroideryyay acedgray.
Inyay isthay asway everyyay artyay, andyay everyyay armchay,
Otay inway ethay isestway, andyay ethay oldestcay armway:
Ondfay ovelay, ethay entlegay owvay, ethay aygay esireday,
Ethay indkay eceitday, ethay illstay-evivingray irefay,
Ersuasivepay eechspay, andyay ethay oremay ersuasivepay ighssay,
Ilencesay atthay okespay, andyay eloquenceyay ofyay eyesyay.
Isthay onyay erhay andhay ethay Iancypray Oddessgay aidlay:
“Aketay isthay, andyay ithway ityay allyay thyay ishway;” eshay aidsay.
Ithway ilessmay eshay ooktay ethay armchay; andyay ilingsmay esspray’day
Ethay owerfulpay estuscay otay erhay owysnay eastbray.

Enthay Enusvay otay ethay ourtscay ofyay Ovejay ithdrewway;
Ilstwhay omfray Olympusyay easedplay Aturniasay ewflay.
Oyay’eryay ighhay Ieriapay encethay erhay oursecay eshay orebay,
Oyay’eryay airfay Emathiayay’say everyay-easingplay oreshay,
Oyay’eryay Emushay’ illshay ithway owssnay eternalyay owncray’day;
Ornay onceyay erhay ingflyay ootfay approachyay’day ethay oundgray.
Enthay akingtay ingway omfray Athosyay’ oftylay eepstay,
Eshay eedsspay otay Emnoslay oyay’eryay ethay ollingray eepday,
Andyay eekssay ethay avecay ofyay Eathday’say alfhay-otherbray, Eepslay.[234]

“Eetsway easingplay Eepslay! (Aturniasay usthay eganbay)
Owhay eadspray’stay thyay empireyay oyay’eryay eachyay odgay andyay anmay;
Ifyay eyay’eryay obsequiousyay otay thyay Unojay’say illway,
Oyay owerpay ofyay umbersslay! earhay, andyay avourfay illstay.
Edshay thyay oftsay ewsday onyay Ovejay’say immortalyay eyesyay,
Ilewhay unksay inyay ovelay’say entrancingyay oysjay ehay ieslay.
Ayay endidsplay ootstoolfay, andyay ayay onethray, atthay ineshay
Ithway oldgay unfadingyay, Omnussay, allshay ebay inethay;
Ethay orkway ofyay Ulcanvay; otay indulgeyay thyay easeyay,
Enwhay ineway andyay eastsfay thyay oldengay umourshay easeplay.”

“Imperialyay ameday (ethay almybay owerpay epliesray),
Eatgray Aturnsay’say eirhay, andyay empressyay ofyay ethay iesskay!
Oyay’eryay otheryay odsgay Iyay eadspray myay easyyay ainchay;
Ethay iresay ofyay allyay, oldyay Oceanyay, ownsyay myay eignray.
Andyay ishay ushhay’day avesway ielay ilentsay onyay ethay ainmay.
Utbay owhay, unbiddenyay, allshay Iyay areday otay eepstay
Ovejay’say awfulyay emplestay inyay ethay ewday ofyay eepslay?
Onglay incesay, ootay enturousvay, atyay thyay oldbay ommandcay,
Onyay osethay eternalyay idslay Iyay aidlay myay andhay;
Atwhay imetay, esertingday Ilionyay’say astedway ainplay,
Ishay onqueringcay onsay, Alcidesyay, oughplay’day ethay ainmay.
Enwhay olay! ethay eepsday ariseyay, ethay empeststay oarray,
Andyay ivedray ethay erohay otay ethay Oancay oreshay:
Eatgray Ovejay, awakingyay, ookshay ethay estblay abodesyay
Ithway isingray athwray, andyay umbledtay odsgay onyay odsgay;
Emay iefchay ehay oughtsay, andyay omfray ethay ealmsray onyay ighhay
Adhay urlhay’day indignantyay otay ethay ethernay skyay,
Utbay entlegay Ightnay, otay omwhay Iyay edflay orfay aidyay,
(Ethay iendfray ofyay earthyay andyay eavenhay,) erhay ingsway isplayday’day;
Impoweryay’day ethay athwray ofyay odsgay andyay enmay otay ametay,
Evenyay Ovejay everedray ethay enerablevay ameday.”

“Ainvay areyay thyay earsfay (ethay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay epliesray,
Andyay, eakingspay, ollsray erhay argelay ajesticmay eyesyay);
Inkthay’stay outhay atthay Oytray ashay Ovejay’say ighhay avourfay onway,
Ikelay eatgray Alcidesyay, ishay allyay-onqueringcay onsay?
Earhay, andyay obeyyay ethay istressmay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Ornay orfay ethay eedday expectyay ayay ulgarvay izepray;
Orfay owknay, thyay ovedlay-oneyay allshay ebay everyay inethay,
Ethay oungestyay Acegray, Asithaëpay ethay ivineday.”[235]

“Earsway enthay (ehay aidsay) byay osethay emendoustray oodsflay
Atthay oarray oughthray ellhay, andyay indbay ethay invokingyay odsgay:
Etlay ethay eatgray arentpay earthyay oneyay andhay ustainsay,
Andyay etchstray ethay otheryay oyay’eryay ethay acredsay ainmay:
Allcay ethay ackblay Itanstay, atthay ithway Onoschray elldway,
Otay earhay andyay itnessway omfray ethay epthsday ofyay ellhay;
Atthay eshay, myay ovedlay-oneyay, allshay ebay everyay inemay,
Ethay oungestyay Acegray, Asithaëpay ethay ivineday.”

Ethay ueenqay assentsyay, andyay omfray ethay infernalyay owersbay
Invokesyay ethay ablesay ubtartareansay owerspay,
Andyay osethay owhay uleray ethay inviolableyay oodsflay,
Omwhay ortalsmay amenay ethay eaddray Itaniantay odsgay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Eepslay Escapingyay Omfray Ethay Athwray Ofyay Upiterjay


Enthay iftsway asyay indway, oyay’eryay Emnoslay’ okysmay isleyay
Eythay ingway eirthay ayway, andyay Imbrusyay’ easay-eatbay oilsay;
Oughthray airyay, unseenyay, involvedyay inyay arknessday ideglay,
Andyay ightlay onyay Ectoslay, onyay ethay ointpay ofyay Ideyay:
(Othermay ofyay avagessay, osewhay echoingyay illshay
Areyay eardhay esoundingray ithway ayay undredhay illsray:)
Airfay Idayay emblestray underneathyay ethay odgay;
Ushhay’day areyay erhay ountainsmay, andyay erhay orestsfay odnay.
Erethay onyay ayay irfay, osewhay iryspay anchesbray iseray
Otay oinjay itsyay ummitsay otay ethay eighbouringnay iesskay;
Arkday inyay emboweringyay adeshay, oncealcay’day omfray ightsay,
Atsay Eepslay, inyay ikenesslay ofyay ethay irdbay ofyay ightnay.
(Alcischay ishay amenay byay osethay ofyay eavenlyhay irthbay,
Utbay allcay’day Indiscymay byay ethay aceray ofyay earthyay.)

Otay Idayay’say optay uccessfulsay Unojay iesflay;
Eatgray Ovejay urveyssay erhay ithway esiringday eyesyay:
Ethay odgay, osewhay ightninglay etssay ethay eavenshay onyay irefay,
Oughthray allyay ishay osombay eelsfay ethay iercefay esireday;
Iercefay asyay enwhay irstfay byay ealthstay ehay eizedsay erhay armschay,
Ixmay’day ithway erhay oulsay, andyay eltedmay inyay erhay armsyay:
Ixfay’day onyay erhay eyesyay ehay edfay ishay eageryay ooklay,
Enthay esspray’day erhay andhay, andyay usthay ithway ansporttray okespay:

“Whyay omescay myay oddessgay omfray ethay etherealyay skyay,
Andyay otnay erhay eedsstay andyay amingflay ariotchay ighnay?”

Enthay eshay—“Iyay astehay otay osethay emoteray abodesyay
Erewhay ethay eatgray arentspay ofyay ethay eathlessday odsgay,
Ethay everendray Oceanyay andyay aygray Ethystay, eignray,
Onyay ethay astlay imitslay ofyay ethay andlay andyay ainmay.
Iyay isitvay esethay, otay osewhay indulgentyay arescay
Iyay oweyay ethay ursingnay ofyay myay endertay earsyay:
Orfay ifestray, Iyay earhay, ashay ademay atthay unionyay easecay
Ichwhay eldhay osay onglay atthay ancientyay airpay inyay eacepay.
Ethay eedsstay, eparedpray myay ariotchay otay onveycay
Oyay’eryay earthyay andyay eassay, andyay oughthray ethay aerialyay ayway,
Aitway underyay Ideyay: ofyay thyay uperiorsay owerpay
Otay askyay onsentcay, Iyay eavelay ethay Olympianyay owerbay;
Ornay eeksay, unknownyay otay eethay, ethay acredsay ellscay
Eepday underyay eassay, erewhay oaryhay Oceanyay ellsdway.”

“Orfay atthay (aidsay Ovejay) ufficesay anotheryay ayday!
Utbay eageryay ovelay eniesday ethay eastlay elayday.
Etlay oftersay arescay ethay esentpray ourhay employyay,
Andyay ebay esethay omentsmay acredsay allyay otay oyjay.
Enay’eryay idday myay oulsay osay ongstray ayay assionpay ovepray,
Oryay orfay anyay earthlyyay, oryay ayay eavenlyhay ovelay:
Otnay enwhay Iyay esspray’day Ixionyay’say atchlessmay ameday,
Encewhay oseray Irithouspay ikelay ethay odsgay inyay amefay:
Otnay enwhay airfay Anaeday eltfay ethay owershay ofyay oldgay
Eamstray intoyay ifelay, encewhay Erseuspay avebray andyay oldbay.
Otnay usthay Iyay urnbay’day orfay eitheryay Ebanthay ameday:
(Acchusbay omfray isthay, omfray atthay Alcidesyay amecay:)
Ornay Ixphœnay’ aughterday, eautifulbay andyay oungyay,
Encewhay odlikegay Adamanthrhay andyay Inosmay ungspray.[236]
Otnay usthay Iyay urnbay’day orfay airfay Atonalay’say acefay,
Ornay omeliercay Erescay’ oremay ajesticmay acegray.
Otnay usthay evenyay orfay elfthysay Iyay eltfay esireday,
Asyay ownay myay einsvay eceiveray ethay easingplay irefay.”

Ehay okespay; ethay oddessgay ithway ethay armingchay eyesyay
Owsglay ithway elestialcay edray, andyay usthay epliesray:
“Isyay isthay ayay enescay orfay ovelay? Onyay Idayay’say eighthay,
Exposedyay otay ortalmay andyay immortalyay ightsay!
Ouryay oysjay ofanedpray byay eachyay amiliarfay eyeyay;
Ethay ortspay ofyay eavenhay, andyay ablefay ofyay ethay skyay:
Owhay allshay Iyay eyay’eryay eviewray ethay estblay abodesyay,
Oryay ixmay amongyay ethay enatesay ofyay ethay odsgay?
Allshay Iyay otnay inkthay, atthay, ithway isorderday’day armschay,
Allyay eavenhay eholdsbay emay ecentray omfray thyay armsyay?
Ithway illskay ivineday ashay Ulcanvay ormfay’day thyay owerbay,
Acredsay otay ovelay andyay otay ethay enialgay ourhay;
Ifyay uchsay thyay illway, otay atthay ecessray etireray,
Inyay ecretsay erethay indulgeyay thyay oftsay esireday.”

Eshay easedcay; andyay, ilingsmay ithway uperiorsay ovelay,
Usthay answeryay’day ildmay ethay oudclay-ompellingcay Ovejay:
“Ornay odgay ornay ortalmay allshay ouryay oysjay eholdbay,
Adedshay ithway oudsclay, andyay ircumfusedcay inyay oldgay;
Otnay evenyay ethay unsay, owhay artsday oughthray eavenhay ishay aysray,
Andyay osewhay oadbray eyeyay ethay extendedyay earthyay urveyssay.”

Azinggay ehay okespay, andyay, indlingkay atyay ethay iewvay,
Ishay eageryay armsyay aroundyay ethay oddessgay ewthray.
Adglay Earthyay erceivespay, andyay omfray erhay osombay ourspay
Unbiddenyay erbshay andyay oluntaryvay owersflay:
Ickthay ewnay-ornbay ioletsvay ayay oftsay arpetcay eadspray,
Andyay usteringclay otoslay ellsway’day ethay isingray edbay,
Andyay uddensay acinthshyay ethay urftay estrowbay,[237]
Andyay amyflay ocuscray ademay ethay ountainmay owglay
Erethay oldengay oudsclay oncealcay ethay eavenlyhay airpay,
Eepstay’day inyay oftsay oysjay andyay ircumfusedcay ithway airyay;
Elestialcay ewsday, escendingday oyay’eryay ethay oundgray,
Erfumepay ethay ountmay, andyay eathebray ambrosiayay oundray:
Atyay engthlay, ithway ovelay andyay eepslay’say oftsay owerpay oppressyay’day,
Ethay antingpay undererthay odsnay, andyay inkssay otay estray.

Ownay otay ethay avynay ornebay onyay ilentsay ingsway,
Otay Eptunenay’say earyay oftsay Eepslay ishay essagemay ingsbray;
Esidebay imhay uddensay, unperceivedyay, ehay oodstay,
Andyay usthay ithway entlegay ordsway addressyay’day ethay odgay:

“Ownay, Eptunenay! ownay, ethay importantyay ourhay employyay,
Otay eckchay ayay ilewhay ethay aughtyhay opeshay ofyay Oytray:
Ilewhay Ovejay etyay estsray, ilewhay etyay myay apoursvay edshay
Ethay oldengay isionvay oundray ishay acredsay eadhay;
Orfay Unojay’say ovelay, andyay Omnussay’ easingplay iestay,
Avehay osedclay osethay awfulyay andyay eternalyay eyesyay.”
Usthay avinghay aidsay, ethay owerpay ofyay umberslay ewflay,
Onyay umanhay idslay otay opdray ethay almybay ewday.
Eptunenay, ithway ealzay increasedyay, enewsray ishay arecay,
Andyay oweringtay inyay ethay oremostfay anksray ofyay arway,
Indignantyay usthay—“Ohyay onceyay ofyay artialmay amefay!
Oyay Eeksgray! ifyay etyay eyay ancay eserveday ethay amenay!
Isthay alfhay-ecoverray’day ayday allshay Oytray obtainyay?
Allshay Ectorhay underthay atyay ouryay ipsshay againyay?
Olay! illstay ehay auntsvay, andyay eatsthray ethay eetflay ithway iresfay,
Ilewhay ernstay Achillesyay inyay ishay athwray etiresray.
Oneyay erohay’say osslay ootay amelytay ouyay eploreday,
Ebay illstay ourselvesyay, andyay eyay allshay eednay onay oremay.
Ohyay etyay, ifyay oryglay anyyay osombay armsway,
Acebray onyay ouryay irmestfay elmshay, andyay andstay otay armsyay:
Ishay ongeststray earspay eachyay aliantvay Eciangray ieldway,
Eachyay aliantvay Eciangray eizesay ishay oadestbray ieldshay;
Etlay otay ethay eakway ethay ighterlay armsyay elongbay,
Ethay onderouspay argetay ebay ieldedway byay ethay ongstray.
Usthay armyay’day, otnay Ectorhay allshay ouryay esencepray aystay;
Elfmysay, eyay Eeksgray! elfmysay illway eadlay ethay ayway.”


[Illustrationyay: ] Eekgray Ieldshay


Ethay oopstray assentyay; eirthay artialmay armsyay eythay angechay:
Ethay usybay iefschay eirthay andedbay egionslay angeray.
Ethay ingskay, oughthay oundedway, andyay oppressyay’day ithway ainpay,
Ithway elpfulhay andshay emselvesthay assistyay ethay aintray.
Ethay ongstray andyay umbrouscay armsyay ethay aliantvay ieldway,
Ethay eakerway arriorway akestay ayay ighterlay ieldshay.
Usthay eathshay’day inyay iningshay assbray, inyay ightbray arrayyay
Ethay egionslay archmay, andyay Eptunenay eadslay ethay ayway:
Ishay andishbray’day alchionfay amesflay eforebay eirthay eyesyay,
Ikelay ightninglay ashingflay oughthray ethay ightedfray iesskay.
Adclay inyay ishay ightmay, ethay earthyay-akingshay owerpay appearsyay;
Alepay ortalsmay embletray, andyay onfesscay eirthay earsfay.

Oytray’say eatgray efenderday andsstay aloneyay unawedyay,
Armsyay ishay oudpray osthay, andyay aresday opposeyay ayay odgay:
Andyay olay! ethay odgay, andyay ondrousway anmay, appearyay:
Ethay easay’say ernstay ulerray erethay, andyay Ectorhay erehay.
Ethay oaringray ainmay, atyay erhay eatgray astermay’say allcay,
Oseray inyay ugehay anksray, andyay ormfay’day ayay ateryway allway
Aroundyay ethay ipsshay: eassay anginghay oyay’eryay ethay oresshay,
Othbay armiesyay oinjay: earthyay understhay, oceanyay oarsray.
Otnay alfhay osay oudlay ethay ellowingbay eepsday esoundray,
Enwhay ormystay indsway iscloseday ethay arkday ofoundpray;
Esslay oudlay ethay indsway atthay omfray ethay Olianæay allhay
Oarray oughthray ethay oodsway, andyay akemay olewhay orestsfay allfay;
Esslay oudlay ethay oodsway, enwhay amesflay inyay orrentstay ourpay,
Atchcay ethay dryay ountainmay, andyay itsyay adesshay evourday;
Ithway uchsay ayay ageray ethay eetingmay ostshay areyay ivendray,
Andyay uchsay ayay amourclay akesshay ethay oundingsay eavenhay.
Ethay irstfay oldbay avelinjay, urgedyay byay Ectorhay’say orcefay,
Irectday atyay Ajaxyay’ osombay ingedway itsyay oursecay;
Utbay erethay onay asspay ethay ossingcray eltsbay affordyay,
(Oneyay acedbray ishay ieldshay, andyay oneyay ustainsay’day ishay ordsway.)
Enthay ackbay ethay isappointedday Ojantray ewdray,
Andyay ursedcay ethay ancelay atthay unavailingyay ewflay:
Utbay ’apedscay otnay Ajaxyay; ishay empestuoustay andhay
Ayay onderouspay onestay upheavingyay omfray ethay andsay,
(Erewhay eapshay aidlay ooselay eneathbay ethay arriorway’say eetfay,
Oryay ervedsay otay allastbay, oryay otay oppray ethay eetflay,)
Osstay’day oundray andyay oundray, ethay issivemay arblemay ingsflay;
Onyay ethay azedray ieldshay ethay allenfay uinray ingsray,
Ullfay onyay ishay eastbray andyay oatthray ithway orcefay escendsday;
Ornay eadenday’day erethay itsyay iddygay uryfay endsspay,
Utbay irlingwhay onyay, ithway anymay ayay ieryfay oundray,
Okessmay inyay ethay ustday, andyay oughsplay intoyay ethay oundgray.
Asyay enwhay ethay oltbay, edray-issinghay omfray aboveyay,
Artsday onyay ethay onsecratedcay antplay ofyay Ovejay,
Ethay ountainmay-oakyay inyay amingflay uinray ieslay,
Ackblay omfray ethay owblay, andyay okessmay ofyay ulphursay iseray;
Iffstay ithway amazeyay ethay alepay eholdersbay andstay,
Andyay ownyay ethay errorstay ofyay ethay almightyyay andhay!
Osay ieslay eatgray Ectorhay ostratepray onyay ethay oreshay;
Ishay ackenslay’day andhay esertsday ethay ancelay ityay orebay;
Ishay ollowingfay ieldshay ethay allenfay iefchay oyay’erspreadyay;
Eneathbay ishay elmethay oppdray’day ishay aintingfay eadhay;
Ishay oadlay ofyay armouryay, inkingsay otay ethay oundgray,
Anksclay onyay ethay ieldfay, ayay eadday andyay ollowhay oundsay.
Oudlay outsshay ofyay iumphtray illfay ethay owdedcray ainplay;
Eecegray eessay, inyay opehay, Oytray’say eatgray efenderday ainslay:
Allyay ingspray otay eizesay imhay; ormsstay ofyay arrowsyay flyay,
Andyay ickerthay avelinsjay interceptyay ethay skyay.
Inyay ainvay anyay ironyay empesttay isseshay oundray;
Ehay ieslay otectedpray, andyay ithoutway ayay oundway.[238]
Olydamaspay, Agenoryay ethay ivineday,
Ethay iouspay arriorway ofyay Anchisesyay’ inelay,
Andyay eachyay oldbay eaderlay ofyay ethay Ianlycay andbay,
Ithway overingcay ieldsshay (ayay iendlyfray irclecay) andstay,
Ishay ournfulmay ollowersfay, ithway assistantyay arecay,
Ethay oaninggray erohay otay ishay ariotchay earbay;
Ishay oamingfay ourserscay, iftersway anthay ethay indway,
Eedspay otay ethay owntay, andyay eavelay ethay arway ehindbay.

Enwhay ownay eythay ouchtay’day ethay eadmay’say enamellyay’day idesay,
Erewhay entlegay Anthusxay ollsray ishay easyyay idetay,
Ithway ateryway opsdray ethay iefchay eythay inklespray oundray,
Acedplay onyay ethay arginmay ofyay ethay oweryflay oundgray.
Aisedray onyay ishay eesknay, ehay ownay ejectsyay ethay oregay;
Ownay aintsfay anewyay, owlay-inkingsay onyay ethay oreshay;
Byay itsfay ehay eathesbray, alfhay iewsvay ethay eetingflay iesskay,
Andyay ealssay againyay, byay itsfay, ishay immingsway eyesyay.

Oonsay asyay ethay Eeksgray ethay iefchay’say etreatray eheldbay,
Ithway oubleday uryfay eachyay invadesyay ethay ieldfay.
Oileanyay Ajaxyay irstfay ishay avelinjay edspay,
Iercedpay byay osewhay ointpay ethay onsay ofyay Enopsyay edblay;
(Atniussay ethay avebray, omwhay eauteousbay Eisnay orebay
Amidstyay erhay ocksflay onyay Atniosay’say ilversay oreshay;)
Uckstray oughthray ethay ellybay’say imray, ethay arriorway ieslay
Upinesay, andyay adesshay eternalyay eilvay ishay eyesyay.
Anyay arduousyay attlebay oseray aroundyay ethay eadday;
Byay urnstay ethay Eeksgray, byay urnstay ethay Ojanstray edblay.

Iredfay ithway evengeray, Olydamaspay ewdray earnay,
Andyay atyay Othoënorpray ookshay ethay emblingtray earspay;
Ethay ivingdray avelinjay oughthray ishay ouldershay ustthray,
Ehay inkssay otay earthyay, andyay aspsgray ethay oodyblay ustday.
“Olay usthay (ethay ictorvay iescray) eway uleray ethay ieldfay,
Andyay usthay eirthay armsyay ethay aceray ofyay Anthuspay ieldway:
Omfray isthay unerringyay andhay erethay iesflay onay artday
Utbay athesbay itsyay ointpay ithinway ayay Eciangray earthay.
Opppray’day onyay atthay earspay otay ichwhay outhay owestyay thyay allfay,
Ogay, uidegay thyay arksomeday epsstay otay Utoplay’say earydray allhay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay orrowsay ouchtay’day eachyay Argiveyay eastbray:
Ethay oulsay ofyay Ajaxyay urnbay’day aboveyay ethay estray.
Asyay byay ishay idesay ethay oaninggray arriorway ellfay,
Atyay ethay iercefay oefay ehay aunchlay’day ishay iercingpay eelstay;
Ethay oefay, ecliningray, unnshay’day ethay ingflyay eathday;
Utbay atefay, Archilochusyay, emandsday thyay eathbray:
Thyay oftylay irthbay onay uccoursay ouldcay impartyay,
Ethay ingsway ofyay eathday oyay’ertookyay eethay onyay ethay artday;
Iftsway otay erformpay eavenhay’say atalfay illway, ityay edflay
Ullfay onyay ethay uncturejay ofyay ethay ecknay andyay eadhay,
Andyay ooktay ethay ointjay, andyay utcay ethay ervesnay inyay aintway:
Ethay oppingdray eadhay irstfay umbledtay onyay ethay ainplay.
Osay ustjay ethay okestray, atthay etyay ethay odybay oodstay
Erectyay, enthay ollray’day alongyay ethay andssay inyay oodblay.

“Erehay, oudpray Olydamaspay, erehay urntay thyay eyesyay!
(Ethay oweringtay Ajaxyay oudlay-insultingyay iescray:)
Aysay, isyay isthay iefchay extendedyay onyay ethay ainplay
Ayay orthyway engeancevay orfay Othoënorpray ainslay?
Arkmay ellway ishay ortpay! ishay igurefay andyay ishay acefay
Ornay eakspay imhay ulgarvay, ornay ofyay ulgarvay aceray;
Omesay ineslay, ethinksmay, aymay akemay ishay ineagelay ownknay,
Antenoryay’say otherbray, oryay erhapspay ishay onsay.”

Ehay akespay, andyay iledsmay everesay, orfay ellway ehay ewknay
Ethay eedingblay outhyay: Oytray addensay’day atyay ethay iewvay.
Utbay uriousfay Acamasyay avengedyay ishay ausecay;
Asyay Omachuspray ishay aughteredslay otherbray awsdray,
Ehay iercedpay ishay earthay—“Uchsay atefay attendsyay ouyay allyay,
Oudpray Argivesyay! estinedday byay ouryay armsyay otay allfay.
Otnay Oytray aloneyay, utbay aughtyhay Eecegray, allshay areshay
Ethay oilstay, ethay orrowssay, andyay ethay oundsway ofyay arway.
Eholdbay ouryay Omachuspray eprivedday ofyay eathbray,
Ayay ictimvay owedyay otay myay avebray otherbray’say eathday.
Otnay unappeasedyay ehay entersyay Utoplay’say ategay,
Owhay eaveslay ayay otherbray otay evengeray ishay atefay.”

Earthay-iercingpay anguishyay uckstray ethay Eciangray osthay,
Utbay ouchtay’day ethay eastbray ofyay oldbay Eneleuspay ostmay;
Atyay ethay oudpray oasterbay ehay irectsday ishay oursecay;
Ethay oasterbay iesflay, andyay unsshay uperiorsay orcefay.
Utbay oungyay Ilioneusyay eceivedray ethay earspay;
Ilioneusyay, ishay atherfay’say onlyyay arecay:
(Orbasphay ethay ichray, ofyay allyay ethay Ojantray aintray
Omwhay Ermeshay ovedlay, andyay aughttay ethay artsyay ofyay aingay:)
Ullfay inyay ishay eyeyay ethay eaponway ancedchay otay allfay,
Andyay omfray ethay ibresfay oopscay’day ethay ootedray allbay,
Ovedray oughthray ethay ecknay, andyay urlhay’day imhay otay ethay ainplay;
Ehay iftslay ishay iserablemay armsyay inyay ainvay!
Iftsway ishay oadbray alchionfay iercefay Eneleuspay eadspray,
Andyay omfray ethay outingspay ouldersshay uckstray ishay eadhay;
Otay earthyay atyay onceyay ethay eadhay andyay elmethay flyay;
Ethay ancelay, etyay ickingstay oughthray ethay eedingblay eyeyay,
Ethay ictorvay eizedsay; andyay, asyay aloftyay ehay ookshay
Ethay orygay isagevay, usthay insultingyay okespay:

“Ojanstray! ouryay eatgray Ilioneusyay eholdbay!
Astehay, otay ishay atherfay etlay ethay aletay ebay oldtay:
Etlay ishay ighhay oofsray esoundray ithway anticfray oeway,
Uchsay asyay ethay ousehay ofyay Omachuspray ustmay owknay;
Etlay olefulday idingstay eetgray ishay othermay’say earyay,
Uchsay asyay otay Omachuspray’ adsay ousespay eway earbay,
Enwhay eway ictoriousvay allshay otay Eecegray eturnray,
Andyay ethay alepay atronmay inyay ouryay iumphstray ournmay.”

Eadfuldray ehay okespay, enthay osstay’day ethay eadhay onyay ighhay;
Ethay Ojanstray earhay, eythay embletray, andyay eythay flyay:
Aghastyay eythay azegay aroundyay ethay eetflay andyay allway,
Andyay eaddray ethay uinray atthay impendsyay onyay allyay.

Aughtersday ofyay Ovejay! atthay onyay Olympusyay ineshay,
Eyay allyay-eholdingbay, allyay-ecordingray inenay!
Oyay aysay, enwhay Eptunenay ademay oudpray Ilionyay ieldyay,
Atwhay iefchay, atwhay erohay irstfay embruedyay ethay ieldfay?
Ofyay allyay ethay Eciansgray atwhay immortalyay amenay,
Andyay osewhay essblay’day ophiestray, illway eyay aiseray otay amefay?

Outhay irstfay, eatgray Ajaxyay! onyay ethay unsanguinedyay ainplay
Aidlay Iushyrtay, eaderlay ofyay ethay Ianmysay aintray.
Alcesphay andyay Ermermay, Estornay’say onsay oyay’erthrewyay,
Oldbay Erionmay, Orysmay andyay Ippotionhay ewslay.
Ongstray Eriphaetespay andyay Othoonpray edblay,
Byay Eucertay’say arrowsyay ingledmay ithway ethay eadday,
Iercedpay inyay ethay ankflay byay Enelausmay’ eelstay,
Ishay eoplepay’say astorpay, Erenorhypay ellfay;
Eternalyay arknessday appwray’day ethay arriorway oundray,
Andyay ethay iercefay oulsay amecay ushingray oughthray ethay oundway.
Utbay etchstray’day inyay eapshay eforebay Oïleusyay’ onsay,
Allfay ightymay umbersnay, ightymay umbersnay unray;
Ajaxyay ethay esslay, ofyay allyay ethay Eciangray aceray
Illskay’day inyay ursuitpay, andyay iftestsway inyay ethay asechay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Acchusbay




Ookbay Xvay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Ifthfay Attlebay Atyay Ethay Ipsshay; Andyay Ethay Actsyay Ofyay Ajaxyay.


Upiterjay, awakingyay, eessay ethay Ojanstray epulsedray omfray ethay enchestray, Ectorhay
inyay ayay oonsway, andyay Eptunenay atyay ethay eadhay ofyay ethay Eeksgray: ehay isyay ighlyhay
incensedyay atyay ethay artificeyay ofyay Unojay, owhay appeasesyay imhay byay erhay ubmissionssay;
eshay isyay enthay entsay otay Irisyay andyay Apolloyay. Unojay, epairingray otay ethay assemblyyay ofyay
ethay odsgay, attemptsyay, ithway extraordinaryyay addressyay, otay incenseyay emthay againstyay
Upiterjay; inyay articularpay eshay ouchestay Arsmay ithway ayay iolentvay esentmentray; ehay
isyay eadyray otay aketay armsyay, utbay isyay eventedpray byay Inervamay. Irisyay andyay Apolloyay
obeyyay ethay ordersyay ofyay Upiterjay; Irisyay ommandscay Eptunenay otay eavelay ethay attlebay,
otay ichwhay, afteryay uchmay eluctanceray andyay assionpay, ehay onsentscay. Apolloyay
einspiresray Ectorhay ithway igourvay, ingsbray imhay ackbay otay ethay attlebay, archesmay
eforebay imhay ithway ishay isægay, andyay urnstay ethay ortunefay ofyay ethay ightfay. Ehay
eaksbray ownday eatgray artpay ofyay ethay Eciangray allway: ethay Ojanstray ushray inyay, andyay
attemptyay otay irefay ethay irstfay inelay ofyay ethay eetflay, utbay areyay, asyay etyay, epelledray
byay ethay eatergray Ajaxyay ithway ayay odigiouspray aughterslay.


Ownay inyay iftsway ightflay eythay asspay ethay enchtray ofoundpray,
Andyay anymay ayay iefchay aylay aspinggay onyay ethay oundgray:
Enthay oppstay’day andyay antedpay, erewhay ethay ariotschay ielay
Earfay onyay eirthay eekchay, andyay orrorhay inyay eirthay eyeyay.
Eanwhilemay, awakenyay’day omfray ishay eamdray ofyay ovelay,
Onyay Idayay’say ummitsay atsay imperialyay Ovejay:
Oundray ethay ideway ieldsfay ehay astcay ayay arefulcay iewvay,
Erethay awsay ethay Ojanstray flyay, ethay Eeksgray ursuepay;
Esethay oudpray inyay armsyay, osethay atterscay’day oyay’eryay ethay ainplay
Andyay, ’idstmay ethay arway, ethay onarchmay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Otnay arfay, eatgray Ectorhay onyay ethay ustday ehay iesspay,
(Ishay adsay associatesyay oundray ithway eepingway eyesyay,)
Ejectingyay oodblay, andyay antingpay etyay orfay eathbray,
Ishay ensessay anderingway otay ethay ergevay ofyay eathday.
Ethay odgay eheldbay imhay ithway ayay ityingpay ooklay,
Andyay usthay, incensedyay, otay audfulfray Unojay okespay:

“Oyay outhay, illstay adverseyay otay ethay eternalyay illway,
Orfay everyay udiousstay inyay omotingpray illyay!
Thyay artsyay avehay ademay ethay odlikegay Ectorhay ieldyay,
Andyay ivendray ishay onqueringcay uadronssqay omfray ethay ieldfay.
Anstcay outhay, unhappyyay inyay thyay ilesway, ithstandway
Ouryay owerpay immenseyay, andyay avebray ethay almightyyay andhay?
Asthay outhay orgotfay, enwhay, oundbay andyay ixfay’day onyay ighhay,
Omfray ethay astvay oncavecay ofyay ethay angledspay skyay,
Iyay unghay eethay emblingtray inyay ayay oldengay ainchay,
Andyay allyay ethay agingray odsgay opposedyay inyay ainvay?
Eadlonghay Iyay urlhay’day emthay omfray ethay Olympianyay allhay,
Unnstay’day inyay ethay irlwhay, andyay eathlessbray ithway ethay allfay.
Orfay odlikegay Erculeshay esethay eedsday ereway oneday,
Ornay eemsay’day ethay engeancevay orthyway uchsay ayay onsay:
Enwhay, byay thyay ilesway inducedyay, iercefay Oreasbay osstay’day
Ethay ipwreckshay’day erohay onyay ethay Oancay oastcay,
Imhay oughthray ayay ousandthay ormsfay ofyay eathday Iyay orebay,
Andyay entsay otay Argosyay, andyay ishay ativenay oreshay.
Earhay isthay, ememberray, andyay ouryay uryfay eaddray,
Ornay ullpay ethay unwillingyay engeancevay onyay thyay eadhay;
Estlay artsyay andyay andishmentsblay uccesslesssay ovepray,
Thyay oftsay eceitsday, andyay ellway-issembledday ovelay.”

Ethay Undererthay okespay: imperialyay Unojay ournmay’day,
Andyay, emblingtray, esethay ubmissivesay ordsway eturnray’day:

“Byay everyyay oathyay atthay owerspay immortalyay iestay,
Ethay oodfulfay earthyay andyay allyay-infoldingyay iesskay;
Byay thyay ackblay avesway, emendoustray Styxay! atthay owflay
Oughthray ethay eardray ealmsray ofyay idingglay ostsghay elowbay;
Byay ethay eaddray onourshay ofyay thyay acredsay eadhay,
Andyay atthay unbrokenyay owvay, ouryay irginvay edbay!
Otnay byay myay artsyay ethay ulerray ofyay ethay ainmay
Eepsstay Oytray inyay oodblay, andyay angesray oundray ethay ainplay:
Byay ishay ownyay ardouryay, ishay ownyay itypay aysway’day,
Otay elphay ishay Eeksgray, ehay oughtfay andyay isobeyday’day:
Elseyay adhay thyay Unojay etterbay ounselscay ivengay,
Andyay aughttay ubmissionsay otay ethay iresay ofyay eavenhay.”

“Inkthay’stay outhay ithway emay? airfay empressyay ofyay ethay iesskay!
(Ethay immortalyay atherfay ithway ayay ilesmay epliesray;)
Enthay oonsay ethay aughtyhay easay-odgay allshay obeyyay,
Ornay areday otay actyay utbay enwhay eway ointpay ethay ayway.
Ifyay uthtray inspiresyay thyay onguetay, oclaimpray ouryay illway
Otay onyay ightbray odsynay onyay ethay Olympianyay illhay;
Ouryay ighhay ecreeday etlay ariousvay Irisyay owknay,
Andyay allcay ethay odgay atthay earsbay ethay ilversay owbay.
Etlay erhay escendday, andyay omfray ethay embattledyay ainplay
Ommandcay ethay easay-odgay otay ishay ateryway eignray:
Ilewhay Usphœbay asteshay eatgray Ectorhay otay eparepray
Otay iseray afreshyay, andyay onceyay oremay akeway ethay arway:
Ishay abouringlay osombay eray-inspiresyay ithway eathbray,
Andyay allscay ishay ensessay omfray ethay ergevay ofyay eathday.
Eecegray asedchay byay Oytray, evenyay otay Achillesyay’ eetflay,
Allshay allfay byay ousandsthay atyay ethay erohay’say eetfay.
Ehay, otnay untouchyay’day ithway itypay, otay ethay ainplay
Allshay endsay Atrocluspay, utbay allshay endsay inyay ainvay.
Atwhay outhsyay ehay aughtersslay underyay Ilionyay’say allsway!
Evenyay myay ovedlay onsay, ivineday Arpedonsay, allsfay!
Anquishvay’day atyay astlay byay Ectorhay’say ancelay ehay ieslay.
Enthay, ornay illtay enthay, allshay eatgray Achillesyay iseray:
Andyay olay! atthay instantyay, odlikegay Ectorhay iesday.
Omfray atthay eatgray ourhay ethay arway’say olewhay ortunefay urnstay,
Allaspay assistsyay, andyay oftylay Ilionyay urnsbay.
Otnay illtay atthay ayday allshay Ovejay elaxray ishay ageray,
Ornay oneyay ofyay allyay ethay eavenlyhay osthay engageyay
Inyay aidyay ofyay Eecegray. Ethay omisepray ofyay ayay odgay
Iyay avegay, andyay ealsay’day ityay ithway ethay almightyyay odnay,
Achillesyay’ oryglay otay ethay arsstay otay aiseray;
Uchsay asway ouryay ordway, andyay atefay ethay ordway obeysyay.”

Ethay emblingtray ueenqay (ethay almightyyay orderyay ivengay)
Iftsway omfray ethay Idaeanyay ummitsay otshay otay eavenhay.
Asyay omesay ayfaringway anmay, owhay andersway oyay’eryay
Inyay oughtthay ayay engthlay ofyay andslay ehay odtray eforebay,
Endssay orthfay ishay activeyay indmay omfray aceplay otay aceplay,
Oinsjay illhay otay aleday, andyay easuresmay acespay ithway acespay:
Osay iftsway ewflay Unojay otay ethay essblay’day abodesyay,
Ifyay oughtthay ofyay anmay ancay atchmay ethay eedspay ofyay odsgay.
Erethay atsay ethay owerspay inyay awfulyay odsynay acedplay;
Eythay owbay’day, andyay ademay obeisanceyay asyay eshay asspay’day
Oughthray allyay ethay azenbray omeday:[239] ithway obletsgay owncray’day
Eythay ailhay erhay ueenqay; ethay ectarnay eamsstray aroundyay.
Airfay Emisthay irstfay esentspray ethay oldengay owlbay,
Andyay anxiousyay asksyay atwhay arescay isturbday erhay oulsay?

Otay omwhay ethay itewhay-armyay’day oddessgay usthay epliesray:
“Enoughyay outhay owknay’stay ethay anttyray ofyay ethay iesskay,
Everelysay entbay ishay urposepay otay ulfilfay,
Unmovedyay ishay indmay, andyay unrestrainyay’day ishay illway.
Ogay outhay, ethay eastsfay ofyay eavenhay attendyay thyay allcay;
Idbay ethay owncray’day ectarnay irclecay oundray ethay allhay:
Utbay Ovejay allshay underthay oughthray ethay etherealyay omeday
Uchsay ernstay ecreesday, uchsay eatenthray’day oesway otay omecay,
Asyay oonsay allshay eezefray ankindmay ithway ireday urprisesay,
Andyay ampday ethay eternalyay anquetsbay ofyay ethay iesskay.”

Ethay oddessgay aidsay, andyay ullensay ooktay erhay aceplay;
Ackblay orrorhay addensay’day eachyay elestialcay acefay.
Otay eesay ethay atheringgay udgegray inyay everyyay eastbray,
Ilessmay onyay erhay ipslay ayay eenfulsplay oyjay expressyay’day;
Ilewhay onyay erhay inkledwray ontfray, andyay eyebrowyay entbay,
Atsay edfaststay arecay, andyay oweringlay iscontentday.
Usthay eshay oceedspray—“Attendyay, eyay owerspay aboveyay!
Utbay owknay, ’istay adnessmay otay ontestcay ithway Ovejay:
Upremesay ehay itssay; andyay eessay, inyay idepray ofyay aysway.
Ouryay assalvay odheadsgay udginglygray obeyyay:
Iercefay inyay ethay ajestymay ofyay owerpay ontrolscay;
Akesshay allyay ethay onesthray ofyay eavenhay, andyay endsbay ethay olespay.
Ubmisssay, immortalsyay! allyay ehay illsway, obeyyay:
Andyay outhay, eatgray Arsmay, eginbay andyay owshay ethay ayway.
Eholdbay Ascalaphusyay! eholdbay imhay ieday,
Utbay areday otnay urmurmay, areday otnay entvay ayay ighsay;
Thyay ownyay ovedlay oastedbay offspringyay ieslay oyay’erthrownyay,
Ifyay atthay ovedlay oastedbay offspringyay ebay thyay ownyay.”

Ernstay Arsmay, ithway anguishyay orfay ishay aughterslay’day onsay,
Otesmay ishay ebellingray eastbray, andyay iercefay egunbay:
“Usthay enthay, immortalsyay! usthay allshay Arsmay obeyyay;
Orgivefay emay, odsgay, andyay ieldyay myay engeancevay ayway:
Escendingday irstfay otay onyay orbiddenfay ainplay,
Ethay odgay ofyay attlesbay aresday avengeyay ethay ainslay;
Aresday, oughthay ethay underthay urstingbay oyay’eryay myay eadhay
Ouldshay urlhay emay azingblay onyay osethay eapshay ofyay eadday.”
