Atefay aimclay’day Achillesyay, utbay ightmay arespay ishay iendfray.
Iyay opedhay Atrocluspay ightmay urvivesay, otay earray
Myay endertay orphanyay ithway ayay arentpay’say arecay,
Omfray Osscyray’ isleyay onductcay imhay oyay’eryay ethay ainmay,
Andyay adglay ishay eyesyay ithway ishay aternalpay eignray,
Ethay oftylay alacepay, andyay ethay argelay omainday.
Orfay Eleuspay eathesbray onay oremay ethay italvay airyay;
Oryay agsdray ayay etchedwray ifelay ofyay ageyay andyay arecay,
Utbay illtay ethay ewsnay ofyay myay adsay atefay invadesyay
Ishay asteninghay oulsay, andyay inkssay imhay otay ethay adesshay.”

Ighingsay ehay aidsay: ishay iefgray ethay eroeshay oinjay’day,
Eachyay olestay ayay eartay orfay atwhay ehay eftlay ehindbay.
Eirthay ingledmay iefgray ethay iresay ofyay eavenhay urveysay’day,
Andyay usthay ithway itypay otay ishay ueblay-eyedyay aidmay:

“Isyay enthay Achillesyay ownay onay oremay thyay arecay,
Andyay ostday outhay usthay esertday ethay eatgray inyay arway?
Olay, erewhay onyay ailssay eirthay anvascay ingsway extendyay,
Allyay omfortlesscay ehay itssay, andyay ailsway ishay iendfray:
Ereyay irstthay andyay antway ishay orcesfay avehay oppressyay’day,
Astehay andyay infuseyay ambrosiayay inyay ishay eastbray.”

Ehay okespay; andyay uddensay, atyay ethay ordway ofyay Ovejay,
Otshay ethay escendingday oddessgay omfray aboveyay.
Osay iftsway oughthray etheryay ethay illshray arpyhay ingsspray,
Ethay ideway airyay oatingflay otay erhay ampleyay ingsway,
Otay eatgray Achillesyay eshay erhay ightflay addressyay’day,
Andyay ourpay’day ivineday ambrosiayay inyay ishay eastbray,[259]
Ithway ectarnay eetsway, (efectionray ofyay ethay odsgay!)
Enthay, iftsway ascendingyay, oughtsay ethay ightbray abodesyay.

Ownay issuedyay omfray ethay ipsshay ethay arriorway-aintray,
Andyay ikelay ayay elugeday ourpay’day uponyay ethay ainplay.
Asyay enwhay ethay iercingpay astsblay ofyay Oreasbay owblay,
Andyay atterscay oyay’eryay ethay ieldsfay ethay ivingdray owsnay;
Omfray uskyday oudsclay ethay eecyflay interway iesflay,
Osewhay azzlingday ustrelay itenswhay allyay ethay iesskay:
Osay elmshay ucceedingsay elmshay, osay ieldsshay omfray ieldsshay,
Atchcay ethay uickqay eamsbay, andyay ightenbray allyay ethay ieldsfay;
Oadbray itteringglay eastplatesbray, earsspay ithway ointedpay aysray,
Ixmay inyay oneyay eamstray, eflectingray azeblay onyay azeblay;
Ickthay eatsbay ethay entrecay asyay ethay ourserscay oundbay;
Ithway endoursplay ameflay ethay iesskay, andyay aughlay ethay ieldsfay aroundyay,

Ullfay inyay ethay idstmay, ighhay-oweringtay oyay’eryay ethay estray,
Ishay imbslay inyay armsyay ivineday Achillesyay essdray’day;
Armsyay ichwhay ethay atherfay ofyay ethay irefay estowbay’day,
Orgedfay onyay ethay eternalyay anvilsyay ofyay ethay odgay.
Iefgray andyay evengeray ishay uriousfay earthay inspireyay,
Ishay owingglay eyeballsyay ollray ithway ivinglay irefay;
Ehay indsgray ishay eethtay, andyay uriousfay ithway elayday
Oyay’erlooksyay ethay embattledyay osthay, andyay opeshay ethay oodyblay ayday.

Ethay ilversay uishescay irstfay ishay ighsthay infoldyay;
Enthay oyay’eryay ishay eastbray asway acedbray ethay ollowhay oldgay;
Ethay azenbray ordsway ayay ariousvay aldricbay iedtay,
Atthay, arrstay’day ithway emsgay, unghay itteringglay atyay ishay idesay;
Andyay, ikelay ethay oonmay, ethay oadbray efulgentray ieldshay
Azedblay ithway onglay aysray, andyay eamglay’day athwartyay ethay ieldfay.

Osay otay ightnay-anderingway ailorssay, alepay ithway earsfay,
Ideway oyay’eryay ethay ateryway asteway, ayay ightlay appearsyay,
Ichwhay onyay ethay arfay-eensay ountainmay azingblay ighhay,
Eamsstray omfray omesay onelylay atchway-owertay otay ethay skyay:
Ithway ournfulmay eyesyay eythay azegay, andyay azegay againyay;
Oudlay owlshay ethay ormstay, andyay ivesdray emthay oyay’eryay ethay ainmay.

Extnay, ishay ighhay eadhay ethay elmethay acedgray; ehindbay
Ethay eepysway estcray unghay oatingflay inyay ethay indway:
Ikelay ethay edray arstay, atthay omfray ishay amingflay airhay
Akesshay ownday iseasesday, estilencepay, andyay arway;
Osay eamstray’day ethay oldengay onourshay omfray ishay eadhay,
Embledtray ethay arklingspay umesplay, andyay ethay ooselay oriesglay edshay.
Ethay iefchay eholdsbay imselfhay ithway onderingway eyesyay;
Ishay armsyay ehay oisespay, andyay ishay otionsmay iestray;
Uoybay’day byay omesay inwardyay orcefay, ehay eemssay otay imsway,
Andyay eelsfay ayay inionpay iftinglay everyyay imblay.

Andyay ownay ehay akesshay ishay eatgray aternalpay earspay,
Onderouspay andyay ugehay, ichwhay otnay ayay Eekgray ouldcay earray,
Omfray Elionpay’say oudyclay optay anyay ashyay entireyay
Oldyay Ironchay ellfay’day, andyay apedshay ityay orfay ishay iresay;
Ayay earspay ichwhay ernstay Achillesyay onlyyay ieldsway,
Ethay eathday ofyay eroeshay, andyay ethay eaddray ofyay ieldsfay.

Automedonyay andyay Alcimusyay eparepray
Ethay immortalyay ourserscay, andyay ethay adiantray arcay;
(Ethay ilversay acestray eepingsway atyay eirthay idesay;)
Eirthay ieryfay outhsmay esplendentray idlesbray iedtay;
Ethay ivoryyay-uddedstay einsray, eturnray’day ehindbay,
Avedway oyay’eryay eirthay acksbay, andyay otay ethay ariotchay oinjay’day.
Ethay arioteerchay enthay irlwhay’day ethay ashlay aroundyay,
Andyay iftsway ascendedyay atyay oneyay activeyay oundbay.
Allyay ightbray inyay eavenlyhay armsyay, aboveyay ishay uiresqay
Achillesyay ountsmay, andyay etssay ethay ieldfay onyay irefay;
Otnay ighterbray Usphœbay inyay ethay etherealyay ayway
Amesflay omfray ishay ariotchay, andyay estoresray ethay ayday.
Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay osthay, allyay erribletay ehay andsstay,
Andyay understhay otay ishay eedsstay esethay eaddray ommandscay:

“Anthusxay andyay Aliusbay! ofyay Odargespay’ ainstray,
(Unlessyay eyay oastbay atthay eavenlyhay aceray inyay ainvay,)
Ebay iftsway, ebay indfulmay ofyay ethay oadlay eyay earbay,
Andyay earnlay otay akemay ouryay astermay oremay ouryay arecay:
Oughthray allingfay uadronssqay earbay myay aughteringslay ordsway,
Ornay, asyay eyay eftlay Atrocluspay, eavelay ouryay ordlay.”

Ethay enerousgay Anthusxay, asyay ethay ordsway ehay aidsay,
Eemsay’day ensiblesay ofyay oeway, andyay oopdray’day ishay eadhay:
Emblingtray ehay oodstay eforebay ethay oldengay ainway,
Andyay owbay’day otay ustday ethay onourshay ofyay ishay anemay.
Enwhay, angestray otay elltay! (osay Unojay illway’day) ehay okebray
Eternalyay ilencesay, andyay ortentouspay okespay.
“Achillesyay! esyay! isthay ayday atyay eastlay eway earbay
Thyay ageray inyay afetysay oughthray ethay ilesfay ofyay arway:
Utbay omecay ityay illway, ethay atalfay imetay ustmay omecay,
Otnay oursyay ethay aultfay, utbay Odgay ecreesday thyay oomday.
Otnay oughthray ouryay imecray, oryay ownessslay inyay ethay oursecay,
Ellfay thyay Atrocluspay, utbay byay eavenlyhay orcefay;
Ethay ightbray arfay-ootingshay odgay owhay ildsgay ethay ayday
(Onfesscay’day eway awsay imhay) oretay ishay armsyay awayyay.
Onay—ouldcay ouryay iftnesssway oyay’eryay ethay indsway evailpray,
Oryay eatbay ethay inionspay ofyay ethay esternway alegay,
Allyay ereway inyay ainvay—ethay Atesfay thyay eathday emandday,
Ueday otay ayay ortalmay andyay immortalyay andhay.”

Enthay easedcay orfay everyay, byay ethay Uriesfay iedtay,
Ishay atefulfay oicevay. Ethay intrepidyay iefchay epliedray
Ithway unabatedyay ageray—“Osay etlay ityay ebay!
Ortentspay andyay odigiespray areyay ostlay onyay emay.
Iyay owknay myay atefay: otay ieday, otay eesay onay oremay
Myay uchmay-ovedlay arentspay, andyay myay ativenay oreshay—
Enoughyay—enwhay eavenhay ordainsyay, Iyay inksay inyay ightnay:
Ownay erishpay Oytray!” Ehay aidsay, andyay ushray’day otay ightfay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Erculeshay




Ookbay Xxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Attlebay Ofyay Ethay Odsgay, Andyay Ethay Actsyay Ofyay Achillesyay.


Upiterjay, uponyay Achillesyay’ eturnray otay ethay attlebay, allscay ayay ouncilcay ofyay ethay
odsgay, andyay ermitspay emthay otay assistyay eitheryay artypay. Ethay errorstay ofyay ethay
ombatcay escribedday, enwhay ethay eitiesday areyay engagedyay. Apolloyay encouragesyay Easænay
otay eetmay Achillesyay. Afteryay ayay onglay onversationcay, esethay otway eroeshay
encounteryay; utbay Easænay isyay eservedpray byay ethay assistanceyay ofyay Eptunenay.
Achillesyay allsfay uponyay ethay estray ofyay ethay Ojanstray, andyay isyay uponyay ethay ointpay ofyay
illingkay Ectorhay, utbay Apolloyay onveyscay imhay awayyay inyay ayay oudclay. Achillesyay
ursuespay ethay Ojanstray ithway ayay eatgray aughterslay.
    Ethay amesay ayday ontinuescay. Ethay enescay isyay inyay ethay ieldfay eforebay Oytray.


Usthay oundray Elidespay eathingbray arway andyay oodblay
Eecegray, eathedshay inyay armsyay, esidebay erhay esselsvay oodstay;
Ilewhay earnay impendingyay omfray ayay eighbouringnay eighthay,
Oytray’say ackblay attalionsbay aitway ethay ockshay ofyay ightfay.
Enthay Ovejay otay Emisthay ivesgay ommandcay, otay allcay
Ethay odsgay otay ouncilcay inyay ethay arrystay allhay:
Iftsway oyay’eryay Olympusyay’ undredhay illshay eshay iesflay,
Andyay ummonssay allyay ethay enatesay ofyay ethay iesskay.
Esethay iningshay onyay, inyay onglay ocessionpray omecay
Otay Ovejay’say eternalyay adamantineyay omeday.
Otnay oneyay asway absentyay, otnay ayay uralray owerpay
Atthay auntshay ethay erdantvay oomglay, oryay osyray owerbay;
Eachyay airfay-airhay’day addryay ofyay ethay adyshay oodway,
Eachyay azureyay istersay ofyay ethay ilversay oodflay;
Allyay utbay oldyay Oceanyay, oaryhay iresay! owhay eepskay
Ishay ancientyay eatsay eneathbay ethay acredsay eepsday.
Onyay arblemay onesthray, ithway ucidlay olumnscay owncray’day,
(Ethay orkway ofyay Ulcanvay,) atsay ethay owerspay aroundyay.
Evenyay ehay osewhay identtray ayssway ethay ateryway eignray
Eardhay ethay oudlay ummonssay, andyay orsookfay ethay ainmay,
Assumedyay ishay onethray amidyay ethay ightbray abodesyay,
Andyay uestionqay’day usthay ethay iresay ofyay enmay andyay odsgay:

“Atwhay ovesmay ethay odgay owhay eavenhay andyay earthyay ommandscay,
Andyay aspsgray ethay underthay inyay ishay awfulyay andshay,
Usthay otay onvenecay ethay olewhay etherealyay atestay?
Isyay Eecegray andyay Oytray ethay ubjectsay inyay ebateday?
Alreadyyay etmay, ethay ouringlay ostshay appearyay,
Andyay eathday andsstay ardentyay onyay ethay edgeyay ofyay arway.”

“’Istay uetray (ethay oudclay-ompellingcay owerpay epliesray)
Isthay ayday eway allcay ethay ouncilcay ofyay ethay iesskay
Inyay arecay ofyay umanhay aceray; evenyay Ovejay’say ownyay eyeyay
Eessay ithway egretray unhappyyay ortalsmay ieday.
Arfay onyay Olympusyay’ optay inyay ecretsay atestay
Ourselfyay illway itsay, andyay eesay ethay andhay ofyay atefay
Orkway outyay ouryay illway. Elestialcay owerspay! escendday,
Andyay asyay ouryay indsmay irectday, ouryay uccoursay endlay
Otay eitheryay osthay. Oytray oonsay ustmay ielay oyay’erthrownyay,
Ifyay uncontrollyay’day Achillesyay ightsfay aloneyay:
Eirthay oopstray utbay atelylay urstday otnay eetmay ishay eyesyay;
Atwhay ancay eythay ownay, ifyay inyay ishay ageray ehay iseray?
Assistyay emthay, odsgay! oryay Ilionyay’say acredsay allway
Aymay allfay isthay ayday, oughthay atefay orbidsfay ethay allfay.”
Ehay aidsay, andyay iredfay eirthay eavenlyhay eastsbray ithway ageray.

Onyay adverseyay artspay ethay arringway odsgay engageyay:
Eavenhay’say awfulyay ueenqay; andyay ehay osewhay azureyay oundray
Irdsgay ethay astvay obeglay; ethay aidmay inyay armsyay enownray’day;
Ermeshay, ofyay ofitablepray artsyay ethay iresay;
Andyay Ulcanvay, ethay ackblay overeignsay ofyay ethay irefay:
Esethay otay ethay eetflay epairray ithway instantyay ightflay;
Ethay esselsvay embletray asyay ethay odsgay alightyay.
Inyay aidyay ofyay Oytray, Atonalay, Usphœbay amecay,
Arsmay ieryfay-elmhay’day, ethay aughterlay-ovinglay ameday,
Anthusxay, osewhay eamsstray inyay oldengay urrentscay owflay,
Andyay ethay astechay untresshay ofyay ethay ilversay owbay.
Ereyay etyay ethay odsgay eirthay ariousvay aidyay employyay,
Eachyay Argiveyay osombay ellsway’day ithway anlymay oyjay,
Ilewhay eatgray Achillesyay (errortay ofyay ethay ainplay),
Onglay ostlay otay attlebay, oneshay inyay armsyay againyay.
Eadfuldray ehay oodstay inyay ontfray ofyay allyay ishay osthay;
Alepay Oytray eheldbay, andyay eemsay’day alreadyyay ostlay;
Erhay avestbray eroeshay antpay ithway inwardyay earfay,
Andyay emblingtray eesay anotheryay odgay ofyay arway.

Utbay enwhay ethay owerspay escendingday ellsway’day ethay ightfay,
Enthay umulttay oseray: iercefay ageray andyay alepay affrightyay
Ariedvay eachyay acefay: enthay Iscordday oundssay alarmsyay,
Earthyay echoesyay, andyay ethay ationsnay ushray otay armsyay.
Ownay oughthray ethay emblingtray oresshay Inervamay allscay,
Andyay ownay eshay understhay omfray ethay Eciangray allsway.
Arsmay overinghay oyay’eryay ishay Oytray, ishay errortay oudsshray
Inyay oomyglay empeststay, andyay ayay ightnay ofyay oudsclay:
Ownay oughthray eachyay Ojantray earthay ehay uryfay ourspay
Ithway oicevay ivineday, omfray Ilionyay’say opmosttay owerstay:
Ownay outsshay otay Imoissay, omfray erhay eauteousbay illhay;
Ethay ountainmay ookshay, ethay apidray eamstray oodstay illstay.

Aboveyay, ethay iresay ofyay odsgay ishay underthay ollsray,
Andyay ealspay onyay ealspay edoubledray endray ethay olespay.
Eneathbay, ernstay Eptunenay akesshay ethay olidsay oundgray;
Ethay orestsfay aveway, ethay ountainsmay odnay aroundyay;
Oughthray allyay eirthay ummitssay embletray Idayay’say oodsway,
Andyay omfray eirthay ourcessay oilbay erhay undredhay oodsflay.
Oytray’say urretstay ottertay onyay ethay ockingray ainplay,
Andyay ethay osstay’day aviesnay eatbay ethay eavinghay ainmay.
Eepday inyay ethay ismalday egionsray ofyay ethay eadday,[260]
Ethay infernalyay onarchmay earray’day ishay orridhay eadhay,
Eaplay’day omfray ishay onethray, estlay Eptunenay’say armyay ouldshay aylay
Ishay arkday ominionsday openyay otay ethay ayday,
Andyay ourpay inyay ightlay onyay Utoplay’say eardray abodesyay,
Abhorryay’day byay enmay, andyay eadfuldray evenyay otay odsgay.[261]


[Illustrationyay: ] Ethay Odsgay Escendingday Otay Attlebay


Uchsay arway ethay immortalsyay ageway; uchsay orrorshay endray
Ethay orldway’say astvay oncavecay, enwhay ethay odsgay ontendcay.
Irstfay ilversay-aftedshay Usphœbay ooktay ethay ainplay
Againstyay ueblay Eptunenay, onarchmay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Ethay odgay ofyay armsyay ishay iantgay ulkbay isplayday’day,
Opposedyay otay Allaspay, arway’say iumphanttray aidmay.
Againstyay Atonalay archmay’day ethay onsay ofyay Aymay.
Ethay uiverqay’day Ianday, istersay ofyay ethay ayday,
(Erhay oldengay arrowsyay oundingsay atyay erhay idesay,)
Aturniasay, ajestymay ofyay eavenhay, efiedday.
Ithway ieryfay Ulcanvay astlay inyay attlebay andsstay
Ethay acredsay oodflay atthay ollsray onyay oldengay andssay;
Anthusxay ishay amenay ithway osethay ofyay eavenlyhay irthbay,
Utbay alledcay Amanderscay byay ethay onssay ofyay earthyay.

Ilewhay usthay ethay odsgay inyay ariousvay eaguelay engageyay,
Achillesyay owglay’day ithway oremay anthay ortalmay ageray:
Ectorhay ehay oughtsay; inyay earchsay ofyay Ectorhay urntay’day
Ishay eyesyay aroundyay, orfay Ectorhay onlyyay urnbay’day;
Andyay urstbay ikelay ightninglay oughthray ethay anksray, andyay owvay’day
Otay utglay ethay odgay ofyay attlesbay ithway ishay oodblay.

Easænay asway ethay irstfay owhay aredday otay aystay;
Apolloyay edgedway imhay inyay ethay arriorway’say ayway,
Utbay ellsway’day ishay osombay ithway undauntedyay ightmay,
Alfhay-orcedfay andyay alfhay-ersuadedpay otay ethay ightfay.
Ikelay oungyay Aonlycay, ofyay ethay oyalray inelay,
Inyay oicevay andyay aspectyay, eemsay’day ethay owerpay ivineday;
Andyay adebay ethay iefchay eflectray, owhay atelay ithway ornscay
Inyay istantday eatsthray ehay avedbray ethay oddessgay-ornbay.

Enthay usthay ethay erohay ofyay Anchisesyay’ ainstray:
“Otay eetmay Elidespay ouyay ersuadepay inyay ainvay:
Alreadyyay avehay Iyay etmay, ornay oidvay ofyay earfay
Observedyay ethay uryfay ofyay ishay ingflyay earspay;
Omfray Idayay’say oodsway ehay asedchay usyay otay ethay ieldfay,
Ouryay orcefay ehay atteredscay, andyay ouryay erdshay ehay illkay’day;
Essuslyrnay, Edasuspay inyay ashesyay aylay;
Utbay (Ovejay assistingyay) Iyay urvivedsay ethay ayday:
Elseyay adhay Iyay unksay oppressyay’day inyay atalfay ightfay
Byay iercefay Achillesyay andyay Inervamay’say ightmay.
Erewhay’eryay ehay ovedmay, ethay oddessgay oneshay eforebay,
Andyay athedbay ishay azenbray ancelay inyay ostilehay oregay.
Atwhay ortalmay anmay Achillesyay ancay ustainsay?
Ethay immortalsyay uardgay imhay oughthray ethay eadfuldray ainplay,
Andyay uffersay otnay ishay artday otay allfay inyay ainvay.
Ereway Odgay myay aidyay, isthay armyay ouldshay eckchay ishay owerpay,
Oughthay ongstray inyay attlebay asyay ayay azenbray owertay.”

Otay omwhay ethay onsay ofyay Ovejay: “Atthay odgay imploreyay,
Andyay ebay atwhay eatgray Achillesyay asway eforebay.
Omfray eavenlyhay Enusvay outhay erivday’stay thyay ainstray,
Andyay ehay utbay omfray ayay istersay ofyay ethay ainmay;
Anyay agedyay easay-odgay atherfay ofyay ishay inelay;
Utbay Ovejay imselfhay ethay acredsay ourcesay ofyay inethay.
Enthay iftlay thyay eaponway orfay ayay oblenay owblay,
Ornay earfay ethay auntingvay ofyay ayay ortalmay oefay.”

Isthay aidsay, andyay iritspay eathedbray intoyay ishay eastbray,
Oughthray ethay ickthay oopstray ethay emboldenyay’day erohay esspray’day:
Ishay enturousvay actyay ethay itewhay-armyay’day ueenqay urveysay’day,
Andyay usthay, assemblingyay allyay ethay owerspay, eshay aidsay:

“Eholdbay anyay actionyay, odsgay! atthay aimsclay ouryay arecay,
Olay eatgray Easænay ushingray otay ethay arway!
Againstyay Elidespay ehay irectsday ishay oursecay,
Usphœbay impelsyay, andyay Usphœbay ivesgay imhay orcefay.
Estrainray ishay oldbay areercay; atyay eastlay, otay attendyay
Ouryay avourfay’day erohay, etlay omesay owerpay escendday.
Otay uardgay ishay ifelay, andyay addyay otay ishay enownray,
Eway, ethay eatgray armamentyay ofyay eavenhay, amecay ownday.
Ereafterhay etlay imhay allfay, asyay Atesfay esignday,
Atthay unspay osay ortshay ishay ifelay’say illustriousyay inelay:[262]
Utbay estlay omesay adverseyay odgay ownay osscray ishay ayway,
Ivegay imhay otay owknay atwhay owerspay assistyay isthay ayday:
Orfay owhay allshay ortalmay andstay ethay ireday alarmsyay,
Enwhay eavenhay’say efulgentray osthay appearyay inyay armsyay?”[263]

Usthay eshay; andyay usthay ethay odgay osewhay orcefay ancay akemay
Ethay olidsay obeglay’say eternalyay asisbay akeshay:
“Againstyay ethay ightmay ofyay anmay, osay eeblefay ownknay,
Whyay ouldshay elestialcay owerspay exertyay eirthay ownyay?
Ufficesay omfray onderyay ountmay otay iewvay ethay enescay,
Andyay eavelay otay arway ethay atesfay ofyay ortalmay enmay.
Utbay ifyay ethay armipotentyay, oryay odgay ofyay ightlay,
Obstructyay Achillesyay, oryay ommencecay ethay ightfay,
Encethay onyay ethay odsgay ofyay Oytray eway iftsway escendday:
Ullfay oonsay, Iyay oubtday otnay, allshay ethay onflictcay endyay;
Andyay esethay, inyay uinray andyay onfusioncay urlhay’day,
Ieldyay otay ouryay onqueringcay armsyay ethay owerlay orldway.”

Usthay avinghay aidsay, ethay anttyray ofyay ethay easay,
Oeruleancay Eptunenay, oseray, andyay edlay ethay ayway.
Advancedyay uponyay ethay ieldfay erethay oodstay ayay oundmay
Ofyay earthyay ongestedcay, allway’day, andyay enchtray’day aroundyay;
Inyay elderyay imestay otay uardgay Alcidesyay ademay,
(Ethay orkway ofyay Ojanstray, ithway Inervamay’say aidyay,)
Atwhay imetay ayay engefulvay onstermay ofyay ethay ainmay
Eptsway ethay ideway oreshay, andyay ovedray imhay otay ethay ainplay.

Erehay Eptunenay andyay ethay odsgay ofyay Eecegray epairray,
Ithway oudsclay encompassyay’day, andyay ayay eilvay ofyay airyay:
Ethay adverseyay owerspay, aroundyay Apolloyay aidlay,
Owncray ethay airfay illshay atthay ilversay Imoissay adeshay.
Inyay irclecay oseclay eachyay eavenlyhay artypay atsay,
Intentyay otay ormfay ethay uturefay emeschay ofyay atefay;
Utbay ixmay otnay etyay inyay ightfay, oughthay Ovejay onyay ighhay
Ivesgay ethay oudlay ignalsay, andyay ethay eavenshay eplyray.

Eanwhilemay ethay ushingray armiesyay idehay ethay oundgray;
Ethay ampledtray entrecay ieldsyay ayay ollowhay oundsay:
Eedsstay asedcay inyay ailmay, andyay iefschay inyay armouryay ightbray,
Ethay eamingglay ampaignchay owsglay ithway azenbray ightlay.
Amidyay othbay ostshay (ayay eadfuldray acespay) appearyay,
Erethay eatgray Achillesyay; oldbay Easænay, erehay.
Ithway oweringtay idesstray Easænay irstfay advancedyay;
Ethay oddingnay umageplay onyay ishay elmethay ancedday:
Eadspray oyay’eryay ishay eastbray ethay encingfay ieldshay ehay orebay,
Andyay, osay ehay ovedmay, ishay avelinjay amedflay eforebay.
Otnay osay Elidespay; uriousfay otay engageyay,
Ehay ushray’day impetuousyay. Uchsay ethay ionlay’say ageray,
Owhay iewingvay irstfay ishay oesfay ithway ornfulscay eyesyay,
Oughthay allyay inyay armsyay ethay eopledpay itycay iseray,
Alksstay arelesscay onyay, ithway unregardingyay idepray;
Illtay atyay ethay engthlay, byay omesay avebray outhyay efiedday,
Otay ishay oldbay earspay ethay avagesay urnstay aloneyay,
Ehay urmursmay uryfay ithway ayay ollowhay oangray;
Ehay insgray, ehay oamsfay, ehay ollsray ishay eyesyay aroundyay,
Ashlay’day byay ishay ailtay ishay eavinghay idessay esoundray;
Ehay allscay upyay allyay ishay ageray; ehay indsgray ishay eethtay,
Esolvedray onyay engeancevay, oryay esolvedray onyay eathday.
Osay iercefay Achillesyay onyay Easænay iesflay;
Osay andsstay Easænay, andyay ishay orcefay efiesday.
Ereyay etyay ethay ernstay encounteryay oinjay’day, egunbay
Ethay eedsay ofyay Etisthay usthay otay Enusvay’ onsay:

“Whyay omescay Easænay oughthray ethay anksray osay arfay?
Eekssay ehay otay eetmay Achillesyay’ armyay inyay arway,
Inyay opehay ethay ealmsray ofyay Iampray otay enjoyyay,
Andyay ovepray ishay eritsmay otay ethay onethray ofyay Oytray?
Antgray atthay eneathbay thyay ancelay Achillesyay iesday,
Ethay artialpay onarchmay aymay efuseray ethay izepray;
Onssay ehay ashay anymay; osethay thyay idepray aymay uellqay:
Andyay ’istay ishay aultfay otay ovelay osethay onssay ootay ellway,
Oryay, inyay ewardray ofyay thyay ictoriousvay andhay,
Ashay Oytray oposedpray omesay aciousspay acttray ofyay andlay,
Anyay ampleyay orestfay, oryay ayay airfay omainday,
Ofyay illshay orfay inesvay, andyay arableyay orfay aingray?
Evenyay isthay, erhapspay, illway ardlyhay ovepray thyay otlay.
Utbay ancay Achillesyay ebay osay oonsay orgotfay?
Onceyay (asyay Iyay inkthay) ouyay awsay isthay andishbray’day earspay,
Andyay enthay ethay eatgray Easænay eemsay’day otay earfay:
Ithway eartyhay astehay omfray Idayay’say ountmay ehay edflay,
Ornay, illtay ehay eachray’day Essuslyrnay, urntay’day ishay eadhay.
Erhay oftylay allsway otnay onglay ouryay ogresspray aystay’day;
Osethay, Allaspay, Ovejay, andyay eway, inyay uinsray aidlay:
Inyay Eciangray ainschay erhay aptivecay aceray ereway astcay;
’Istay uetray, ethay eatgray Easænay edflay ootay astfay.
Efraudedday ofyay myay onquestcay onceyay eforebay,
Atwhay enthay Iyay ostlay, ethay odsgay isthay ayday estoreray.
Ogay; ilewhay outhay aymay’stay, avoidyay ethay eatenthray’day atefay;
Oolsfay aystay otay eelfay ityay, andyay areyay iseway ootay atelay.”

Otay isthay Anchisesyay’ onsay: “Uchsay ordsway employyay
Otay oneyay atthay earsfay eethay, omesay unwarlikeyay oybay;
Uchsay eway isdainday; ethay estbay aymay ebay efiedday
Ithway eanmay eproachesray, andyay unmanlyyay idepray;
Unworthyyay ethay ighhay aceray omfray ichwhay eway amecay
Oclaimpray’day osay oudlylay byay ethay oicevay ofyay amefay:
Eachyay omfray illustriousyay athersfay awsdray ishay inelay;
Eachyay oddessgay-ornbay; alfhay umanhay, alfhay ivineday.
Etisthay’ isthay ayday, oryay Enusvay’ offspringyay iesday,
Andyay earstay allshay ickletray omfray elestialcay eyesyay:
Orfay enwhay otway eroeshay, usthay erivedday, ontendcay,
’Istay otnay inyay ordsway ethay oriousglay ifestray ancay endyay.
Ifyay etyay outhay urtherfay eeksay otay earnlay myay irthbay
(Ayay aletay esoundedray oughthray ethay aciousspay earthyay)
Earhay owhay ethay oriousglay originyay eway ovepray
Omfray ancientyay Ardanusday, ethay irstfay omfray Ovejay:
Ardaniaday’say allsway ehay aisedray; orfay Ilionyay, enthay,
(Ethay itycay incesay ofyay anymay-anguagedlay enmay,)
Asway otnay. Ethay ativesnay ereway ontentcay otay illtay
Ethay adyshay ootfay ofyay Idayay’say ountfulfay illhay.[264]
Omfray Ardanusday eatgray Erichthoniusyay ingsspray,
Ethay ichestray, onceyay, ofyay Asiayay’say ealthyway ingskay;
Eethray ousandthay aresmay ishay aciousspay asturespay edbray,
Eethray ousandthay oalsfay esidebay eirthay othersmay edfay.
Oreasbay, enamouryay’day ofyay ethay ightlyspray aintray,
Oncealcay’day ishay odheadgay inyay ayay owingflay anemay,
Ithway oicevay issembledday otay ishay oveslay ehay eighnay’day,
Andyay oursedcay ethay appledday eautiesbay oyay’eryay ethay eadmay:
Encehay ungspray elvetway othersyay ofyay unrivallyay’day indkay,
Iftsway asyay eirthay othermay aresmay, andyay atherfay indway.
Esethay ightlylay immingskay, enwhay eythay eptsway ethay ainplay,
Ornay iedplay ethay assgray, ornay entbay ethay endertay aingray;
Andyay enwhay alongyay ethay evellay eassay eythay ewflay,[265]
Arcescay onyay ethay urfacesay urlcay’day ethay inybray ewday.
Uchsay Erichthoniusyay asway: omfray imhay erethay amecay
Ethay acredsay Ostray, ofyay omwhay ethay Ojantray amenay.
Eethray onssay enownray’day adornyay’day ishay uptialnay edbay,
Ilusyay, Assaracusyay, andyay Anymedgay:
Ethay atchlessmay Anymedgay, ivinelyday airfay,
Omwhay eavenhay, enamouryay’day, atchsnay’day otay upperyay airyay,
Otay earbay ethay upcay ofyay Ovejay (etherealyay uestgay,
Ethay acegray andyay oryglay ofyay ethay ambrosialyay eastfay).
Ethay otway emainingray onssay ethay inelay ivideday:
Irstfay oseray Aomedonlay omfray Ilusyay’ idesay;
Omfray imhay Ithonustay, ownay inyay arescay owngray oldyay,
Andyay Iampray, essblay’day ithway Ectorhay, avebray andyay oldbay;
Iusclytay andyay Ampuslay, everyay-onourhay’day airpay;
Andyay Icetaonhay, underboltthay ofyay arway.
Omfray eatgray Assaracusyay angspray Apyscay, ehay
Egatbay Anchisesyay, andyay Anchisesyay emay.
Uchsay isyay ouryay aceray: ’istay ortunefay ivesgay usyay irthbay,
Utbay Ovejay aloneyay enduesyay ethay oulsay ithway orthway:
Ehay, ourcesay ofyay owerpay andyay ightmay! ithway oundlessbay aysway,
Allyay umanhay ouragecay ivesgay, oryay akestay awayyay.
Onglay inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay ordsway eway aymay ontendcay,
Eproachray isyay infiniteyay, andyay owsknay onay endyay,
Armyay’day oryay ithway uthtray oryay alsehoodfay, ightray oryay ongwray;
Osay olublevay ayay eaponway isyay ethay onguetay;
Oundedway, eway oundway; andyay eithernay idesay ancay ailfay,
Orfay everyyay anmay ashay equalyay engthstray otay ailray:
Omenway aloneyay, enwhay inyay ethay eetsstray eythay arjay,
Erhapspay excelyay usyay inyay isthay ordyway arway;
Ikelay usyay eythay andstay, encompassyay’day ithway ethay owdcray,
Andyay entvay eirthay angeryay impotentyay andyay oudlay.
Easecay enthay—Ouryay usinessbay inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay ightfay
Isyay otnay otay uestionqay, utbay otay ovepray ouryay ightmay.
Otay allyay osethay insultsyay outhay asthay offeryay’day erehay,
Eceiveray isthay answeryay: ’istay myay ingflyay earspay.”

Ehay okespay. Ithway allyay ishay orcefay ethay avelinjay ungflay,
Ixfay’day eepday, andyay oudlylay inyay ethay ucklerbay ungray.
Arfay onyay ishay outstretchyay’day armyay, Elidespay eldhay
(Otay eetmay ethay underingthay ancelay) ishay eadfuldray ieldshay,
Atthay embledtray asyay ityay uckstay; ornay oidvay ofyay earfay
Awsay, ereyay ityay ellfay, ethay immeasurableyay earspay.
Ishay earsfay ereway ainvay; impenetrableyay armschay
Ecuredsay ethay empertay ofyay ethay etherealyay armsyay.
Oughthray otway ongstray atesplay ethay ointpay itsyay assagepay eldhay,
Utbay oppstay’day, andyay estedray, byay ethay irdthay epellray’day.
Ivefay atesplay ofyay ariousvay etalmay, ariousvay ouldmay,
Omposedcay ethay ieldshay; ofyay assbray eachyay outwardyay oldfay,
Ofyay intay eachyay inwardyay, andyay ethay iddlemay oldgay:
Erethay uckstay ethay ancelay. Enthay isingray ereyay ehay ewthray,
Ethay orcefulfay earspay ofyay eatgray Achillesyay ewflay,
Andyay iercedpay ethay Ardanday ieldshay’say extremestyay oundbay,
Erewhay ethay illshray assbray eturnray’day ayay arpershay oundsay:
Oughthray ethay inthay ergevay ethay Eleanpay eaponway idesglay,
Andyay ethay ightslay overingcay ofyay expandedyay ideshay.
Easænay ishay ontractedcay odybay endsbay,
Andyay oyay’eryay imhay ighhay ethay ivenray argetay extendsyay,
Eessay, oughthray itsyay artingpay atesplay, ethay upperyay airyay,
Andyay atyay ishay ackbay erceivespay ethay uiveringqay earspay:
Ayay atefay osay earnay imhay, illschay ishay oulsay ithway ightfray;
Andyay imssway eforebay ishay eyesyay ethay anymay-olourcay’day ightlay.
Achillesyay, ushingray inyay ithway eadfuldray iescray,
Awsdray ishay oadbray adeblay, andyay atyay Easænay iesflay:
Easænay ousingray asyay ethay oefay amecay onyay,
Ithway orcefay ollectedcay, eaveshay ayay ightymay onestay:
Ayay assmay enormousyay! ichwhay inyay odernmay aysday
Onay otway ofyay earthyay’say egenerateday onssay ouldcay aiseray.
Utbay oceanyay’say odgay, osewhay earthquakesyay ockray ethay oundgray
Awsay ethay istressday, andyay ovedmay ethay owerspay aroundyay:

“Olay! onyay ethay inkbray ofyay atefay Easænay andsstay,
Anyay instantyay ictimvay otay Achillesyay’ andshay;
Byay Usphœbay urgedyay; utbay Usphœbay ashay estowbay’day
Ishay aidyay inyay ainvay: ethay anmay oyay’erpowersyay ethay odgay.
Andyay ancay eyay eesay isthay ighteousray iefchay atoneyay
Ithway uiltlessgay oodblay orfay icesvay otnay ishay ownyay?
Otay allyay ethay odsgay ishay onstantcay owsvay ereway aidpay;
Uresay, oughthay ehay arsway orfay Oytray, ehay aimsclay ouryay aidyay.
Atefay illsway otnay isthay; ornay usthay ancay Ovejay esignray
Ethay uturefay atherfay ofyay ethay Ardanday inelay:[266]
Ethay irstfay eatgray ancestoryay obtainyay’day ishay acegray,
Andyay illstay ishay ovelay escendsday onyay allyay ethay aceray:
Orfay Iampray ownay, andyay Iampray’say aithlessfay indkay,
Atyay engthlay areyay odiousyay otay ethay allyay-eeingsay indmay;
Onyay eatgray Easænay allshay evolveday ethay eignray,
Andyay onssay ucceedingsay onssay ethay astinglay inelay ustainsay.”

Ethay eatgray earthyay-akershay usthay: otay omwhay epliesray
Ethay imperialyay oddessgay ithway ethay adiantray eyesyay:
“Oodgay asyay ehay isyay, otay immolateyay oryay arespay
Ethay Ardanday incepray, Oyay Eptunenay! ebay thyay arecay;
Allaspay andyay Iyay, byay allyay atthay odsgay ancay indbay,
Avehay ornsway estructionday otay ethay Ojantray indkay;
Otnay evenyay anyay instantyay otay otractpray eirthay atefay,
Oryay avesay oneyay embermay ofyay ethay inkingsay atestay;
Illtay erhay astlay ameflay ebay uenchqay’day ithway erhay astlay oregay,
Andyay evenyay erhay umblingcray uinsray areyay onay oremay.”

Ethay ingkay ofyay oceanyay otay ethay ightfay escendsday,
Oughthray allyay ethay istlingwhay artsday ishay oursecay ehay endsbay,
Iftsway interposedyay etweenbay ethay arriorway iesflay,
Andyay astscay ickthay arknessday oyay’eryay Achillesyay’ eyesyay.[267]
Omfray eatgray Easænay’ ieldshay ethay earspay ehay ewdray,
Andyay atyay ishay astermay’say eetfay ethay eaponway ewthray.
Atthay oneday, ithway orcefay ivineday ehay atchsnay’day onyay ighhay
Ethay Ardanday incepray, andyay orebay imhay oughthray ethay skyay,
Oothsmay-idingglay ithoutway epstay, aboveyay ethay eadshay
Ofyay arringway eroeshay, andyay ofyay oundingbay eedsstay:
Illtay atyay ethay attlebay’say utmostyay ergevay eythay ightlay,
Erewhay ethay owslay Aucanscay oseclay ethay earray ofyay ightfay.
Ethay odheadgay erethay (ishay eavenlyhay ormfay onfesscay’day)
Ithway ordsway ikelay esethay ethay antingpay iefchay addressyay’day:

“Atwhay owerpay, Oyay incepray! ithway orcefay inferioryay arfay,
Urgedyay eethay otay eetmay Achillesyay’ armyay inyay arway?
Enceforthhay ewarebay, ornay antedateyay thyay oomday,
Efraudingday atefay ofyay allyay thyay amefay otay omecay.
Utbay enwhay ethay ayday ecreedday (orfay omecay ityay ustmay)
Allshay aylay isthay eadfuldray erohay inyay ethay ustday,
Etlay enthay ethay uriesfay ofyay atthay armyay ebay ownknay,
Ecuresay onay Eciangray orcefay anscendstray thyay ownyay.”

Ithway atthay, ehay eftlay imhay onderingway asyay ehay aylay,
Enthay omfray Achillesyay asedchay ethay istmay awayyay:
Uddensay, eturningray ithway ayay eamstray ofyay ightlay,
Ethay enescay ofyay arway amecay ushingray onyay ishay ightsay.
Enthay usthay, amazedyay; “Atwhay ondersway ikestray myay indmay!
Myay earspay, atthay artedpay onyay ethay ingsway ofyay indway,
Aidlay erehay eforebay emay! andyay ethay Ardanday ordlay,
Atthay ellfay isthay instantyay, anishvay’day omfray myay ordsway!
Iyay oughtthay aloneyay ithway ortalsmay otay ontendcay,
Utbay owerspay elestialcay uresay isthay oefay efendday.
Eatgray asyay ehay isyay, ouryay armsyay ehay arcescay illway tryay,
Ontentcay orfay onceyay, ithway allyay ishay odsgay, otay flyay.
Ownay enthay etlay othersyay eedblay.” Isthay aidsay, aloudyay
Ehay entsvay ishay uryfay andyay inflamesyay ethay owdcray:
“Oyay Eeksgray! (ehay iescray, andyay everyyay ankray alarmsyay)
Oinjay attlebay, anmay otay anmay, andyay armsyay otay armsyay!
’Istay otnay inyay emay, oughthay avourfay’day byay ethay skyay,
Otay owmay olewhay oopstray, andyay akemay olewhay armiesyay flyay:
Onay odgay ancay inglysay uchsay ayay osthay engageyay,
Otnay Arsmay imselfhay, ornay eatgray Inervamay’say ageray.
Utbay atsoewhay’eryay Achillesyay ancay inspireyay,
Atewhay’eryay ofyay activeyay orcefay, oryay actingyay irefay;
Atewhay’eryay isthay earthay ancay omptpray, oryay andhay obeyyay;
Allyay, allyay Achillesyay, Eeksgray! isyay oursyay otay-ayday.
Oughthray onyay ideway osthay isthay armyay allshay atterscay earfay,
Andyay inthay ethay uadronssqay ithway myay inglesay earspay.”

Ehay aidsay: ornay esslay elateyay ithway artialmay oyjay,
Ethay odlikegay Ectorhay armway’day ethay oopstray ofyay Oytray:
“Ojanstray, otay arway! Inkthay, Ectorhay eadslay ouyay onyay;
Ornay eaddray ethay auntsvay ofyay Eleuspay’ aughtyhay onsay.
Eedsday ustmay ecideday ouryay atefay. Eyay’enyay esethay ithway ordsway
Insultyay ethay avebray, owhay embletray atyay eirthay ordssway:
Ethay eakestway atheistyay-etchwray allyay eavenhay efiesday,
Utbay inksshray andyay uddersshay enwhay ethay underthay iesflay.
Ornay omfray onyay oasterbay allshay ouryay iefchay etireray,
Otnay oughthay ishay earthay ereway eelstay, ishay andshay ereway irefay;
Atthay irefay, atthay eelstay, ouryay Ectorhay ouldshay ithstandway,
Andyay avebray atthay engefulvay earthay, atthay eadfuldray andhay.”

Usthay (eathingbray ageray oughthray allyay) ethay erohay aidsay;
Ayay oodway ofyay anceslay isesray oundray ishay eadhay,
Amoursclay onyay amoursclay empesttay allyay ethay airyay,
Eythay oinjay, eythay ongthray, eythay ickenthay otay ethay arway.
Utbay Usphœbay arnsway imhay omfray ighhay eavenhay otay unshay
Ethay inglesay ightfay ithway Etisthay’ odlikegay onsay;
Oremay afesay otay ombatcay inyay ethay ingledmay andbay,
Ornay empttay ootay earnay ethay errorstay ofyay ishay andhay.
Ehay earshay, obedientyay otay ethay odgay ofyay ightlay,
Andyay, ungedplay ithinway ethay anksray, awaitsyay ethay ightfay.

Enthay iercefay Achillesyay, outingshay otay ethay iesskay,
Onyay Oytray’say olewhay orcefay ithway oundlessbay uryfay iesflay.
Irstfay allsfay Iphytionyay, atyay ishay armyyay’say eadhay;
Avebray asway ethay iefchay, andyay avebray ethay osthay ehay edlay;
Omfray eatgray Otrynteusyay ehay erivedday ishay oodblay,
Ishay othermay asway ayay Aisnay, ofyay ethay oodflay;
Eneathbay ethay adesshay ofyay Olustmay, owncray’day ithway owsnay,
Omfray Ehyday’say allsway ehay uledray ethay andslay elowbay.
Iercefay asyay ehay ingsspray, ethay ordsway ishay eadhay ividesday:
Ethay artedpay isagevay allsfay onyay equalyay idessay:
Ithway oudlay-esoundingray armsyay ehay ikesstray ethay ainplay;
Ilewhay usthay Achillesyay oriesglay oyay’eryay ethay ainslay:

“Ielay erethay, Otryntidesyay! ethay Ojantray earthyay
Eceivesray eethay eadday, oughthay Aegygay oastbay thyay irthbay;
Osethay eauteousbay ieldsfay erewhay Ushyllay’ avesway areyay ollray’day,
Andyay enteousplay Ermushay ellssway ithway idestay ofyay oldgay,
Areyay inethay onay oremay.”—Ethay insultingyay erohay aidsay,
Andyay eftlay imhay eepingslay inyay eternalyay adeshay.
Ethay ollingray eelswhay ofyay Eecegray ethay odybay oretay,
Andyay ashday’day eirthay axlesyay ithway onay ulgarvay oregay.

Emoleonday extnay, Antenoryay’say offspringyay, aidlay
Eathlessbray inyay ustday, ethay icepray ofyay ashnessray aidpay.
Ethay impatientyay eelstay ithway ullfay-escendingday aysway
Orcedfay oughthray ishay azenbray elmhay itsyay uriousfay ayway,
Esistlessray ovedray ethay atterbay’day ullskay eforebay,
Andyay ashday’day andyay ingledmay allyay ethay ainsbray ithway oregay.
Isthay eessay Ippodamashay, andyay eizedsay ithway ightfray,
Esertsday ishay ariotchay orfay ayay iftersway ightflay:
Ethay ancelay arrestsyay imhay: anyay ignobleyay oundway
Ethay antingpay Ojantray ivetsray otay ethay oundgray.
Ehay oansgray awayyay ishay oulsay: otnay ouderlay oarsray,
Atyay Eptunenay’say ineshray onyay Elicèhay’say ighhay oresshay,
Ethay ictimvay ullbay; ethay ocksray eray-ellowbay oundray,
Andyay oceanyay istenslay otay ethay atefulgray oundsay.
Enthay ellfay onyay Olydorepay ishay engefulvay ageray,[268]
Ethay oungestyay opehay ofyay Iampray’say oopingstay ageyay:
(Osewhay eetfay orfay iftnesssway inyay ethay aceray urpasssay’day:)
Ofyay allyay ishay onssay, ethay earestday, andyay ethay astlay.
Otay ethay orbiddenfay ieldfay ehay akestay ishay ightflay,
Inyay ethay irstfay ollyfay ofyay ayay outhfulyay ightknay,
Otay auntvay ishay iftnesssway eelswhay aroundyay ethay ainplay,
Utbay auntsvay otnay onglay, ithway allyay ishay iftnesssway ainslay:
Uckstray erewhay ethay ossingcray eltsbay uniteyay ehindbay,
Andyay oldengay ingsray ethay oubleday ackbay-ateplay oinjay’day
Orthfay oughthray ethay avelnay urstbay ethay illingthray eelstay;
Andyay onyay ishay eesknay ithway iercingpay ieksshray ehay ellfay;
Ethay ushingray entrailsyay ourpay’day uponyay ethay oundgray
Ishay andshay ollectcay; andyay arknessday apswray imhay oundray.
Enwhay Ectorhay iewvay’day, allyay astlyghay inyay ishay oregay,
Usthay adlysay ainslay ethay unhappyyay Olydorepay,
Ayay oudclay ofyay orrowsay overcastyay ishay ightsay,
Ishay oulsay onay ongerlay ookbray’day ethay istantday ightfay:
Ullfay inyay Achillesyay’ eadfuldray ontfray ehay amecay,
Andyay ookshay ishay avelinjay ikelay ayay avingway ameflay.
Ethay onsay ofyay Eleuspay eessay, ithway oyjay ossesspay’day,
Ishay earthay ighhay-oundingbay inyay ishay isingray eastbray.
“Andyay, olay! ethay anmay onyay omwhay ackblay atesfay attendyay;
Ethay anmay, atthay ewslay Achillesyay, isyay ishay iendfray!
Onay oremay allshay Ectorhay’say andyay Elidespay’ earspay
Urntay omfray eachyay otheryay inyay ethay alksway ofyay arway.”—
Enthay ithway evengefulray eyesyay ehay annscay’day imhay oyay’eryay:
“Omecay, andyay eceiveray thyay atefay!” Ehay akespay onay oremay.

Ectorhay, undauntedyay, usthay: “Uchsay ordsway employyay
Otay oneyay atthay eadsdray eethay, omesay unwarlikeyay oybay:
Uchsay eway ouldcay ivegay, efyingday andyay efiedday,
Eanmay intercourseyay ofyay obloquyyay andyay idepray!
Iyay owknay thyay orcefay otay inemay uperiorsay arfay;
Utbay eavenhay aloneyay onferscay uccesssay inyay arway:
Eanmay asyay Iyay amyay, ethay odsgay aymay uidegay myay artday,
Andyay ivegay ityay entranceyay inyay ayay averbray earthay.”

Enthay artspay ethay ancelay: utbay Allaspay’ eavenlyhay eathbray
Arfay omfray Achillesyay aftsway ethay ingedway eathday:
Ethay iddenbay artday againyay otay Ectorhay iesflay,
Andyay atyay ethay eetfay ofyay itsyay eatgray astermay ieslay.
Achillesyay osesclay ithway ishay atedhay oefay,
Ishay earthay andyay eyesyay ithway amingflay uryfay owglay:
Utbay esentpray otay ishay aidyay, Apolloyay oudsshray
Ethay avourfay’day erohay inyay ayay eilvay ofyay oudsclay.
Icethray uckstray Elidespay ithway indignantyay earthay,
Icethray inyay impassiveyay airyay ehay ungedplay ethay artday;
Ethay earspay ayay ourthfay imetay uriedbay inyay ethay oudclay.
Ehay oamsfay ithway uryfay, andyay exclaimsyay aloudyay:

“Etchwray! outhay asthay ’apedscay againyay; onceyay oremay thyay ightflay
Ashay avedsay eethay, andyay ethay artialpay odgay ofyay ightlay.
Utbay onglay outhay altshay otnay thyay ustjay atefay ithstandway,
Ifyay anyyay owerpay assistyay Achillesyay’ andhay.
Flyay enthay ingloriousyay! utbay thyay ightflay isthay ayday
Olewhay ecatombshay ofyay Ojantray ostsghay allshay aypay.”

Ithway atthay, ehay utsglay ishay ageray onyay umbersnay ainslay:
Enthay Opsdryay umbledtay otay ethay ensanguinedyay ainplay,
Iercedpay oughthray ethay ecknay: ehay eftlay imhay antingpay erethay,
Andyay oppstay’day Emuchusday, eatgray Iletorphay’say eirhay.
Iganticgay iefchay! eepday ashgay’day ethay enormousyay adeblay,
Andyay orfay ethay oulsay anyay ampleyay assagepay ademay.
Aoganuslay andyay Ardanusday expireyay,
Ethay aliantvay onssay ofyay anyay unhappyyay iresay;
Othbay inyay oneyay instantyay omfray ethay ariotchay urlhay’day,
Unksay inyay oneyay instantyay otay ethay ethernay orldway:
Isthay ifferenceday onlyyay eirthay adsay atesfay affordyay
Atthay oneyay ethay earspay estroyday’day, andyay oneyay ethay ordsway.

Ornay esslay unpitiedyay, oungyay Alastoryay eedsblay;
Inyay ainvay ishay outhyay, inyay ainvay ishay eautybay eadsplay;
Inyay ainvay ehay egsbay eethay, ithway ayay uppliantsay’say oanmay,
Otay arespay ayay ormfay, anyay ageyay osay ikelay thyay ownyay!
Unhappyyay oybay! onay ayerpray, onay ovingmay artyay,
Eyay’eryay entbay atthay iercefay, inexorableyay earthay!
Ilewhay etyay ehay embledtray atyay ishay eesknay, andyay iedcray,
Ethay uthlessray alchionfay opedyay ishay endertay idesay;
Ethay antingpay iverlay ourspay ayay oodflay ofyay oregay
Atthay ownsdray ishay osombay illtay ehay antspay onay oremay.

Oughthray Uliusmay’ eadhay enthay ovedray ethay impetuousyay earspay:
Ethay arriorway allsfay, ansfixtray’day omfray earyay otay earyay.
Thyay ifelay, Echeclusyay! extnay ethay ordsway ereavesbay,
Eepday oughthay ethay ontfray ethay onderouspay alchionfay eavesclay;
Armway’day inyay ethay ainbray ethay okingsmay eaponway ieslay,
Ethay urplepay eathday omescay oatingflay oyay’eryay ishay eyesyay.
Enthay avebray Eucalionday iedday: ethay artday asway ungflay
Erewhay ethay itknay ervesnay ethay iantplay elbowyay ungstray;
Ehay oppdray’day ishay armyay, anyay unassistingyay eightway,
Andyay oodstay allyay impotentyay, expectingyay atefay:
Ullfay onyay ishay ecknay ethay allingfay alchionfay edspay,
Omfray ishay oadbray ouldersshay ewhay’day ishay estedcray eadhay:
Orthfay omfray ethay onebay ethay inalspay arrowmay iesflay,
Andyay, unksay inyay ustday, ethay orpsecay extendedyay ieslay.
Igmasrhay, osewhay aceray omfray uitfulfray Aciathray amecay,
(Ethay onsay ofyay Ieruspay, anyay illustriousyay amenay,)
Ucceedssay otay atefay: ethay earspay ishay ellybay endsray;
Onepray omfray ishay arcay ethay underingthay iefchay escendsday.
Ethay uiresqay, owhay awsay expiringyay onyay ethay oundgray
Ishay ostratepray astermay, einray’day ethay eedsstay aroundyay;
Ishay ackbay, arcescay urntay’day, ethay Elianpay avelinjay oredgay,
Andyay etchstray’day ethay ervantsay oyay’eryay ishay ingdyay ordlay.
Asyay enwhay ayay ameflay ethay indingway alleyvay illsfay,
Andyay unsray onyay acklingcray ubsshray etweenbay ethay illshay;
Enthay oyay’eryay ethay ubblestay upyay ethay ountainmay iesflay,
Iresfay ethay ighhay oodsway, andyay azesblay otay ethay iesskay,
Isthay ayway andyay atthay, ethay eadingspray orrenttay oarsray:
Osay eepssway ethay erohay oughthray ethay astedway oresshay;
Aroundyay imhay ideway, immenseyay estructionday ourspay
Andyay earthyay isyay elugedday ithway ethay anguinesay owersshay,
Asyay ithway autumnalyay arvestshay overcay’day oyay’eryay,
Andyay ickthay estrewnbay, ieslay Erescay’ acredsay oorflay;
Enwhay oundray andyay oundray, ithway evernay-eariedway ainpay,
Ethay amplingtray eersstay eatbay outyay ethay unnumberyay’day aingray:
Osay ethay iercefay ourserscay, asyay ethay ariotchay ollsray,
Eadtray ownday olewhay anksray, andyay ushcray outyay eroeshay’ oulssay,
Ashday’day omfray eirthay oofshay ilewhay oyay’eryay ethay eadday eythay flyay,
Ackblay, oodyblay opsdray ethay okingsmay ariotchay edyay:
Ethay ikyspay eelswhay oughthray eapshay ofyay arnagecay oretay;
Andyay ickthay ethay oaninggray axlesyay oppdray’day ithway oregay.
Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay enescay ofyay eathday Achillesyay oodstay,
Allyay imgray ithway ustday, allyay orriblehay inyay oodblay:
Etyay illstay insatiateyay, illstay ithway ageray onyay ameflay;
Uchsay isyay ethay ustlay ofyay evernay-ingdyay amefay!


[Illustrationyay: ] Entaurcay




Ookbay Ixxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Attlebay Inyay Ethay Iverray Amanderscay.[269]


Ethay Ojanstray flyay eforebay Achillesyay, omesay owardstay ethay owntay, othersyay otay ethay
iverray Amanderscay: ehay allsfay uponyay ethay atterlay ithway eatgray aughterslay: akestay
elvetway aptivescay aliveyay, otay acrificesay otay ethay adeshay ofyay Atrocluspay; andyay
illskay Aonlycay andyay Asteropeusyay. Amanderscay attacksyay imhay ithway allyay ishay avesway:
Eptunenay andyay Allaspay assistyay ethay erohay: Imoissay oinsjay Amanderscay: atyay engthlay
Ulcanvay, byay ethay instigationyay ofyay Unojay, almostyay iesdray upyay ethay iverray. Isthay
ombatcay endedyay, ethay otheryay odsgay engageyay eachyay otheryay. Eanwhilemay Achillesyay
ontinuescay ethay aughterslay, ivesdray ethay estray intoyay Oytray: Agenoryay onlyyay akesmay ayay
andstay, andyay isyay onveyedcay awayyay inyay ayay oudclay byay Apolloyay; owhay (otay eludeday
Achillesyay) akestay uponyay imhay Agenoryay’say apeshay, andyay ilewhay ehay ursuespay imhay inyay
atthay isguiseday, ivesgay ethay Ojanstray anyay opportunityyay ofyay etiringray intoyay eirthay
itycay.
    Ethay amesay ayday ontinuescay. Ethay enescay isyay onyay ethay anksbay andyay inyay ethay eamstray
    ofyay Amanderscay.


Andyay ownay otay Anthusxay’ idingglay eamstray eythay ovedray,
Anthusxay, immortalyay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay.
Ethay iverray erehay ividesday ethay ingflyay aintray,
Artpay otay ethay owntay flyay iverseday oyay’eryay ethay ainplay,
Erewhay atelay eirthay oopstray iumphanttray orebay ethay ightfay,
Ownay asedchay, andyay emblingtray inyay ignobleyay ightflay:
(Esethay ithway ayay atheredgay istmay Aturniasay oudsshray,
Andyay ollsray ehindbay ethay outray ayay eaphay ofyay oudsclay:)
Artpay ungeplay intoyay ethay eamstray: oldyay Anthusxay oarsray,
Ethay ashingflay illowsbay eatbay ethay itenwhay’day oresshay:
Ithway iescray omiscuouspray allyay ethay anksbay esoundray,
Andyay erehay, andyay erethay, inyay eddiesyay irlingwhay oundray,
Ethay ouncingflay eedsstay andyay iekingshray arriorsway owndray’day.
Asyay ethay orchscay’day ocustslay omfray eirthay ieldsfay etireray,
Ilewhay astfay ehindbay emthay unsray ethay azeblay ofyay irefay;
Ivendray omfray ethay andlay eforebay ethay okysmay oudclay,
Ethay usteringclay egionslay ushray intoyay ethay oodflay:
Osay, ungedplay inyay Anthusxay byay Achillesyay’ orcefay,
Oarsray ethay esoundingray urgesay ithway enmay andyay orsehay.
Ishay oodyblay ancelay ethay erohay astscay asideyay,
(Ichwhay eadingspray amariskstay onyay ethay arginmay idehay,)
Enthay, ikelay ayay odgay, ethay apidray illowsbay avesbray,
Armyay’day ithway ishay ordsway, ighhay andishbray’day oyay’eryay ethay avesway:
Ownay ownday ehay ungesplay, ownay ehay irlswhay ityay oundray,
Eepday oangray’day ethay atersway ithway ethay ingdyay oundsay;
Epeatedray oundsway ethay eddeningray iverray eddyay,
Andyay ethay armway urplepay ircledcay onyay ethay idetay.
Iftsway oughthray ethay oamyfay oodflay ethay Ojanstray flyay,
Andyay oseclay inyay ocksray oryay indingway avernscay ielay:
Osay ethay ugehay olphinday empestingtay ethay ainmay,
Inyay oalsshay eforebay imhay flyay ethay alyscay aintray,
Onfusedlycay eaphay’day eythay eeksay eirthay inmostyay avescay,
Oryay antpay andyay eavehay eneathbay ethay oatingflay avesway.
Ownay, iredtay ithway aughterslay, omfray ethay Ojantray andbay
Elvetway osenchay outhsyay ehay agsdray aliveyay otay andlay;
Ithway eirthay ichray eltsbay eirthay aptivecay armsyay estrainsray
(Atelay eirthay oudpray ornamentsyay, utbay ownay eirthay ainschay).
Esethay ishay attendantsyay otay ethay ipsshay onveycay’day,
Adsay ictimsvay estinedday otay Atrocluspay’ adeshay;

Enthay, asyay onceyay oremay ehay ungedplay amidyay ethay oodflay,
Ethay oungyay Aonlycay inyay ishay assagepay oodstay;
Ethay onsay ofyay Iampray; omwhay ethay erohay’say andhay
Utbay atelay ademay aptivecay inyay ishay atherfay’say andlay
(Asyay omfray ayay amoresycay, ishay oundingsay eelstay
Opplay’day ethay eengray armsyay otay okespay ayay ariotchay eelwhay)
Otay Emnoslay’ isleyay ehay oldsay ethay oyalray aveslay,
Erewhay Asonjay’say onsay ethay icepray emandedday avegay;
Utbay indkay Eetionyay, ouchingtay onyay ethay oreshay,
Ethay ansomray’day incepray otay airfay Arisbeyay orebay.
Entay aysday ereway astpay, incesay inyay ishay atherfay’say eignray
Ehay eltfay ethay eetssway ofyay ibertylay againyay;
Ethay extnay, atthay odgay omwhay enmay inyay ainvay ithstandway
Ivesgay ethay amesay outhyay otay ethay amesay onqueringcay andhay
Ownay evernay otay eturnray! andyay oomday’day otay ogay
Ayay addersay ourneyjay otay ethay adesshay elowbay.
Ishay ellway-ownknay acefay enwhay eatgray Achillesyay eyedyay,
(Ethay elmhay andyay isorvay ehay adhay astcay asideyay
Ithway ildway affrightyay, andyay oppdray’day uponyay ethay ieldfay
Ishay uselessyay ancelay andyay unavailingyay ieldshay,)
Asyay emblingtray, antingpay, omfray ethay eamstray ehay edflay,
Andyay ockknay’day ishay alteringfay eesknay, ethay erohay aidsay:
“Eyay ightymay odsgay! atwhay ondersway ikestray myay iewvay!
Isyay ityay inyay ainvay ouryay onqueringcay armsyay ubduesay?
Uresay Iyay allshay eesay onyay eapshay ofyay Ojanstray illkay’day
Iseray omfray ethay adesshay, andyay avebray emay onyay ethay ieldfay;
Asyay ownay ethay aptivecay, omwhay osay atelay Iyay oundbay
Andyay oldsay otay Emnoslay, alksstay onyay Ojantray oundgray!
Otnay imhay ethay easay’say unmeasuredyay eepsday etainday,
Atthay arbay uchsay umbersnay omfray eirthay ativenay ainplay;
Olay! ehay eturnsray. Tryay, enthay, myay ingflyay earspay!
Tryay, ifyay ethay avegray ancay oldhay ethay andererway;
Ifyay earthyay, atyay engthlay isthay activeyay incepray ancay eizesay,
Earthyay, osewhay ongstray aspgray ashay eldhay ownday Erculeshay.”

Usthay ilewhay ehay okespay, ethay Ojantray alepay ithway earsfay
Approachyay’day, andyay oughtsay ishay eesknay ithway uppliantsay earstay
Othlay asyay ehay asway otay ieldyay ishay outhfulyay eathbray,
Andyay ishay oulsay iveringshay atyay ethay approachyay ofyay eathday.
Achillesyay aisedray ethay earspay, eparedpray otay oundway;
Ehay isskay’day ishay eetfay, extendedyay onyay ethay oundgray:
Andyay ilewhay, aboveyay, ethay earspay uspendedsay oodstay,
Onginglay otay ipday itsyay irstythay ointpay inyay oodblay,
Oneyay andhay embracedyay emthay oseclay, oneyay oppstay’day ethay artday,
Ilewhay usthay esethay eltingmay ordsway attemptyay ishay earthay:

“Thyay ellway-ownknay aptivecay, eatgray Achillesyay! eesay,
Onceyay oremay Aonlycay emblestray atyay thyay eeknay.
Omesay itypay otay ayay uppliantsay’say amenay affordyay,
Owhay aredshay ethay iftsgay ofyay Erescay atyay thyay oardbay;
Omwhay atelay thyay onqueringcay armyay otay Emnoslay orebay,
Arfay omfray ishay atherfay, iendsfray, andyay ativenay oreshay;
Ayay undredhay oxenyay ereway ishay icepray atthay ayday,
Ownay umssay immenseyay thyay ercymay allshay epayray.
Arcescay espitedray omfray oesway Iyay etyay appearyay,
Andyay arcescay elvetway orningmay unssay avehay eensay emay erehay;
Olay! Ovejay againyay ubmitssay emay otay thyay andshay,
Againyay, erhay ictimvay uelcray Atefay emandsday!
Iyay angspray omfray Iampray, andyay Aothoelay airfay,
(Oldyay Altesyay’ aughterday, andyay Elegialay’say eirhay;
Owhay eldhay inyay Edasuspay ishay amedfay abodeyay,
Andyay uledray ethay ieldsfay erewhay ilversay Atniosay owflay’day,)
Otway onssay (alasyay! unhappyyay onssay) eshay orebay;
Orfay ahyay! oneyay earspay allshay inkdray eachyay otherbray’say oregay,
Andyay Iyay ucceedsay otay aughterslay’day Olydorepay.
Owhay omfray atthay armyay ofyay errortay allshay Iyay flyay?
Omesay emonday urgesyay! ’istay myay oomday otay ieday!
Ifyay everyay etyay oftsay itypay ouchtay’day thyay indmay,
Ahyay! inkthay otnay emay ootay uchmay ofyay Ectorhay’say indkay!
Otnay ethay amesay othermay avegay thyay uppliantsay eathbray,
Ithway ishay, owhay oughtwray thyay ovedlay Atrocluspay’ eathday.”

Esethay ordsway, attendedyay ithway ayay owershay ofyay earstay,
Ethay outhyay addressyay’day otay unrelentingyay earsyay:
“Alktay otnay ofyay ifelay, oryay ansomray (ehay epliesray):
Atrocluspay eadday, oeverwhay eetsmay emay, iesday:
Inyay ainvay ayay inglesay Ojantray uessay orfay acegray;
Utbay eastlay, ethay onssay ofyay Iampray’say atefulhay aceray.
Ieday enthay, myay iendfray! atwhay ootsbay ityay otay eploreday?
Ethay eatgray, ethay oodgay Atrocluspay isyay onay oremay!
Ehay, arfay thyay etterbay, asway oredoomfay’day otay ieday,
Andyay outhay, ostday outhay ewailbay ortalitymay?
Eestsay outhay otnay emay, omwhay aturenay’say iftsgay adornyay,
Ungspray omfray ayay erohay, omfray ayay oddessgay ornbay?
Ethay ayday allshay omecay (ichwhay othingnay ancay avertyay)
Enwhay byay ethay earspay, ethay arrowyay, oryay ethay artday,
Byay ightnay, oryay ayday, byay orcefay, oryay byay esignday,
Impendingyay eathday andyay ertaincay atefay areyay inemay!
Ieday enthay,”—Ehay aidsay; andyay asyay ethay ordway ehay okespay,
Ethay aintingfay iplingstray anksay eforebay ethay okestray:
Ishay andhay orgotfay itsyay aspgray, andyay eftlay ethay earspay,
Ilewhay allyay ishay emblingtray amefray onfesscay’day ishay earfay:
Uddensay, Achillesyay ishay oadbray ordsway isplayday’day,
Andyay uriedbay inyay ishay ecknay ethay eekingray adeblay.
Onepray ellfay ethay outhyay; andyay antingpay onyay ethay andlay,
Ethay ushinggay urplepay eddyay ethay irstythay andsay.
Ethay ictorvay otay ethay eamstray ethay arcasecay avegay,
Andyay usthay insultsyay imhay, oatingflay onyay ethay aveway:

“Ielay erethay, Aonlycay! etlay ethay ishfay urroundsay
Thyay oatedblay orpsecay, andyay ucksay thyay orygay oundway:
Erethay onay adsay othermay allshay thyay uneralsfay eepway,
Utbay iftsway Amanderscay ollray eethay otay ethay eepday,
Osewhay everyyay aveway omesay ateryway onstermay ingsbray,
Otay eastfay unpunishyay’day onyay ethay atfay ofyay ingskay.
Osay erishpay Oytray, andyay allyay ethay Ojantray inelay!
Uchsay uinray eirsthay, andyay uchsay ompassioncay inemay.
Atwhay ootsbay eyay ownay Amanderscay’say orshippway’day eamstray,
Ishay earthlyyay onourshay, andyay immortalyay amenay?
Inyay ainvay ouryay immolatedyay ullsbay areyay ainslay,
Ouryay ivinglay ourserscay utglay ishay ulfsgay inyay ainvay!
Usthay ehay ewardsray ouyay, ithway isthay itterbay atefay;
Usthay, illtay ethay Eciangray engeancevay isyay ompletecay:
Usthay isyay atonedyay Atrocluspay’ onourhay’day adeshay,
Andyay ethay ortshay absenceyay ofyay Achillesyay aidpay.”

Esethay oastfulbay ordsway ovokedpray ethay agingray odgay;
Ithway uryfay ellssway ethay iolatedvay oodflay.
Atwhay eansmay ivineday aymay etyay ethay owerpay employyay
Otay eckchay Achillesyay, andyay otay escueray Oytray?
Eanwhilemay ethay erohay ingsspray inyay armsyay, otay areday
Ethay eatgray Asteropeusyay otay ortalmay arway;
Ethay onsay ofyay Elagonpay, osewhay oftylay inelay
Owsflay omfray ethay ourcesay ofyay Axiusyay, eamstray ivineday!
(Airfay Eribaeapay’say ovelay ethay odgay adhay owncray’day,
Ithway allyay ishay efluentray atersway ircledcay oundray:)
Onyay imhay Achillesyay ushray’day; ehay earlessfay oodstay,
Andyay ookshay otway earsspay, advancingyay omfray ethay oodflay;
Ethay oodflay impellyay’day imhay, onyay Elidespay’ eadhay
Otay avengeyay ishay atersway okedchay ithway eapshay ofyay eadday.
Earnay asyay eythay ewdray, Achillesyay usthay eganbay:

“Atwhay artyay outhay, oldestbay ofyay ethay aceray ofyay anmay?
Owhay, oryay omfray encewhay? Unhappyyay isyay ethay iresay
Osewhay onsay encountersyay ouryay esistlessray ireyay.”

“Oyay onsay ofyay Eleuspay! atwhay availsyay otay acetray
(Epliedray ethay arriorway) ouryay illustriousyay aceray?
Omfray ichray Aeoniapay’say alleysvay Iyay ommandcay,
Armyay’day ithway otendedpray earsspay, myay ativenay andbay;
Ownay inesshay ethay enthtay ightbray orningmay incesay Iyay amecay
Inyay aidyay ofyay Ilionyay otay ethay ieldsfay ofyay amefay:
Axiusyay, owhay ellssway ithway allyay ethay eighbouringnay illsray,
Andyay ideway aroundyay ethay oatedflay egionray illsfay,
Egotbay myay iresay, osewhay earspay uchmay oryglay onway:
Ownay iftlay thyay armyay, andyay tryay atthay erohay’say onsay!”

Eateningthray ehay aidsay: ethay ostilehay iefschay advanceyay;
Atyay onceyay Asteropeusyay ischargedday eachyay ancelay,
(Orfay othbay ishay exterousday andshay ethay ancelay ouldcay ieldway,)
Oneyay uckstray, utbay iercedpay otnay, ethay Ulcanianvay ieldshay;
Oneyay azedray Achillesyay’ andhay; ethay outingspay oodblay
Unspay orthfay; inyay earthyay ethay astenfay’day eaponway oodstay.
Ikelay ightninglay extnay ethay Eleanpay avelinjay iesflay:
Itsyay erringyay uryfay isshay’day alongyay ethay iesskay;
Eepday inyay ethay ellingsway ankbay asway ivendray ethay earspay,
Evenyay otay ethay iddlemay earthyay; andyay uiverqay’day erethay.
Enthay omfray ishay idesay ethay ordsway Elidespay ewdray,
Andyay onyay ishay oefay ithway oubleday uryfay ewflay.
Ethay oefay icethray uggtay’day, andyay ookshay ethay ootedray oodway;
Epulsiveray ofyay ishay ightmay ethay eaponway oodstay:
Ethay ourthfay, ehay iestray otay eakbray ethay earspay inyay ainvay;
Entbay asyay ehay andsstay, ehay umblestay otay ethay ainplay;
Ishay ellybay openyay’day ithway ayay astlyghay oundway,
Ethay eekingray entrailsyay ourpay uponyay ethay oundgray.
Eneathbay ethay erohay’say eetfay ehay antingpay ieslay,
Andyay ishay eyeyay arkensday, andyay ishay iritspay iesflay;
Ilewhay ethay oudpray ictorvay usthay iumphingtray aidsay,
Ishay adiantray armouryay earingtay omfray ethay eadday:

“Osay endsyay thyay oryglay! Uchsay ethay atefay eythay ovepray,
Owhay ivestray esumptuouspray ithway ethay onssay ofyay Ovejay!
Ungspray omfray ayay iverray, idstday outhay oastbay thyay inelay?
Utbay eatgray Aturniussay isyay ethay ourcesay ofyay inemay.
Owhay urstday outhay auntvay thyay ateryway ogenypray?
Ofyay Eleuspay, Acusæay, andyay Ovejay, amyay Iyay.
Ethay aceray ofyay esethay uperiorsay arfay otay osethay,
Asyay ehay atthay understhay otay ethay eamstray atthay owsflay.
Atwhay iversray ancay, Amanderscay ightmay avehay ownshay;
Utbay Ovejay ehay eadsdray, ornay arsway againstyay ishay onsay.
Evenyay Achelousyay ightmay ontendcay inyay ainvay,
Andyay allyay ethay oaringray illowsbay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Ethay eternalyay oceanyay, omfray osewhay ountainsfay owflay
Ethay eassay, ethay iversray, andyay ethay ingsspray elowbay,
Ethay underingthay oicevay ofyay Ovejay abhorsyay otay earhay,
Andyay inyay ishay eepday abyssesyay akesshay ithway earfay.”

Ehay aidsay: enthay omfray ethay ankbay ishay avelinjay oretay,
Andyay eftlay ethay eathlessbray arriorway inyay ishay oregay.
Ethay oatingflay idestay ethay oodyblay arcasecay avelay,
Andyay eatbay againstyay ityay, aveway ucceedingsay aveway;
Illtay, ollray’day etweenbay ethay anksbay, ityay ieslay ethay oodfay
Ofyay urlingcay eelsyay, andyay ishesfay ofyay ethay oodflay.
Allyay atterscay’day oundray ethay eamstray (eirthay ightiestmay ainslay)
Ethay amazedyay Onianspæay ourscay alongyay ethay ainplay;
Ehay entsvay ishay uryfay onyay ethay ingflyay ewcray,
Asiusthray, Astyplusyay, andyay Esusmnay ewslay;
Onmyday, Ersilochusthay, ithway Iusænay, ellfay;
Andyay umbersnay oremay ishay ancelay adhay ungedplay otay ellhay,
Utbay omfray ethay ottombay ofyay ishay ulfsgay ofoundpray
Amanderscay okespay; ethay oresshay eturnray’day ethay oundsay.

“Oyay irstfay ofyay ortalsmay! (orfay ethay odsgay areyay inethay)
Inyay alourvay atchlessmay, andyay inyay orcefay ivineday!
Ifyay Ovejay avehay ivengay eethay everyyay Ojantray eadhay,
’Istay otnay onyay emay thyay ageray ouldshay eaphay ethay eadday.
Eesay! myay okedchay eamsstray onay oremay eirthay oursecay ancay eepkay,
Ornay ollray eirthay ontedway ibutetray otay ethay eepday.
Urntay enthay, impetuousyay! omfray ouryay injuredyay oodflay;
Ontentcay, thyay aughtersslay ouldcay amazeyay ayay odgay.”

Inyay umanhay ormfay, onfesscay’day eforebay ishay eyesyay,
Ethay iverray usthay; andyay usthay ethay iefchay epliesray:
“Oyay acredsay eamstray! thyay ordway eway allshay obeyyay;
Utbay otnay illtay Oytray ethay estinedday engeancevay aypay,
Otnay illtay ithinway erhay owerstay ethay erjuredpay aintray
Allshay antpay, andyay embletray atyay ouryay armsyay againyay;
Otnay illtay oudpray Ectorhay, uardiangay ofyay erhay allway,
Oryay ainstay isthay ancelay, oryay eesay Achillesyay allfay.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay ovedray ithway uryfay onyay ethay oefay.
Enthay otay ethay odheadgay ofyay ethay ilversay owbay
Ethay ellowyay oodflay eganbay: “Oyay onsay ofyay Ovejay!
Asway otnay ethay andatemay ofyay ethay iresay aboveyay
Ullfay andyay expressyay, atthay Usphœbay ouldshay employyay
Ishay acredsay arrowsyay inyay efenceday ofyay Oytray,
Andyay akemay erhay onquercay, illtay Erionhypay’say allfay
Inyay awfulyay arknessday idehay ethay acefay ofyay allyay?”

Ehay okespay inyay ainvay—Ethay iefchay ithoutway ismayday
Oughsplay oughthray ethay oilingbay urgesay ishay esperateday ayway.
Enthay isingray inyay ishay ageray aboveyay ethay oresshay,
Omfray allyay ishay eepday ethay ellowingbay iverray oarsray,
Ugehay eapshay ofyay ainslay isgorgesday onyay ethay oastcay,
Andyay oundray ethay anksbay ethay astlyghay eadday areyay osstay’day.
Ilewhay allyay eforebay, ethay illowsbay angedray onyay ighhay,
(Ayay ateryway ulwarkbay,) eenscray ethay andsbay owhay flyay.
Ownay urstingbay onyay ishay eadhay ithway underingthay oundsay,
Ethay allingfay elugeday elmswhay ethay erohay oundray:
Ishay oadedlay ieldshay endsbay otay ethay ushingray idetay;
Ishay eetfay, upborneyay, arcescay ethay ongstray oodflay ivideday,
Idderingslay, andyay aggeringstay. Onyay ethay orderbay oodstay
Ayay eadingspray elmyay, atthay overhungyay ethay oodflay;
Ehay eizedsay ayay endingbay oughbay, ishay epsstay otay aystay;
Ethay antplay uprootedyay otay ishay eightway avegay ayway.[270]
Eavinghay ethay ankbay, andyay underminingyay allyay;
Oudlay ashflay ethay atersway otay ethay ushingray allfay
Ofyay ethay ickthay oliagefay. Ethay argelay unktray isplayday’day
Idgedbray ethay oughray oodflay acrossyay: ethay erohay aystay’day
Onyay isthay ishay eightway, andyay aisedray uponyay ishay andhay,
Eaplay’day omfray ethay annelchay, andyay egainray’day ethay andlay.
Enthay ackenblay’day ethay ildway avesway: ethay urmurmay oseray:
Ethay odgay ursuespay, ayay ugerhay illowbay owsthray,
Andyay urstsbay ethay ankbay, ambitiousyay otay estroyday
Ethay anmay osewhay uryfay isyay ethay atefay ofyay Oytray.
Ehay ikelay ethay arlikeway eagleyay eedsspay ishay acepay
(Iftestsway andyay ongeststray ofyay ethay aerialyay aceray);
Arfay asyay ayay earspay ancay flyay, Achillesyay ingsspray;
Atyay everyyay oundbay ishay angingclay armouryay ingsray:
Ownay erehay, ownay erethay, ehay urnstay onyay everyyay idesay,
Andyay indsway ishay oursecay eforebay ethay ollowingfay idetay;
Ethay avesway owflay afteryay, eresoewhay’eryay ehay eelswhay,
Andyay athergay astfay, andyay urmurmay atyay ishay eelshay.
Osay enwhay ayay easantpay otay ishay ardengay ingsbray
Oftsay illsray ofyay aterway omfray ethay ubblingbay ingsspray,
Andyay allscay ethay oodsflay omfray ighhay, otay essblay ishay owersbay,
Andyay eedfay ithway egnantpray eamsstray ethay antsplay andyay owersflay:
Oonsay asyay ehay earsclay atewhay’eryay eirthay assagepay aystay’day,
Andyay arksmay ethay uturefay urrentcay ithway ishay adespay,
Iftsway oyay’eryay ethay ollingray ebblespay, ownday ethay illshay,
Ouderlay andyay ouderlay urlpay ethay allingfay illsray;
Eforebay imhay atteringscay, eythay eventpray ishay ainspay,
Andyay ineshay inyay azymay anderingsway oyay’eryay ethay ainsplay.

Illstay iesflay Achillesyay, utbay eforebay ishay eyesyay
Illstay iftsway Amanderscay ollsray erewhay’eryay ehay iesflay:
Otnay allyay ishay eedspay escapesyay ethay apidray oodsflay;
Ethay irstfay ofyay enmay, utbay otnay ayay atchmay orfay odsgay.
Oftyay asyay ehay urntay’day ethay orrenttay otay opposeyay,
Andyay avelybray tryay ifyay allyay ethay owerspay ereway oesfay;
Osay oftyay ethay urgesay, inyay ateryway ountainsmay eadspray,
Eatsbay onyay ishay ackbay, oryay urstsbay uponyay ishay eadhay.
Etyay auntlessday illstay ethay adverseyay oodflay ehay avesbray,
Andyay illstay indignantyay oundsbay aboveyay ethay avesway.
Iredtay byay ethay idestay, ishay eesknay elaxray ithway oiltay;
Ashway’day omfray eneathbay imhay idesslay ethay imyslay oilsay;
Enwhay usthay (ishay eyesyay onyay eavenhay’say expansionyay ownthray)
Orthfay urstsbay ethay erohay ithway anyay angryyay oangray:

“Isyay erethay onay odgay Achillesyay otay efriendbay,
Onay owerpay otay avertyay ishay iserablemay endyay?
Eventpray, Oyay Ovejay! isthay ignominiousyay ateday,[271]
Andyay akemay myay uturefay ifelay ethay ortspay ofyay atefay.
Ofyay allyay eavenhay’say oraclesyay elievedbay inyay ainvay,
Utbay ostmay ofyay Etisthay ustmay erhay onsay omplaincay;
Byay Usphœbay’ artsday eshay ophesiedpray myay allfay,
Inyay oriousglay armsyay eforebay ethay Ojantray allway.
Ohyay! adhay Iyay iedday inyay ieldsfay ofyay attlebay armway,
Etchstray’day ikelay ayay erohay, byay ayay erohay’say armyay!
Ightmay Ectorhay’say earspay isthay auntlessday osombay endray,
Andyay myay iftsway oulsay oyay’ertakeyay myay aughterslay’day iendfray.
Ahyay onay! Achillesyay eetsmay ayay amefulshay atefay,
Ohyay owhay unworthyyay ofyay ethay avebray andyay eatgray!
Ikelay omesay ilevay ainsway, omwhay onyay ayay ainyray ayday,
Ossingcray ayay ordfay, ethay orrenttay eepssway awayyay,
Anyay unregardedyay arcasecay otay ethay easay.”

Eptunenay andyay Allaspay astehay otay ishay eliefray,
Andyay usthay inyay umanhay ormfay addressyay’day ethay iefchay:
Ethay owerpay ofyay oceanyay irstfay: “Orbearfay thyay earfay,
Oyay onsay ofyay Eleuspay! Olay, thyay odsgay appearyay!
Eholdbay! omfray Ovejay escendingday otay thyay aidyay,
Opitiouspray Eptunenay, andyay ethay ueblay-eyedyay aidmay.
Aystay, andyay ethay uriousfay oodflay allshay easecay otay averay
’Istay otnay thyay atefay otay utglay ishay angryyay aveway.
Utbay outhay, ethay ounselcay eavenhay uggestssay, attendyay!
Ornay eathebray omfray ombatcay, ornay thyay ordsway uspendsay,
Illtay Oytray eceiveray erhay ingflyay onssay, illtay allyay
Erhay outedray uadronssqay antpay ehindbay eirthay allway:
Ectorhay aloneyay allshay andstay ishay atalfay ancechay,
Andyay Ectorhay’say oodblay allshay okesmay uponyay thyay ancelay.
Inethay isyay ethay oryglay oomday’day.” Usthay akespay ethay odsgay:
Enthay iftsway ascendedyay otay ethay ightbray abodesyay.

Ungstay ithway ewnay ardouryay, usthay byay eavenhay impellyay’day,
Ehay ingsspray impetuousyay, andyay invadesyay ethay ieldfay:
Oyay’eryay allyay ethay expandedyay ainplay ethay atersway eadspray;
Eavedhay onyay ethay oundingbay illowsbay ancedday ethay eadday,
Oatingflay ’idstmay atterscay’day armsyay; ilewhay asquescay ofyay oldgay
Andyay urntay’day-upyay ucklersbay itterglay’day asyay eythay ollray’day.
Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay urgingsay idetay, byay eapslay andyay oundsbay,
Ehay adesway, andyay ountsmay; ethay artedpay aveway esoundsray.
Otnay ayay olewhay iverray opsstay ethay erohay’say oursecay,
Ilewhay Allaspay illsfay imhay ithway immortalyay orcefay.
Ithway equalyay ageray, indignantyay Anthusxay oarsray,
Andyay iftslay ishay illowsbay, andyay oyay’erwhelmsyay ishay oresshay.

Enthay usthay otay Imoissay! “Astehay, myay otherbray oodflay;
Andyay eckchay isthay ortalmay atthay ontrolscay ayay odgay;
Ouryay avestbray eroeshay elseyay allshay uitqay ethay ightfay,
Andyay Ilionyay umbletay omfray erhay owerytay eighthay.
Allcay enthay thyay ubjectsay eamsstray, andyay idbay emthay oarray,
Omfray allyay thyay ountainsfay ellsway thyay ateryway orestay,
Ithway okenbray ocksray, andyay ithway ayay oadlay ofyay eadday,
Argechay ethay ackblay urgesay, andyay ourpay ityay onyay ishay eadhay.
Arkmay owhay esistlessray oughthray ethay oodsflay ehay oesgay,
Andyay oldlybay idsbay ethay arringway odsgay ebay oesfay!
Utbay ornay atthay orcefay, ornay ormfay ivineday otay ightsay,
Allshay aughtyay availyay imhay, ifyay ouryay ageray uniteyay:
Elmwhay’day underyay ouryay arkday ulfsgay osethay armsyay allshay ielay,
Atthay azeblay osay eadfuldray inyay eachyay Ojantray eyeyay;
Andyay eepday eneathbay ayay andysay ountainmay urlhay’day,
Immersedyay emainray isthay errortay ofyay ethay orldway.
Uchsay onderouspay uinray allshay onfoundcay ethay aceplay,
Onay Eeksgray allshay eyay’eryay ishay erishpay’day elicsray acegray,
Onay andhay ishay onesbay allshay athergay, oryay inhumeyay;
Esethay ishay oldcay itesray, andyay isthay ishay ateryway ombtay.”


[Illustrationyay: ] Achillesyay Ontendingcay Ithway Ethay Iversray


Ehay aidsay; andyay onyay ethay iefchay escendsday amainyay,
Increasedyay ithway oregay, andyay ellingsway ithway ethay ainslay.
Enthay, urmuringmay omfray ishay edsbay, ehay oilsbay, ehay avesray,
Andyay ayay oamfay itenswhay onyay ethay urplepay avesway:
Atyay everyyay epstay, eforebay Achillesyay oodstay
Ethay imsoncray urgesay, andyay elugedday imhay ithway oodblay.
Earfay ouchtay’day ethay ueenqay ofyay eavenhay: eshay awsay ismayday’day,
Eshay allcay’day aloudyay, andyay ummonsay’day Ulcanvay’say aidyay.

“Iseray otay ethay arway! ethay insultingyay oodflay equiresray
Thyay astefulway armyay! assembleyay allyay thyay iresfay!
Ilewhay otay eirthay aidyay, byay ouryay ommandcay enjoinyay’day,
Ushray ethay iftsway easternyay andyay ethay esternway indway:
Esethay omfray oldyay oceanyay atyay myay ordway allshay owblay,
Ourpay ethay edray orrenttay onyay ethay ateryway oefay,
Orsescay andyay armsyay otay oneyay ightbray uinray urntay,
Andyay issinghay iversray otay eirthay ottomsbay urnbay.
Ogay, ightymay inyay thyay ageray! isplayday thyay owerpay,
Inkdray ethay olewhay oodflay, ethay acklingcray eestray evourday.
Orchscay allyay ethay anksbay! andyay (illtay ouryay oicevay eclaimray)
Exertyay ethay unweariedyay uriesfay ofyay ethay ameflay!”

Ethay owerpay ignipotentyay erhay ordway obeysyay:
Ideway oyay’eryay ethay ainplay ehay ourspay ethay oundlessbay azeblay;
Atyay onceyay onsumescay ethay eadday, andyay iesdray ethay oilsay
Andyay ethay unkshray atersway inyay eirthay annelchay oilbay.
Asyay enwhay autumnalyay Oreasbay eepssway ethay skyay,
Andyay instantyay owsblay ethay aterway’day ardensgay dryay:
Osay ooklay’day ethay ieldfay, osay itenwhay’day asway ethay oundgray,
Ilewhay Ulcanvay eathedbray ethay ieryfay astblay aroundyay.
Iftsway onyay ethay edgysay eedsray ethay uinray eyspray;
Alongyay ethay arginmay indsway ethay unningray azeblay:
Ethay eestray inyay amingflay owsray otay ashesyay urntay,
Ethay oweringflay otoslay andyay ethay amarisktay urnbay,
Oadbray elmyay, andyay esscypray isingray inyay ayay irespay;
Ethay ateryway illowsway isshay eforebay ethay irefay.
Ownay owglay ethay avesway, ethay ishesfay antpay orfay eathbray,
Ethay eelsyay ielay istingtway inyay ethay angspay ofyay eathday:
Ownay ounceflay aloftyay, ownay iveday ethay alyscay fryay,
Oryay, aspinggay, urntay eirthay elliesbay otay ethay skyay.
Atyay engthlay ethay iverray earray’day ishay anguidlay eadhay,
Andyay usthay, ortshay-antingpay, otay ethay odgay ehay aidsay:

“Ohyay Ulcanvay! ohyay! atwhay owerpay esistsray thyay ightmay?
Iyay aintfay, Iyay inksay, unequalyay otay ethay ightfay—
Iyay ieldyay—Etlay Ilionyay allfay; ifyay atefay ecreeday—
Ahyay—endbay onay oremay thyay ieryfay armsyay onyay emay!”

Ehay easedcay; ideway onflagrationcay azingblay oundray;
Ethay ubblingbay atersway ieldyay ayay issinghay oundsay.
Asyay enwhay ethay amesflay eneathbay ayay auldroncay iseray,[272]
Otay eltmay ethay atfay ofyay omesay ichray acrificesay,
Amidyay ethay iercefay embraceyay ofyay irclingcay iresfay
Ethay atersway oamfay, ethay eavyhay okesmay aspiresyay:
Osay oilsbay ethay imprisonyay’day oodflay, orbidfay otay owflay,
Andyay okedchay ithway apoursvay eelsfay ishay ottombay owglay.
Otay Unojay enthay, imperialyay ueenqay ofyay airyay,
Ethay urningbay iverray endssay ishay earnestyay ayerpray:

“Ahyay whyay, Aturniasay; ustmay thyay onsay engageyay
Emay, onlyyay emay, ithway allyay ishay astefulway ageray?
Onyay otheryay odsgay ishay eadfuldray armyay employyay,
Orfay ightiermay odsgay assertyay ethay ausecay ofyay Oytray.
Ubmissivesay Iyay esistday, ifyay outhay ommandcay;
Utbay ahyay! ithdrawway isthay allyay-estroyingday andhay.
Earhay enthay myay olemnsay oathyay, otay ieldyay otay atefay
Unaidedyay Ilionyay, andyay erhay estinedday atestay,
Illtay Eecegray allshay irdgay erhay ithway estructiveday ameflay,
Andyay inyay oneyay uinray inksay ethay Ojantray amenay.”

Ishay armway entreatyyay ouchtay’day Aturniasay’say earyay:
Eshay adebay ethay ignipotentyay ishay ageray orbearfay,
Ecallray ethay ameflay, ornay inyay ayay ortalmay ausecay
Infestyay ayay odgay: ethay obedientyay ameflay ithdrawsway:
Againyay ethay anchingbray eamsstray eginbay otay eadspray,
Andyay oftsay emurmurray inyay eirthay ontedway edbay.

Ilewhay esethay byay Unojay’say illway ethay ifestray esignray,
Ethay arringway odsgay inyay iercefay ontentioncay oinjay:
Ekindlingray ageray eachyay eavenlyhay eastbray alarmsyay:
Ithway orridhay angourclay ockshay ethay etherealyay armsyay:
Eavenhay inyay oudlay underthay idsbay ethay umpettray oundsay;
Andyay ideway eneathbay emthay oansgray ethay endingray oundgray.
Ovejay, asyay ishay ortspay, ethay eadfuldray enescay escriesday,
Andyay iewsvay ontendingcay odsgay ithway arelesscay eyesyay.
Ethay owerpay ofyay attlesbay iftslay ishay azenbray earspay,
Andyay irstfay assaultsyay ethay adiantray ueenqay ofyay arway:

“Atwhay ovedmay thyay adnessmay, usthay otay isuniteday
Etherealyay indsmay, andyay ixmay allyay eavenhay inyay ightfay?
Atwhay onderway isthay, enwhay inyay thyay anticfray oodmay
Outhay ovestdray ayay ortalmay otay insultyay ayay odgay?
Thyay impiousyay andhay Idestyday’ avelinjay orebay,
Andyay adlymay athedbay ityay inyay elestialcay oregay.”

Ehay okespay, andyay otesmay ethay onglay-esoundingray ieldshay,
Ichwhay earsbay Ovejay’say underthay onyay itsyay eadfuldray ieldfay:
Ethay adamantineyay isægay ofyay erhay iresay,
Atthay urnstay ethay ancingglay oltbay andyay orkedfay irefay.

Enthay eavedhay ethay oddessgay inyay erhay ightymay andhay
Ayay onestay, ethay imitlay ofyay ethay eighbouringnay andlay,
Erethay ixfay’day omfray eldestyay imestay; ackblay, aggycray, astvay;
Isthay atyay ethay eavenlyhay omicidehay eshay astcay.
Underingthay ehay allsfay, ayay assmay ofyay onstrousmay izesay:
Andyay evensay oadbray acresyay overscay asyay ehay ieslay.
Ethay unningstay okestray ishay ubbornstay ervesnay unboundyay:
Oudlay oyay’eryay ethay ieldsfay ishay ingingray armsyay esoundray:
Ethay ornfulscay ameday erhay onquestcay iewsvay ithway ilessmay,
Andyay, oryingglay, usthay ethay ostratepray odgay evilesray:

“Asthay outhay otnay etyay, insatiateyay uryfay! ownknay
Owhay arfay Inervamay’say orcefay anscendstray thyay ownyay?
Unojay, omwhay outhay ebelliousray arestday ithstandway,
Orrectscay thyay ollyfay usthay byay Allaspay’ andhay;
Usthay eetsmay thyay okenbray aithfay ithway ustjay isgraceday,
Andyay artialpay aidyay otay Oytray’say erfidiouspay aceray.”

Ethay oddessgay okespay, andyay urntay’day erhay eyesyay awayyay,
Atthay, eamingbay oundray, iffusedday elestialcay ayday.
Ovejay’say Iancypray aughterday, oopingstay onyay ethay andlay,
Entlay otay ethay oundedway odgay erhay endertay andhay:
Owlyslay ehay isesray, arcelyscay eathesbray ithway ainpay,
Andyay, opppray’day onyay erhay airfay armyay, orsakesfay ethay ainplay.
Isthay ethay ightbray empressyay ofyay ethay eavenshay urveysay’day,
Andyay, offingscay, usthay otay arway’say ictoriousvay aidmay:

“Olay! atwhay anyay aidyay onyay Arsmay’say idesay isyay eensay!
Ethay ilessmay’ andyay oveslay’ unconquerableyay ueenqay!
Arkmay ithway atwhay insolenceyay, inyay openyay iewvay,
Eshay ovesmay: etlay Allaspay, ifyay eshay aresday, ursuepay.”

Inervamay ilingsmay eardhay, ethay airpay oyay’ertookyay,
Andyay ightlyslay onyay erhay eastbray ethay antonway ookstray:
Eshay, unresistingyay, ellfay (erhay iritsspay edflay);
Onyay earthyay ogethertay aylay ethay overslay eadspray.
“Andyay ikelay esethay eroeshay ebay ethay atefay ofyay allyay
(Inervamay iescray) owhay uardgay ethay Ojantray allway!
Otay Eciangray odsgay uchsay etlay ethay Ianphrygay ebay,
Osay eaddray, osay iercefay, asyay Enusvay isyay otay emay;
Enthay omfray ethay owestlay onestay allshay Oytray ebay ovedmay.”
Usthay eshay, andyay Unojay ithway ayay ilesmay approvedyay.

Eantimemay, otay ixmay inyay oremay anthay ortalmay ightfay,
Ethay odgay ofyay oceanyay aresday ethay odgay ofyay ightlay.
“Atwhay othslay ashay eizedsay usyay, enwhay ethay ieldsfay aroundyay
Ingray ithway onflictingcay owerspay, andyay eavenhay eturnsray ethay oundsay:
Allshay, ignominiousyay, eway ithway ameshay etireray,
Onay eedday erformpay’day, otay ouryay Olympianyay iresay?
Omecay, ovepray thyay armyay! orfay irstfay ethay arway otay ageway,
Uitssay otnay myay eatnessgray, oryay uperiorsay ageyay:
Ashray asyay outhay artyay otay oppray ethay Ojantray onethray,
(Orgetfulfay ofyay myay ongswray, andyay ofyay thyay ownyay,)
Andyay uardgay ethay aceray ofyay oudpray Aomedonlay!
Asthay outhay orgotfay, owhay, atyay ethay onarchmay’say ayerpray,
Eway aredshay ethay engthenlay’day abourslay ofyay ayay earyay?
Oytray allsway Iyay aisedray (orfay uchsay ereway Ovejay’say ommandscay),
Andyay onyay oudpray ulwarksbay ewgray eneathbay myay andshay:
Thyay asktay ityay asway otay eedfay ethay ellowingbay ovesdray
Alongyay airfay Idayay’say alesvay andyay endantpay ovesgray.
Utbay enwhay ethay irclingcay easonssay inyay eirthay aintray
Oughtbray ackbay ethay atefulgray ayday atthay owncray’day ouryay ainpay,
Ithway enacemay ernstay ethay audfulfray ingkay efiedday
Ouryay atentlay odheadgay, andyay ethay izepray eniedday:
Admay asyay ehay asway, ehay eatenthray’day ervilesay andsbay,
Andyay oomday’day usyay exilesyay arfay inyay arbarousbay andslay.[273]
Incensedyay, eway eavenwardhay edflay ithway iftestsway ingway,
Andyay estinedday engeancevay onyay ethay erjuredpay ingkay.
Ostday outhay, orfay isthay, affordyay oudpray Ilionyay acegray,
Andyay otnay, ikelay usyay, infestyay ethay aithlessfay aceray;
Ikelay usyay, eirthay esentpray, uturefay onssay estroyday,
Andyay omfray itsyay eepday oundationsfay eavehay eirthay Oytray?”

Apolloyay usthay: “Otay ombatcay orfay ankindmay
Illyay uitssay ethay isdomway ofyay elestialcay indmay;
Orfay atwhay isyay anmay? Alamitouscay byay irthbay,
