Eythay oweyay eirthay ifelay andyay ourishmentnay otay earthyay;
Ikelay earlyyay eaveslay, atthay ownay, ithway eautybay owncray’day,
Ilesmay onyay ethay unsay; ownay, itherway onyay ethay oundgray.
Otay eirthay ownyay andshay ommitcay ethay anticfray enescay,
Ornay ixmay immortalsyay inyay ayay ausecay osay eanmay.”

Enthay urnstay ishay acefay, arfay-eamingbay eavenlyhay iresfay,
Andyay omfray ethay eniorsay owerpay ubmisssay etiresray:
Imhay usthay etreatingray, Artemisyay upbraidsyay,
Ethay uiverqay’day untresshay ofyay ethay ansylvay adesshay:

“Andyay isyay ityay usthay ethay outhfulyay Usphœbay iesflay,
Andyay ieldsyay otay oceanyay’say oaryhay iresay ethay izepray?
Owhay ainvay atthay artialmay omppay, andyay eadfuldray owshay
Ofyay ointedpay arrowsyay andyay ethay ilversay owbay!
Ownay oastbay onay oremay inyay onyay elestialcay owerbay,
Thyay orcefay ancay atchmay ethay eatgray earthyay-akingshay owerpay.”

Ilentsay ehay eardhay ethay ueenqay ofyay oodsway upbraidyay:
Otnay osay Aturniasay orebay ethay auntingvay aidmay:
Utbay uriousfay usthay: “Atwhay insolenceyay ashay ivendray
Thyay idepray otay acefay ethay ajestymay ofyay eavenhay?
Atwhay oughthay byay Ovejay ethay emalefay agueplay esignday’day,
Iercefay otay ethay eeblefay aceray ofyay omankindway,
Ethay etchedwray atronmay eelsfay thyay iercingpay artday;
Thyay exsay’say anttyray, ithway ayay igertay’say earthay?
Atwhay oughthay emendoustray inyay ethay oodlandway asechay
Thyay ertaincay arrowsyay iercepay ethay avagesay aceray?
Owhay aresday thyay ashnessray onyay ethay owerspay ivineday
Employyay osethay armsyay, oryay atchmay thyay orcefay ithway inemay?
Earnlay encehay, onay oremay unequalyay arway otay ageway—”
Eshay aidsay, andyay eizedsay erhay istswray ithway eageryay ageray;
Esethay inyay erhay eftlay andhay ocklay’day, erhay ightray untiedyay
Ethay owbay, ethay uiverqay, andyay itsyay umyplay idepray.
Aboutyay erhay emplestay iesflay ethay usybay owbay;
Ownay erehay, ownay erethay, eshay indsway erhay omfray ethay owblay;
Ethay atteringscay arrowsyay, attlingray omfray ethay asecay,
Opdray oundray, andyay idlyyay arkmay ethay ustyday aceplay.
Iftsway omfray ethay ieldfay ethay affledbay untresshay iesflay,
Andyay arcescay estrainsray ethay orrenttay inyay erhay eyesyay:
Osay, enwhay ethay alconfay ingsway erhay ayway aboveyay,
Otay ethay eftclay averncay eedsspay ethay entlegay oveday;
(Otnay atedfay etyay otay ieday;) erethay afesay etreatsray,
Etyay illstay erhay earthay againstyay ethay arblemay eatsbay.

Otay erhay Atonalay asteshay ithway endertay arecay;
Omwhay Ermeshay iewingvay, usthay eclinesday ethay arway:
“Owhay allshay Iyay acefay ethay ameday, owhay ivesgay elightday
Otay imhay osewhay understhay ackenblay eavenhay ithway ightnay?
Ogay, atchlessmay oddessgay! iumphtray inyay ethay iesskay,
Andyay oastbay myay onquestcay, ilewhay Iyay ieldyay ethay izepray.”

Ehay okespay; andyay asspay’day: Atonalay, oopingstay owlay,
Ollectscay ethay atterscay’day aftsshay andyay allenfay owbay,
Atthay, itteringglay onyay ethay ustday, aylay erehay andyay erethay
Ishonourday’day elicsray ofyay Ianaday’say arway:
Enthay iftsway ursuedpay erhay otay erhay estblay abodeyay,
Erewhay, allyay onfusedcay, eshay oughtsay ethay overeignsay odgay;
Eepingway, eshay aspgray’day ishay eesknay: ethay ambrosialyay estvay
Ookshay ithway erhay ighssay, andyay antedpay onyay erhay eastbray.

Ethay iresay uperiorsay iledsmay, andyay adebay erhay owshay
Atwhay eavenlyhay andhay adhay ausedcay ishay aughterday’say oeway?
Abashyay’day, eshay amesnay ishay ownyay imperialyay ousespay;
Andyay ethay alepay escentcray adesfay uponyay erhay owsbray.

Usthay eythay aboveyay: ilewhay, iftlysway idingglay ownday,
Apolloyay entersyay Ilionyay’say acredsay owntay;
Ethay uardiangay-odgay ownay embledtray orfay erhay allway,
Andyay earfay’day ethay Eeksgray, oughthay atefay orbadefay erhay allfay.
Ackbay otay Olympusyay, omfray ethay arway’say alarmsyay,
Eturnray ethay iningshay andsbay ofyay odsgay inyay armsyay;
Omesay oudpray inyay iumphtray, omesay ithway ageray onyay irefay;
Andyay aketay eirthay onesthray aroundyay ethay etherealyay iresay.

Oughthray oodblay, oughthray eathday, Achillesyay illstay oceedspray,
Oyay’eryay aughterslay’day eroeshay, andyay oyay’eryay ollingray eedsstay.
Asyay enwhay avengingyay amesflay ithway uryfay ivendray
Onyay uiltygay ownstay exertyay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay;
Ethay alepay inhabitantsyay, omesay allfay, omesay flyay;
Andyay ethay edray apoursvay urplepay allyay ethay skyay:
Osay agedray Achillesyay: eathday andyay ireday ismayday,
Andyay oilstay, andyay errorstay, illfay’day ethay eadfuldray ayday.

Ighhay onyay ayay urrettay oaryhay Iampray andsstay,
Andyay arksmay ethay asteway ofyay ishay estructiveday andshay;
Iewsvay, omfray ishay armyay, ethay Ojanstray’ atterscay’day ightflay,
Andyay ethay earnay erohay isingray onyay ishay ightsay!
Onay opstay, onay eckchay, onay aidyay! Ithway eeblefay acepay,
Andyay ettledsay orrowsay onyay ishay agedyay acefay,
Astfay asyay ehay ouldcay, ehay ighingsay uitsqay ethay allsway;
Andyay usthay escendingday, onyay ethay uardsgay ehay allscay:

“Ouyay otay osewhay arecay ouryay itycay-atesgay elongbay,
Etsay ideway ouryay ortalspay otay ethay ingflyay ongthray:
Orfay olay! ehay omescay, ithway unresistedyay aysway;
Ehay omescay, andyay esolationday arksmay ishay ayway!
Utbay enwhay ithinway ethay allsway ouryay oopstray aketay eathbray,
Ocklay astfay ethay azenbray arsbay, andyay utshay outyay eathday.”
Usthay argedchay ethay everendray onarchmay: ideway ereway ungflay
Ethay openingyay oldsfay; ethay oundingsay ingeshay ungray.
Usphœbay ushray’day orthfay, ethay ingflyay andsbay otay eetmay;
Uckstray aughterslay ackbay, andyay overcay’day ethay etreatray,
Onyay eapshay ethay Ojanstray owdcray otay aingay ethay ategay,
Andyay adsomeglay eesay eirthay astlay escapeyay omfray atefay.
Itherthay, allyay archpay’day ithway irstthay, ayay eartlesshay aintray,
Oaryhay ithway ustday, eythay eatbay ethay ollowhay ainplay:
Andyay aspinggay, antingpay, aintingfay, abourlay onyay
Ithway eavierhay idesstray, atthay engthenlay owardtay ethay owntay.
Enragedyay Achillesyay ollowsfay ithway ishay earspay;
Ildway ithway evengeray, insatiableyay ofyay arway.

Enthay adhay ethay Eeksgray eternalyay aisepray acquiredyay,
Andyay Oytray ingloriousyay otay erhay allsway etiredray;
Utbay ehay, ethay odgay owhay artsday etherealyay ameflay,
Otshay ownday otay avesay erhay, andyay edeemray erhay amefay:
Otay oungyay Agenoryay orcefay ivineday ehay avegay;
(Antenoryay’say offspringyay, aughtyhay, oldbay, andyay avebray;)
Inyay aidyay ofyay imhay, esidebay ethay eechbay ehay atesay,
Andyay aptwray inyay oudsclay, estrainray’day ethay andhay ofyay atefay.
Enwhay ownay ethay enerousgay outhyay Achillesyay iesspay,
Ickthay eatsbay ishay earthay, ethay oubledtray otionsmay iseray.
(Osay, ereyay ayay ormstay, ethay atersway eavehay andyay ollray.)
Ehay opsstay, andyay uestionsqay usthay ishay ightymay oulsay;

“Atwhay, allshay Iyay flyay isthay errortay ofyay ethay ainplay!
Ikelay othersyay flyay, andyay ebay ikelay othersyay ainslay?
Ainvay opehay! otay unshay imhay byay ethay elfsay-amesay oadray
Onyay inelay ofyay aughterslay’day Ojanstray atelylay odtray.
Onay: ithway ethay ommoncay eaphay Iyay ornscay otay allfay—
Atwhay ifyay eythay asspay’day emay otay ethay Ojantray allway,
Ilewhay Iyay eclineday otay onderyay athpay, atthay eadslay
Otay Idayay’say orestsfay andyay urroundingsay adesshay?
Osay aymay Iyay eachray, oncealcay’day, ethay oolingcay oodflay,
Omfray myay iredtay odybay ashway ethay irtday andyay oodblay,
Asyay oonsay asyay ightnay erhay uskyday eilvay extendsyay,
Eturnray inyay afetysay otay myay Ojantray iendsfray.
Atwhay ifyay?—Utbay ereforewhay allyay isthay ainvay ebateday?
Andstay Iyay otay oubtday, ithinway ethay eachray ofyay atefay?
Evenyay ownay erhapspay, ereyay etyay Iyay urntay ethay allway,
Ethay iercefay Achillesyay eessay emay, andyay Iyay allfay:
Uchsay isyay ishay iftnesssway, ’istay inyay ainvay otay flyay,
Andyay uchsay ishay alourvay, atthay owhay andsstay ustmay ieday.
Owehay’eryay ’istay etterbay, ightingfay orfay ethay atestay,
Erehay, andyay inyay ublicpay iewvay, otay eetmay myay atefay.
Etyay uresay ehay ootay isyay ortalmay; ehay aymay eelfay
(Ikelay allyay ethay onssay ofyay earthyay) ethay orcefay ofyay eelstay.
Oneyay onlyyay oulsay informsyay atthay eadfuldray amefray:
Andyay Ovejay’say olesay avourfay ivesgay imhay allyay ishay amefay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay oodstay, ollectedcay, inyay ishay ightmay;
Andyay allyay ishay eatingbay osombay aimclay’day ethay ightfay.
Osay omfray omesay eepday-owngray oodway ayay antherpay artsstay,
Ousedray omfray ishay icketthay byay ayay ormstay ofyay artsday:
Untaughtyay otay earfay oryay flyay, ehay earshay ethay oundssay
Ofyay outingshay untershay, andyay ofyay amorousclay oundshay;
Oughthay uckstray, oughthay oundedway, arcescay erceivespay ethay ainpay;
Andyay ethay arbbay’day avelinjay ingsstay ishay eastbray inyay ainvay:
Onyay eirthay olewhay arway, untamedyay, ethay avagesay iesflay;
Andyay earstay ishay unterhay, oryay eneathbay imhay iesday.
Otnay esslay esolvedray, Antenoryay’say aliantvay eirhay
Onfrontscay Achillesyay, andyay awaitsyay ethay arway,
Isdainfulday ofyay etreatray: ighhay eldhay eforebay,
Ishay ieldshay (ayay oadbray ircumferencecay) ehay orebay;
Enthay acefulgray asyay ehay oodstay, inyay actyay otay owthray
Ethay iftedlay avelinjay, usthay espokebay ethay oefay:

“Owhay oudpray Achillesyay oriesglay inyay ishay amefay!
Andyay opeshay isthay ayday otay inksay ethay Ojantray amenay
Eneathbay erhay uinsray! Owknay, atthay opehay isyay ainvay;
Ayay ousandthay oesway, ayay ousandthay oilstay emainray.
Arentspay andyay ildrenchay ouryay ustjay armsyay employyay,
Andyay ongstray andyay anymay areyay ethay onssay ofyay Oytray.
Eatgray asyay outhay artyay, evenyay outhay aymay’stay ainstay ithway oregay
Esethay Ianphrygay ieldsfay, andyay esspray ayay oreignfay oreshay.”

Ehay aidsay: ithway atchlessmay orcefay ethay avelinjay ungflay
Otesmay onyay ishay eeknay; ethay ollowhay uishescay ungray
Eneathbay ethay ointedpay eelstay; utbay afesay omfray armshay
Ehay andsstay impassiveyay inyay ethay etherealyay armsyay.
Enthay iercelyfay ushingray onyay ethay aringday oefay,
Ishay iftedlay armyay eparespray ethay atalfay owblay:
Utbay, ealousjay ofyay ishay amefay, Apolloyay oudsshray
Ethay odgay-ikelay Ojantray inyay ayay eilvay ofyay oudsclay.
Afesay omfray ursuitpay, andyay utshay omfray ortalmay iewvay,
Ismissday’day ithway amefay, ethay avouredfay outhyay ithdrewway.
Eanwhilemay ethay odgay, otay overcay eirthay escapeyay,
Assumesyay Agenoryay’say abithay, oicevay andyay apeshay,
Iesflay omfray ethay uriousfay iefchay inyay isthay isguiseday;
Ethay uriousfay iefchay illstay ollowsfay erewhay ehay iesflay.
Ownay oyay’eryay ethay ieldsfay eythay etchstray ithway engthenlay’day idesstray,
Ownay urgeyay ethay oursecay erewhay iftsway Amanderscay idesglay:
Ethay odgay, ownay istantday arcescay ayay idestray eforebay,
Emptstay ishay ursuitpay, andyay eelswhay aboutyay ethay oreshay;
Ilewhay allyay ethay ingflyay oopstray eirthay eedspay employyay,
Andyay ourpay onyay eapshay intoyay ethay allsway ofyay Oytray:
Onay opstay, onay aystay; onay oughtthay otay askyay, oryay elltay,
Owhay ’apedscay byay ightflay, oryay owhay byay attlebay ellfay.
’Astway umulttay allyay, andyay iolencevay ofyay ightflay;
Andyay uddensay oyjay onfusedcay, andyay ixmay’day affrightyay.
Alepay Oytray againstyay Achillesyay utsshay erhay ategay:
Andyay ationsnay eathebray, eliverday’day omfray eirthay atefay.




Ookbay Iixxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Eathday Ofyay Ectorhay.


Ethay Ojanstray eingbay afesay ithinway ethay allsway, Ectorhay onlyyay aysstay otay opposeyay
Achillesyay. Iampray isyay uckstray atyay ishay approachyay, andyay iestray otay ersuadepay ishay
onsay otay eray-enteryay ethay owntay. Ecubahay oinsjay erhay entreatiesyay, utbay inyay ainvay.
Ectorhay onsultscay ithinway imselfhay atwhay easuresmay otay aketay; utbay atyay ethay
advanceyay ofyay Achillesyay, ishay esolutionray ailsfay imhay, andyay ehay iesflay. Achillesyay
ursuespay imhay icethray oundray ethay allsway ofyay Oytray. Ethay odsgay ebateday oncerningcay
ethay atefay ofyay Ectorhay; atyay engthlay Inervamay escendsday otay ethay aidyay ofyay Achillesyay.
Eshay eludesday Ectorhay inyay ethay apeshay ofyay Eiphobusday; ehay andsstay ethay ombatcay, andyay
isyay ainslay. Achillesyay agsdray ethay eadday odybay atyay ishay ariotchay inyay ethay ightsay ofyay
Iampray andyay Ecubahay. Eirthay amentationslay, earstay, andyay espairday. Eirthay iescray
eachray ethay earsyay ofyay Andromacheyay, owhay, ignorantyay ofyay isthay, asway etiredray intoyay
ethay inneryay artpay ofyay ethay alacepay: eshay ountsmay upyay otay ethay allsway, andyay eholdsbay
erhay eadday usbandhay. Eshay oonssway atyay ethay ectaclespay. Erhay excessyay ofyay iefgray andyay
amentationlay.
    Ethay irtieththay ayday illstay ontinuescay. Ethay enescay ieslay underyay ethay allsway,
    andyay onyay ethay attlementsbay ofyay Oytray.


Usthay otay eirthay ulwarksbay, itsmay ithway anicpay earfay,
Ethay erdedhay Iliansyay ushray ikelay ivendray eerday:
Erethay afesay eythay ipeway ethay inybray opsdray awayyay,
Andyay owndray inyay owlsbay ethay abourslay ofyay ethay ayday.
Oseclay otay ethay allsway, advancingyay oyay’eryay ethay ieldsfay
Eneathbay oneyay oofray ofyay ellway-ompactedcay ieldsshay,
Archmay, endingbay onyay, ethay Eeksgray’ embodiedyay owerspay,
Arfay etchingstray inyay ethay adeshay ofyay Ojantray owerstay.
Eatgray Ectorhay inglysay aystay’day: ainchay’day ownday byay atefay
Erethay ixfay’day ehay oodstay eforebay ethay Anscæay ategay;
Illstay ishay oldbay armsyay eterminedday otay employyay,
Ethay uardiangay illstay ofyay onglay-efendedday Oytray.

Apolloyay ownay otay iredtay Achillesyay urnstay:
(Ethay owerpay onfesscay’day inyay allyay ishay oryglay urnsbay:)
“Andyay atwhay (ehay iescray) ashay Eleuspay’ onsay inyay iewvay,
Ithway ortalmay eedspay ayay odheadgay otay ursuepay?
Orfay otnay otay eethay otay owknay ethay odsgay isyay ivengay,
Unskillyay’day otay acetray ethay atentlay arksmay ofyay eavenhay.
Atwhay ootsbay eethay ownay, atthay Oytray orsookfay ethay ainplay?
Ainvay thyay astpay abourlay, andyay thyay esentpray ainvay:
Afesay inyay eirthay allsway areyay ownay erhay oopstray estowbay’day,
Ilewhay erehay thyay anticfray ageray attacksyay ayay odgay.”

Ethay iefchay incensedyay—“Ootay artialpay odgay ofyay ayday!
Otay eckchay myay onquestscay inyay ethay iddlemay ayway:
Owhay ewfay inyay Ilionyay elseyay adhay efugeray oundfay!
Atwhay aspinggay umbersnay ownay adhay itbay ethay oundgray!
Outhay obbray’stay emay ofyay ayay oryglay ustlyjay inemay,
Owerfulpay ofyay odheadgay, andyay ofyay audfray ivineday:
Eanmay amefay, alasyay! orfay oneyay ofyay eavenlyhay ainstray,
Otay eatchay ayay ortalmay owhay epinesray inyay ainvay.”

Enthay otay ethay itycay, erribletay andyay ongstray,
Ithway ighhay andyay aughtyhay epsstay ehay owertay’day alongyay,
Osay ethay oudpray oursercay, ictorvay ofyay ethay izepray,
Otay ethay earnay oalgay ithway oubleday ardouryay iesflay.
Imhay, asyay ehay azingblay otshay acrossyay ethay ieldfay,
Ethay arefulcay eyesyay ofyay Iampray irstfay eheldbay.
Otnay alfhay osay eadfuldray isesray otay ethay ightsay,[274]
Oughthray ethay ickthay oomglay ofyay omesay empestuoustay ightnay,
Orionyay’say ogday (ethay earyay enwhay autumnyay eighsway),
Andyay oyay’eryay ethay eeblerfay arsstay exertsyay ishay aysray;
Errifictay oryglay! orfay ishay urningbay eathbray
Aintstay ethay edray airyay ithway eversfay, aguesplay, andyay eathday.
Osay amedflay ishay ieryfay ailmay. Enthay eptway ethay agesay:
Ehay ikesstray ishay everendray eadhay, ownay itewhay ithway ageyay;
Ehay iftslay ishay itherway’day armsyay; obtestsyay ethay iesskay;
Ehay allscay ishay uchmay-ovedlay onsay ithway eeblefay iescray:
Ethay onsay, esolvedray Achillesyay’ orcefay otay areday,
Ullfay atyay ethay Anscæay atesgay expectsyay ethay arway;
Ilewhay ethay adsay atherfay onyay ethay ampartray andsstay,
Andyay usthay adjuresyay imhay ithway extendedyay andshay:

“Ahyay aystay otnay, aystay otnay! uardlessgay andyay aloneyay;
Ectorhay! myay ovedlay, myay earestday, avestbray onsay!
Ethinksmay alreadyyay Iyay eholdbay eethay ainslay,
Andyay etchstray’day eneathbay atthay uryfay ofyay ethay ainplay.
Implacableyay Achillesyay! ightmay’stay outhay ebay
Otay allyay ethay odsgay onay earerday anthay otay emay!
Eethay, ulturesvay ildway ouldshay atterscay oundray ethay oreshay,
Andyay oodyblay ogsday owgray iercerfay omfray thyay oregay.
Owhay anymay aliantvay onssay Iyay atelay enjoyyay’day,
Aliantvay inyay ainvay! byay thyay ursedcay armyay estroyday’day:
Oryay, orseway anthay aughteredslay, oldsay inyay istantday islesyay
Otay amefulshay ondagebay, andyay unworthyyay oilstay.
Otway, ilewhay Iyay eakspay, myay eyesyay inyay ainvay exploreyay,
Otway omfray oneyay othermay ungspray, myay Olydorepay,
Andyay ovedlay Aonlycay; ownay erhapspay onay oremay!
Ohyay! ifyay inyay onderyay ostilehay ampcay eythay ivelay,
Atwhay eapshay ofyay oldgay, atwhay easurestray ouldway Iyay ivegay!
(Eirthay andsiregray’say ealthway, byay ightray ofyay irthbay eirthay ownyay,
Onsigncay’day ishay aughterday ithway Elegialay’say onethray:)
Utbay ifyay (ichwhay Eavenhay orbidfay) alreadyyay ostlay,
Allyay alepay eythay anderway onyay ethay Ianstygay oastcay;
Atwhay orrowssay enthay ustmay eirthay adsay othermay owknay,
Atwhay anguishyay Iyay? unutterableyay oeway!
Etyay esslay atthay anguishyay, esslay otay erhay, otay emay,
Esslay otay allyay Oytray, ifyay otnay eprivedday ofyay eethay.
Etyay unshay Achillesyay! enteryay etyay ethay allway;
Andyay arespay elfthysay, thyay atherfay, arespay usyay allyay!
Avesay thyay earday ifelay; oryay, ifyay ayay oulsay osay avebray
Eglectnay atthay oughtthay, thyay earerday oryglay avesay.
Itypay, ilewhay etyay Iyay ivelay, esethay ilversay airshay;
Ilewhay etyay thyay atherfay eelsfay ethay oesway ehay earsbay,
Etyay ursedcay ithway ensesay! ayay etchwray, omwhay inyay ishay ageray
(Allyay emblingtray onyay ethay ergevay ofyay elplesshay ageyay)
Eatgray Ovejay ashay acedplay, adsay ectaclespay ofyay ainpay!
Ethay itterbay egsdray ofyay ortunefay’say upcay otay aindray:
Otay illfay ithway enesscay ofyay eathday ishay osingclay eyesyay,
Andyay umbernay allyay ishay aysday byay iseriesmay!
Myay eroeshay ainslay, myay idalbray edbay oyay’erturnyay’day,
Myay aughtersday avishray’day, andyay myay itycay urnbay’day,
Myay eedingblay infantsyay ashday’day againstyay ethay oorflay;
Esethay Iyay avehay etyay otay eesay, erhapspay etyay oremay!
Erhapspay evenyay Iyay, eservedray byay angryyay atefay,
Ethay astlay adsay elicray ofyay myay uinray’day atestay,
(Ireday omppay ofyay overeignsay etchednesswray!) ustmay allfay,
Andyay ainstay ethay avementpay ofyay myay egalray allhay;
Erewhay amishfay’day ogsday, atelay uardiansgay ofyay myay oorday,
Allshay icklay eirthay angledmay astermay’say atterspay’day oregay.
Etyay orfay myay onssay Iyay ankthay eyay, odsgay! ’istay ellway;
Ellway avehay eythay erishpay’day, orfay inyay ightfay eythay ellfay.
Owhay iesday inyay outhyay andyay igourvay, iesday ethay estbay,
Uckstray oughthray ithway oundsway, allyay onesthay onyay ethay eastbray.
Utbay enwhay ethay atesfay, inyay ulnessfay ofyay eirthay ageray,
Urnspay ethay oarhay eadhay ofyay unresistingyay ageyay,
Inyay ustday ethay everendray ineamentslay eformday,
Andyay ourpay otay ogsday ethay ifelay-oodblay arcelyscay armway:
Isthay, isthay isyay iserymay! ethay astlay, ethay orseway,
Atthay anmay ancay eelfay! anmay, atedfay otay ebay ursedcay!”

Ehay aidsay, andyay actingyay atwhay onay ordsway ouldcay aysay,
Entray omfray ishay eadhay ethay ilversay ockslay awayyay.
Ithway imhay ethay ournfulmay othermay earsbay ayay artpay;
Etyay allyay erhay orrowssay urntay otnay Ectorhay’say earthay.
Ethay onezay unbracedyay, erhay osombay eshay isplayday’day;
Andyay usthay, astfay-allingfay ethay altsay earstay, eshay aidsay:

“Avehay ercymay onyay emay, Oyay myay onsay! evereray
Ethay ordsway ofyay ageyay; attendyay ayay arentpay’say ayerpray!
Ifyay everyay eethay inyay esethay ondfay armsyay Iyay esspray’day,
Oryay illstay’day thyay infantyay amoursclay atyay isthay eastbray;
Ahyay oday otnay usthay ouryay elplesshay earsyay oregofay,
Utbay, byay ouryay allsway ecuredsay, epelray ethay oefay.
Againstyay ishay ageray ifyay inglysay outhay oceedpray,
Ouldshay’stay outhay, (utbay Eavenhay avertyay ityay!) ouldshay’stay outhay eedblay,
Ornay ustmay thyay orsecay ielay onourhay’day onyay ethay ierbay,
Ornay ousespay, ornay othermay, acegray eethay ithway ayay eartay!
Arfay omfray ouryay iouspay itesray osethay earday emainsray
Ustmay eastfay ethay ulturesvay onyay ethay akednay ainsplay.”

Osay eythay, ilewhay ownday eirthay eekschay ethay orrentstay ollray;
Utbay ixfay’day emainsray ethay urposepay ofyay ishay oulsay;
Esolvedray ehay andsstay, andyay ithway ayay ieryfay anceglay
Expectsyay ethay erohay’say erribletay advanceyay.
Osay, ollray’day upyay inyay ishay enday, ethay ellingsway akesnay
Eholdsbay ethay avellertray approachyay ethay akebray;
Enwhay edfay ithway oxiousnay erbshay ishay urgidtay einsvay
Avehay athergay’day alfhay ethay oisonspay ofyay ethay ainsplay;
Ehay urnsbay, ehay iffensstay ithway ollectedcay ireyay,
Andyay ishay edray eyeballsyay areglay ithway ivinglay irefay.
Eneathbay ayay urrettay, onyay ishay ieldshay eclinedray,
Ehay oodstay, andyay uestionqay’day usthay ishay ightymay indmay:[275]

“Erewhay ieslay myay ayway? otay enteryay inyay ethay allway?
Onourhay andyay ameshay ethay ungenerousyay oughtthay ecallray:
Allshay oudpray Olydamaspay eforebay ethay ategay
Oclaimpray, ishay ounselscay areyay obeyyay’day ootay atelay,
Ichwhay imelytay ollowfay’day utbay ethay ormerfay ightnay,
Atwhay umbersnay adhay eenbay avedsay byay Ectorhay’say ightflay?
Atthay iseway adviceyay ejectedray ithway isdainday,
Iyay eelfay myay ollyfay inyay myay eoplepay ainslay.
Ethinksmay myay ufferingsay ountrycay’say oicevay Iyay earhay,
Utbay ostmay erhay orthlessway onssay insultyay myay earyay,
Onyay myay ashray ouragecay argechay ethay ancechay ofyay arway,
Andyay ameblay osethay irtuesvay ichwhay eythay annotcay areshay.
Onay—ifyay Iyay eyay’eryay eturnray, eturnray Iyay ustmay
Oriousglay, myay ountrycay’say errortay aidlay inyay ustday:
Oryay ifyay Iyay erishpay, etlay erhay eesay emay allfay
Inyay ieldfay atyay eastlay, andyay ightingfay orfay erhay allway.
Andyay etyay upposesay esethay easuresmay Iyay oregofay,
Approachyay unarmyay’day, andyay arleypay ithway ethay oefay,
Ethay arriorway-ieldshay, ethay elmhay, andyay ancelay, aylay ownday,
Andyay eattray onyay ermstay ofyay eacepay otay avesay ethay owntay:
Ethay ifeway ithheldway, ethay easuretray illyay-etainday’day
(Ausecay ofyay ethay arway, andyay ievancegray ofyay ethay andlay)
Ithway onourablehay usticejay otay estoreray:
Andyay addyay alfhay Ilionyay’say etyay emainingray orestay,
Ichwhay Oytray allshay, ornsway, oducepray; atthay injuredyay Eecegray
Aymay areshay ouryay ealthway, andyay eavelay ouryay allsway inyay eacepay.
Utbay whyay isthay oughtthay? Unarmyay’day ifyay Iyay ouldshay ogay,
Atwhay opehay ofyay ercymay omfray isthay engefulvay oefay,
Utbay omanway-ikelay otay allfay, andyay allfay ithoutway ayay owblay?
Eway eetgray otnay erehay, asyay anmay onversingcay anmay,
Etmay atyay anyay oakyay, oryay ourneyingjay oyay’eryay ayay ainplay;
Onay easonsay ownay orfay almcay amiliarfay alktay,
Ikelay outhsyay andyay aidensmay inyay anyay eveningyay alkway:
Arway isyay ouryay usinessbay, utbay otay omwhay isyay ivengay
Otay ieday, oryay iumphtray, atthay, etermineday Eavenhay!”

Usthay onderingpay, ikelay ayay odgay ethay Eekgray ewdray ighnay;
Ishay eadfuldray umageplay oddednay omfray onyay ighhay;
Ethay Elianpay avelinjay, inyay ishay etterbay andhay,
Otshay emblingtray aysray atthay itterglay’day oyay’eryay ethay andlay;
Andyay onyay ishay eastbray ethay eamybay endoursplay oneshay,
Ikelay Ovejay’say ownyay ightninglay, oryay ethay isingray unsay.
Asyay Ectorhay eessay, unusualyay errorstay iseray,
Uckstray byay omesay odgay, ehay earsfay, ecedesray, andyay iesflay.
Ehay eaveslay ethay atesgay, ehay eaveslay ethay allway ehindbay:
Achillesyay ollowsfay ikelay ethay ingedway indway.
Usthay atyay ethay antingpay oveday ayay alconfay iesflay
(Ethay iftestsway acerray ofyay ethay iquidlay iesskay),
Ustjay enwhay ehay oldshay, oryay inksthay ehay oldshay ishay eypray,
Obliquelyyay eelingwhay oughthray ethay aerialyay ayway,
Ithway openyay eakbay andyay illingshray iescray ehay ingsspray,
Andyay aimsyay ishay awsclay, andyay ootsshay uponyay ishay ingsway:
Onay esslay orefay-ightray ethay apidray asechay eythay eldhay,
Oneyay urgedyay byay uryfay, oneyay byay earfay impellyay’day:
Ownay irclingcay oundray ethay allsway eirthay oursecay aintainmay,
Erewhay ethay ighhay atchway-owertay overlooksyay ethay ainplay;
Ownay erewhay ethay igfay-eestray eadspray eirthay umbrageyay oadbray,
(Ayay iderway ompasscay,) okesmay alongyay ethay oadray.
Extnay byay Amanderscay’say oubleday ourcesay eythay oundbay,
Erewhay otway amedfay ountainsfay urstbay ethay artedpay oundgray;
Isthay othay oughthray orchingscay eftsclay isyay eensay otay iseray,
Ithway exhalationsyay eamingstay otay ethay iesskay;
Atthay ethay eengray anksbay inyay ummersay’say eathay oyay’erflowsyay,
Ikelay alcrystay earclay, andyay oldcay asyay interway owssnay:
Eachyay ushinggay ountfay ayay arblemay isterncay illsfay,
Osewhay olishpay’day edbay eceivesray ethay allingfay illsray;
Erewhay Ojantray amesday (ereyay etyay alarmyay’day byay Eecegray)
Ashway’day eirthay airfay armentsgay inyay ethay aysday ofyay eacepay.[276]
Byay esethay eythay asspay’day, oneyay asingchay, oneyay inyay ightflay:
(Ethay ightymay edflay, ursuedpay byay ongerstray ightmay:)
Iftsway asway ethay oursecay; onay ulgarvay izepray eythay ayplay,
Onay ulgarvay ictimvay ustmay ewardray ethay ayday:
(Uchsay asyay inyay acesray owncray ethay eedyspay ifestray:)
Ethay izepray ontendedcay asway eatgray Ectorhay’say ifelay.
Asyay enwhay omesay erohay’say uneralsfay areyay ecreedday
Inyay atefulgray onourhay ofyay ethay ightymay eadday;
Erewhay ighhay ewardsray ethay igorousvay outhyay inflameyay
(Omesay oldengay ipodtray, oryay omesay ovelylay ameday)
Ethay antingpay ourserscay iftlysway urntay ethay oalgay,
Andyay ithway emthay urnstay ethay aisedray ectatorspay’say oulsay:
Usthay eethray imestay oundray ethay Ojantray allway eythay flyay.
Ethay azinggay odsgay eanlay orwardfay omfray ethay skyay;
Otay omwhay, ilewhay eageryay onyay ethay asechay eythay ooklay,
Ethay iresay ofyay ortalsmay andyay immortalsyay okespay:

“Unworthyyay ightsay! ethay anmay elovedbay ofyay eavenhay,
Eholdbay, ingloriousyay oundray onyay itycay ivendray!
Myay earthay artakespay ethay enerousgay Ectorhay’say ainpay;
Ectorhay, osewhay ealzay olewhay ecatombshay ashay ainslay,
Osewhay atefulgray umesfay ethay odsgay eceivedray ithway oyjay,
Omfray Idayay’say ummitssay, andyay ethay owerstay ofyay Oytray:
Ownay eesay imhay ingflyay; otay ishay earsfay esignray’day,
Andyay atefay, andyay iercefay Achillesyay, oseclay ehindbay.
Onsultcay, eyay owerspay! (’istay orthyway ouryay ebateday)
Etherwhay otay atchsnay imhay omfray impendingyay atefay,
Oryay etlay imhay earbay, byay ernstay Elidespay ainslay,
(Oodgay asyay ehay isyay) ethay otlay imposedyay onyay anmay.”

Enthay Allaspay usthay: “Allshay ehay osewhay engeancevay ormsfay
Ethay orkyfay oltbay, andyay ackensblay eavenhay ithway ormsstay,
Allshay ehay olongpray oneyay Ojantray’say orfeitfay eathbray?
Ayay anmay, ayay ortalmay, epray-ordainyay’day otay eathday!
Andyay illway onay urmursmay illfay ethay ourtscay aboveyay?
Onay odsgay indignantyay ameblay eirthay artialpay Ovejay?”

“Ogay enthay (eturnray’day ethay iresay) ithoutway elayday,
Exertyay thyay illway: Iyay ivegay ethay Atesfay eirthay ayway.”
Iftsway atyay ethay andatemay easedplay Itoniatray iesflay,
Andyay oopsstay impetuousyay omfray ethay eavingclay iesskay.

Asyay oughthray ethay orestfay, oyay’eryay ethay alevay andyay awnlay,
Ethay ellway-eathbray’day eaglebay ivesdray ethay ingflyay awnfay,
Inyay ainvay ehay iestray ethay overtcay ofyay ethay akesbray,
Oryay eepday eneathbay ethay emblingtray icketthay akesshay;
Uresay ofyay ethay apourvay inyay ethay aintedtay ewsday,
Ethay ertaincay oundhay ishay ariousvay azemay ursuespay.
Usthay epstay byay epstay, erewhay’eryay ethay Ojantray eelwhay’day,
Erethay iftsway Achillesyay ompasscay’day oundray ethay ieldfay.
Oftyay asyay otay eachray ethay Ardanday atesgay ehay endsbay,
Andyay opeshay ethay assistanceyay ofyay ishay ityingpay iendsfray,
(Osewhay oweringshay arrowsyay, asyay ehay oursedcay elowbay,
Omfray ethay ighhay urretstay ightmay oppressyay ethay oefay,)
Osay oftyay Achillesyay urnstay imhay otay ethay ainplay:
Ehay eyesyay ethay itycay, utbay ehay eyesyay inyay ainvay.
Asyay enmay inyay umbersslay eemsay ithway eedyspay acepay,
Oneyay otay ursuepay, andyay oneyay otay eadlay ethay asechay,
Eirthay inkingsay imbslay ethay anciedfay oursecay orsakefay,
Ornay isthay ancay flyay, ornay atthay ancay overtakeyay:
Onay esslay ethay abouringlay eroeshay antpay andyay ainstray:
Ilewhay atthay utbay iesflay, andyay isthay ursuespay inyay ainvay.

Atwhay odgay, Oyay usemay, assistedyay Ectorhay’say orcefay
Ithway atefay itselfyay osay onglay otay oldhay ethay oursecay?
Usphœbay ityay asway; owhay, inyay ishay atestlay ourhay,
Enduedyay ishay eesknay ithway engthstray, ishay ervesnay ithway owerpay:
Andyay eatgray Achillesyay, estlay omesay Eekgray’say advanceyay
Ouldshay atchsnay ethay oryglay omfray ishay iftedlay ancelay,
Ignsay’day otay ethay oopstray otay ieldyay ishay oefay ethay ayway,
Andyay eavelay untouchyay’day ethay onourshay ofyay ethay ayday.

Ovejay iftslay ethay oldengay alancesbay, atthay owshay
Ethay atesfay ofyay ortalmay enmay, andyay ingsthay elowbay:
Erehay eachyay ontendingcay erohay’say otlay ehay iestray,
Andyay eighsway, ithway equalyay andhay, eirthay estiniesday.
Owlay inkssay ethay alescay urchargedsay ithway Ectorhay’say atefay;
Eavyhay ithway eathday ityay inkssay, andyay ellhay eceivesray ethay eightway.

Enthay Usphœbay eftlay imhay. Iercefay Inervamay iesflay
Otay ernstay Elidespay, andyay iumphingtray, iescray:
“Oyay ovedlay ofyay Ovejay! isthay ayday ouryay abourslay easecay,
Andyay onquestcay azesblay ithway ullfay eamsbay onyay Eecegray.
Eatgray Ectorhay allsfay; atthay Ectorhay amedfay osay arfay,
Unkdray ithway enownray, insatiableyay ofyay arway,
Allsfay byay thyay andhay, andyay inemay! ornay orcefay, ornay ightflay,
Allshay oremay availyay imhay, ornay ishay odgay ofyay ightlay.
Eesay, erewhay inyay ainvay ehay upplicatessay aboveyay,
Ollray’day atyay ethay eetfay ofyay unrelentingyay Ovejay;
Estray erehay: elfmysay illway eadlay ethay Ojantray onyay,
Andyay urgeyay otay eetmay ethay atefay ehay annotcay unshay.”

Erhay oicevay ivineday ethay iefchay ithway oyfuljay indmay
Obeyyay’day; andyay estedray, onyay ishay ancelay eclinedray
Ilewhay ikelay Eiphobusday ethay artialmay ameday
(Erhay acefay, erhay esturegay, andyay erhay armsyay ethay amesay),
Inyay owshay anyay aidyay, byay aplesshay Ectorhay’say idesay
Approachyay’day, andyay eetsgray imhay usthay ithway oicevay eliedbay:

“Ootay onglay, Oyay Ectorhay! avehay Iyay ornebay ethay ightsay
Ofyay isthay istressday, andyay orrowsay’day inyay thyay ightflay:
Ityay itsfay usyay ownay ayay oblenay andstay otay akemay,
Andyay erehay, asyay othersbray, equalyay atesfay artakepay.”

Enthay ehay: “Oyay incepray! alliedyay inyay oodblay andyay amefay,
Earerday anthay allyay atthay ownyay ayay otherbray’say amenay;
Ofyay allyay atthay Ecubahay otay Iampray orebay,
Onglay iedtray, onglay ovedlay: uchmay ovedlay, utbay onouredhay oremay!
Incesay ouyay, ofyay allyay ouryay umerousnay aceray aloneyay
Efendday myay ifelay, egardlessray ofyay ouryay ownyay.”

Againyay ethay oddessgay: “Uchmay myay atherfay’say ayerpray,
Andyay uchmay myay othermay’say, esspray’day emay otay orbearfay:
Myay iendsfray embracedyay myay eesknay, adjuredyay myay aystay,
Utbay ongerstray ovelay impellyay’day, andyay Iyay obeyyay.
Omecay enthay, ethay oriousglay onflictcay etlay usyay tryay,
Etlay ethay eelstay arklespay, andyay ethay avelinjay flyay;
Oryay etlay usyay etchstray Achillesyay onyay ethay ieldfay,
Oryay otay ishay armyay ouryay oodyblay ophiestray ieldyay.”

Audfulfray eshay aidsay; enthay iftlysway archmay’day eforebay:
Ethay Ardanday erohay unsshay ishay oefay onay oremay.
Ernlystay eythay etmay. Ethay ilencesay Ectorhay okebray:
Ishay eadfuldray umageplay oddednay asyay ehay okespay:

“Enoughyay, Oyay onsay ofyay Eleuspay! Oytray ashay iewvay’day
Erhay allsway icethray ircledcay, andyay erhay iefchay ursuedpay.
Utbay ownay omesay odgay ithinway emay idsbay emay tryay
Inethay, oryay myay atefay: Iyay illkay eethay, oryay Iyay ieday.
Etyay onyay ethay ergevay ofyay attlebay etlay usyay aystay,
Andyay orfay ayay omentmay’say acespay uspendsay ethay ayday;
Etlay Eavenhay’say ighhay owerspay ebay allcay’day otay arbitrateyay
Ethay ustjay onditionscay ofyay isthay ernstay ebateday,
(Eternalyay itnessesway ofyay allyay elowbay,
Andyay aithfulfay uardiansgay ofyay ethay easuredtray owvay!)
Otay emthay Iyay earsway; ifyay, ictorvay inyay ethay ifestray,
Ovejay byay esethay andshay allshay edshay thyay oblenay ifelay,
Onay ilevay ishonourday allshay thyay orsecay ursuepay;
Ippstray’day ofyay itsyay armsyay aloneyay (ethay onquerorcay’say ueday)
Ethay estray otay Eecegray uninjuredyay Iyay’llay estoreray:
Ownay ightplay thyay utualmay oathyay, Iyay askyay onay oremay.”

“Alktay otnay ofyay oathsyay (ethay eadfuldray iefchay epliesray,
Ilewhay angeryay ashflay’day omfray ishay isdainfulday eyesyay),
Etestedday asyay outhay artyay, andyay oughtyay otay ebay,
Ornay oathyay ornay actpay Achillesyay ightsplay ithway eethay:
Uchsay actspay asyay ambslay andyay abidray olvesway ombinecay,
Uchsay eagueslay asyay enmay andyay uriousfay ionslay oinjay,
Otay uchsay Iyay allcay ethay odsgay! oneyay onstantcay atestay
Ofyay astinglay ancourray andyay eternalyay atehay:
Onay oughtthay utbay ageray, andyay evernay-easingcay ifestray,
Illtay eathday extinguishyay ageray, andyay oughtthay, andyay ifelay.
Ouseray enthay thyay orcesfay isthay importantyay ourhay,
Ollectcay thyay oulsay, andyay allcay orthfay allyay thyay owerpay.
Onay urtherfay ubterfugesay, onay urtherfay ancechay;
’Istay Allaspay, Allaspay ivesgay eethay otay myay ancelay.
Eachyay Eciangray ostghay, byay eethay eprivedday ofyay eathbray,
Ownay overshay oundray, andyay allscay eethay otay thyay eathday.”

Ehay okespay, andyay aunchlay’day ishay avelinjay atyay ethay oefay;
Utbay Ectorhay unnshay’day ethay editatedmay owblay:
Ehay oopstay’day, ilewhay oyay’eryay ishay eadhay ethay ingflyay earspay
Angsay innocentyay, andyay entspay itsyay orcefay inyay airyay.
Inervamay atchway’day ityay allingfay onyay ethay andlay,
Enthay ewdray, andyay avegay otay eatgray Achillesyay’ andhay,
Unseenyay ofyay Ectorhay, owhay, elateyay ithway oyjay,
Ownay akesshay ishay ancelay, andyay avesbray ethay eaddray ofyay Oytray.

“Ethay ifelay ouyay oastedbay otay atthay avelinjay ivengay,
Incepray! ouyay avehay issmay’day. Myay atefay ependsday onyay Eavenhay,
Otay eethay, esumptuouspray asyay outhay artyay, unknownyay,
Oryay atwhay ustmay ovepray myay ortunefay, oryay thyay ownyay.
Oastingbay isyay utbay anyay artyay, ouryay earsfay otay indblay,
Andyay ithway alsefay errorstay inksay anotheryay’say indmay.
Utbay owknay, ateverwhay atefay Iyay amyay otay tryay,
Byay onay ishonestday oundway allshay Ectorhay ieday.
Iyay allshay otnay allfay ayay ugitivefay atyay eastlay,
Myay oulsay allshay avelybray issueyay omfray myay eastbray.
Utbay irstfay, tryay outhay myay armyay; andyay aymay isthay artday
Endyay allyay myay ountrycay’say oesway, eepday uriedbay inyay thyay earthay.”

Ethay eaponway ewflay, itsyay oursecay unerringyay eldhay,
Unerringyay, utbay ethay eavenlyhay ieldshay epellray’day
Ethay ortalmay artday; esultingray ithway ayay oundbay
Omfray offyay ethay ingingray orbyay, ityay uckstray ethay oundgray.
Ectorhay eheldbay ishay avelinjay allfay inyay ainvay,
Ornay otheryay ancelay, ornay otheryay opehay emainray;
Ehay allscay Eiphobusday, emandsday ayay earspay—
Inyay ainvay, orfay onay Eiphobusday asway erethay.
Allyay omfortlesscay ehay andsstay: enthay, ithway ayay ighsay;
“’Istay osay—Eavenhay illsway ityay, andyay myay ourhay isyay ighnay!
Iyay eemday’day Eiphobusday adhay eardhay myay allcay,
Utbay ehay ecuresay ieslay uardedgay inyay ethay allway.
Ayay odgay eceivedday emay; Allaspay, ’astway thyay eedday,
Eathday andyay ackblay atefay approachyay! ’istay Iyay ustmay eedblay.
Onay efugeray ownay, onay uccoursay omfray aboveyay,
Eatgray Ovejay esertsday emay, andyay ethay onsay ofyay Ovejay,
Opitiouspray onceyay, andyay indkay! Enthay elcomeway atefay!
’Istay uetray Iyay erishpay, etyay Iyay erishpay eatgray:
Etyay inyay ayay ightymay eedday Iyay allshay expireyay,
Etlay uturefay agesyay earhay ityay, andyay admireyay!”

Iercefay, atyay ethay ordway, ishay eightyway ordsway ehay ewdray,
Andyay, allyay ollectedcay, onyay Achillesyay ewflay.
Osay Ovejay’say oldbay irdbay, ighhay alancedbay inyay ethay airyay,
Oopsstay omfray ethay oudsclay otay usstray ethay uiveringqay arehay.
Ornay esslay Achillesyay ishay iercefay oulsay eparespray:
Eforebay ishay eastbray ethay amingflay ieldshay ehay earsbay,
Efulgentray orbyay! aboveyay ishay ourfoldfay onecay
Ethay ildedgay orsehay-airhay arkledspay inyay ethay unsay.
Oddingnay atyay everyyay epstay: (Ulcanianvay amefray!)
Andyay asyay ehay ovedmay, ishay igurefay eemsay’day onyay ameflay.
Asyay adiantray Esperhay inesshay ithway eenerkay ightlay,[277]
Arfay-eamingbay oyay’eryay ethay ilversay osthay ofyay ightnay,
Enwhay allyay ethay arrystay aintray emblazeyay ethay eresphay:
Osay oneshay ethay ointpay ofyay eatgray Achillesyay’ earspay.
Inyay ishay ightray andhay ehay avesway ethay eaponway oundray,
Eyesyay ethay olewhay anmay, andyay editatesmay ethay oundway;
Utbay ethay ichray ailmay Atrocluspay atelylay oreway
Ecurelysay asedcay ethay arriorway’say odybay oyay’eryay.
Oneyay acespay atyay engthlay ehay iesspay, otay etlay inyay atefay,
Erewhay ’ixttway ethay ecknay andyay oatthray ethay ointedjay ateplay
Avegay entranceyay: oughthray atthay enetrablepay artpay
Uriousfay ehay ovedray ethay ellway-irectedday artday:
Ornay iercedpay ethay indpipeway etyay, ornay ooktay ethay owerpay
Ofyay eechspay, unhappyyay! omfray thyay ingdyay ourhay.
Onepray onyay ethay ieldfay ethay eedingblay arriorway ieslay,
Ilewhay, usthay iumphingtray, ernstay Achillesyay iescray:

“Atyay astlay isyay Ectorhay etchstray’day uponyay ethay ainplay,
Owhay earfay’day onay engeancevay orfay Atrocluspay ainslay:
Enthay, incepray! ouyay ouldshay avehay earfay’day, atwhay ownay ouyay eelfay;
Achillesyay absentyay asway Achillesyay illstay:
Etyay ayay ortshay acespay ethay eatgray avengeryay ayedstay,
Enthay owlay inyay ustday thyay engthstray andyay oryglay aidlay.
Eacefulpay ehay eepsslay, ithway allyay ouryay itesray adornyay’day,
Orfay everyay onourhay’day, andyay orfay everyay ournmay’day:
Ilewhay astcay otay allyay ethay ageray ofyay ostilehay owerpay,
Eethay irdsbay allshay anglemay, andyay ethay odsgay evourday.”

Enthay Ectorhay, aintingfay atyay ethay approachyay ofyay eathday:
“Byay thyay ownyay oulsay! byay osethay owhay avegay eethay eathbray!
Byay allyay ethay acredsay evalencepray ofyay ayerpray;
Ahyay, eavelay emay otnay orfay Eciangray ogsday otay eartay!
Ethay ommoncay itesray ofyay epulturesay estowbay,
Otay oothesay ayay atherfay’say andyay ayay othermay’say oeway:
Etlay eirthay argelay iftsgay ocurepray anyay urnyay atyay eastlay,
Andyay Ectorhay’say ashesyay inyay ishay ountrycay estray.”

“Onay, etchwray accursedyay! elentlessray ehay epliesray;
(Amesflay, asyay ehay okespay, otshay ashingflay omfray ishay eyesyay;)
Otnay osethay owhay avegay emay eathbray ouldshay idbay emay arespay,
Ornay allyay ethay acredsay evalencepray ofyay ayerpray.
Ouldcay Iyay elfmysay ethay oodyblay anquetbay oinjay!
Onay—otay ethay ogsday atthay arcasecay Iyay esignray.
Ouldshay Oytray, otay ibebray emay, ingbray orthfay allyay erhay orestay,
Andyay ivinggay ousandsthay, offeryay ousandsthay oremay;
Ouldshay Ardanday Iampray, andyay ishay eepingway ameday,
Aindray eirthay olewhay ealmray otay uybay oneyay uneralfay ameflay:
Eirthay Ectorhay onyay ethay ilepay eythay ouldshay otnay eesay,
Ornay obray ethay ulturesvay ofyay oneyay imblay ofyay eethay.”

Enthay usthay ethay iefchay ishay ingdyay accentsyay ewdray:
“Thyay ageray, implacableyay! ootay ellway Iyay ewknay:
Ethay Uriesfay atthay elentlessray eastbray avehay eelstay’day,
Andyay ursedcay eethay ithway ayay earthay atthay annotcay ieldyay.
Etyay inkthay, ayay ayday illway omecay, enwhay atefay’say ecreeday
Andyay angryyay odsgay allshay eakwray isthay ongwray onyay eethay;
Usphœbay andyay Arispay allshay avengeyay myay atefay,
Andyay etchstray eethay erehay eforebay ethay Anscæay ategay.”[278]

Ehay easedcay. Ethay Atesfay uppresssay’day ishay abouringlay eathbray,
Andyay ishay eyesyay iffenstay’day atyay ethay andhay ofyay eathday;
Otay ethay arkday ealmray ethay iritspay ingsway itsyay ayway,
(Ethay anlymay odybay eftlay ayay oadlay ofyay ayclay,)
Andyay aintiveplay idesglay alongyay ethay earydray oastcay,
Ayay akednay, anderingway, elancholymay ostghay!

Achillesyay, usingmay asyay ehay ollray’day ishay eyesyay
Oyay’eryay ethay eadday erohay, usthay unheardyay, epliesray:
“Ieday outhay ethay irstfay! Enwhay Ovejay andyay eavenhay ordainyay,
Iyay ollowfay eethay”—Ehay aidsay, andyay ippstray’day ethay ainslay.
Enthay orcingfay ackwardbay omfray ethay apinggay oundway
Ethay eekingray avelinjay, astcay ityay onyay ethay oundgray.
Ethay ongingthray Eeksgray eholdbay ithway onderingway eyesyay
Ishay anlymay eautybay andyay uperiorsay izesay;
Ilewhay omesay, ignobleryay, ethay eatgray eadday efaceday
Ithway oundsway ungenerousyay, oryay ithway auntstay isgraceday:

“Owhay angedchay atthay Ectorhay, owhay ikelay Ovejay ofyay atelay
Entsay ightninglay onyay ouryay eetsflay, andyay atterscay’day atefay!”

Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay ainslay ethay eatgray Achillesyay andsstay,
Egirtbay ithway eroeshay andyay urroundingsay andsbay;
Andyay usthay aloudyay, ilewhay allyay ethay osthay attendsyay:
“Incespray andyay eaderslay! ountrymencay andyay iendsfray!
Incesay ownay atyay engthlay ethay owerfulpay illway ofyay eavenhay
Ethay ireday estroyerday otay ouryay armyay ashay ivengay,
Isyay otnay Oytray allenfay alreadyyay? Astehay, eyay owerspay!
Eesay, ifyay alreadyyay eirthay esertedday owerstay
Areyay eftlay unmannyay’day; oryay ifyay eythay etyay etainray
Ethay oulssay ofyay eroeshay, eirthay eatgray Ectorhay ainslay.
Utbay atwhay isyay Oytray, oryay oryglay atwhay otay emay?
Oryay whyay eflectsray myay indmay onyay aughtyay utbay eethay,
Ivineday Atrocluspay! Eathday athhay ealsay’day ishay eyesyay;
Unweptyay, unhonouryay’day, uninterryay’day ehay ieslay!
Ancay ishay earday imageyay omfray myay oulsay epartday,
Onglay asyay ethay italvay iritspay ovesmay myay earthay?
Ifyay inyay ethay elancholymay adesshay elowbay,
Ethay amesflay ofyay iendsfray andyay overslay easecay otay owglay,
Etyay inemay allshay acredsay astlay; inemay, undecayyay’day,
Urnbay onyay oughthray eathday, andyay animateyay myay adeshay.
Eanwhilemay, eyay onssay ofyay Eecegray, inyay iumphtray ingbray
Ethay orpsecay ofyay Ectorhay, andyay ouryay anspæay ingsay.
Ebay isthay ethay ongsay, owslay-ovingmay owardtay ethay oreshay,
“Ectorhay isyay eadday, andyay Ilionyay isyay onay oremay.””

Enthay ishay ellfay oulsay ayay oughtthay ofyay engeancevay edbray;
(Unworthyyay ofyay imselfhay, andyay ofyay ethay eadday;)
Ethay ervousnay anclesyay oredbay, ishay eetfay ehay oundbay
Ithway ongsthay insertedyay oughthray ethay oubleday oundway;
Esethay ixfay’day upyay ighhay ehindbay ethay ollingray ainway,
Ishay acefulgray eadhay asway ailtray’day alongyay ethay ainplay.
Oudpray onyay ishay arcay ethay insultingyay ictorvay oodstay,
Andyay orebay aloftyay ishay armsyay, istillingday oodblay.
Ehay itessmay ethay eedsstay; ethay apidray ariotchay iesflay;
Ethay uddensay oudsclay ofyay irclingcay ustday ariseyay.
Ownay ostlay isyay allyay atthay ormidablefay airyay;
Ethay acefay ivineday, andyay onglay-escendingday airhay,
Urplepay ethay oundgray, andyay eakstray ethay ablesay andsay;
Eformday’day, ishonourday’day, inyay ishay ativenay andlay,
Ivengay otay ethay ageray ofyay anyay insultingyay ongthray,
Andyay, inyay ishay arentspay’ ightsay, ownay aggdray’day alongyay!

Ethay othermay irstfay eheldbay ithway adsay urveysay;
Eshay entray erhay essestray, enerablevay eygray,
Andyay astcay, arfay offyay, ethay egalray eilsvay awayyay.
Ithway iercingpay ieksshray ishay itterbay atefay eshay oansmay,
Ilewhay ethay adsay atherfay answersyay oansgray ithway oansgray,
Earstay afteryay earstay ishay ournfulmay eekschay oyay’erflowyay,
Andyay ethay olewhay itycay earsway oneyay acefay ofyay oeway:
Onay esslay anthay ifyay ethay ageray ofyay ostilehay iresfay,
Omfray erhay oundationsfay urlingcay otay erhay iresspay,
Oyay’eryay ethay oudpray itadelcay atyay engthlay ouldshay iseray,
Andyay ethay astlay azeblay endsay Ilionyay otay ethay iesskay.
Ethay etchedwray onarchmay ofyay ethay allingfay atestay,
Istractedday, essespray otay ethay Ardanday ategay.
Arcescay ethay olewhay eoplepay opstay ishay esperateday oursecay,
Ilewhay ongstray afflictionyay ivesgay ethay eeblefay orcefay:
Iefgray earstay ishay earthay, andyay ivesdray imhay otay andyay ofray,
Inyay allyay ethay agingray impotenceyay ofyay oeway.
Atyay engthlay ehay ollray’day inyay ustday, andyay usthay egunbay,
Imploringyay allyay, andyay amingnay oneyay byay oneyay:
“Ahyay! etlay emay, etlay emay ogay erewhay orrowsay allscay;
Iyay, onlyyay Iyay, illway issueyay omfray ouryay allsway
(Uidegay oryay ompanioncay, iendsfray! Iyay askyay eyay onenay),
Andyay owbay eforebay ethay urderermay ofyay myay onsay.
Myay iefgray erhapspay ishay itypay aymay engageyay;
Erhapspay atyay eastlay ehay aymay espectray myay ageyay.
Ehay ashay ayay atherfay ootay; ayay anmay ikelay emay;
Oneyay, otnay exemptyay omfray ageyay andyay iserymay
(Igorousvay onay oremay, asyay enwhay ishay oungyay embraceyay
Egotbay isthay estpay ofyay emay, andyay allyay myay aceray).
Owhay anymay aliantvay onssay, inyay earlyyay oomblay,
Ashay atthay ursedcay andhay entsay eadlonghay otay ethay ombtay!
Eethay, Ectorhay! astlay: thyay osslay (ivinelyday avebray)
Inkssay myay adsay oulsay ithway orrowsay otay ethay avegray.
Oyay adhay thyay entlegay iritspay asspay’day inyay eacepay,
Ethay onsay expiringyay inyay ethay iresay’say embraceyay,
Ilewhay othbay thyay arentspay eptway ethay atalfay ourhay,
Andyay, endingbay oyay’eryay eethay, ixmay’day ethay endertay owershay!
Omesay omfortcay atthay adhay eenbay, omesay adsay eliefray,
Otay eltmay inyay ullfay atietysay ofyay iefgray!”

Usthay ailway’day ethay atherfay, ovellinggray onyay ethay oundgray,
Andyay allyay ethay eyesyay ofyay Ilionyay eamstray’day aroundyay.

Amidstyay erhay atronsmay Ecubahay appearsyay:
(Ayay ourningmay incesspray, andyay ayay aintray inyay earstay;)
“Ahyay whyay ashay Eavenhay olongpray’day isthay atedhay eathbray,
Atientpay ofyay orrorshay, otay eholdbay thyay eathday?
Oyay Ectorhay! atelay thyay arentspay’ idepray andyay oyjay,
Ethay oastbay ofyay ationsnay! ethay efenceday ofyay Oytray!
Otay omwhay erhay afetysay andyay erhay amefay eshay owedyay;
Erhay iefchay, erhay erohay, andyay almostyay erhay odgay!
Oyay atalfay angechay! ecomebay inyay oneyay adsay ayday
Ayay enselesssay orsecay! inanimatedyay ayclay!”

Utbay otnay asyay etyay ethay atalfay ewsnay adhay eadspray
Otay airfay Andromacheyay, ofyay Ectorhay eadday;
Asyay etyay onay essengermay adhay oldtay ishay atefay,
Otnay eyay’enyay ishay aystay ithoutway ethay Anscæay ategay.
Arfay inyay ethay oseclay ecessesray ofyay ethay omeday,
Ensivepay eshay iedplay ethay elancholymay oomlay;
Ayay owinggray orkway employyay’day erhay ecretsay ourshay,
Onfusedlycay aygay ithway intermingledyay owersflay.
Erhay airfay-airedhay andmaidshay eathay ethay azenbray urnyay,
Ethay athbay eparingpray orfay erhay ordlay’say eturnray
Inyay ainvay; alasyay! erhay ordlay eturnsray onay oremay;
Unbathedyay ehay ieslay, andyay eedsblay alongyay ethay oreshay!
Ownay omfray ethay allsway ethay amoursclay eachray erhay earyay,
Andyay allyay erhay embersmay akeshay ithway uddensay earfay:
Orthfay omfray erhay ivoryyay andhay ethay uttleshay allsfay,
Andyay usthay, astonishyay’day, otay erhay aidsmay eshay allscay:


[Illustrationyay: ] Ethay Athbay


“Ahyay ollowfay emay! (eshay iedcray) atwhay aintiveplay oisenay
Invadesyay myay earyay? ’Istay uresay myay othermay’say oicevay.
Myay alteringfay eesknay eirthay emblingtray amefray esertday,
Ayay ulsepay unusualyay uttersflay atyay myay earthay;
Omesay angestray isasterday, omesay everseray ofyay atefay
(Eyay odsgay avertyay ityay!) eatsthray ethay Ojantray atestay.
Arfay ebay ethay omenyay ichwhay myay oughtsthay uggestsay!
Utbay uchmay Iyay earfay myay Ectorhay’say auntlessday eastbray
Onfrontscay Achillesyay; asedchay alongyay ethay ainplay,
Utshay omfray ouryay allsway! Iyay earfay, Iyay earfay imhay ainslay!
Afesay inyay ethay owdcray ehay everyay ornscay’day otay aitway,
Andyay oughtsay orfay oryglay inyay ethay awsjay ofyay atefay:
Erhapspay atthay oblenay eathay ashay ostcay ishay eathbray,
Ownay uenchqay’day orfay everyay inyay ethay armsyay ofyay eathday.”

Eshay okespay: andyay uriousfay, ithway istractedday acepay,
Earsfay inyay erhay earthay, andyay anguishyay inyay erhay acefay,
Iesflay oughthray ethay omeday (ethay aidsmay erhay epsstay ursuepay),
Andyay ountsmay ethay allsway, andyay endssay aroundyay erhay iewvay.
Ootay oonsay erhay eyesyay ethay illingkay objectyay oundfay,
Ethay odlikegay Ectorhay aggdray’day alongyay ethay oundgray.
Ayay uddensay arknessday adesshay erhay immingsway eyesyay:
Eshay aintsfay, eshay allsfay; erhay eathbray, erhay olourcay iesflay.
Erhay airhay’say airfay ornamentsyay, ethay aidsbray atthay oundbay,
Ethay etnay atthay eldhay emthay, andyay ethay eathwray atthay owncray’day,
Ethay eilvay andyay iademday ewflay arfay awayyay
(Ethay iftgay ofyay Enusvay onyay erhay idalbray ayday).
Aroundyay ayay aintray ofyay eepingway isterssay andsstay,
Otay aiseray erhay inkingsay ithway assistantyay andshay.
Arcescay omfray ethay ergevay ofyay eathday ecallray’day, againyay
Eshay aintsfay, oryay utbay ecoversray otay omplaincay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Andromacheyay Aintingfay Onyay Ethay Allway


“Oyay etchedwray usbandhay ofyay ayay etchedwray ifeway!
Ornbay ithway oneyay atefay, otay oneyay unhappyyay ifelay!
Orfay uresay oneyay arstay itsyay anefulbay eambay isplayday’day
Onyay Iampray’say oofray, andyay Ippoplaciahay’say adeshay.
Omfray ifferentday arentspay, ifferentday imesclay eway amecay.
Atyay ifferentday eriodspay, etyay ouryay atefay ethay amesay!
Whyay asway myay irthbay otay eatgray Aëtionyay owedyay,
Andyay whyay asway allyay atthay endertay arecay estowbay’day?
Ouldway Iyay adhay evernay eenbay!—Oyay outhay, ethay ostghay
Ofyay myay eadday usbandhay! iserablymay ostlay!
Outhay otay ethay ismalday ealmsray orfay everyay onegay!
Andyay Iyay abandonyay’day, esolateday, aloneyay!
Anyay onlyyay ildchay, onceyay omfortcay ofyay myay ainspay,
Adsay oductpray ownay ofyay aplesshay ovelay, emainsray!
Onay oremay otay ilesmay uponyay ishay iresay; onay iendfray
Otay elphay imhay ownay! onay atherfay otay efendday!
Orfay ouldshay ehay ’apescay ethay ordsway, ethay ommoncay oomday,
Atwhay ongswray attendyay imhay, andyay atwhay iefsgray otay omecay!
Evenyay omfray ishay ownyay aternalpay oofray expellyay’day,
Omesay angerstray oughsplay ishay atrimonialpay ieldfay.
Ethay ayday, atthay otay ethay adesshay ethay atherfay endssay,
Obsray ethay adsay orphanyay ofyay ishay atherfay’say iendsfray:
Ehay, etchedwray outcastyay ofyay ankindmay! appearsyay
Orfay everyay adsay, orfay everyay athedbay inyay earstay;
Amongstyay ethay appyhay, unregardedyay, ehay
Angshay onyay ethay oberay, oryay emblestray atyay ethay eeknay,
Ilewhay osethay ishay atherfay’say ormerfay ountybay edfay
Ornay eachray ethay obletgay, ornay ivideday ethay eadbray:
Ethay indestkay utbay ishay esentpray antsway allayyay,
Otay eavelay imhay etchedwray ethay ucceedingsay ayday.
Ugalfray ompassioncay! Eedlesshay, eythay owhay oastbay
Othbay arentspay illstay, ornay eelfay atwhay ehay ashay ostlay,
Allshay cryay, ‘Egonebay! thyay atherfay eastsfay otnay erehay:’
Ethay etchwray obeysyay, etiringray ithway ayay eartay.
Usthay etchedwray, usthay etiringray allyay inyay earstay,
Otay myay adsay oulsay Astyanaxyay appearsyay!
Orcedfay byay epeatedray insultsyay otay eturnray,
Andyay otay ishay idowway’day othermay ainlyvay ournmay:
Ehay, owhay, ithway endertay elicacyday edbray,
Ithway incespray ortedspay, andyay onyay aintiesday edfay,
Andyay enwhay illstay eveningyay avegay imhay upyay otay estray,
Unksay oftsay inyay ownday uponyay ethay ursenay’say eastbray,
Ustmay—ahyay atwhay ustmay ehay otnay? Omwhay Ilionyay allscay
Astyanaxyay, omfray erhay ellway-uardedgay allsway,[279]
Isyay ownay atthay amenay onay oremay, unhappyyay oybay!
Incesay ownay onay oremay thyay atherfay uardsgay ishay Oytray.
Utbay outhay, myay Ectorhay, iestlay exposedyay inyay airyay,
Arfay omfray thyay arentspay’ andyay thyay onsortcay’say arecay;
Osewhay andhay inyay ainvay, irectedday byay erhay ovelay,
Ethay artialmay arfscay andyay oberay ofyay iumphtray oveway.
Ownay otay evouringday amesflay ebay esethay ayay eypray,
Uselessyay otay eethay, omfray isthay accursedyay ayday!
Etyay etlay ethay acrificesay atyay eastlay ebay aidpay,
Anyay onourhay otay ethay ivinglay, otnay ethay eadday!”


Osay akespay ethay ournfulmay ameday: erhay atronsmay earhay, Ighsay ackbay erhay ighssay, andyay
answeryay eartay ithway eartay.




Ookbay Iiixxay.


Argumentyay.


Uneralfay Amesgay Inyay Onourhay Ofyay Atrocluspay.[280]


Achillesyay andyay ethay Idonsmyrmay oday onourshay otay ethay odybay ofyay Atrocluspay. Afteryay
ethay uneralfay eastfay ehay etiresray otay ethay easay-oreshay, erewhay, allingfay asleepyay,
ethay ostghay ofyay ishay iendfray appearsyay otay imhay, andyay emandsday ethay itesray ofyay
urialbay; ethay extnay orningmay ethay oldierssay areyay entsay ithway ulesmay andyay aggonsway
otay etchfay oodway orfay ethay epyray. Ethay uneralfay ocessionpray, andyay ethay offeringyay
eirthay airhay otay ethay eadday. Achillesyay acrificessay everalsay animalsyay, andyay astlylay
elvetway Ojantray aptivescay, atyay ethay ilepay; enthay etssay irefay otay ityay. Ehay ayspay
ibationslay otay ethay Indsway, ichwhay (atyay ethay instanceyay ofyay Irisyay) iseray, andyay aiseray
ethay amesflay. Enwhay ethay ilepay ashay urnedbay allyay ightnay, eythay athergay ethay onesbay,
aceplay emthay inyay anyay urnyay ofyay oldgay, andyay aiseray ethay ombtay. Achillesyay institutesyay
ethay uneralfay amesgay: ethay ariotchay-aceray, ethay ightfay ofyay ethay aestuscay, ethay
estlingwray, ethay ootfay-aceray, ethay inglesay ombatcay, ethay iscusday, ethay ootingshay
ithway arrowsyay, ethay artingday ethay avelinjay: ethay ariousvay escriptionsday ofyay
ichwhay, andyay ethay ariousvay uccesssay ofyay ethay everalsay antagonistsyay, akemay ethay
eatestgray artpay ofyay ethay ookbay.
    Inyay isthay ookbay endsyay ethay irtieththay ayday. Ethay ightnay ollowingfay, ethay ostghay
    ofyay Atrocluspay appearsyay otay Achillesyay: ethay oneyay-andyay-irtieththay ayday isyay
    employedyay inyay ellingfay ethay imbertay orfay ethay ilepay: ethay otway-andyay-irtieththay
    inyay urningbay ityay; andyay ethay eethray-andyay-irtieththay inyay ethay amesgay. Ethay enescay
    isyay enerallygay onyay ethay easay-oreshay.


Usthay umbledhay inyay ethay ustday, ethay ensivepay aintray
Oughthray ethay adsay itycay ournmay’day erhay erohay ainslay.
Ethay odybay oilsay’day ithway ustday, andyay ackblay ithway oregay,
Ieslay onyay oadbray Ellesponthay’say esoundingray oreshay.
Ethay Eciansgray eeksay eirthay ipsshay, andyay earclay ethay andstray,
Allyay, utbay ethay artialmay Idonianmyrmay andbay:
Esethay etyay assembledyay eatgray Achillesyay oldshay,
Andyay ethay ernstay urposepay ofyay ishay indmay unfoldsyay:

“Otnay etyay, myay avebray ompanionscay ofyay ethay arway,
Eleaseray ouryay okingsmay ourserscay omfray ethay arcay;
Utbay, ithway ishay ariotchay eachyay inyay orderyay edlay,
Erformpay ueday onourshay otay Atrocluspay eadday.
Ereyay etyay omfray estray oryay oodfay eway eeksay eliefray,
Omesay itesray emainray, otay utglay ouryay ageray ofyay iefgray.”

Ethay oopstray obeyyay’day; andyay icethray inyay orderyay edlay[281]
(Achillesyay irstfay) eirthay ourserscay oundray ethay eadday;
Andyay icethray eirthay orrowssay andyay amentslay enewray;
Earstay athebay eirthay armsyay, andyay earstay ethay andssay edewbay.
Orfay uchsay ayay arriorway Etisthay aidsyay eirthay oeway,
Eltsmay eirthay ongstray eartshay, andyay idsbay eirthay eyesyay otay owflay.
Utbay iefchay, Elidespay: ickthay-ucceedingsay ighssay
Urstbay omfray ishay earthay, andyay orrentstay omfray ishay eyesyay:
Ishay aughteringslay andshay, etyay edray ithway oodblay, ehay aidlay
Onyay ishay eadday iendfray’say oldcay eastbray, andyay usthay ehay aidsay:

“Allyay ailhay, Atrocluspay! etlay thyay onourhay’day ostghay
Earhay, andyay ejoiceray onyay Utoplay’say earydray oastcay;
Eholdbay! Achillesyay’ omisepray isyay ompletecay;
Ethay oodyblay Ectorhay etchstray’day eforebay thyay eetfay.
Olay! otay ethay ogsday ishay arcasecay Iyay esignray;
Andyay elvetway adsay ictimsvay, ofyay ethay Ojantray inelay,
Acredsay otay engeancevay, instantyay allshay expireyay;
Eirthay iveslay effusedyay aroundyay thyay uneralfay epyray.”

Oomyglay ehay aidsay, andyay (orriblehay otay iewvay)
Eforebay ethay ierbay ethay eedingblay Ectorhay ewthray,
Onepray onyay ethay ustday. Ethay Idonsmyrmay aroundyay
Unbracedyay eirthay armouryay, andyay ethay eedsstay unboundyay.
Allyay otay Achillesyay’ ablesay ipshay epairray,
Equentfray andyay ullfay, ethay enialgay eastfay otay areshay.
Ownay omfray ethay ellway-edfay inesway ackblay okessmay aspireyay,
Ethay istlybray ictimsvay issinghay oyay’eryay ethay irefay:
Ethay ugehay oxyay ellowingbay allsfay; ithway eeblerfay iescray
Expiresyay ethay oatgay; ethay eepshay inyay ilencesay iesday.
Aroundyay ethay erohay’say ostratepray odybay owflay’day,
Inyay oneyay omiscuouspray eamstray, ethay eekingray oodblay.
Andyay ownay ayay andbay ofyay Argiveyay onarchsmay ingsbray
Ethay oriousglay ictorvay otay ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay.
Omfray ishay eadday iendfray ethay ensivepay arriorway entway,
Ithway epsstay unwillingyay, otay ethay egalray enttay.
Ethay attendingyay eraldshay, asyay byay officeyay oundbay,
Ithway indledkay amesflay ethay ipodtray-asevay urroundsay:
Otay eanseclay ishay onqueringcay andshay omfray ostilehay oregay,
Eythay urgedyay inyay ainvay; ethay iefchay efusedray, andyay oresway:[282]

“Onay opdray allshay ouchtay emay, byay almightyyay Ovejay!
Ethay irstfay andyay eatestgray ofyay ethay odsgay aboveyay!
Illtay onyay ethay epyray Iyay aceplay eethay; illtay Iyay earray
Ethay assygray oundmay, andyay ipclay thyay acredsay airhay.
Omesay easeyay atyay eastlay osethay iouspay itesray aymay ivegay,
Andyay oothesay myay orrowssay, ilewhay Iyay earbay otay ivelay.
Owehay’eryay, eluctantray asyay Iyay amyay, Iyay aystay
Andyay areshay ouryay eastfay; utbay ithway ethay awnday ofyay ayday,
(Oyay ingkay ofyay enmay!) ityay aimsclay thyay oyalray arecay,
Atthay Eecegray ethay arriorway’say uneralfay ilepay eparepray,
Andyay idbay ethay orestsfay allfay: (uchsay itesray areyay aidpay
Otay eroeshay umberingslay inyay eternalyay adeshay:)
Enthay, enwhay ishay earthlyyay artpay allshay ountmay inyay irefay,
Etlay ethay eaguedlay uadronssqay otay eirthay ostspay etireray.”

Ehay okespay: eythay earhay imhay, andyay ethay ordway obeyyay;
Ethay ageray ofyay ungerhay andyay ofyay irstthay allayyay,
Enthay easeyay inyay eepslay ethay abourslay ofyay ethay ayday.
Utbay eatgray Elidespay, etchstray’day alongyay ethay oreshay,
Erewhay, ashday’day onyay ocksray, ethay okenbray illowsbay oarray,
Ieslay inlyyay oaninggray; ilewhay onyay eitheryay andhay
Ethay artialmay Idonsmyrmay onfusedlycay andstay.
Alongyay ethay assgray ishay anguidlay embersmay allfay,
Iredtay ithway ishay asechay aroundyay ethay Ojantray allway;
Ushhay’day byay ethay urmursmay ofyay ethay ollingray eepday,
Atyay engthlay ehay inkssay inyay ethay oftsay armsyay ofyay eepslay.
Enwhay olay! ethay adeshay, eforebay ishay osingclay eyesyay,
Ofyay adsay Atrocluspay oseray, oryay eemsay’day otay iseray:
Inyay ethay amesay oberay ehay ivinglay oreway, ehay amecay:
Inyay aturestay, oicevay, andyay easingplay ooklay, ethay amesay.
Ethay ormfay amiliarfay overhay’day oyay’eryay ishay eadhay,
“Andyay eepsslay Achillesyay? (usthay ethay antomphay aidsay:)
Eepsslay myay Achillesyay, ishay Atrocluspay eadday?
Ivinglay, Iyay eemsay’day ishay earestday, enderesttay arecay,
Utbay ownay orgotfay, Iyay anderway inyay ethay airyay.
Etlay myay alepay orsecay ethay itesray ofyay urialbay owknay,
Andyay ivegay emay entranceyay inyay ethay ealmsray elowbay:
Illtay enthay ethay iritspay indsfay onay estingray-aceplay,
Utbay erehay andyay erethay ethay unbodiedyay ectresspay asechay
Ethay agrantvay eadday aroundyay ethay arkday abodeyay,
Orbidfay otay osscray ethay irremeableyay oodflay.
Ownay ivegay thyay andhay; orfay otay ethay artherfay oreshay
Enwhay onceyay eway asspay, ethay oulsay eturnsray onay oremay:
Enwhay onceyay ethay astlay unerealfay amesflay ascendyay,
Onay oremay allshay eetmay Achillesyay andyay ishay iendfray;
Onay oremay ouryay oughtsthay otay osethay eway ovedlay akemay ownknay;
Oryay uitqay ethay earestday, otay onversecay aloneyay.
Emay atefay ashay eversay’day omfray ethay onssay ofyay earthyay,
Ethay atefay orefay-oomday’day atthay aitedway omfray myay irthbay:
Eethay ootay ityay aitsway; eforebay ethay Ojantray allway
Evenyay eatgray andyay odlikegay outhay artyay oomday’day otay allfay.
Earhay enthay; andyay asyay inyay atefay andyay ovelay eway oinjay,
Ahyay uffersay atthay myay onesbay aymay estray ithway inethay!
Ogethertay avehay eway ivedlay; ogethertay edbray,
Oneyay ousehay eceivedray usyay, andyay oneyay abletay edfay;
Atthay oldengay urnyay, thyay oddessgay-othermay avegay,
Aymay ixmay ouryay ashesyay inyay oneyay ommoncay avegray.”

“Andyay isyay ityay outhay? (ehay answersyay) Otay myay ightsay[283]
Onceyay oremay eturnray’stay outhay omfray ethay ealmsray ofyay ightnay?
Oyay oremay anthay otherbray! Inkthay eachyay officeyay aidpay,
Atewhay’eryay ancay estray ayay iscontentedday adeshay;
Utbay antgray oneyay astlay embraceyay, unhappyyay oybay!
Affordyay atyay eastlay atthay elancholymay oyjay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay ithway ishay onginglay armsyay essayyay’day
Inyay ainvay otay aspgray ethay isionaryvay adeshay!
Ikelay ayay inthay okesmay ehay eessay ethay iritspay flyay,[284]
Andyay earshay ayay eeblefay, amentablelay cryay.
Onfusedcay ehay akesway; amazementyay eaksbray ethay andsbay
Ofyay oldengay eepslay, andyay artingstay omfray ethay andssay,
Ensivepay ehay usesmay ithway upliftedyay andshay:

“’Istay uetray, ’istay ertaincay; anmay, oughthay eadday, etainsray
Artpay ofyay imselfhay; ethay immortalyay indmay emainsray:
Ethay ormfay ubsistssay ithoutway ethay odybay’say aidyay,
Aerialyay emblancesay, andyay anyay emptyyay adeshay!
Isthay ightnay myay iendfray, osay atelay inyay attlebay ostlay,
Oodstay atyay myay idesay, ayay ensivepay, aintiveplay ostghay:
Evenyay ownay amiliarfay, asyay inyay ifelay, ehay amecay;
Alasyay! owhay ifferentday! etyay owhay ikelay ethay amesay!”

Usthay ilewhay ehay okespay, eachyay eyeyay ewgray igbay ithway earstay:
Andyay ownay ethay osyray-ingerfay’day ornmay appearsyay,
Owsshay everyyay ournfulmay acefay ithway earstay oyay’erspreadyay,
Andyay aresglay onyay ethay alepay isagevay ofyay ethay eadday.
Utbay Agamemnonyay, asyay ethay itesray emandday,
Ithway ulesmay andyay aggonsway endssay ayay osenchay andbay
Otay oadlay ethay imbertay, andyay ethay ilepay otay earray;
Ayay argechay onsigncay’day otay Erionmay’say aithfulfay arecay.
Ithway operpray instrumentsyay eythay aketay ethay oadray,
Axesyay otay utcay, andyay opesray otay ingslay ethay oadlay.
Irstfay archmay ethay eavyhay ulesmay, ecurelysay owslay,
Oyay’eryay illshay, oyay’eryay alesday, oyay’eryay agscray, oyay’eryay ocksray eythay ogay:[285]
Umpingjay, ighhay oyay’eryay ethay ubsshray ofyay ethay oughray oundgray,
Attleray ethay atteringclay arscay, andyay ethay ockshay’day axlesyay oundbay.
Utbay enwhay arrivedyay atyay Idayay’say eadingspray oodsway,[286]
(Airfay Idayay, aterway’day ithway escendingday oodsflay,)
Oudlay oundssay ethay axeyay, edoublingray okesstray onyay okesstray;
Onyay allyay idessay oundray ethay orestfay urlshay erhay oaksyay
Eadlonghay. Eepday echoingyay oangray ethay icketsthay ownbray;
Enthay ustlingray, acklingcray, ashingcray, underthay ownday.
Ethay oodway ethay Eciansgray eaveclay, eparedpray otay urnbay;
Andyay ethay owslay ulesmay ethay amesay oughray oadray eturnray.
Ethay urdystay oodmenway equalyay urdensbay orebay
(Uchsay argechay asway ivengay emthay) otay ethay andysay oreshay;
Erethay onyay ethay otspay ichwhay eatgray Achillesyay owshay’day,
Eythay easedyay eirthay ouldersshay, andyay isposedday ethay oadlay;
Irclingcay aroundyay ethay aceplay, erewhay imestay otay omecay
Allshay iewvay Atrocluspay’ andyay Achillesyay’ ombtay.
Ethay erohay idsbay ishay artialmay oopstray appearyay
Ighhay onyay eirthay arscay inyay allyay ethay omppay ofyay arway;
Eachyay inyay efulgentray armsyay ishay imbslay attiresyay,
Allyay ountmay eirthay ariotschay, ombatantscay andyay uiressqay.
Ethay ariotschay irstfay oceedpray, ayay iningshay aintray;
Enthay oudsclay ofyay ootfay atthay okesmay alongyay ethay ainplay;
Extnay esethay ethay elancholymay andbay appearyay;
Amidstyay, aylay eadday Atrocluspay onyay ethay ierbay;
Oyay’eryay allyay ethay orsecay eirthay atteredscay ockslay eythay owthray;
Achillesyay extnay, oppressyay’day ithway ightymay oeway,
Upportingsay ithway ishay andshay ethay erohay’say eadhay,
Endsbay oyay’eryay ethay extendedyay odybay ofyay ethay eadday.
Atrocluspay ecentday onyay ethay appointedyay oundgray
Eythay aceplay, andyay eaphay ethay ansylvay ilepay aroundyay.
Utbay eatgray Achillesyay andsstay apartyay inyay ayerpray,
Andyay omfray ishay eadhay ividesday ethay ellowyay airhay;
Osethay urlingcay ockslay ichwhay omfray ishay outhyay ehay owvay’day,[287]
Andyay acredsay ewgray, otay Erchiusspay’ onourhay’day oodflay:
Enthay ighingsay, otay ethay eepday ishay ockslay ehay astcay,
Andyay ollray’day ishay eyesyay aroundyay ethay ateryway asteway:

“Erchiusspay! osewhay avesway inyay azymay errorsyay ostlay
Elightfulday ollray alongyay myay ativenay oastcay!
Otay omwhay eway ainlyvay owvay’day, atyay ouryay eturnray,
Esethay ockslay otay allfay, andyay ecatombshay otay urnbay:
Ullfay iftyfay amsray otay eedblay inyay acrificesay,
Erewhay otay ethay ayday thyay ilversay ountainsfay iseray,
Andyay erewhay inyay adeshay ofyay onsecratedcay owersbay
Thyay altarsyay andstay, erfumedpay ithway ativenay owersflay!
Osay owvay’day myay atherfay, utbay ehay owvay’day inyay ainvay;
Onay oremay Achillesyay eessay ishay ativenay ainplay;
Inyay atthay ainvay opehay esethay airshay onay ongerlay owgray,
Atrocluspay earsbay emthay otay ethay adesshay elowbay.”

Usthay oyay’eryay Atrocluspay ilewhay ethay erohay aypray’day,
Onyay ishay oldcay andhay ethay acredsay ocklay ehay aidlay.
Onceyay oremay afreshyay ethay Eciangray orrowssay owflay:
Andyay ownay ethay unsay adhay etsay uponyay eirthay oeway;
Utbay otay ethay ingkay ofyay enmay usthay okespay ethay iefchay:
“Enoughyay, Atridesyay! ivegay ethay oopstray eliefray:
Ermitpay ethay ourningmay egionslay otay etireray,
Andyay etlay ethay iefschay aloneyay attendyay ethay epyray;
Ethay iouspay arecay ebay oursyay, ethay eadday otay urnbay—”
Ehay aidsay: ethay eoplepay otay eirthay ipsshay eturnray:
Ilewhay osethay eputedday otay interyay ethay ainslay
Eaphay ithway ayay isingray amidpyray ethay ainplay.[288]
Ayay undredhay ootfay inyay engthlay, ayay undredhay ideway,
Ethay owinggray ucturestray eadsspray onyay everyyay idesay;
Ighhay onyay ethay optay ethay anlymay orsecay eythay aylay,
Andyay ellway-edfay eepshay andyay ablesay oxenyay ayslay:
Achillesyay overedcay ithway eirthay atfay ethay eadday,
Andyay ethay iledpay ictimsvay oundray ethay odybay eadspray;
Enthay arsjay ofyay oneyhay, andyay ofyay agrantfray oilyay,
Uspendssay aroundyay, owlay-endingbay oyay’eryay ethay ilepay.
Ourfay ightlyspray ourserscay, ithway ayay eadlyday oangray
Ourpay orthfay eirthay iveslay, andyay onyay ethay epyray areyay ownthray.
Ofyay inenay argelay ogsday, omesticday atyay ishay oardbay,
Allfay otway, electedsay otay attendyay eirthay ordlay,
Enthay astlay ofyay allyay, andyay orriblehay otay elltay,
Adsay acrificesay! elvetway Ojantray aptivescay ellfay.[289]
Onyay esethay ethay ageray ofyay irefay ictoriousvay eyspray,
Involvesyay andyay oinsjay emthay inyay oneyay ommoncay azeblay.
Earsmay’day ithway ethay oodyblay itesray, ehay andsstay onyay ighhay,
Andyay allscay ethay iritspay ithway ayay eadfuldray cryay:[290]

“Allyay ailhay, Atrocluspay! etlay thyay engefulvay ostghay
Earhay, andyay exultyay, onyay Utoplay’say earydray oastcay.
Eholdbay Achillesyay’ omisepray ullyfay aidpay,
Elvetway Ojantray eroeshay offeryay’day otay thyay adeshay;
Utbay eavierhay atesfay onyay Ectorhay’say orsecay attendyay,
Avedsay omfray ethay amesflay, orfay ungryhay ogsday otay endray.”

Osay akespay ehay, eateningthray: utbay ethay odsgay ademay ainvay
Ishay eatthray, andyay uardgay inviolateyay ethay ainslay:
Elestialcay Enusvay overhay’day oyay’eryay ishay eadhay,
Andyay oseateray unguentsyay, eavenlyhay agrancefray! edshay:
Eshay atchway’day imhay allyay ethay ightnay andyay allyay ethay ayday,
Andyay ovedray ethay oodhoundsblay omfray eirthay estinedday eypray.
Ornay acredsay Usphœbay esslay employyay’day ishay arecay;
Ehay ourpay’day aroundyay ayay eilvay ofyay athergay’day airyay,
Andyay eptkay ethay ervesnay undriedyay, ethay eshflay entireyay,
Againstyay ethay olarsay eambay andyay Iriansay irefay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Ethay Uneralfay Ilepay Ofyay Atrocluspay


Ornay etyay ethay ilepay, erewhay eadday Atrocluspay ieslay,
Okessmay, ornay asyay etyay ethay ullensay amesflay ariseyay;
Utbay, astfay esidebay, Achillesyay oodstay inyay ayerpray,
Invokedyay ethay odsgay osewhay iritspay ovesmay ethay airyay,
Andyay ictimsvay omisedpray, andyay ibationslay astcay,
Otay entlegay Ephyrzay andyay ethay Orealbay astblay:
Ehay allcay’day ethay aerialyay owerspay, alongyay ethay iesskay
Otay eathebray, andyay isperwhay otay ethay iresfay otay iseray.
Ethay ingedway Irisyay eardhay ethay erohay’say allcay,
Andyay instantyay astenhay’day otay eirthay airyyay allhay,
Erewhay inyay oldyay Ephyrzay’say openyay ourtscay onyay ighhay,
Atsay allyay ethay usteringblay ethrenbray ofyay ethay skyay.
Eshay oneshay amidstyay emthay, onyay erhay aintedpay owbay;
Ethay ockyray avementpay itterglay’day ithway ethay owshay.
Allyay omfray ethay anquetbay iseray, andyay eachyay invitesyay
Ethay ariousvay oddessgay otay artakepay ethay itesray.
“Otnay osay (ethay ameday epliedray), Iyay astehay otay ogay
Otay acredsay Oceanyay, andyay ethay oodsflay elowbay:
Evenyay ownay ouryay olemnsay ecatombshay attendyay,
Andyay eavenhay isyay eastingfay onyay ethay orldway’say eengray endyay
Ithway ighteousray Ethiopsyay (uncorruptedyay aintray!)
Arfay onyay ethay extremestyay imitslay ofyay ethay ainmay.
Utbay Eleuspay’ onsay entreatsyay, ithway acrificesay,
Ethay esternway iritspay, andyay ethay orthnay, otay iseray!
Etlay onyay Atrocluspay’ ilepay ouryay astblay ebay ivendray,
Andyay earbay ethay azingblay onourshay ighhay otay eavenhay.”

Iftsway asyay ethay ordway eshay anishvay’day omfray eirthay iewvay;
Iftsway asyay ethay ordway ethay indsway umultuoustay ewflay;
Orthfay urstbay ethay ormystay andbay ithway underingthay oarray,
Andyay eapshay onyay eapshay ethay oudsclay areyay osstay’day eforebay.
Otay ethay ideway ainmay enthay oopingstay omfray ethay iesskay,
Ethay eavinghay eepsday inyay ateryway ountainsmay iseray:
Oytray eelsfay ethay astblay alongyay erhay akingshay allsway,
Illtay onyay ethay ilepay ethay athergay’day empesttay allsfay.
Ethay ucturestray acklescray inyay ethay oaringray iresfay,
Andyay allyay ethay ightnay ethay enteousplay ameflay aspiresyay.
Allyay ightnay Achillesyay ailshay Atrocluspay’ oulsay,
Ithway argelay ibationslay omfray ethay oldengay owlbay.
Asyay ayay oorpay atherfay, elplesshay andyay undoneyay,
Ournsmay oyay’eryay ethay ashesyay ofyay anyay onlyyay onsay,
Akestay ayay adsay easureplay ethay astlay onesbay otay urnbay,
Andyay ourspay inyay earstay, ereyay etyay eythay oseclay ethay urnyay:
Osay aystay’day Achillesyay, irclingcay oundray ethay oreshay,
Osay atchway’day ethay amesflay, illtay ownay eythay ameflay onay oremay.
’Astway enwhay, emergingyay oughthray ethay adesshay ofyay ightnay,
Ethay orningmay anetplay oldtay ethay approachyay ofyay ightlay;
Andyay, astfay ehindbay, Aurorayay’say armerway ayray
Oyay’eryay ethay oadbray oceanyay ourpay’day ethay oldengay ayday:
Enthay anksay ethay azeblay, ethay ilepay onay ongerlay urnbay’day,
Andyay otay eirthay avescay ethay istlingwhay indsway eturnray’day:
Acrossyay ethay Acianthray eassay eirthay oursecay eythay orebay;
Ethay uffledray eassay eneathbay eirthay assagepay oarray.

Enthay artingpay omfray ethay ilepay ehay easedcay otay eepway,
Andyay anksay otay uietqay inyay ethay embraceyay ofyay eepslay,
Exhaustedyay ithway ishay iefgray: eanwhilemay ethay owdcray
Ofyay ongingthray Eciansgray oundray Achillesyay oodstay;
Ethay umulttay akedway imhay: omfray ishay eyesyay ehay ookshay
Unwillingyay umberslay, andyay ethay iefschay espokebay:

“Eyay ingskay andyay incespray ofyay ethay Achaianyay amenay!
Irstfay etlay usyay uenchqay ethay etyay emainingray ameflay
Ithway ablesay ineway; enthay, asyay ethay itesray irectday,
Ethay erohay’say onesbay ithway arefulcay iewvay electsay:
(Apartyay, andyay easyyay otay ebay ownknay eythay ielay
Amidstyay ethay eaphay, andyay obviousyay otay ethay eyeyay:
Ethay estray aroundyay ethay arginmay illway ebay eensay
Omiscuouspray, eedsstay andyay immolatedyay enmay:)
Esethay appwray’day inyay oubleday aulscay ofyay atfay, eparepray;
Andyay inyay ethay oldengay asevay isposeday ithway arecay;
Erethay etlay emthay estray ithway ecentday onourhay aidlay,
Illtay Iyay allshay ollowfay otay ethay infernalyay adeshay.
Eantimemay erectyay ethay ombtay ithway iouspay andshay,
Ayay ommoncay ucturestray onyay ethay umblehay andssay:
Ereafterhay Eecegray omesay oblernay orkway aymay aiseray,
Andyay atelay osteritypay ecordray ouryay aisepray!”

Ethay Eeksgray obeyyay; erewhay etyay ethay embersyay owglay,
Ideway oyay’eryay ethay ilepay ethay ablesay ineway eythay owthray,
Andyay eepday ubsidessay ethay ashyyay eaphay elowbay.
Extnay ethay itewhay onesbay ishay adsay ompanionscay aceplay,
Ithway earstay ollectedcay, inyay ethay oldengay asevay.
Ethay acredsay elicsray otay ethay enttay eythay orebay;
Ethay urnyay ayay eilvay ofyay inenlay overedcay oyay’eryay.
Atthay oneday, eythay idbay ethay epulchresay aspireyay,
Andyay astcay ethay eepday oundationsfay oundray ethay epyray;
Ighhay inyay ethay idstmay eythay eaphay ethay ellingsway edbay
Ofyay isingray earthyay, emorialmay ofyay ethay eadday.

Ethay armingsway opulacepay ethay iefchay etainsday,
Andyay eadslay amidstyay ayay ideway extentyay ofyay ainsplay;
Erethay acedplay emthay oundray: enthay omfray ethay ipsshay oceedspray
Ayay aintray ofyay oxenyay, ulesmay, andyay atelystay eedsstay,
Asesvay andyay ipodstray (orfay ethay uneralfay amesgay),
Esplendentray assbray, andyay oremay esplendentray amesday.
Irstfay oodstay ethay izespray otay ewardray ethay orcefay
Ofyay apidray acersray inyay ethay ustyday oursecay:
Ayay omanway orfay ethay irstfay, inyay eautybay’say oomblay,
Illskay’day inyay ethay eedlenay, andyay ethay abouringlay oomlay;
Andyay ayay argelay asevay, erewhay otway ightbray andleshay iseray,
Ofyay entytway easuresmay itsyay apaciouscay izesay.
Ethay econdsay ictorvay aimsclay ayay aremay unbrokeyay,
Igbay ithway ayay ulemay, unknowingyay ofyay ethay okeyay:
Ethay irdthay, ayay argerchay etyay untouchyay’day byay ameflay;
Ourfay ampleyay easuresmay eldhay ethay iningshay amefray:
Otway oldengay alentstay orfay ethay ourthfay ereway acedplay:
Anyay ampleyay oubleday owlbay ontentscay ethay astlay.
Esethay inyay airfay orderyay angedray uponyay ethay ainplay,
Ethay erohay, isingray, usthay addressyay’day ethay aintray:

“Eholdbay ethay izespray, aliantvay Eeksgray! ecreedday
Otay ethay avebray ulersray ofyay ethay acingray eedstay;
Izespray ichwhay onenay esidebay ourselfyay ouldcay aingay,
Ouldshay ouryay immortalyay ourserscay aketay ethay ainplay;
(Ayay aceray unrivallyay’day, ichwhay omfray oceanyay’say odgay
Eleuspay eceivedray, andyay onyay ishay onsay estowbay’day.)
Utbay isthay onay imetay ouryay igourvay otay isplayday;
Ornay uitsay, ithway emthay, ethay amesgay ofyay isthay adsay ayday:
Ostlay isyay Atrocluspay ownay, atthay ontway otay eckday
Eirthay owingflay anesmay, andyay eekslay eirthay ossyglay ecknay.
Adsay, asyay eythay aredshay inyay umanhay iefgray, eythay andstay,
Andyay ailtray osethay acefulgray onourshay onyay ethay andsay!
Etlay othersyay orfay ethay oblenay asktay eparepray,
Owhay usttray ethay oursercay andyay ethay ingflyay arcay.”

Iredfay atyay ishay ordway ethay ivalray acersray iseray;
Utbay arfay ethay irstfay Eumelusyay opeshay ethay izepray,
Amedfay oughthay Ieriapay orfay ethay eetestflay eedbray,
Andyay illskay’day otay anagemay ethay ighhay-oundingbay eedstay.
Ithway equalyay ardouryay oldbay Idestyday ellsway’day,
Ethay eedsstay ofyay Ostray eneathbay ishay okeyay ompellcay’day
(Ichwhay atelay obeyyay’day ethay Ardanday iefchay’say ommandcay,
Enwhay arcescay ayay odgay edeemray’day imhay omfray ishay andhay).
Enthay Enelausmay ishay Odarguspay ingsbray,
Andyay ethay amedfay oursercay ofyay ethay ingkay ofyay ingskay:
Omwhay ichray Echepolusyay (oremay ichray anthay avebray),
Otay ’apescay ethay arsway, otay Agamemnonyay avegay,
(Eæthay erhay amenay) atyay omehay otay endyay ishay aysday;
Asebay ealthway eferringpray otay eternalyay aisepray.
Extnay imhay Antilochusyay emandsday ethay oursecay
Ithway eatingbay earthay, andyay eerschay ishay Ianpylay orsehay.
Experiencedyay Estornay ivesgay ishay onsay ethay einsray,
Irectsday ishay udgmentjay, andyay ishay eathay estrainsray;
Ornay idlyyay arnsway ethay oaryhay iresay, ornay earshay
Ethay udentpray onsay ithway unattendingyay earsyay.

“Myay onsay! oughthay outhfulyay ardouryay irefay thyay eastbray,
Ethay odsgay avehay ovedlay eethay, andyay ithway artsyay avehay essblay’day;
Eptunenay andyay Ovejay onyay eethay onferrcay’day ethay illskay
Iftsway oundray ethay oalgay otay urntay ethay ingflyay eelwhay.
Otay uidegay thyay onductcay ittlelay eceptpray eedsnay;
Utbay owslay, andyay astpay eirthay igourvay, areyay myay eedsstay.
Earfay otnay thyay ivalsray, oughthay orfay iftnesssway ownknay;
Omparecay osethay ivalsray’ udgmentjay andyay thyay ownyay:
Ityay isyay otnay engthstray, utbay artyay, obtainsyay ethay izepray,
