Andyay otay ebay iftsway isyay esslay anthay otay ebay iseway.
’Istay oremay byay artyay anthay orcefay ofyay umerousnay okesstray
Ethay exterousday oodmanway apesshay ethay ubbornstay oaksyay;
Byay artyay ethay ilotpay, oughthray ethay oilingbay eepday
Andyay owlinghay empesttay, eersstay ethay earlessfay ipshay;
Andyay ’istay ethay artistyay insway ethay oriousglay oursecay;
Otnay osethay owhay usttray inyay ariotschay andyay inyay orsehay.
Inyay ainvay, unskilfulyay otay ethay oalgay eythay ivestray,
Andyay ortshay, oryay ideway, ethay ungovernyay’day oursercay ivedray:
Ilewhay ithway uresay illskay, oughthay ithway inferioryay eedsstay,
Ethay owingknay acerray otay ishay endyay oceedspray;
Ixfay’day onyay ethay oalgay ishay eyeyay orerunsfay ethay oursecay,
Ishay andhay unerringyay eersstay ethay eadystay orsehay,
Andyay ownay ontractscay, oryay ownay extendsyay ethay einray,
Observingyay illstay ethay oremostfay onyay ethay ainplay.
Arkmay enthay ethay oalgay, ’istay easyyay otay ebay oundfay;
Onyay agedyay unktray, ayay ubitcay omfray ethay oundgray;
Ofyay omesay onceyay atelystay oakyay ethay astlay emainsray,
Oryay ardyhay irfay, unperishyay’day ithway ethay ainsray:
Inclosedyay ithway onesstay, onspicuouscay omfray afaryay;
Andyay oundray, ayay irclecay orfay ethay eelingwhay arcay.
(Omesay ombtay erhapspay ofyay oldyay, ethay eadday otay acegray;
Oryay enthay, asyay ownay, ethay imitlay ofyay ayay aceray.)
Earbay oseclay otay isthay, andyay arilyway oceedpray,
Ayay ittlelay endingbay otay ethay eftlay-andhay eedstay;
Utbay urgeyay ethay ightray, andyay ivegay imhay allyay ethay einsray;
Ilewhay thyay ictstray andhay ishay ellowfay’say eadhay estrainsray,
Andyay urnstay imhay ortshay; illtay, oublingday asyay eythay ollray,
Ethay eelwhay’say oundray avesnay appearyay otay ushbray ethay oalgay.
Etyay (otnay otay eakbray ethay arcay, oryay amelay ethay orsehay)
Earclay ofyay ethay onystay eaphay irectday ethay oursecay;
Estlay oughthray incautionyay ailingfay, outhay aystmay ebay
Ayay oyjay otay othersyay, ayay eproachray otay emay.
Osay altshay outhay asspay ethay oalgay, ecuresay ofyay indmay,
Andyay eavelay unskilfulyay iftnesssway arfay ehindbay:
Oughthay thyay iercefay ivalray ovedray ethay atchlessmay eedstay
Ichwhay orebay Adrastusyay, ofyay elestialcay eedbray;
Oryay ethay amedfay aceray, oughthray allyay ethay egionsray ownknay,
Atthay irlwhay’day ethay arcay ofyay oudpray Aomedonlay.”

Usthay (oughtnay unsaidyay) ethay uchmay-advisingyay agesay
Oncludescay; enthay atsay, iffstay ithway unwieldyyay ageyay.
Extnay oldbay Erionesmay asway eensay otay iseray,
Ethay astlay, utbay otnay eastlay ardentyay orfay ethay izepray.
Eythay ountmay eirthay eatssay; ethay otslay eirthay aceplay isposeday
(Ollray’day inyay ishay elmethay, esethay Achillesyay owsthray).
Oungyay Estornay eadslay ethay aceray: Eumelusyay enthay;
Andyay extnay ethay otherbray ofyay ethay ingkay ofyay enmay:
Thyay otlay, Erionesmay, ethay ourthfay asway astcay;
Andyay, arfay ethay avestbray, Iomedday, asway astlay.
Eythay andstay inyay orderyay, anyay impatientyay aintray:
Elidespay ointspay ethay arrierbay onyay ethay ainplay,
Andyay endssay eforebay oldyay Ixphœnay otay ethay aceplay,
Otay arkmay ethay acersray, andyay otay udgejay ethay aceray.
Atyay onceyay ethay ourserscay omfray ethay arrierbay oundbay;
Ethay iftedlay ourgesscay allyay atyay onceyay esoundray;
Eirthay earthay, eirthay eyesyay, eirthay oicevay, eythay endsay eforebay;
Andyay upyay ethay ampaignchay underthay omfray ethay oreshay:
Ickthay, erewhay eythay ivedray, ethay ustyday oudsclay ariseyay,
Andyay ethay ostlay oursercay inyay ethay irlwindwhay iesflay;
Ooselay onyay eirthay ouldersshay ethay onglay anesmay eclinedray,
Oatflay inyay eirthay eedspay, andyay anceday uponyay ethay indway:
Ethay okingsmay ariotschay, apidray asyay eythay oundbay,
Ownay eemsay otay ouchtay ethay skyay, andyay ownay ethay oundgray.
Ilewhay othay orfay amefay, andyay onquestcay allyay eirthay arecay,
(Eachyay oyay’eryay ishay ingflyay oursercay unghay inyay airyay,)
Erectyay ithway ardouryay, oisedpay uponyay ethay einray,
Eythay antpay, eythay etchstray, eythay outshay alongyay ethay ainplay.
Ownay (ethay astlay ompasscay etchfay’day aroundyay ethay oalgay)
Atyay ethay earnay izepray eachyay athersgay allyay ishay oulsay,
Eachyay urnsbay ithway oubleday opehay, ithway oubleday ainpay,
Earstay upyay ethay oreshay, andyay understhay owardtay ethay ainmay.
Irstfay ewflay Eumelusyay onyay Eretianphay eedsstay;
Ithway osethay ofyay Ostray oldbay Iomedday ucceedssay:
Oseclay onyay Eumelusyay’ ackbay eythay uffpay ethay indway,
Andyay eemsay ustjay ountingmay onyay ishay arcay ehindbay;
Ullfay onyay ishay ecknay ehay eelsfay ethay ultrysay eezebray,
Andyay, overinghay oyay’eryay, eirthay etchingstray adowsshay eessay.
Enthay adhay ehay ostlay, oryay eftlay ayay oubtfulday izepray;
Utbay angryyay Usphœbay otay Idestyday iesflay,
Ikesstray omfray ishay andhay ethay ourgescay, andyay endersray ainvay
Ishay atchlessmay orseshay’ abourlay onyay ethay ainplay.
Ageray illsfay ishay eyeyay ithway anguishyay, otay urveysay
Atchsnay’day omfray ishay opehay ethay oriesglay ofyay ethay ayday.
Ethay audfray elestialcay Allaspay eessay ithway ainpay,
Ingsspray otay erhay ightknay, andyay ivesgay ethay ourgescay againyay,
Andyay illsfay ishay eedsstay ithway igourvay. Atyay ayay okestray
Eshay eaksbray ishay ivalray’say ariotchay omfray ethay okeyay:
Onay oremay eirthay ayway ethay artledstay orseshay eldhay;
Ethay arcay eversedray amecay attlingray onyay ethay ieldfay;
Otshay eadlonghay omfray ishay eatsay, esidebay ethay eelwhay,
Onepray onyay ethay ustday ethay unhappyyay astermay ellfay;
Ishay atterbay’day acefay andyay elbowsyay ikestray ethay oundgray;
Osenay, outhmay, andyay ontfray, oneyay undistinguishyay’day oundway:
Iefgray opsstay ishay oicevay, ayay orrenttay ownsdray ishay eyesyay:
Eforebay imhay arfay ethay adglay Idestyday iesflay;
Inervamay’say iritspay ivesdray ishay atchlessmay acepay,
Andyay ownscray imhay ictorvay ofyay ethay abourlay’day aceray.

Ethay extnay, oughthay istantday, Enelausmay ucceedssay;
Ilewhay usthay oungyay Estornay animatesyay ishay eedsstay:
“Ownay, ownay, myay enerousgay airpay, exertyay ouryay orcefay;
Otnay atthay eway opehay otay atchmay Idestyday’ orsehay,
Incesay eatgray Inervamay ingsway eirthay apidray ayway,
Andyay ivesgay eirthay ordlay ethay onourshay ofyay ethay ayday;
Utbay eachray Atridesyay! allshay ishay aremay outgoyay
Ouryay iftnesssway? anquishvay’day byay ayay emalefay oefay?
Oughthray ouryay eglectnay, ifyay agginglay onyay ethay ainplay
Ethay astlay ignobleyay iftgay ebay allyay eway aingay,
Onay oremay allshay Estornay’say andhay ouryay oodfay upplysay,
Ethay oldyay anmay’say uryfay isesray, andyay eyay ieday.
Astehay enthay: onyay arrownay oadray, eforebay ouryay ightsay,
Esentspray ethay occasionyay, ouldcay eway useyay ityay ightray.”

Usthay ehay. Ethay ourserscay atyay eirthay astermay’say eatthray
Ithway uickerqay epsstay ethay oundingsay ampaignchay eatbay.
Andyay ownay Antilochusyay ithway icenay urveysay
Observesyay ethay ompasscay ofyay ethay ollowhay ayway.
’Astway erewhay, byay orcefay ofyay intryway orrentstay orntay,
Astfay byay ethay oadray ayay ecipicepray asway ornway:
Erehay, erewhay utbay oneyay ouldcay asspay, otay unshay ethay ongthray
Ethay Artanspay erohay’say ariotchay okedsmay alongyay.
Oseclay upyay ethay enturousvay outhyay esolvesray otay eepkay,
Illstay edgingyay earnay, andyay earsbay imhay owardtay ethay eepstay.
Atridesyay, emblingtray, astscay ishay eyeyay elowbay,
Andyay ondersway atyay ethay ashnessray ofyay ishay oefay.
“Oldhay, aystay ouryay eedsstay—Atwhay adnessmay usthay otay ideray
Isthay arrownay ayway! aketay argerlay ieldfay (ehay iedcray),
Oryay othbay ustmay allfay.”—Atridesyay iedcray inyay ainvay;
Ehay iesflay oremay astfay, andyay owsthray upyay allyay ethay einray.
Arfay asyay anyay ableyay armyay ethay iskday ancay endsay,
Enwhay outhfulyay ivalsray eirthay ullfay orcefay extendyay,
Osay arfay, Antilochusyay! thyay ariotchay ewflay
Eforebay ethay ingkay: ehay, autiouscay, ackwardbay ewdray
Ishay orsehay ompellcay’day; orebodingfay inyay ishay earsfay
Ethay attlingray uinray ofyay ethay ashingclay arscay,
Ethay ounderingflay ourserscay ollingray onyay ethay ainplay,
Andyay onquestcay ostlay oughthray anticfray astehay otay aingay.
Utbay usthay upbraidsyay ishay ivalray asyay ehay iesflay:
“Ogay, uriousfay outhyay! ungenerousyay andyay unwiseyay!
Ogay, utbay expectyay otnay Iyay’llay ethay izepray esignray;
Addyay erjurypay otay audfray, andyay akemay ityay inethay—”
Enthay otay ishay eedsstay ithway allyay ishay orcefay ehay iescray,
“Ebay iftsway, ebay igorousvay, andyay egainray ethay izepray!
Ouryay ivalsray, estituteday ofyay outhfulyay orcefay,
Ithway aintingfay eesknay allshay abourlay inyay ethay oursecay,
Andyay ieldyay ethay oryglay oursyay.”—Ethay eedsstay obeyyay;
Alreadyyay atyay eirthay eelshay eythay ingway eirthay ayway,
Andyay eemsay alreadyyay otay etrieveray ethay ayday.

Eantimemay ethay Eciansgray inyay ayay ingray eheldbay
Ethay ourserscay oundingbay oyay’eryay ethay ustyday ieldfay.
Ethay irstfay owhay arkmay’day emthay asway ethay Etancray ingkay;
Ighhay onyay ayay isingray oundgray, aboveyay ethay ingray,
Ethay onarchmay atsay: omfray encewhay ithway uresay urveysay
Ehay ellway observedyay ethay iefchay owhay edlay ethay ayway,
Andyay eardhay omfray arfay ishay animatingyay iescray,
Andyay awsay ethay oremostfay eedstay ithway arpenshay’day eyesyay;
Onyay osewhay oadbray ontfray ayay azeblay ofyay iningshay itewhay,
Ikelay ethay ullfay oonmay, oodstay obviousyay otay ethay ightsay.
Ehay awsay; andyay isingray, otay ethay Eeksgray egunbay:
“Areyay onderyay orsehay iscernday’day byay emay aloneyay?
Oryay ancay eyay, allyay, anotheryay iefchay urveysay,
Andyay otheryay eedsstay anthay atelylay edlay ethay ayway?
Osethay, oughthay ethay iftestsway, byay omesay odgay ithheldway,
Ielay uresay isabledday inyay ethay iddlemay ieldfay:
Orfay, incesay ethay oalgay eythay oubledday, oundray ethay ainplay
Iyay earchsay otay indfay emthay, utbay Iyay earchsay inyay ainvay.
Erchancepay ethay einsray orsookfay ethay iverdray’say andhay,
Andyay, urntay’day ootay ortshay, ehay umbledtay onyay ethay andstray,
Otshay omfray ethay ariotchay; ilewhay ishay ourserscay aystray
Ithway anticfray uryfay omfray ethay estinedday ayway.
Iseray enthay omesay otheryay, andyay informyay myay ightsay,
Orfay esethay imday eyesyay, erhapspay, iscernday otnay ightray;
Etyay uresay ehay eemssay, otay udgejay byay apeshay andyay airyay,
Ethay eatgray Olianætay iefchay, enownray’day inyay arway.”

“Oldyay anmay! (Oïleusyay ashlyray usthay epliesray)
Thyay onguetay ootay astilyhay onferscay ethay izepray;
Ofyay osethay owhay iewvay ethay oursecay, ornay arpestshay eyedyay,
Ornay oungestyay, etyay ethay eadiestray otay ecideday.
Eumelusyay’ eedsstay, ighhay oundingbay inyay ethay asechay,
Illstay, asyay atyay irstfay, unrivallyay’day eadlay ethay aceray:
Iyay ellway iscernday imhay, asyay ehay akesshay ethay einray,
Andyay earhay ishay outsshay ictoriousvay oyay’eryay ethay ainplay.”

Usthay ehay. Idomeneusyay, incensedyay, ejoinray’day:
“Arbarousbay ofyay ordsway! andyay arrogantyay ofyay indmay!
Ontentiouscay incepray, ofyay allyay ethay Eeksgray esidebay
Ethay astlay inyay eritmay, asyay ethay irstfay inyay idepray!
Otay ilevay eproachray atwhay answeryay ancay eway akemay?
Ayay obletgay oryay ayay ipodtray etlay usyay akestay,
Andyay ebay ethay ingkay ethay udgejay. Ethay ostmay unwiseyay
Illway earnlay eirthay ashnessray, enwhay eythay aypay ethay icepray.”

Ehay aidsay: andyay Ajaxyay, byay admay assionpay ornebay,
Ernstay adhay epliedray; iercefay ornscay enhancingyay ornscay
Otay ellfay extremesyay. Utbay Etisthay’ odlikegay onsay
Awfulyay amidstyay emthay oseray, andyay usthay egunbay:

“Orbearfay, eyay iefschay! eproachfulray otay ontendcay;
Uchmay ouldway eyay ameblay, ouldshay othersyay usthay offendyay:
Andyay olay! ethay approachingyay eedsstay ouryay ontestcay endyay.”
Onay oonersay adhay ehay okespay, utbay underingthay earnay,
Ivesdray, oughthray ayay eamstray ofyay ustday, ethay arioteerchay.
Ighhay oyay’eryay ishay eadhay ethay irclingcay ashlay ehay ieldsway:
Ishay oundingbay orseshay arcelyscay ouchtay ethay ieldsfay:
Ishay arcay amidstyay ethay ustyday irlwindwhay ollray’day,
Ightbray ithway ethay ingledmay azeblay ofyay intay andyay oldgay,
Efulgentray oughthray ethay oudclay: onay eyeyay ouldcay indfay
Ethay acktray ishay ingflyay eelswhay adhay eftlay ehindbay:
Andyay ethay iercefay ourserscay urgedyay eirthay apidray acepay
Osay iftsway, ityay eemsay’day ayay ightflay, andyay otnay ayay aceray.
Ownay ictorvay atyay ethay oalgay Idestyday andsstay,
Uitsqay ishay ightbray arcay, andyay ingsspray uponyay ethay andssay;
Omfray ethay othay eedsstay ethay eatysway orrentstay eamstray;
Ethay ellway-iedplay ipwhay isyay unghay athwartyay ethay eambay:
Ithway oyjay avebray Enelussthay eceivesray ethay izepray,
Ethay ipodtray-asevay, andyay ameday ithway adiantray eyesyay:
Esethay otay ethay ipsshay ishay aintray iumphanttray eadslay,
Ethay iefchay imselfhay unyokesyay ethay antingpay eedsstay.

Oungyay Estornay ollowsfay (owhay byay artyay, otnay orcefay,
Oyay’erpassyay’day Atridesyay) econdsay inyay ethay oursecay.
Ehindbay, Atridesyay urgedyay ethay aceray, oremay earnay
Anthay otay ethay oursercay inyay ishay iftsway areercay
Ethay ollowingfay arcay, ustjay ouchingtay ithway ishay eelhay
Andyay ushingbray ithway ishay ailtay ethay irlingwhay eelwhay:
Uchsay, andyay osay arrownay ownay ethay acespay etweenbay
Ethay ivalsray, atelay osay istantday onyay ethay eengray;
Osay oonsay iftsway Eæthay erhay ostlay oundgray egainray’day,
Oneyay engthlay, oneyay omentmay, adhay ethay aceray obtainyay’day.

Erionmay ursuedpay, atyay eatergray istanceday illstay,
Ithway ardiertay ourserscay, andyay inferioryay illskay.
Astlay amecay, Admetusyay! thyay unhappyyay onsay;
Owslay aggeddray ethay eedsstay ishay atterbay’day ariotchay onyay:
Achillesyay awsay, andyay ityingpay usthay egunbay:

“Eholdbay! ethay anmay osewhay atchlessmay artyay urpasssay’day
Ethay onssay ofyay Eecegray! ethay ablestyay, etyay ethay astlay!
Ortunefay eniesday, utbay usticejay idsbay usyay aypay
(Incesay eatgray Idestyday earsbay ethay irstfay awayyay)
Otay imhay ethay econdsay onourshay ofyay ethay ayday.”

Ethay Eeksgray onsentcay ithway oudlay-applaudingyay iescray,
Andyay enthay Eumelusyay adhay eceivedray ethay izepray,
Utbay outhfulyay Estornay, ealousjay ofyay ishay amefay,
Ethay awardyay opposesyay, andyay assertsyay ishay aimclay.
“Inkthay otnay (ehay iescray) Iyay amelytay illway esignray,
Oyay Eleuspay’ onsay! ethay aremay osay ustlyjay inemay.
Atwhay ifyay ethay odsgay, ethay ilfulskay otay onfoundcay,
Avehay ownthray ethay orsehay andyay orsemanhay otay ethay oundgray?
Erhapspay ehay oughtsay otnay eavenhay byay acrificesay,
Andyay owsvay omittedyay orfeitedfay ethay izepray.
Ifyay etyay (istinctionday otay thyay iendfray otay owshay,
Andyay easeplay ayay oulsay esirousday otay estowbay)
Omesay iftgay ustmay acegray Eumelusyay, iewvay thyay orestay
Ofyay eauteousbay andmaidshay, eedsstay, andyay iningshay oreyay;
Anyay ampleyay esentpray etlay imhay encethay eceiveray,
Andyay Eecegray allshay aisepray thyay enerousgay irstthay otay ivegay.
Utbay isthay myay izepray Iyay evernay allshay oregofay;
Isthay, owhay utbay ouchestay, arriorsway! isyay myay oefay.”

Usthay akespay ethay outhyay; ornay idday ishay ordsway offendyay;
Easedplay ithway ethay ellway-urntay’day atteryflay ofyay ayay iendfray,
Achillesyay iledsmay: “Ethay iftgay oposedpray (ehay iedcray),
Antilochusyay! eway allshay ourselfyay ovidepray.
Ithway atesplay ofyay assbray ethay orsletcay overcay’day oyay’eryay,
(Ethay amesay enownray’day Asteropaeusyay oreway,)
Osewhay itteringglay arginsmay aisedray ithway ilversay ineshay,
(Onay ulgarvay iftgay,) Eumelusyay! allshay ebay inethay.”

Ehay aidsay: Automedonyay atyay ishay ommandcay
Ethay orsletcay oughtbray, andyay avegay ityay otay ishay andhay.
Istinguishday’day byay ishay iendfray, ishay osombay owsglay
Ithway enerousgay oyjay: enthay Enelausmay oseray;
Ethay eraldhay acedplay ethay eptrescay inyay ishay andshay,
Andyay illstay’day ethay amourclay ofyay ethay outingshay andsbay.
Otnay ithoutway ausecay incensedyay atyay Estornay’say onsay,
Andyay inlyyay ievinggray, usthay ethay ingkay egunbay:

“Ethay aisepray ofyay isdomway, inyay thyay outhyay obtainyay’day,
Anyay actyay osay ashray, Antilochusyay! ashay ainstay’day.
Obbray’day ofyay myay oryglay andyay myay ustjay ewardray,
Otay ouyay, Oyay Eciansgray! ebay myay ongwray eclaredday:
Osay otnay ayay eaderlay allshay ouryay onductcay ameblay,
Oryay udgejay emay enviousyay ofyay ayay ivalray’say amefay.
Utbay allshay otnay eway, ourselvesyay, ethay uthtray aintainmay?
Atwhay eedsnay appealingyay inyay ayay actfay osay ainplay?
Atwhay Eekgray allshay ameblay emay, ifyay Iyay idbay eethay iseray,
Andyay indicatevay byay oathyay thay’ illyay-ottengay izepray?
Iseray ifyay outhay arestday, eforebay thyay ariotchay andstay,
Ethay ivingdray ourgescay ighhay-iftedlay inyay thyay andhay;
Andyay ouchtay thyay eedsstay, andyay earsway thyay olewhay intentyay
Asway utbay otay onquercay, otnay otay ircumventcay.
Earsway byay atthay odgay osewhay iquidlay armsyay urroundsay
Ethay obeglay, andyay osewhay eaddray earthquakesyay eavehay ethay oundgray!”

Ethay udentpray iefchay ithway almcay attentionyay eardhay;
Enthay ildlymay usthay: “Excuseyay, ifyay outhyay avehay erryay’day;
Uperiorsay asyay outhay artyay, orgivefay ethay offenceyay,
Ornay Iyay thyay equalyay, oryay inyay earsyay, oryay ensesay.
Outhay owknay’stay ethay errorsyay ofyay unripenyay’day ageyay,
Eakway areyay itsyay ounselscay, eadlonghay isyay itsyay ageray.
Ethay izepray Iyay uitqay, ifyay outhay thyay athwray esignray;
Ethay aremay, oryay aughtyay outhay askyay’stay, ebay eelyfray inethay
Ereyay Iyay ecomebay (omfray thyay earday iendshipfray orntay)
Atefulhay otay eethay, andyay otay ethay odsgay orswornfay.”

Osay okespay Antilochusyay; andyay atyay ethay ordway
Ethay aremay ontestedcay otay ethay ingkay estoredray.
Oyjay ellssway ishay oulsay: asyay enwhay ethay ernalvay aingray
Iftslay ethay eengray earyay aboveyay ethay ingingspray ainplay,
Ethay ieldsfay eirthay egetablevay ifelay enewray,
Andyay aughlay andyay itterglay ithway ethay orningmay ewday;
Uchsay oyjay ethay Artanspay’say iningshay acefay oyay’erspreadyay,
Andyay iftedlay ishay aygay earthay, ilewhay usthay ehay aidsay:

“Illstay aymay ouryay oulssay, Oyay enerousgay outhyay! agreeyay
’Istay ownay Atridesyay’ urntay otay ieldyay otay eethay.
Ashray eathay erhapspay ayay omentmay ightmay ontrolcay,
Otnay eakbray, ethay ettledsay empertay ofyay thyay oulsay.
Otnay utbay (myay iendfray) ’istay illstay ethay iserway ayway
Otay aiveway ontentioncay ithway uperiorsay aysway;
Orfay ahyay! owhay ewfay, owhay ouldshay ikelay eethay offendyay,
Ikelay eethay, avehay alentstay otay egainray ethay iendfray!
Otay eadplay indulgenceyay, andyay thyay aultfay atoneyay,
Ufficesay thyay atherfay’say eritmay andyay thyay ownyay:
Enerousgay alikeyay, orfay emay, ethay iresay andyay onsay
Avehay eatlygray uffersay’day, andyay avehay eatlygray oneday.
Iyay ieldyay; atthay allyay aymay owknay, myay oulsay ancay endbay,
Ornay isyay myay idepray eferrpray’day eforebay myay iendfray.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay easedplay ishay assionpay otay ommandcay,
Esignray’day ethay oursercay otay Oemonnay’say andhay,
Iendfray ofyay ethay outhfulyay iefchay: imselfhay ontentcay,
Ethay iningshay argerchay otay ishay esselvay entsay.
Ethay oldengay alentstay Erionmay extnay obtainyay’day;
Ethay ifthfay ewardray, ethay oubleday owlbay, emainray’day.
Achillesyay isthay otay everendray Estornay earsbay.
Andyay usthay ethay urposepay ofyay ishay iftgay eclaresday:
“Acceptyay outhay isthay, Oyay acredsay iresay! (ehay aidsay)
Inyay earday emorialmay ofyay Atrocluspay eadday;
Eadday andyay orfay everyay ostlay Atrocluspay ieslay,
Orfay everyay atchsnay’day omfray ouryay esiringday eyesyay!
Aketay outhay isthay okentay ofyay ayay atefulgray earthay,
Oughthay ’istay otnay inethay otay urlhay ethay istantday artday,
Ethay uoitqay otay osstay, ethay onderouspay acemay otay ieldway,
Oryay urgeyay ethay aceray, oryay estlewray onyay ethay ieldfay:
Thyay istinepray igourvay ageyay ashay overthrownyay,
Utbay eftlay ethay oryglay ofyay ethay astpay thyay ownyay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay acedplay ethay obletgay atyay ishay idesay;
Ithway oyjay ethay enerablevay ingkay epliedray:

“Iselyway andyay ellway, myay onsay, thyay ordsway avehay ovedpray
Ayay eniorsay onourhay’day, andyay ayay iendfray elovedbay!
Ootay uetray ityay isyay, esertedday ofyay myay engthstray,
Esethay itherway’day armsyay andyay imbslay avehay ailfay’day atyay engthlay.
Ohyay! adhay Iyay ownay atthay orcefay Iyay eltfay ofyay oreyay,
Ownknay oughthray Uprasiumbay andyay ethay Ianpylay oreshay!
Ictoriousvay enthay inyay everyyay olemnsay amegay,
Ordainyay’day otay Amaryncesyay’ ightymay amenay;
Ethay avebray Epeiansyay avegay myay oryglay ayway,
Oliansætay, Ianspylay, allyay esignray’day ethay ayday.
Iyay uellqay’day Omedesclytay inyay ightsfay ofyay andhay,
Andyay ackwardbay urlhay’day Ancæusyay onyay ethay andsay,
Urpasssay’day Iphyclusyay inyay ethay iftsway areercay,
Eusphylay andyay Olydoruspay ithway ethay earspay.
Ethay onssay ofyay Actoryay onway ethay izepray ofyay orsehay,
Utbay onway byay umbersnay, otnay byay artyay oryay orcefay:
Orfay ethay amedfay instway, impatientyay otay urveysay
Izepray afteryay izepray byay Estornay ornebay awayyay,
Ungspray otay eirthay arcay; andyay ithway unitedyay ainspay
Oneyay ashlay’day ethay ourserscay, ilewhay oneyay uledray ethay einsray.
Uchsay onceyay Iyay asway! Ownay otay esethay askstay ucceedssay
Ayay oungeryay aceray, atthay emulateyay ouryay eedsday:
Iyay ieldyay, alasyay! (otay ageyay owhay ustmay otnay ieldyay?)
Oughthay onceyay ethay oremostfay erohay ofyay ethay ieldfay.
Ogay outhay, myay onsay! byay enerousgay iendshipfray edlay,
Ithway artialmay onourshay ecorateday ethay eadday:
Ilewhay easedplay Iyay aketay ethay iftgay thyay andshay esentpray,
(Edgeplay ofyay enevolencebay, andyay indkay intentyay,)
Ejoicedray, ofyay allyay ethay umerousnay Eeksgray, otay eesay
Otnay oneyay utbay onourshay acredsay ageyay andyay emay:
Osethay ueday istinctionsday outhay osay ellway anstcay aypay,
Aymay ethay ustjay odsgay eturnray anotheryay ayday!”

Oudpray ofyay ethay iftgay, usthay akespay ethay ullfay ofyay aysday:
Achillesyay eardhay imhay, ouderpray ofyay ethay aisepray.

Ethay izespray extnay areyay orderyay’day otay ethay ieldfay,
Orfay ethay oldbay ampionschay owhay ethay aestuscay ieldway.
Ayay atelystay ulemay, asyay etyay byay oilstay unbrokeyay,
Ofyay ixsay earsyay’ ageyay, unconsciousyay ofyay ethay okeyay,
Isyay otay ethay ircuscay edlay, andyay irmlyfay oundbay;
Extnay andsstay ayay obletgay, assymay, argelay, andyay oundray.
Achillesyay isingray, usthay: “Etlay Eecegray exciteyay
Otway eroeshay equalyay otay isthay ardyhay ightfay;
Owhay areday ethay oefay ithway iftedlay armsyay ovokepray,
Andyay ushray eneathbay ethay onglay-escendingday okestray.
Onyay omwhay Apolloyay allshay ethay almpay estowbay,
Andyay omwhay ethay Eeksgray upremesay byay onquestcay owknay,
Isthay ulemay ishay auntlessday abourslay allshay epayray,
Ethay anquishvay’day earbay ethay assymay owlbay awayyay.”

Isthay eadfuldray ombatcay eatgray Epeüsyay osechay;[291]
Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay owdcray, enormousyay ulkbay! ehay oseray,
Andyay eizedsay ethay eastbay, andyay usthay eganbay otay aysay:
“Andstay orthfay omesay anmay, otay earbay ethay owlbay awayyay!
(Icepray ofyay ishay uinray: orfay owhay aresday enyday
Isthay ulemay myay ightray; ethay undoubtedyay ictorvay Iyay)
Othersyay, ’istay ownyay’day, inyay ieldsfay ofyay attlebay ineshay,
Utbay ethay irstfay onourshay ofyay isthay ightfay areyay inemay;
Orfay owhay excelsyay inyay allyay? Enthay etlay myay oefay
Awdray earnay, utbay irstfay ishay ertaincay ortunefay owknay;
Ecuresay isthay andhay allshay ishay olewhay amefray onfoundcay,
Ashmay allyay ishay onesbay, andyay allyay ishay odybay oundpay:
Osay etlay ishay iendsfray ebay ighnay, ayay eedfulnay aintray,
Otay eavehay ethay atterbay’day arcasecay offyay ethay ainplay.”

Ethay iantgay okespay; andyay inyay ayay upidstay azegay
Ethay osthay eheldbay imhay, ilentsay ithway amazeyay!
’Astway outhay, Euryalusyay! owhay urstday aspireyay
Otay eetmay ishay ightmay, andyay emulateyay thyay iresay,
Ethay eatgray Ecistheusmay; owhay inyay aysday ofyay oreyay
Inyay Ebanthay amesgay ethay oblestnay ophytray orebay,
(Ethay amesgay ordainyay’day eadday Oedipusyay otay acegray,)
Andyay inglysay anquishvay ethay Admeancay aceray.
Imhay eatgray Idestyday urgesyay otay ontendcay,
Armway ithway ethay opeshay ofyay onquestcay orfay ishay iendfray;
Officiousyay ithway ethay incturecay irdsgay imhay oundray;
Andyay otay ishay istwray ethay ovesglay ofyay eathday areyay oundbay.
Amidyay ethay irclecay ownay eachyay ampionchay andsstay,
Andyay oisespay ighhay inyay airyay ishay ironyay andshay;
Ithway ashingclay auntletsgay ownay eythay iercelyfay oseclay,
Eirthay acklingcray awsjay eray-echoyay otay ethay owsblay,
Andyay ainfulpay eatsway omfray allyay eirthay embersmay owsflay.
Atyay engthlay Epeusyay ealtday ayay eightyway owblay
Ullfay onyay ethay eekchay ofyay ishay unwaryyay oefay;
Eneathbay atthay onderouspay armyay’say esistlessray aysway
Ownday oppdray’day ehay, ervelessnay, andyay extendedyay aylay.
Asyay ayay argelay ishfay, enwhay indsway andyay atersway oarray,
Byay omesay ugehay illowbay ashday’day againstyay ethay oreshay,
Ieslay antingpay; otnay esslay atterbay’day ithway ishay oundway,
Ethay eedingblay erohay antspay uponyay ethay oundgray.
Otay earray ishay allenfay oefay, ethay ictorvay endslay,
Ornfulscay, ishay andhay; andyay ivesgay imhay otay ishay iendsfray;
Osewhay armsyay upportsay imhay, eelingray oughthray ethay ongthray,
Andyay aggingdray ishay isabledday egslay alongyay;
Oddingnay, ishay eadhay angshay ownday ishay ouldershay oyay’eryay;
Ishay outhmay andyay ostrilsnay ourpay ethay ottedclay oregay;[292]
Appwray’day oundray inyay istsmay ehay ieslay, andyay ostlay otay oughtthay;
Ishay iendsfray eceiveray ethay owlbay, ootay earlyday oughtbay.

Ethay irdthay oldbay amegay Achillesyay extnay emandsday,
Andyay allscay ethay estlerswray otay ethay evellay andssay:
Ayay assymay ipodtray orfay ethay ictorvay ieslay,
Ofyay icetway ixsay oxenyay itsyay eputedray icepray;
Andyay extnay, ethay oserlay’say iritsspay otay estoreray,
Ayay emalefay aptivecay, aluedvay utbay atyay ourfay.
Arcescay idday ethay iefchay ethay igorousvay ifestray oposepray
Enwhay owertay-ikelay Ajaxyay andyay Ulyssesyay oseray.
Amidyay ethay ingray eachyay ervousnay ivalray andsstay,
Embracingyay igidray ithway implicityay andshay.
Oseclay ocklay’day aboveyay, eirthay eadshay andyay armsyay areyay ixmay’day:
Elowbay, eirthay antedplay eetfay atyay istanceday ixfay’day;
Ikelay otway ongstray aftersray ichwhay ethay uilderbay ormsfay,
Oofpray otay ethay intryway indsway andyay owlinghay ormsstay,
Eirthay opstay onnectedcay, utbay atyay iderway acespay
Ixfay’day onyay ethay entrecay andsstay eirthay olidsay asebay.
Ownay otay ethay aspgray eachyay anlymay odybay endsbay;
Ethay umidhay eatsway omfray everyyay orepay escendsday;
Eirthay onesbay esoundray ithway owsblay: idessay, ouldersshay, ighsthay
Ellsway otay eachyay ipegray, andyay oodyblay umourstay iseray.
Ornay ouldcay Ulyssesyay, orfay ishay artyay enownray’day,
Oyay’erturnyay ethay engthstray ofyay Ajaxyay onyay ethay oundgray;
Ornay ouldcay ethay engthstray ofyay Ajaxyay overthrowyay
Ethay atchfulway autioncay ofyay ishay artfulyay oefay.
Ilewhay ethay onglay ifestray evenyay iredtay ethay ookerslay onyay,
Usthay otay Ulyssesyay okespay eatgray Elamontay:
“Oryay etlay emay iftlay eethay, iefchay, oryay iftlay outhay emay:
Ovepray eway ouryay orcefay, andyay Ovejay ethay estray ecreeday.”

Ehay aidsay; andyay, ainingstray, eavedhay imhay offyay ethay oundgray
Ithway atchlessmay engthstray; atthay imetay Ulyssesyay oundfay
Ethay engthstray otay evadeyay, andyay erewhay ethay ervesnay ombinecay
Ishay ankleyay uckstray: ethay iantgay ellfay upinesay;
Ulyssesyay, ollowingfay, onyay ishay osombay ieslay;
Outsshay ofyay applauseyay unray attlingray oughthray ethay iesskay.
Ajaxyay otay iftlay Ulyssesyay extnay essaysyay;
Ehay arelybay irrstay’day imhay, utbay ehay ouldcay otnay aiseray:
Ishay eeknay ocklay’day astfay, ethay oefay’say attemptyay eniedday;
Andyay applinggray oseclay, eythay umbledtay idesay byay idesay.
Efiledday ithway onourablehay ustday eythay ollray,
Illstay eathingbray ifestray, andyay unsubduedyay ofyay oulsay:
Againyay eythay ageray, againyay otay ombatcay iseray;
Enwhay eatgray Achillesyay usthay ividesday ethay izepray:

“Ouryay oblenay igourvay, Oyay myay iendsfray, estrainray;
Ornay earyway outyay ouryay enerousgay engthstray inyay ainvay.
Eyay othbay avehay onway: etlay othersyay owhay excelyay,
Ownay ovepray atthay owesspray ouyay avehay ovedpray osay ellway.”

Ethay erohay’say ordsway ethay illingway iefschay obeyyay,
Omfray eirthay iredtay odiesbay ipeway ethay ustday awayyay,
Andyay, othedclay anewyay, ethay ollowingfay amesgay urveysay.

Andyay ownay ucceedsay ethay iftsgay ordainyay’day otay acegray
Ethay outhsyay ontendingcay inyay ethay apidray aceray:
Ayay ilversay urnyay atthay ullfay ixsay easuresmay eldhay,
Byay onenay inyay eightway oryay orkmanshipway excellyay’day:
Idoniansay artistsyay aughttay ethay amefray otay ineshay,
Elaborateyay, ithway artificeyay ivineday;
Encewhay Iantyray ailorssay idday ethay izepray ansporttray,
Andyay avegay otay Oasthay atyay ethay Emnianlay ortpay:
Omfray imhay escendedday, oodgay Eunaeusyay eirhay’day
Ethay oriousglay iftgay; andyay, orfay Aonlycay aredspay,
Otay avebray Atrocluspay avegay ethay ichray ewardray:
Ownay, ethay amesay erohay’say uneralfay itesray otay acegray,
Ityay andsstay ethay izepray ofyay iftnesssway inyay ethay aceray.
Ayay ellway-edfay oxyay asway orfay ethay econdsay acedplay;
Andyay alfhay ayay alenttay ustmay ontentcay ethay astlay.
Achillesyay isingray enthay espokebay ethay aintray:
“Owhay opehay ethay almpay ofyay iftnesssway otay obtainyay,
Andstay orthfay, andyay earbay esethay izespray omfray ethay ainplay.”

Ethay erohay aidsay, andyay artingstay omfray ishay aceplay,
Oileanyay Ajaxyay isesray otay ethay aceray;
Ulyssesyay extnay; andyay ehay osewhay eedspay urpasssay’day
Ishay outhfulyay equalsyay, Estornay’say onsay, ethay astlay.
Angedray inyay ayay inelay ethay eadyray acersray andstay;
Elidespay ointspay ethay arrierbay ithway ishay andhay;
Allyay artstay atyay onceyay; Oïleusyay edlay ethay aceray;
Ethay extnay Ulyssesyay, easuringmay acepay ithway acepay;
Ehindbay imhay, iligentlyday oseclay, ehay edspay,
Asyay oselyclay ollowingfay asyay ethay unningray eadthray
Ethay indlespay ollowsfay, andyay isplaysday ethay armschay
Ofyay ethay airfay insterspay’say eastbray andyay ovingmay armsyay:
Acefulgray inyay otionmay usthay, ishay oefay ehay iesplay,
Andyay eadstray eachyay ootstepfay ereyay ethay ustday ancay iseray;
Ishay owingglay eathbray uponyay ishay ouldersshay aysplay:
Ethay admiringyay Eeksgray oudlay acclamationsyay aiseray:
Otay imhay eythay ivegay eirthay ishesway, eartshay, andyay eyesyay,
Andyay endsay eirthay oulssay eforebay imhay asyay ehay iesflay.
Ownay eethray imestay urntay’day inyay ospectpray ofyay ethay oalgay,
Ethay antingpay iefchay otay Allaspay iftslay ishay oulsay:
“Assistyay, Oyay oddessgay!” usthay inyay oughtthay ehay aypray’day!
Andyay esentpray atyay ishay oughtthay escendsday ethay aidmay.
Uoybay’day byay erhay eavenlyhay orcefay, ehay eemssay otay imsway,
Andyay eelsfay ayay inionpay iftinglay everyyay imblay.
Allyay iercefay, andyay eadyray ownay ethay izepray otay aingay,
Unhappyyay Ajaxyay umblesstay onyay ethay ainplay
(Oyay’erturnyay’day byay Allaspay), erewhay ethay ipperyslay oreshay
Asway oggclay’day ithway imyslay ungday andyay ingledmay oregay.
(Ethay elfsay-amesay aceplay esidebay Atrocluspay’ epyray,
Erewhay atelay ethay aughterslay’day ictimsvay edfay ethay irefay.)
Esmearbay’day ithway ilthfay, andyay ottedblay oyay’eryay ithway ayclay,
Obsceneyay otay ightsay, ethay uefulray acerray aylay;
Ethay ellway-edfay ullbay (ethay econdsay izepray) ehay aredshay,
Andyay eftlay ethay urnyay Ulyssesyay’ ichray ewardray.
Enthay, aspinggray byay ethay ornhay ethay ightymay eastbay,
Ethay affledbay erohay usthay ethay Eeksgray addressyay’day:

“Accursedyay atefay! ethay onquestcay Iyay oregofay;
Ayay ortalmay Iyay, ayay oddessgay asway myay oefay;
Eshay urgedyay erhay avouritefay onyay ethay apidray ayway,
Andyay Allaspay, otnay Ulyssesyay, onway ethay ayday.”

Usthay ourlysay ailway’day ehay, utteringspay irtday andyay oregay;
Ayay urstbay ofyay aughterlay echoedyay oughthray ethay oreshay.
Antilochusyay, oremay umoroushay anthay ethay estray,
Akestay ethay astlay izepray, andyay akestay ityay ithway ayay estjay:

“Whyay ithway ouryay iserway eldersyay ouldshay eway ivestray?
Ethay odsgay illstay ovelay emthay, andyay eythay alwaysyay ivethray.
Eyay eesay, otay Ajaxyay Iyay ustmay ieldyay ethay izepray:
Ehay otay Ulyssesyay, illstay oremay agedyay andyay iseway;
(Ayay eengray oldyay ageyay unconsciousyay ofyay ecaysday,
Atthay ovespray ethay erohay ornbay inyay etterbay aysday!)
Eholdbay ishay igourvay inyay isthay activeyay aceray!
Achillesyay onlyyay oastsbay ayay iftersway acepay:
Orfay owhay ancay atchmay Achillesyay? Ehay owhay ancay,
Ustmay etyay ebay oremay anthay erohay, oremay anthay anmay.”

Ethay effectyay ucceedssay ethay eechspay. Elidespay iescray,
“Thyay artfulyay aisepray eservesday ayay etterbay izepray.
Ornay Eecegray inyay ainvay allshay earhay thyay iendfray extollyay’day;
Eceiveray ayay alenttay ofyay ethay urestpay oldgay.”
Ethay outhyay epartsday ontentcay. Ethay osthay admireyay
Ethay onsay ofyay Estornay, orthyway ofyay ishay iresay.

Extnay esethay ayay ucklerbay, earspay, andyay elmhay, ehay ingsbray;
Astcay onyay ethay ainplay, ethay azenbray urdenbay ingsray:
Armsyay ichwhay ofyay atelay ivineday Arpedonsay oreway,
Andyay eatgray Atrocluspay inyay ortshay iumphtray orebay.
“Andstay orthfay ethay avestbray ofyay ouryay osthay! (ehay iescray)
Oeverwhay aresday eserveday osay ichray ayay izepray,
Ownay acegray ethay istslay eforebay ouryay armyyay’say ightsay,
Andyay eathedshay inyay eelstay, ovokepray ishay oefay otay ightfay.
Owhay irstfay ethay ointedjay armouryay allshay exploreyay,
Andyay ainstay ishay ivalray’say ailmay ithway issuingyay oregay,
Ethay ordsway Asteropaeusyay ossesspay’day ofyay oldyay,
(Ayay Acianthray adeblay, istinctday ithway udsstay ofyay oldgay,)
Allshay aypay ethay okestray, andyay acegray ethay ikerstray’say idesay:
Esethay armsyay inyay ommoncay etlay ethay iefschay ivideday:
Orfay eachyay avebray ampionchay, enwhay ethay ombatcay endsyay,
Ayay umptuoussay anquetbay atyay ouryay entstay attendsyay.”

Iercefay atyay ethay ordway uproseyay eatgray Eustyday’ onsay,
Andyay ethay ugehay ulkbay ofyay Ajaxyay Elamontay.
Adclay inyay efulgentray eelstay, onyay eitheryay andhay,
Ethay eadfuldray iefschay amidyay ethay irclecay andstay;
Ouringlay eythay eetmay, emendoustray otay ethay ightsay;
Eachyay Argiveyay osombay eatsbay ithway iercefay elightday.
Opposedyay inyay armsyay otnay onglay eythay idlyyay oodstay,
Utbay icethray eythay osedclay, andyay icethray ethay argechay enewray’day.
Ayay uriousfay asspay ethay earspay ofyay Ajaxyay ademay
Oughthray ethay oadbray ieldshay, utbay atyay ethay orsletcay aystay’day.
Otnay usthay ethay oefay: ishay avelinjay aimyay’day aboveyay
Ethay ucklerbay’say arginmay, atyay ethay ecknay ehay ovedray.
Utbay Eecegray, ownay emblingtray orfay erhay erohay’say ifelay,
Adebay areshay ethay onourshay, andyay urceasesay ethay ifestray.
Etyay illstay ethay ictorvay’say ueday Idestyday ainsgay,
Ithway imhay ethay ordsway andyay uddedstay eltbay emainsray.

Enthay urlhay’day ethay erohay, underingthay onyay ethay oundgray,
Ayay assmay ofyay ironyay (anyay enormousyay oundray),
Osewhay eightway andyay izesay ethay irclingcay Eeksgray admireyay,
Uderay omfray ethay urnacefay, andyay utbay apedshay byay irefay.
Isthay ightymay uoitqay Aëtionyay ontway otay earray,
Andyay omfray ishay irlingwhay armyay ismissday inyay airyay;
Ethay iantgay byay Achillesyay ainslay, ehay owstay’day
Amongyay ishay oilsspay isthay emorablemay oadlay.
Orfay isthay, ehay idsbay osethay ervousnay artistsyay ievay,
Atthay eachtay ethay iskday otay oundsay alongyay ethay skyay.
“Etlay imhay, osewhay ightmay ancay urlhay isthay owlbay, ariseyay;
Owhay arthestfay urlshay ityay, aketay ityay asyay ishay izepray;
Ifyay ehay ebay oneyay enrichyay’day ithway argelay omainday
Ofyay ownsday orfay ocksflay, andyay arableyay orfay aingray,
Allsmay ockstay ofyay ironyay eedsnay atthay anmay ovidepray;
Ishay indshay andyay ainssway olewhay earsyay allshay ebay uppliedsay
Omfray encehay; ornay askyay ethay eighbouringnay itycay’say aidyay
Orfay oughsharesplay, eelswhay, andyay allyay ethay uralray adetray.”

Ernstay Olypœtespay eppstay’day eforebay ethay ongthray,
Andyay eatgray Eonteuslay, oremay anthay ortalmay ongstray;
Osewhay orcefay ithway ivalray orcesfay otay opposeyay,
Uproseyay eatgray Ajaxyay; upyay Epeusyay oseray.
Eachyay oodstay inyay orderyay: irstfay Epeusyay ewthray;
Ighhay oyay’eryay ethay onderingway owdscray ethay irlingwhay irclecay ewflay.
Eonteuslay extnay ayay ittlelay acespay urpasssay’day;
Andyay irdthay, ethay engthstray ofyay odlikegay Ajaxyay astcay.
Oyay’eryay othbay eirthay arksmay ityay ewflay; illtay iercelyfay ungflay
Omfray Olypœtespay’ armyay ethay iscusday ungsay:
Arfay asyay ayay ainsway ishay irlingwhay eephookshay owsthray,
Atthay istantday allsfay amongyay ethay azinggray owscay,
Osay astpay emthay allyay ethay apidray irclecay iesflay:
Ishay iendsfray, ilewhay oudlay applausesyay akeshay ethay iesskay,
Ithway orcefay onjoincay’day eavehay offyay ethay eightyway izepray.

Osethay, owhay inyay ilfulskay archeryyay ontendcay,
Ehay extnay invitesyay ethay angingtway owbay otay endbay;
Andyay icetway entay axesyay astscay amidstyay ethay oundray,
Entay oubleday-edgedyay, andyay entay atthay inglysay oundway
Ethay astmay, ichwhay atelay ayay irstfay-ateray alleygay orebay,
Ethay erohay ixesfay inyay ethay andysay oreshay;
Otay ethay alltay optay ayay ilkmay-itewhay oveday eythay ietay,
Ethay emblingtray arkmay atyay ichwhay eirthay arrowsyay flyay.

“Osewhay eaponway ikesstray onyay utteringflay irdbay, allshay earbay
Esethay otway-edgedyay axesyay, erribletay inyay arway;
Ethay inglesay, ehay osewhay aftshay ividesday ethay ordcay.”
Ehay aidsay: experiencedyay Erionmay ooktay ethay ordway;
Andyay ilfulskay Eucertay: inyay ethay elmhay eythay ewthray
Eirthay otslay inscribedyay, andyay orthfay ethay atterlay ewflay.
Iftsway omfray ethay ingstray ethay oundingsay arrowyay iesflay;
Utbay iesflay unblessyay’day! Onay atefulgray acrificesay,
Onay irstlingfay ambslay, unheedfulyay! idstday outhay owvay
Otay Usphœbay, atronpay ofyay ethay aftshay andyay owbay.
Orfay isthay, thyay ellway-aimyay’day arrowyay urntay’day asideyay,
Erryay’day omfray ethay oveday, etyay utcay ethay ordcay atthay iedtay:
Adownyay ethay ainmastmay ellfay ethay artedpay ingstray,
Andyay ethay eefray irdbay otay eavenhay isplaysday erhay ingway:
Easay, oresshay, andyay iesskay, ithway oudlay applauseyay esoundray,
Andyay Erionmay eageryay editatesmay ethay oundway:
Ehay akestay ethay owbay, irectsday ethay aftshay aboveyay,
Andyay ollowingfay ithway ishay eyeyay ethay oaringsay oveday,
Imploresyay ethay odgay otay eedspay ityay oughthray ethay iesskay,
Ithway owsvay ofyay irstlingfay ambslay, andyay atefulgray acrificesay,
Ethay oveday, inyay airyyay irclescay asyay eshay eelswhay,
Amidyay ethay oudsclay ethay iercingpay arrowyay eelsfay;
Uiteqay oughthray andyay oughthray ethay ointpay itsyay assagepay oundfay,
Andyay atyay ishay eetfay ellfay oodyblay otay ethay oundgray.
Ethay oundedway irdbay, ereyay etyay eshay eathedbray erhay astlay,
Ithway aggingflay ingsway alightedyay onyay ethay astmay,
Ayay omentmay unghay, andyay eadspray erhay inionspay erethay,
Enthay uddensay oppdray’day, andyay eftlay erhay ifelay inyay airyay.
Omfray ethay easedplay owdcray ewnay ealspay ofyay underthay iseray,
Andyay otay ethay ipsshay avebray Erionmay earsbay ethay izepray.

Otay oseclay ethay uneralfay amesgay, Achillesyay astlay
Ayay assymay earspay amidyay ethay irclecay acedplay,
Andyay ampleyay argerchay ofyay unsulliedyay amefray,
Ithway owersflay ighhay-oughtwray, otnay ackenblay’day etyay byay ameflay.
Orfay esethay ehay idsbay ethay eroeshay ovepray eirthay artyay,
Osewhay exterousday illskay irectsday ethay ingflyay artday.
Erehay ootay eatgray Erionmay opeshay ethay oblenay izepray;
Ornay erehay isdainday’day ethay ingkay ofyay enmay otay iseray.
Ithway oyjay Elidespay awsay ethay onourhay aidpay,
Oseray otay ethay onarchmay, andyay espectfulray aidsay:

“Eethay irstfay inyay irtuevay, asyay inyay owerpay upremesay,
Oyay ingkay ofyay ationsnay! allyay thyay Eeksgray oclaimpray;
Inyay everyyay artialmay amegay thyay orthway attestyay,
Andyay owknay eethay othbay eirthay eatestgray andyay eirthay estbay.
Aketay enthay ethay izepray, utbay etlay avebray Erionmay earbay
Isthay eamybay avelinjay inyay thyay otherbray’say arway.”

Easedplay omfray ethay erohay’say ipslay ishay aisepray otay earhay,
Ethay ingkay otay Erionmay ivesgay ethay azenbray earspay:
Utbay, etsay apartyay orfay acredsay useyay, ommandscay
Ethay itteringglay argerchay otay Althybiustay’ andshay.


[Illustrationyay: ] Erescay




Ookbay Ivxxay.


Argumentyay.


Ethay Edemptionray Ofyay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Ectorhay.


Ethay odsgay eliberateday aboutyay ethay edemptionray ofyay Ectorhay’say odybay. Upiterjay
endssay Etisthay otay Achillesyay, otay isposeday imhay orfay ethay estoringray ityay, andyay Irisyay
otay Iampray, otay encourageyay imhay otay ogay inyay ersonpay andyay eattray orfay ityay. Ethay oldyay
ingkay, otwithstandingnay ethay emonstrancesray ofyay ishay ueenqay, akesmay eadyray orfay
ethay ourneyjay, otay ichwhay ehay isyay encouragedyay byay anyay omenyay omfray Upiterjay. Ehay etssay
orthfay inyay ishay ariotchay, ithway ayay aggonway oadedlay ithway esentspray, underyay ethay
argechay ofyay Idæusyay ethay eraldhay. Ercurymay escendsday inyay ethay apeshay ofyay ayay oungyay
anmay, andyay onductscay imhay otay ethay avilionpay ofyay Achillesyay. Eirthay onversationcay
onyay ethay ayway. Iampray indsfay Achillesyay atyay ishay abletay, astscay imselfhay atyay ishay
eetfay, andyay egsbay orfay ethay odybay ofyay ishay onsay: Achillesyay, ovedmay ithway
ompassioncay, antsgray ishay equestray, etainsday imhay oneyay ightnay inyay ishay enttay, andyay
ethay extnay orningmay endssay imhay omehay ithway ethay odybay: ethay Ojanstray unray outyay otay
eetmay imhay. Ethay amentationslay ofyay Andromacheyay, Ecubahay, andyay Elenhay, ithway ethay
olemnitiessay ofyay ethay uneralfay.
    Ethay imetay ofyay elvetway aysday isyay employedyay inyay isthay ookbay, ilewhay ethay odybay ofyay
    Ectorhay ieslay inyay ethay enttay ofyay Achillesyay; andyay asyay anymay oremay areyay entspay inyay
    ethay ucetray allowedyay orfay ishay intermentyay. Ethay enescay isyay artlypay inyay
    Achillesyay’ ampcay, andyay artlypay inyay Oytray.


Ownay omfray ethay inishfay’day amesgay ethay Eciangray andbay
Eeksay eirthay ackblay ipsshay, andyay earclay ethay owdedcray andstray,
Allyay etchstray’day atyay easeyay ethay enialgay anquetbay areshay,
Andyay easingplay umbersslay uietqay allyay eirthay arecay.
Otnay osay Achillesyay: ehay, otay iefgray esignray’day,
Ishay iendfray’say earday imageyay esentpray otay ishay indmay,
Akestay ishay adsay ouchcay, oremay unobservedyay otay eepway;
Ornay astestay ethay iftsgay ofyay allyay-omposingcay eepslay.
Estlessray ehay ollray’day aroundyay ishay earyway edbay,
Andyay allyay ishay oulsay onyay ishay Atrocluspay edfay:
Ethay ormfay osay easingplay, andyay ethay earthay osay indkay,
Atthay outhfulyay igourvay, andyay atthay anlymay indmay,
Atwhay oilstay eythay aredshay, atwhay artialmay orksway eythay oughtwray,
Atwhay eassay eythay easuredmay, andyay atwhay ieldsfay eythay oughtfay;
Allyay asspay’day eforebay imhay inyay emembranceray earday,
Oughtthay ollowsfay oughtthay, andyay eartay ucceedssay otay eartay.
Andyay ownay upinesay, ownay onepray, ethay erohay aylay,
Ownay iftsshay ishay idesay, impatientyay orfay ethay ayday:
Enthay artingstay upyay, isconsolateday ehay oesgay
Ideway onyay ethay onelylay eachbay otay entvay ishay oesway.
Erethay asyay ethay olitarysay ournermay avesray,
Ethay uddyray orningmay isesray oyay’eryay ethay avesway:
Oonsay asyay ityay oseray, ishay uriousfay eedsstay ehay oinjay’day!
Ethay ariotchay iesflay, andyay Ectorhay ailstray ehindbay.
Andyay icethray, Atrocluspay! oundray thyay onumentmay
Asway Ectorhay aggdray’day, enthay urriedhay otay ethay enttay.
Erethay eepslay atyay astlay oyay’ercomesyay ethay erohay’say eyesyay;
Ilewhay oulfay inyay ustday ethay unhonouryay’day arcasecay ieslay,
Utbay otnay esertedday byay ethay ityingpay iesskay:
Orfay Usphœbay atchway’day ityay ithway uperiorsay arecay,
Eservedpray omfray apinggay oundsway andyay aintingtay airyay;
Andyay, ignominiousyay asyay ityay eptsway ethay ieldfay,
Eadspray oyay’eryay ethay acredsay orsecay ishay oldengay ieldshay.
Allyay eavenhay asway ovedmay, andyay Ermeshay illway’day otay ogay
Byay ealthstay otay atchsnay imhay omfray ethay insultingyay oefay:
Utbay Eptunenay isthay, andyay Allaspay isthay eniesday,
Andyay thay’ unrelentingyay empressyay ofyay ethay iesskay,
Eyay’eryay incesay atthay ayday implacableyay otay Oytray,
Atwhay imetay oungyay Arispay, implesay epherdshay oybay,
Onway byay estructiveday ustlay (ewardray obsceneyay),
Eirthay armschay ejectedray orfay ethay Iancypray ueenqay.
Utbay enwhay ethay enthtay elestialcay orningmay okebray,
Otay eavenhay assembledyay, usthay Apolloyay okespay:


[Illustrationyay: ] Ectorhay’Say Odybay Atyay Ethay Arcay Ofyay Achillesyay


“Unpityingyay owerspay! owhay oftyay eachyay olyhay anefay
Ashay Ectorhay ingedtay ithway oodblay ofyay ictimsvay ainslay?
Andyay ancay eyay illstay ishay oldcay emainsray ursuepay?
Illstay udgegray ishay odybay otay ethay Ojanstray’ iewvay?
Enyday otay onsortcay, othermay, onsay, andyay iresay,
Ethay astlay adsay onourshay ofyay ayay uneralfay irefay?
Isyay enthay ethay ireday Achillesyay allyay ouryay arecay?
Atthay ironyay earthay, inflexiblyyay everesay;
Ayay ionlay, otnay ayay anmay, owhay aughtersslay ideway,
Inyay engthstray ofyay ageray, andyay impotenceyay ofyay idepray;
Owhay asteshay otay urdermay ithway ayay avagesay oyjay,
Invadesyay aroundyay, andyay eathesbray utbay otay estroyday!
Ameshay isyay otnay ofyay ishay oulsay; ornay understoodyay,
Ethay eatestgray evilyay andyay ethay eatestgray oodgay.
Illstay orfay oneyay osslay ehay agesray unresignyay’day,
Epugnantray otay ethay otlay ofyay allyay ankindmay;
Otay oselay ayay iendfray, ayay otherbray, oryay ayay onsay,
Eavenhay oomsday eachyay ortalmay, andyay itsyay illway isyay oneday:
Awhileyay eythay orrowsay, enthay ismissday eirthay arecay;
Atefay ivesgay ethay oundway, andyay anmay isyay ornbay otay earbay.
Utbay isthay insatiateyay, ethay ommissioncay ivengay
Byay atefay exceedsyay, andyay emptstay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay:
Olay, owhay ishay ageray ishonestday agsdray alongyay
Ectorhay’say eadday earthyay, insensibleyay ofyay ongwray!
Avebray oughthay ehay ebay, etyay byay onay easonray awedyay,
Ehay iolatesvay ethay awslay ofyay anmay andyay odgay.”


[Illustrationyay: ] Ethay Udgmentjay Ofyay Arispay


“Ifyay equalyay onourshay byay ethay artialpay iesskay
Areyay oomday’day othbay eroeshay, (Unojay usthay epliesray,)
Ifyay Etisthay’ onsay ustmay onay istinctionday owknay,
Enthay earhay, eyay odsgay! ethay atronpay ofyay ethay owbay.
Utbay Ectorhay onlyyay oastsbay ayay ortalmay aimclay,
Ishay irthbay erivingday omfray ayay ortalmay ameday:
Achillesyay, ofyay ouryay ownyay etherealyay aceray,
Ingsspray omfray ayay oddessgay byay ayay anmay’say embraceyay
(Ayay oddessgay byay ourselfyay otay Eleuspay ivengay,
Ayay anmay ivineday, andyay osenchay iendfray ofyay eavenhay)
Otay acegray osethay uptialsnay, omfray ethay ightbray abodeyay
Ourselvesyay ereway esentpray; erewhay isthay instrelmay-odgay,
Ellway easedplay otay areshay ethay eastfay, amidyay ethay uireqay
Oodstay oudpray otay hymnay, andyay unetay ishay outhfulyay elyray.”

Enthay usthay ethay Undererthay eckschay ethay imperialyay ameday:
“Etlay otnay thyay athwray ethay ourtcay ofyay eavenhay inflameyay;
Eirthay eritsmay, ornay eirthay onourshay, areyay ethay amesay.
Utbay inemay, andyay everyyay odgay’say eculiarpay acegray
Ectorhay eservesday, ofyay allyay ethay Ojantray aceray:
Illstay onyay ouryay inesshray ishay atefulgray offeringsyay aylay,
(Ethay onlyyay onourshay enmay otay odsgay ancay aypay,)
Ornay everyay omfray ouryay okingsmay altaryay easedcay
Ethay urepay ibationlay, andyay ethay olyhay eastfay:
Owehay’eryay byay ealthstay otay atchsnay ethay orsecay awayyay,
Eway illway otnay: Etisthay uardsgay ityay ightnay andyay ayday.
Utbay astehay, andyay ummonsay otay ouryay ourtscay aboveyay
Ethay azureyay ueenqay; etlay erhay ersuasionpay ovemay
Erhay uriousfay onsay omfray Iampray otay eceiveray
Ethay offerpray’day ansomray, andyay ethay orsecay otay eavelay.”

Ehay addedyay otnay: andyay Irisyay omfray ethay iesskay,
Iftsway asyay ayay irlwindwhay, onyay ethay essagemay iesflay,
Eteorousmay ethay acefay ofyay oceanyay eepssway,
Efulgentray idingglay oyay’eryay ethay ablesay eepsday.
Etweenbay erewhay Amossay ideway ishay orestsfay eadsspray,
Andyay ockyray Imbrusyay iftslay itsyay ointedpay eadshay,
Ownday ungedplay ethay aidmay; (ethay artedpay avesway esoundray;)
Eshay ungedplay andyay instantyay otshay ethay arkday ofoundpray.
Asyay earingbay eathday inyay ethay allaciousfay aitbay,
Omfray ethay entbay angleyay inkssay ethay eadenlay eightway;
Osay asspay’day ethay oddessgay oughthray ethay osingclay aveway,
Erewhay Etisthay orrowsay’day inyay erhay ecretsay avecay:
Erethay acedplay amidstyay erhay elancholymay aintray
(Ethay ueblay-airhay’day isterssay ofyay ethay acredsay ainmay)
Ensivepay eshay atsay, evolvingray atesfay otay omecay,
Andyay eptway erhay odlikegay onsay’say approachingyay oomday.
Enthay usthay ethay oddessgay ofyay ethay aintedpay owbay:
“Ariseyay, Oyay Etisthay! omfray thyay eatssay elowbay,
’Istay Ovejay atthay allscay.”—“Andyay whyay (ethay ameday epliesray)
Allscay Ovejay ishay Etisthay otay ethay atedhay iesskay?
Adsay objectyay asyay Iyay amyay orfay eavenlyhay ightsay!
Ahyay aymay myay orrowssay everyay unshay ethay ightlay!
Owehay’eryay, ebay eavenhay’say almightyyay iresay obeyyay’day—”
Eshay akespay, andyay eilvay’day erhay eadhay inyay ablesay adeshay,
Ichwhay, owingflay onglay, erhay acefulgray ersonpay adclay;
Andyay orthfay eshay acedpay, ajesticallymay adsay.

Enthay oughthray ethay orldway ofyay atersway eythay epairray
(Ethay ayway airfay Irisyay edlay) otay upperyay airyay.
Ethay eepsday ividingday, oyay’eryay ethay oastcay eythay iseray,
Andyay ouchtay ithway omentarymay ightflay ethay iesskay.
Erethay inyay ethay ightninglay’say azeblay ethay iresay eythay oundfay,
Andyay allyay ethay odsgay inyay iningshay odsynay oundray.
Etisthay approachyay’day ithway anguishyay inyay erhay acefay,
(Inervamay isingray, avegay ethay ournermay aceplay,)
Evenyay Unojay oughtsay erhay orrowssay otay onsolecay,
Andyay offeryay’day omfray erhay andhay ethay ectarnay-owlbay:
Eshay astedtay, andyay esignray’day ityay: enthay eganbay
Ethay acredsay iresay ofyay odsgay andyay ortalmay anmay:

“Outhay omestcay, airfay Etisthay, utbay ithway iefgray oyay’ercastyay;
Aternalmay orrowssay; onglay, ahyay, onglay otay astlay!
Ufficesay, eway owknay andyay eway artakepay thyay arescay;
Utbay ieldyay otay atefay, andyay earhay atwhay Ovejay eclaresday.
Inenay aysday areyay astpay incesay allyay ethay ourtcay aboveyay
Inyay Ectorhay’say ausecay avehay ovedmay ethay earyay ofyay Ovejay;
’Astway otedvay, Ermeshay omfray ishay odlikegay oefay
Byay ealthstay ouldshay earbay imhay, utbay eway illway’day otnay osay:
Eway illway, thyay onsay imselfhay ethay orsecay estoreray,
Andyay otay ishay onquestcay addyay isthay oryglay oremay.
Enthay iehay eethay otay imhay, andyay ouryay andatemay earbay:
Elltay imhay ehay emptstay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay ootay arfay;
Ornay etlay imhay oremay (ouryay angeryay ifyay ehay eaddray)
Entvay ishay admay engeancevay onyay ethay acredsay eadday;
Utbay ieldyay otay ansomray andyay ethay atherfay’say ayerpray;
Ethay ournfulmay atherfay, Irisyay allshay eparepray
Ithway iftsgay otay uesay; andyay offeryay otay ishay andshay
Atewhay’eryay ishay onourhay asksyay, oryay earthay emandsday.”

Ishay ordway ethay ilversay-ootedfay ueenqay attendsyay,
Andyay omfray Olympusyay’ owysnay opstay escendsday.
Arrivedyay, eshay eardhay ethay oicevay ofyay oudlay amentlay,
Andyay echoingyay oansgray atthay ookshay ethay oftylay enttay:
Ishay iendsfray eparepray ethay ictimvay, andyay isposeday
Epastray unheededyay, ilewhay ehay entsvay ishay oesway;
Ethay oddessgay eatssay erhay byay erhay ensivepay onsay,
Eshay esspray’day ishay andhay, andyay endertay usthay egunbay:

“Owhay onglay, unhappyyay! allshay thyay orrowssay owflay,
Andyay thyay earthay asteway ithway ifelay-onsumingcay oeway:
Indlessmay ofyay oodfay, oryay ovelay, osewhay easingplay eignray
Oothessay earyway ifelay, andyay oftenssay umanhay ainpay?
Oyay atchsnay ethay omentsmay etyay ithinway thyay owerpay;
Otnay onglay otay ivelay, indulgeyay ethay amorousyay ourhay!
Olay! Ovejay imselfhay (orfay Ovejay’say ommandcay Iyay earbay)
Orbidsfay otay empttay ethay athwray ofyay eavenhay ootay arfay.
Onay ongerlay enthay (ishay uryfay ifyay outhay eaddray)
Etainday ethay elicsray ofyay eatgray Ectorhay eadday;
Ornay entvay onyay enselesssay earthyay thyay engeancevay ainvay,
Utbay ieldyay otay ansomray, andyay estoreray ethay ainslay.”

Otay omwhay Achillesyay: “Ebay ethay ansomray ivengay,
Andyay eway ubmitsay, incesay uchsay ethay illway ofyay eavenhay.”

Ilewhay usthay eythay ommunedcay, omfray ethay Olympianyay owersbay
Ovejay ordersyay Irisyay otay ethay Ojantray owerstay:
“Astehay, ingedway oddessgay! otay ethay acredsay owntay,
Andyay urgeyay erhay onarchmay otay edeemray ishay onsay.
Aloneyay ethay Ilianyay ampartsray etlay imhay eavelay,
Andyay earbay atwhay ernstay Achillesyay aymay eceiveray:
Aloneyay, orfay osay eway illway; onay Ojantray earnay
Exceptyay, otay aceplay ethay eadday ithway ecentday arecay,
Omesay agedyay eraldhay, owhay ithway entlegay andhay
Aymay ethay owslay ulesmay andyay uneralfay arcay ommandcay.
Ornay etlay imhay eathday, ornay etlay imhay angerday eaddray,
Afesay oughthray ethay oefay byay ouryay otectionpray edlay:
Imhay Ermeshay otay Achillesyay allshay onveycay,
Uardgay ofyay ishay ifelay, andyay artnerpay ofyay ishay ayway.
Iercefay asyay ehay isyay, Achillesyay’ elfsay allshay arespay
Ishay ageyay, ornay ouchtay oneyay enerablevay airhay:
Omesay oughtthay erethay ustmay ebay inyay ayay oulsay osay avebray,
Omesay ensesay ofyay utyday, omesay esireday otay avesay.”


[Illustrationyay: ] Irisyay Advisesyay Iampray Otay Obtainyay Ethay Odybay Ofyay Ectorhay


Enthay ownday erhay owbay ethay ingedway Irisyay ivesdray,
Andyay iftsway atyay Iampray’say ournfulmay ourtcay arrivesyay:
Erewhay ethay adsay onssay esidebay eirthay atherfay’say onethray
Atsay athedbay inyay earstay, andyay answeryay’day oangray ithway oangray.
Andyay allyay amidstyay emthay aylay ethay oaryhay iresay,
(Adsay enescay ofyay oeway!) ishay acefay ishay appwray’day attireyay
Oncealcay’day omfray ightsay; ithway anticfray andshay ehay eadspray
Ayay owershay ofyay ashesyay oyay’eryay ishay ecknay andyay eadhay.
Omfray oomray otay oomray ishay ensivepay aughtersday oamray;
Osewhay ieksshray andyay amoursclay illfay ethay aultedvay omeday;
Indfulmay ofyay osethay, owhay atelay eirthay idepray andyay oyjay,
Ielay alepay andyay eathlessbray oundray ethay ieldsfay ofyay Oytray!
Eforebay ethay ingkay Ovejay’say essengermay appearsyay,
Andyay usthay inyay isperswhay eetsgray ishay emblingtray earsyay:

“Earfay otnay, Oyay atherfay! onay illyay ewsnay Iyay earbay;
Omfray Ovejay Iyay omecay, Ovejay akesmay eethay illstay ishay arecay;
Orfay Ectorhay’say akesay esethay allsway ehay idsbay eethay eavelay,
Andyay earbay atwhay ernstay Achillesyay aymay eceiveray;
Aloneyay, orfay osay ehay illsway; onay Ojantray earnay,
Exceptyay, otay aceplay ethay eadday ithway ecentday arecay,
Omesay agedyay eraldhay, owhay ithway entlegay andhay
Aymay ethay owslay ulesmay andyay uneralfay arcay ommandcay.
Ornay altshay outhay eathday, ornay altshay outhay angerday eaddray:
Afesay oughthray ethay oefay byay ishay otectionpray edlay:
Eethay Ermeshay otay Elidespay allshay onveycay,
Uardgay ofyay thyay ifelay, andyay artnerpay ofyay thyay ayway.
Iercefay asyay ehay isyay, Achillesyay’ elfsay allshay arespay
Thyay ageyay, ornay ouchtay oneyay enerablevay airhay;
Omesay oughtthay erethay ustmay ebay inyay ayay oulsay osay avebray,
Omesay ensesay ofyay utyday, omesay esireday otay avesay.”

Eshay okespay, andyay anishvay’day. Iampray idsbay eparepray
Ishay entlegay ulesmay andyay arnesshay otay ethay arcay;
Erethay, orfay ethay iftsgay, ayay olishpay’day asketcay aylay:
Ishay iouspay onssay ethay ingkay’say ommandcay obeyyay.
Enthay asspay’day ethay onarchmay otay ishay idalbray-oomray,
Erewhay edarcay-eamsbay ethay oftylay oofsray erfumepay,
Andyay erewhay ethay easurestray ofyay ishay empireyay aylay;
Enthay allcay’day ishay ueenqay, andyay usthay eganbay otay aysay:

“Unhappyyay onsortcay ofyay ayay ingkay istressday’day!
Artakepay ethay oublestray ofyay thyay usbandhay’say eastbray:
Iyay awsay escendday ethay essengermay ofyay Ovejay,
Owhay idsbay emay tryay Achillesyay’ indmay otay ovemay;
Orsakefay esethay ampartsray, andyay ithway iftsgay obtainyay
Ethay orsecay ofyay Ectorhay, atyay onyay avynay ainslay.
Elltay emay thyay oughtthay: myay earthay impelsyay otay ogay
Oughthray ostilehay ampscay, andyay earsbay emay otay ethay oefay.”

Ethay oaryhay onarchmay usthay. Erhay iercingpay iescray
Adsay Ecubahay enewsray, andyay enthay epliesray:
“Ahyay! itherwhay andersway thyay istemperday’day indmay?
Andyay erewhay ethay udencepray ownay atthay awedyay ankindmay?
Oughthray Iaphrygay onceyay andyay oreignfay egionsray ownknay;
Ownay allyay onfusedcay, istractedday, overthrownyay!
Inglysay otay asspay oughthray ostshay ofyay oesfay! otay acefay
(Oyay earthay ofyay eelstay!) ethay urderermay ofyay thyay aceray!
Otay iewvay atthay eathfulday eyeyay, andyay anderway oyay’eryay
Osethay andshay etyay edray ithway Ectorhay’say oblenay oregay!
Alasyay! myay ordlay! ehay owsknay otnay owhay otay arespay,
Andyay atwhay ishay ercymay, thyay ainslay onssay eclareday;
Osay avebray! osay anymay allenfay! Otay aimclay ishay ageray
Ainvay ereway thyay ignityday, andyay ainvay thyay ageyay.
Onay—entpay inyay isthay adsay alacepay, etlay usyay ivegay
Otay iefgray ethay etchedwray aysday eway avehay otay ivelay.
Illstay, illstay orfay Ectorhay etlay ouryay orrowssay owflay,
Ornbay otay ishay ownyay, andyay otay ishay arentspay’ oeway!
Oomday’day omfray ethay ourhay ishay ucklesslay ifelay egunbay,
Otay ogsday, otay ulturesvay, andyay otay Eleuspay’ onsay!
Ohyay! inyay ishay earestday oodblay ightmay Iyay allayyay
Myay ageray, andyay esethay arbaritiesbay epayray!
Orfay ahyay! ouldcay Ectorhay eritmay usthay, osewhay eathbray
Expiredyay otnay eanlymay, inyay unactiveyay eathday?
Ehay ouredpay ishay atestlay oodblay inyay anlymay ightfay,
Andyay ellfay ayay erohay inyay ishay ountrycay’say ightray.”

“Eeksay otnay otay aystay emay, ornay myay oulsay affrightyay
Ithway ordsway ofyay omenyay, ikelay ayay irdbay ofyay ightnay,
(Epliedray unmovedyay ethay enerablevay anmay;)
’Istay eavenhay ommandscay emay, andyay ouyay urgeyay inyay ainvay.
Adhay anyyay ortalmay oicevay ethay injunctionyay aidlay,
Ornay auguryay, iestpray, ornay eersay, adhay eenbay obeyyay’day.
Ayay esentpray oddessgay oughtbray ethay ighhay ommandcay,
Iyay awsay, Iyay eardhay erhay, andyay ethay ordway allshay andstay.
Iyay ogay, eyay odsgay! obedientyay otay ouryay allcay:
Ifyay inyay onyay ampcay ouryay owerspay avehay oomday’day myay allfay,
Ontentcay—Byay ethay amesay andhay etlay emay expireyay!
Addyay otay ethay aughterslay’day onsay ethay etchedwray iresay!
Oneyay oldcay embraceyay atyay eastlay aymay ebay allowyay’day,
Andyay myay astlay earstay owflay ingledmay ithway ishay oodblay!”

Omfray orthfay ishay openyay’day oresstay, isthay aidsay, ehay ewdray
Elvetway ostlycay arpetscay ofyay efulgentray uehay,
Asyay anymay estsvay, asyay anymay antlesmay oldtay,
Andyay elvetway airfay eilsvay, andyay armentsgay iffstay ithway oldgay,
Otway ipodstray extnay, andyay icetway otway argerschay ineshay,
Ithway entay urepay alentstay omfray ethay ichestray inemay;
Andyay astlay ayay argelay ellway-abourlay’day owlbay adhay aceplay,
(Ethay edgeplay ofyay eatiestray onceyay ithway iendlyfray Acethray:)
Eemsay’day allyay ootay eanmay ethay oresstay ehay ouldcay employyay,
Orfay oneyay astlay ooklay otay uybay imhay ackbay otay Oytray!

Olay! ethay adsay atherfay, anticfray ithway ishay ainpay,
Aroundyay imhay uriousfay ivesdray ishay enialmay aintray:
Inyay ainvay eachyay aveslay ithway uteousday arecay attendsyay,
Eachyay officeyay urtshay imhay, andyay eachyay acefay offendsyay.
“Atwhay akemay eyay erehay, officiousyay owdscray! (ehay iescray):
Encehay! ornay obtrudeyay ouryay anguishyay onyay myay eyesyay.
Avehay eyay onay iefsgray atyay omehay, otay ixfay eyay erethay:
Amyay Iyay ethay onlyyay objectyay ofyay espairday?
Amyay Iyay ecomebay myay eoplepay’say ommoncay owshay,
Etsay upyay byay Ovejay ouryay ectaclespay ofyay oeway?
Onay, ouyay ustmay eelfay imhay ootay; ourselvesyay ustmay allfay;
Ethay amesay ernstay odgay otay uinray ivesgay ouyay allyay:
Ornay isyay eatgray Ectorhay ostlay byay emay aloneyay;
Ouryay olesay efenceday, ouryay uardiangay owerpay isyay onegay!
Iyay eesay ouryay oodblay ethay ieldsfay ofyay Iaphrygay owndray,
Iyay eesay ethay uinsray ofyay ouryay okingsmay owntay!
Oyay endsay emay, odsgay! ereyay atthay adsay ayday allshay omecay,
Ayay illingway ostghay otay Utoplay’say earydray omeday!”

Ehay aidsay, andyay eeblyfay ivesdray ishay iendsfray awayyay:
Ethay orrowingsay iendsfray ishay anticfray ageray obeyyay.
Extnay onyay ishay onssay ishay erringyay uryfay allsfay,
Olitespay, Arispay, Agathonyay, ehay allscay;
Ishay eatsthray Eiphobusday andyay Iusday earhay,
Ippothoushay, Ammonpay, Eleneshay ethay eersay,
Andyay enerousgay Antiphonyay: orfay etyay esethay inenay
Urvivedsay, adsay elicsray ofyay ishay umerousnay inelay.

“Ingloriousyay onssay ofyay anyay unhappyyay iresay!
Whyay idday otnay allyay inyay Ectorhay’say ausecay expireyay?
Etchwray atthay Iyay amyay! myay avestbray offspringyay ainslay.
Ouyay, ethay isgraceday ofyay Iampray’say ousehay, emainray!
Estormay ethay avebray, enownray’day inyay anksray ofyay arway,
Ithway Oilustray, eadfuldray onyay ishay ushingray arcay,[293]
Andyay astlay eatgray Ectorhay, oremay anthay anmay ivineday,
Orfay uresay ehay eemsay’day otnay ofyay errestrialtay inelay!
Allyay osethay elentlessray Arsmay untimelyyay ewslay,
Andyay eftlay emay esethay, ayay oftsay andyay ervilesay ewcray,
Osewhay aysday ethay eastfay andyay antonway anceday employyay,
Uttonsglay andyay atterersflay, ethay ontemptcay ofyay Oytray!
Whyay eachtay eyay otnay myay apidray eelswhay otay unray,
Andyay eedspay myay ourneyjay otay edeemray myay onsay?”

Ethay onssay eirthay atherfay’say etchedwray ageyay evereray,
Orgivefay ishay angeryay, andyay oducepray ethay arcay.
Ighhay onyay ethay eatsay ethay abinetcay eythay indbay:
Ethay ewnay-ademay arcay ithway olidsay eautybay inedshay;
Oxbay asway ethay okeyay, embossyay’day ithway ostlycay ainspay,
Andyay unghay ithway ingletsray otay eceiveray ethay einsray;
Inenay ubitscay onglay, ethay acestray eptsway ethay oundgray:
Esethay otay ethay ariotchay’say olishpay’day olepay eythay oundbay.
Enthay ixfay’day ayay ingray ethay unningray einsray otay uidegay,
Andyay oseclay eneathbay ethay athergay’day endsyay ereway iedtay.
Extnay ithway ethay iftsgay (ethay icepray ofyay Ectorhay ainslay)
Ethay adsay attendantsyay oadlay ethay oaninggray ainway:
Astlay otay ethay okeyay ethay ellway-atchedmay ulesmay eythay ingbray,
(Ethay iftgay ofyay Iamysay otay ethay Ojantray ingkay.)
Utbay ethay airfay orseshay, onglay ishay arlingday arecay,
Imselfhay eceivedray, andyay arnesshay’day otay ishay arcay:
Ievedgray asyay ehay asway, ehay otnay isthay asktay eniedday;
Ethay oaryhay eraldhay elphay’day imhay, atyay ishay idesay.
Ilewhay arefulcay esethay ethay entlegay ourserscay oinjay’day,
Adsay Ecubahay approachyay’day ithway anxiousyay indmay;
Ayay oldengay owlbay atthay oamfay’day ithway agrantfray ineway,
(Ibationlay estinedday otay ethay owerpay ivineday,)
Eldhay inyay erhay ightray, eforebay ethay eedstay eshay andsstay,
Andyay usthay onsignscay ityay otay ethay onarchmay’say andshay:

“Aketay isthay, andyay ourpay otay Ovejay; atthay afesay omfray armshay
Ishay acegray estoreray eethay otay ouryay oofray andyay armsyay.
Incesay ictorvay ofyay thyay earsfay, andyay ightingslay inemay,
Eavenhay, oryay thyay oulsay, inspiresyay isthay oldbay esignday;
Aypray otay atthay odgay, owhay ighhay onyay Idayay’say owbray
Urveyssay thyay esolatedday ealmsray elowbay,
Ishay ingedway essengermay otay endsay omfray ighhay,
Andyay eadlay thyay ayway ithway eavenlyhay auguryyay:
Etlay ethay ongstray overeignsay ofyay ethay umyplay aceray
Owertay onyay ethay ightray ofyay onyay etherealyay acespay.
Atthay ignsay eheldbay, andyay engthenstray’day omfray aboveyay,
Oldlybay ursuepay ethay ourneyjay arkmay’day byay Ovejay:
Utbay ifyay ethay odgay ishay auguryyay eniesday,
Uppresssay thyay impulseyay, ornay ejectray adviceyay.”

“’Istay ustjay (aidsay Iampray) otay ethay iresay aboveyay
Otay aiseray ouryay andshay; orfay owhay osay oodgay asyay Ovejay?”
Ehay okespay, andyay adebay ethay attendantyay andmaidhay ingbray
Ethay urestpay aterway ofyay ethay ivinglay ingspray:
(Erhay eadyray andshay ethay eweryay andyay asonbay eldhay:)
Enthay ooktay ethay oldengay upcay ishay ueenqay adhay illfay’day;
Onyay ethay idmay avementpay ourspay ethay osyray ineway,
Upliftsyay ishay eyesyay, andyay allscay ethay owerpay ivineday:

“Oyay irstfay andyay eatestgray! eavenhay’say imperialyay ordlay!
Onyay oftylay Idayay’say olyhay illhay adoredyay!
Otay ernstay Achillesyay ownay irectday myay aysway,
Andyay eachtay imhay ercymay enwhay ayay atherfay ayspray.
Ifyay uchsay thyay illway, espatchday omfray onderyay skyay
Thyay acredsay irdbay, elestialcay auguryyay!
Etlay ethay ongstray overeignsay ofyay ethay umyplay aceray
Owertay onyay ethay ightray ofyay onyay etherealyay acespay;
Osay allshay thyay uppliantsay, engthenstray’day omfray aboveyay,
Earlessfay ursuepay ethay ourneyjay arkmay’day byay Ovejay.”

Ovejay eardhay ishay ayerpray, andyay omfray ethay onethray onyay ighhay,
Espatchday’day ishay irdbay, elestialcay auguryyay!
Ethay iftsway-ingway’day aserchay ofyay ethay eatherfay’day amegay,
Andyay ownknay otay odsgay byay Ercnospay’ oftylay amenay.
Ideway asyay appearsyay omesay alacepay-ategay isplayday’day,
Osay oadbray, ishay inionspay etchstray’day eirthay ampleyay adeshay,
Asyay oopingstay exterday ithway esoundingray ingsway
Ethay imperialyay irdbay escendsday inyay airyyay ingsray.
Ayay awnday ofyay oyjay inyay everyyay acefay appearsyay:
Ethay ourningmay atronmay iesdray erhay imoroustay earstay:
Iftsway onyay ishay arcay ethay impatientyay onarchmay ungspray;
Ethay azenbray ortalpay inyay ishay assagepay ungray;
Ethay ulesmay ecedingpray awdray ethay oadedlay ainway,
Argedchay ithway ethay iftsgay: Idæusyay oldshay ethay einray:
Ethay ingkay imselfhay ishay entlegay eedsstay ontrolscay,
Andyay oughthray urroundingsay iendsfray ethay ariotchay ollsray.
Onyay ishay owslay eelswhay ethay ollowingfay eoplepay aitway,
Ournmay atyay eachyay epstay, andyay ivegay imhay upyay otay atefay;
Ithway andshay upliftedyay eyeyay imhay asyay ehay asspay’day,
Andyay azegay uponyay imhay asyay eythay azedgay eirthay astlay.
Ownay orwardfay aresfay ethay atherfay onyay ishay ayway,
Oughthray ethay onelay ieldsfay, andyay ackbay otay Ilionyay eythay.
Eatgray Ovejay eheldbay imhay asyay ehay osscray’day ethay ainplay,
Andyay eltfay ethay oesway ofyay iserablemay anmay.
Enthay usthay otay Ermeshay: “Outhay osewhay onstantcay arescay
Illstay uccoursay ortalsmay, andyay attendyay eirthay ayerspray;
Eholdbay anyay objectyay otay thyay argechay onsigncay’day:
Ifyay everyay itypay ouchtay’day eethay orfay ankindmay,
Ogay, uardgay ethay iresay: ethay observingyay oefay eventpray,
Andyay afesay onductcay imhay otay Achillesyay’ enttay.”

Ethay odgay obeysyay, ishay oldengay inionspay indsbay,[294]
Andyay ountsmay incumbentyay onyay ethay ingsway ofyay indsway,
Atthay ighhay, oughthray ieldsfay ofyay airyay, ishay ightflay ustainsay,
Oyay’eryay ethay ideway earthyay, andyay oyay’eryay ethay oundlessbay ainmay;
Enthay aspsgray ethay andway atthay ausescay eepslay otay flyay,
Oryay inyay oftsay umbersslay ealssay ethay akefulway eyeyay:
Usthay armyay’day, iftsway Ermeshay eersstay ishay airyyay ayway,
Andyay oopsstay onyay Ellesponthay’say esoundingray easay.
Ayay eauteousbay outhyay, ajesticmay andyay ivineday,
Ehay eemsay’day; airfay offspringyay ofyay omesay incelypray inelay!
Ownay ilighttway eilvay’day ethay aringglay acefay ofyay ayday,
Andyay adclay ethay uskyday ieldsfay inyay obersay eygray;
Atwhay imetay ethay eraldhay andyay ethay oaryhay ingkay
(Eirthay ariotschay oppingstay atyay ethay ilversay ingspray,
Atthay irclingcay Ilusyay’ ancientyay arblemay owsflay)
Allowyay’day eirthay ulesmay andyay eedsstay ayay ortshay eposeray,
Oughthray ethay imday adeshay ethay eraldhay irstfay espiesyay
Ayay anmay’say approachyay, andyay usthay otay Iampray iescray:
“Iyay arkmay omesay oefay’say advanceyay: Oyay ingkay! ewarebay;
Isthay ardhay adventureyay aimsclay thyay utmostyay arecay!
Orfay uchmay Iyay earfay estructionday overshay ighnay:
Ouryay atestay asksyay ounselcay; isyay ityay estbay otay flyay?
Oryay oldyay andyay elplesshay, atyay ishay eetfay otay allfay,
Otway etchedwray uppliantssay, andyay orfay ercymay allcay?”

Ethay afflictedyay onarchmay ivershay’day ithway espairday;
Alepay ewgray ishay acefay, andyay uprightyay oodstay ishay airhay;
Unksay asway ishay earthay; ishay olourcay entway andyay amecay;
Ayay uddensay emblingtray ookshay ishay agedyay amefray:
Enwhay Ermeshay, eetinggray, ouchtay’day ishay oyalray andhay,
Andyay, entlegay, usthay accostsyay ithway indkay emandday:

“Aysay itherwhay, atherfay! enwhay eachyay ortalmay ightsay
Isyay ealsay’day inyay eepslay, outhay anderestway oughthray ethay ightnay?
Whyay oamray thyay ulesmay andyay eedsstay ethay ainsplay alongyay,
Oughthray Eciangray oesfay, osay umerousnay andyay osay ongstray?
Atwhay ouldstcay outhay opehay, ouldshay esethay thyay easurestray iewvay;
Esethay, owhay ithway endlessyay atehay thyay aceray ursuepay?
Orfay atwhay efenceday, alasyay! ouldcay’stay outhay ovidepray;
Elfthysay otnay oungyay, ayay eakway oldyay anmay thyay uidegay?
Etyay uffersay otnay thyay oulsay otay inksay ithway eaddray;
Omfray emay onay armhay allshay ouchtay thyay everendray eadhay;
Omfray Eecegray Iyay’llay uardgay eethay ootay; orfay inyay osethay ineslay
Ethay ivinglay imageyay ofyay myay atherfay inesshay.”

“Thyay ordsway, atthay eakspay enevolencebay ofyay indmay,
Areyay uetray, myay onsay! (ethay odlikegay iresay ejoinray’day:)
Eatgray areyay myay azardshay; utbay ethay odsgay urveysay
Myay epsstay, andyay endsay eethay, uardiangay ofyay myay ayway.
Ailhay, andyay ebay essblay’day! Orfay arcescay ofyay ortalmay indkay
Appearyay thyay ormfay, thyay eaturefay, andyay thyay indmay.”

“Ornay uetray areyay allyay thyay ordsway, ornay erringyay ideway;
(Ethay acredsay essengermay ofyay eavenhay epliedray;)
Utbay aysay, onveycay’stay outhay oughthray ethay onelylay ainsplay
Atwhay etyay ostmay eciouspray ofyay thyay orestay emainsray,
Otay odgelay inyay afetysay ithway omesay iendlyfray andhay:
Eparedpray, erchancepay, otay eavelay thyay ativenay andlay?
Oryay iestflay outhay ownay?—Atwhay opeshay ancay Oytray etainray,
Thyay atchlessmay onsay, erhay uardgay andyay oryglay, ainslay?”

Ethay ingkay, alarmyay’day: “Aysay atwhay, andyay encewhay outhay artyay
Owhay earchsay ethay orrowssay ofyay ayay arentpay’say earthay,
Andyay owknay osay ellway owhay odlikegay Ectorhay iedday?”
Usthay Iampray okespay, andyay Ermeshay usthay epliedray:

“Ouyay empttay emay, atherfay, andyay ithway itypay ouchtay:
Onyay isthay adsay ubjectsay ouyay inquireyay ootay uchmay.
Oftyay avehay esethay eyesyay atthay odlikegay Ectorhay iewvay’day
Inyay oriousglay ightfay, ithway Eciangray oodblay embruedyay:
Iyay awsay imhay enwhay, ikelay Ovejay, ishay amesflay ehay osstay’day
Onyay ousandthay ipsshay, andyay itherway’day alfhay ayay osthay:
Iyay awsay, utbay elphay’day otnay: ernstay Achillesyay’ ireyay
Orbadefay assistanceyay, andyay enjoyyay’day ethay irefay.
Orfay imhay Iyay ervesay, ofyay Idonianmyrmay aceray;
Oneyay ipshay onveycay’day usyay omfray ouryay ativenay aceplay;
Olyctorpay isyay myay iresay, anyay onourhay’day amenay,
Oldyay ikelay elfthysay, andyay otnay unknownyay otay amefay;
Ofyay evensay ishay onssay, byay omwhay ethay otlay asway astcay
Otay ervesay ouryay incepray, ityay ellfay onyay emay, ethay astlay.
Otay atchway isthay uarterqay, myay adventureyay allsfay:
Orfay ithway ethay ornmay ethay Eeksgray attackyay ouryay allsway;
Eeplessslay eythay itsay, impatientyay otay engageyay,
Andyay arcescay eirthay ulersray eckchay eirthay artialmay ageray.”

“Ifyay enthay outhay artyay ofyay ernstay Elidespay’ aintray,
(Ethay ournfulmay onarchmay usthay ejoinray’day againyay,)
Ahyay elltay emay ulytray, erewhay, ohyay! erewhay areyay aidlay
Myay onsay’say earday elicsray? atwhay efallsbay imhay eadday?
Avehay ogsday ismemberday’day (onyay ethay akednay ainsplay),
Oryay etyay unmangledyay estray, ishay oldcay emainsray?”

“Oyay avourfay’day ofyay ethay iesskay! (usthay answeredyay enthay
Ethay owerpay atthay ediatesmay etweenbay odgay andyay enmay)
Ornay ogsday ornay ulturesvay avehay thyay Ectorhay entray,
Utbay olewhay ehay ieslay, eglectednay inyay ethay enttay:
Isthay ethay elfthtway eveningyay incesay ehay estedray erethay,
Untouchyay’day byay ormsway, untaintedyay byay ethay airyay.
Illstay asyay Aurorayay’say uddyray eambay isyay eadspray,
Oundray ishay iendfray’say ombtay Achillesyay agsdray ethay eadday:
Etyay undisfiguredyay, oryay inyay imblay oryay acefay,
Allyay eshfray ehay ieslay, ithway everyyay ivinglay acegray,
Ajesticalmay inyay eathday! Onay ainsstay areyay oundfay
Oyay’eryay allyay ethay orsecay, andyay osedclay isyay everyyay oundway,
Oughthay anymay ayay oundway eythay avegay. Omesay eavenlyhay arecay,
Omesay andhay ivineday, eservespray imhay everyay airfay:
Oryay allyay ethay osthay ofyay eavenhay, otay omwhay ehay edlay
Ayay ifelay osay atefulgray, illstay egardray imhay eadday.”

Usthay okespay otay Iampray ethay elestialcay uidegay,
Andyay oyfuljay usthay ethay oyalray iresay epliedray:
“Estblay isyay ethay anmay owhay ayspay ethay odsgay aboveyay
Ethay onstantcay ibutetray ofyay espectray andyay ovelay!
Osethay owhay inhabityay ethay Olympianyay owerbay
Myay onsay orgotfay otnay, inyay exaltedyay owerpay;
Andyay eavenhay, atthay everyyay irtuevay earsbay inyay indmay,
Evenyay otay ethay ashesyay ofyay ethay ustjay isyay indkay.
Utbay outhay, Oyay enerousgay outhyay! isthay obletgay aketay,
Ayay edgeplay ofyay atitudegray orfay Ectorhay’say akesay;
Andyay ilewhay ethay avouringfay odsgay ouryay epsstay urveysay,
Afesay otay Elidespay’ enttay onductcay myay ayway.”

Otay omwhay ethay atentlay odgay: “Oyay ingkay, orbearfay
Otay empttay myay outhyay, orfay aptyay isyay outhyay otay erryay.
Utbay ancay Iyay, absentyay omfray myay incepray’say ightsay,
Aketay iftsgay inyay ecretsay, atthay ustmay unshay ethay ightlay?
Atwhay omfray ouryay astermay’say interestyay usthay eway awdray,
Isyay utbay ayay icensedlay eftthay atthay ’apesscay ethay awlay.
Espectingray imhay, myay oulsay abjuresyay ethay offenceyay;
Andyay asyay ethay imecray, Iyay eaddray ethay onsequencecay.
Eethay, arfay asyay Argosyay, easedplay Iyay ouldcay onveycay;
Uardgay ofyay thyay ifelay, andyay artnerpay ofyay thyay ayway:
Onyay eethay attendyay, thyay afetysay otay aintainmay,
Oyay’eryay athlesspay orestsfay, oryay ethay oaringray ainmay.”

Ehay aidsay, enthay ooktay ethay ariotchay atyay ayay oundbay,
Andyay atchsnay’day ethay einsray, andyay irlwhay’day ethay ashlay aroundyay:
Eforebay ethay inspiringyay odgay atthay urgedyay emthay onyay,
Ethay ourserscay flyay ithway iritspay otnay eirthay ownyay.
Andyay ownay eythay eachray’day ethay avalnay allsway, andyay oundfay
Ethay uardsgay epastingray, ilewhay ethay owlsbay ogay oundray;
Onyay esethay ethay irtuevay ofyay ishay andway ehay iestray,
Andyay ourspay eepday umberslay onyay eirthay atchfulway eyesyay:
Enthay eavedhay ethay assymay atesgay, emovedray ethay arsbay,
Andyay oyay’eryay ethay enchestray edlay ethay ollingray arscay.
Unseenyay, oughthray allyay ethay ostilehay ampcay eythay entway,
Andyay ownay approachyay’day Elidespay’ oftylay enttay.
Onyay irsfay ethay oofray asway aisedray, andyay overcay’day oyay’eryay
Ithway eedsray ollectedcay omfray ethay arshymay oreshay;
Andyay, encedfay ithway alisadespay, ayay allhay ofyay atestay,
(Ethay orkway ofyay oldierssay,) erewhay ethay erohay atsay:
Argelay asway ethay oorday, osewhay ellway-ompactedcay engthstray
Ayay olidsay inepay-eetray arrbay’day ofyay ondrousway engthlay:
Arcescay eethray ongstray Eeksgray ouldcay iftlay itsyay ightymay eightway,
Utbay eatgray Achillesyay inglysay osedclay ethay ategay.
Isthay Ermeshay (uchsay ethay owerpay ofyay odsgay) etsay ideway;
Enthay iftsway alightedyay ethay elestialcay uidegay,
Andyay usthay evealray’day—”Earhay, incepray! andyay understandyay
Outhay owyay’stay thyay uidancegay otay onay ortalmay andhay:
Ermeshay Iyay amyay, escendedday omfray aboveyay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay artsyay, ethay essengermay ofyay Ovejay,
Arewellfay: otay unshay Achillesyay’ ightsay Iyay flyay;
Uncommonyay areyay uchsay avoursfay ofyay ethay skyay,
Ornay andstay onfesscay’day otay ailfray ortalitymay.
Ownay earlessfay enteryay, andyay eferpray thyay ayerspray;
Adjureyay imhay byay ishay atherfay’say ilversay airshay,
Ishay onsay, ishay othermay! urgeyay imhay otay estowbay
Ateverwhay itypay atthay ernstay earthay ancay owknay.”

Usthay avinghay aidsay, ehay anishvay’day omfray ishay eyesyay,
Andyay inyay ayay omentmay otshay intoyay ethay iesskay:
Ethay ingkay, onfirmcay’day omfray eavenhay, alightedyay erethay,
Andyay eftlay ishay agedyay eraldhay onyay ethay arcay,
Ithway olemnsay acepay oughthray ariousvay oomsray ehay entway,
Andyay oundfay Achillesyay inyay ishay inneryay enttay:
Erethay atsay ethay erohay: Alcimusyay ethay avebray,
Andyay eatgray Automedonyay, attendanceyay avegay:
Esethay ervedsay ishay ersonpay atyay ethay oyalray eastfay;
Aroundyay, atyay awfulyay istanceday, oodstay ethay estray.

Unseenyay byay esethay, ethay ingkay ishay entryyay ademay:
Andyay, ostratepray ownay eforebay Achillesyay aidlay,
Uddensay (ayay enerablevay ightsay!) appearsyay;
