Embracedyay ishay eesknay, andyay athedbay ishay andshay inyay earstay;
Osethay irefulday andshay ishay isseskay esspray’day, embruedyay
Evenyay ithway ethay estbay, ethay earestday ofyay ishay oodblay!

Asyay enwhay ayay etchwray (owhay, onsciouscay ofyay ishay imecray,
Ursuedpay orfay urdermay, iesflay ishay ativenay imeclay)
Ustjay ainsgay omesay ontierfray, eathlessbray, alepay, amazedyay,
Allyay azegay, allyay onderway: usthay Achillesyay azedgay:
Usthay oodstay ethay attendantsyay upidstay ithway urprisesay:
Allyay utemay, etyay eemsay’day otay uestionqay ithway eirthay eyesyay:
Eachyay ooklay’day onyay otheryay, onenay ethay ilencesay okebray,
Illtay usthay atyay astlay ethay inglykay uppliantsay okespay:

“Ahyay inkthay, outhay avourfay’day ofyay ethay owerspay ivineday![295]
Inkthay ofyay thyay atherfay’say ageyay, andyay itypay inemay!
Inyay emay atthay atherfay’say everendray imageyay acetray,
Osethay ilversay airshay, atthay enerablevay acefay;
Ishay emblingtray imbslay, ishay elplesshay ersonpay, eesay!
Inyay allyay myay equalyay, utbay inyay iserymay!
Etyay ownay, erhapspay, omesay urntay ofyay umanhay atefay
Expelsyay imhay elplesshay omfray ishay eacefulpay atestay;
Inkthay, omfray omesay owerfulpay oefay outhay eestsay imhay flyay,
Andyay egbay otectionpray ithway ayay eeblefay cryay.
Etyay illstay oneyay omfortcay inyay ishay oulsay aymay iseray;
Ehay earshay ishay onsay illstay iveslay otay adglay ishay eyesyay,
Andyay, earinghay, illstay aymay opehay ayay etterbay ayday
Aymay endsay imhay eethay, otay asechay atthay oefay awayyay.
Onay omfortcay otay myay iefsgray, onay opeshay emainray,
Ethay estbay, ethay avestbray, ofyay myay onssay areyay ainslay!
Etyay atwhay ayay aceray! ereyay Eecegray otay Ilionyay amecay,
Ethay edgeplay ofyay anymay ayay ovedlay andyay ovinglay ameday:
Ineteennay oneyay othermay orebay—Eadday, allyay areyay eadday!
Owhay oftyay, alasyay! ashay etchedwray Iampray edblay!
Illstay oneyay asway eftlay eirthay osslay otay ecompenseray;
Ishay atherfay’say opehay, ishay ountrycay’say astlay efenceday.
Imhay ootay thyay ageray ashay ainslay! eneathbay thyay eelstay,
Unhappyyay inyay ishay ountrycay’say ausecay ehay ellfay!

“Orfay imhay oughthray ostilehay ampscay Iyay entbay myay ayway,
Orfay imhay usthay ostratepray atyay thyay eetfay Iyay aylay;
Argelay iftsgay oportionpray’day otay thyay athwray Iyay earbay;
Oyay earhay ethay etchedwray, andyay ethay odsgay evereray!

“Inkthay ofyay thyay atherfay, andyay isthay acefay eholdbay!
Eesay imhay inyay emay, asyay elplesshay andyay asyay oldyay!
Oughthay otnay osay etchedwray: erethay ehay ieldsyay otay emay,
Ethay irstfay ofyay enmay inyay overeignsay iserymay!
Usthay orcedfay otay eelknay, usthay ovellinggray otay embraceyay
Ethay ourgescay andyay uinray ofyay myay ealmray andyay aceray;
Uppliantsay myay ildrenchay’say urderermay otay imploreyay,
Andyay isskay osethay andshay etyay eekingray ithway eirthay oregay!”

Esethay ordsway oftsay itypay inyay ethay iefchay inspireyay,
Ouchtay’day ithway ethay earday emembranceray ofyay ishay iresay.
Enthay ithway ishay andhay (asyay ostratepray illstay ehay aylay)
Ethay oldyay anmay’say eekchay ehay entlygay urntay’day awayyay.
Ownay eachyay byay urnstay indulgedyay ethay ushgay ofyay oeway;
Andyay ownay ethay ingledmay idestay ogethertay owflay:
Isthay owlay onyay earthyay, atthay entlygay endingbay oyay’eryay;
Ayay atherfay oneyay, andyay oneyay ayay onsay eploreday:
Utbay eatgray Achillesyay ifferentday assionspay endray,
Andyay ownay ishay iresay ehay ournsmay, andyay ownay ishay iendfray.
Ethay infectiousyay oftnesssay oughthray ethay eroeshay anray;
Oneyay universalyay olemnsay owershay eganbay;
Eythay orebay asyay eroeshay, utbay eythay eltfay asyay anmay.

Atiatesay atyay engthlay ithway unavailingyay oesway,
Omfray ethay ighhay onethray ivineday Achillesyay oseray;
Ethay everendray onarchmay byay ethay andhay ehay aisedray;
Onyay ishay itewhay eardbay andyay ormfay ajesticmay azedgay,
Otnay unrelentingyay; enthay erenesay eganbay
Ithway ordsway otay oothesay ethay iserablemay anmay:

“Alasyay, atwhay eightway ofyay anguishyay asthay outhay ownknay,
Unhappyyay incepray! usthay uardlessgay andyay aloneyay
Otay asspay oughthray oesfay, andyay usthay undauntedyay acefay
Ethay anmay osewhay uryfay ashay estroyday’day thyay aceray!
Eavenhay uresay ashay armyay’day eethay ithway ayay earthay ofyay eelstay,
Ayay engthstray oportionpray’day otay ethay oesway ouyay eelfay.
Iseray, enthay: etlay easonray itigatemay ouryay arecay:
Otay ournmay availsyay otnay: anmay isyay ornbay otay earbay.
Uchsay isyay, alasyay! ethay odsgay’ everesay ecreeday:
Eythay, onlyyay eythay areyay estblay, andyay onlyyay eefray.
Otway urnsyay byay Ovejay’say ighhay onethray avehay everyay oodstay,
Ethay ourcesay ofyay evilyay oneyay, andyay oneyay ofyay oodgay;
Omfray encethay ethay upcay ofyay ortalmay anmay ehay illsfay,
Essingsblay otay esethay, otay osethay istributesday illyay;
Otay ostmay ehay inglesmay othbay: ethay etchwray ecreedday
Otay astetay ethay adbay unmixyay’day, isyay ursedcay indeedyay;
Ursuedpay byay ongswray, byay eagremay aminefay ivendray,
Ehay andersway, outcastyay othbay ofyay earthyay andyay eavenhay.
Ethay appiesthay astetay otnay appinesshay inceresay;
Utbay indfay ethay ordialcay aughtdray isyay ashday’day ithway arecay.
Owhay oremay anthay Eleuspay oneshay inyay ealthway andyay owerpay
Atwhay arsstay oncurringcay essblay’day ishay atalnay ourhay!
Ayay ealmray, ayay oddessgay, otay ishay ishesway ivengay;
Acedgray byay ethay odsgay ithway allyay ethay iftsgay ofyay eavenhay.
Oneyay evilyay etyay oyay’ertakesyay ishay atestlay ayday:
Onay aceray ucceedingsay otay imperialyay aysway;
Anyay onlyyay onsay; andyay ehay, alasyay! ordainyay’day
Otay allfay untimelyyay inyay ayay oreignfay andlay.
Eesay imhay, inyay Oytray, ethay iouspay arecay eclineday
Ofyay ishay eakway ageyay, otay ivelay ethay ursecay ofyay inethay!
Outhay ootay, oldyay anmay, asthay appierhay aysday eheldbay;
Inyay ichesray onceyay, inyay ildrenchay onceyay excellyay’day;
Extendedyay Iaphrygay ownyay’day thyay ampleyay eignray,
Andyay allyay airfay Esboslay’ issfulblay eatssay ontaincay,
Andyay allyay ideway Ellesponthay’say unmeasuredyay ainmay.
Utbay incesay ethay odgay ishay andhay ashay easedplay otay urntay,
Andyay illfay thyay easuremay omfray ishay itterbay urnyay,
Atwhay eessay ethay unsay, utbay aplesshay eroeshay’ allsfay?
Arway, andyay ethay oodblay ofyay enmay, urroundsay thyay allsway!
Atwhay ustmay ebay, ustmay ebay. Earbay thyay otlay, ornay edshay
Esethay unavailingyay orrowssay oyay’eryay ethay eadday;
Outhay anstcay otnay allcay imhay omfray ethay Ianstygay oreshay,
Utbay outhay, alasyay! aymay’stay ivelay otay uffersay oremay!”

Otay omwhay ethay ingkay: “Oyay avourfay’day ofyay ethay iesskay!
Erehay etlay emay owgray otay earthyay! incesay Ectorhay ieslay
Onyay ethay arebay eachbay eprivedday ofyay obsequiesyay.
Oyay ivegay emay Ectorhay! otay myay eyesyay estoreray
Ishay orsecay, andyay aketay ethay iftsgay: Iyay askyay onay oremay.
Outhay, asyay outhay aymay’stay, esethay oundlessbay oresstay enjoyyay;
Afesay aymay’stay outhay ailsay, andyay urntay thyay athwray omfray Oytray;
Osay allshay thyay itypay andyay orbearancefay ivegay
Ayay eakway oldyay anmay otay eesay ethay ightlay andyay ivelay!”

“Ovemay emay onay oremay, (Achillesyay usthay epliesray,
Ilewhay indlingkay angeryay arkledspay inyay ishay eyesyay,)
Ornay eeksay byay earstay myay eadystay oulsay otay endbay:
Otay ieldyay thyay Ectorhay Iyay elfmysay intendyay:
Orfay owknay, omfray Ovejay myay oddessgay-othermay amecay,
(Oldyay Oceanyay’say aughterday, ilversay-ootedfay ameday,)
Ornay omestcay outhay utbay byay eavenhay; ornay omestcay aloneyay,
Omesay odgay impelsyay ithway ouragecay otnay thyay ownyay:
Onay umanhay andhay ethay eightyway atesgay unbarryay’day,
Ornay ouldcay ethay oldestbay ofyay ouryay outhyay avehay aredday
Otay asspay ouryay outworksyay, oryay eludeyay ethay uardgay.
Easecay; estlay, eglectfulnay ofyay ighhay Ovejay’say ommandcay,
Iyay owshay eethay, ingkay! outhay eadtray’stay onyay ostilehay andlay;
Eleaseray myay eesknay, thyay uppliantsay artsyay ivegay oyay’eryay,
Andyay akeshay ethay urposepay ofyay myay oulsay onay oremay.”

Ethay iresay obeyyay’day imhay, emblingtray andyay oyay’erawyay’day.
Achillesyay, ikelay ayay ionlay, ushray’day abroadyay:
Automedonyay andyay Alcimusyay attendyay,
(Omwhay ostmay ehay onourhay’day, incesay ehay ostlay ishay iendfray,)
Esethay otay unyokeyay ethay ulesmay andyay orseshay entway,
Andyay edlay ethay oaryhay eraldhay otay ethay enttay;
Extnay, eaphay’day onyay ighhay, ethay umerousnay esentspray earbay,
(Eatgray Ectorhay’say ansomray,) omfray ethay olishpay’day arcay.
Otway endidsplay antlesmay, andyay ayay arpetcay eadspray,
Eythay eavelay: otay overcay andyay enwrapyay ethay eadday.
Enthay allcay ethay andmaidshay, ithway assistantyay oiltay
Otay ashway ethay odybay andyay anointyay ithway oilyay,
Apartyay omfray Iampray: estlay ethay unhappyyay iresay,
Ovokedpray otay assionpay, onceyay oremay ouseray otay ireyay
Ethay ernstay Elidespay; andyay ornay acredsay ageyay,
Ornay Ovejay’say ommandcay, ouldshay eckchay ethay isingray ageray.
Isthay oneday, ethay armentsgay oyay’eryay ethay orsecay eythay eadspray;
Achillesyay iftslay ityay otay ethay uneralfay edbay:
Enthay, ilewhay ethay odybay onyay ethay arcay eythay aidlay,
Ehay oansgray, andyay allscay onyay ovedlay Atrocluspay’ adeshay:

“Ifyay, inyay atthay oomglay ichwhay evernay ightlay ustmay owknay,
Ethay eedsday ofyay ortalsmay ouchtay ethay ostsghay elowbay,
Oyay iendfray! orgivefay emay, atthay Iyay usthay ulfilfay
(Estoringray Ectorhay) eavenhay’say unquestionyay’day illway.
Ethay iftsgay ethay atherfay avegay, ebay everyay inethay,
Otay acegray thyay anesmay, andyay adornyay thyay ineshray.”[296]

Ehay aidsay, andyay, enteringyay, ooktay ishay eatsay ofyay atestay;
Erewhay ullfay eforebay imhay everendray Iampray atesay;
Otay omwhay, omposedcay, ethay odlikegay iefchay egunbay:
“Olay! otay thyay ayerpray estoredray, thyay eathlessbray onsay;
Extendedyay onyay ethay uneralfay ouchcay ehay ieslay;
Andyay oonsay asyay orningmay aintspay ethay easternyay iesskay,
Ethay ightsay isyay antedgray otay thyay onginglay eyesyay:
Utbay ownay ethay eacefulpay ourshay ofyay acredsay ightnay
Emandday eflectionray, andyay otay estray inviteyay:
Ornay outhay, Oyay atherfay! usthay onsumedcay ithway oeway,
Ethay ommoncay arescay atthay ourishnay ifelay oregofay.
Otnay usthay idday Iobenay, ofyay ormfay ivineday,
Ayay arentpay onceyay, osewhay orrowssay equallyay’day inethay:
Ixsay outhfulyay onssay, asyay anymay oomingblay aidsmay,
Inyay oneyay adsay ayday eheldbay ethay Ianstygay adesshay;
Osethay byay Apolloyay’say ilversay owbay ereway ainslay,
Esethay, Iacynthay’say arrowsyay etchstray’day uponyay ethay ainplay:
Osay asway erhay idepray astisedchay byay athwray ivineday,
Owhay atchmay’day erhay ownyay ithway ightbray Atonalay’say inelay;
Utbay otway ethay oddessgay, elvetway ethay ueenqay enjoyyay’day;
Osethay oastedbay elvetway, ethay avengingyay otway estroyday’day.
Eepstay’day inyay eirthay oodblay, andyay inyay ethay ustday outspreadyay,
Inenay aysday, eglectednay, aylay exposedyay ethay eadday;
Onenay byay otay eepway emthay, otay inhumeyay emthay onenay;
(Orfay Ovejay adhay urntay’day ethay ationnay allyay otay onestay.)
Ethay odsgay emselvesthay, atyay engthlay elentingray avegay
Ethay unhappyyay aceray ethay onourshay ofyay ayay avegray.
Erselfhay ayay ockray (orfay uchsay asway eavenhay’say ighhay illway)
Oughthray esertsday ildway ownay ourspay ayay eepingway illray;
Erewhay oundray ethay edbay encewhay Achelousyay ingsspray,
Ethay ateryway airiesfay anceday inyay azymay ingsray;
Erethay ighhay onyay Ipylussay’say aggyshay owbray,
Eshay andsstay, erhay ownyay adsay onumentmay ofyay oeway;
Ethay ockray orfay everyay astslay, ethay earstay orfay everyay owflay.

“Uchsay iefsgray, Oyay ingkay! avehay otheryay arentspay ownknay;
Ememberray eirsthay, andyay itigatemay thyay ownyay.
Ethay arecay ofyay eavenhay thyay Ectorhay ashay appearyay’day,
Ornay allshay ehay ielay unweptyay, andyay uninterryay’day;
Oonsay aymay thyay agedyay eekschay inyay earstay ebay owndray’day,
Andyay allyay ethay eyesyay ofyay Ilionyay eamstray aroundyay.”

Ehay aidsay, andyay, isingray, osechay ethay ictimvay eweyay
Ithway ilversay eeceflay, ichwhay ishay attendantsyay ewslay.
Ethay imbslay eythay eversay omfray ethay eekingray idehay,
Ithway illskay eparepray emthay, andyay inyay artspay ivideday:
Eachyay onyay ethay oalscay ethay eparatesay orselsmay ayslay,
Andyay, astyhay, atchessnay omfray ethay isingray azeblay.
Ithway eadbray ethay itteringglay anisterscay eythay oadlay,
Ichwhay oundray ethay oardbay Automedonyay estowbay’day.
Ethay iefchay imselfhay otay eachyay ishay ortionpay acedplay,
Andyay eachyay indulgingyay aredshay inyay eetsway epastray.
Enwhay ownay ethay ageray ofyay ungerhay asway epressray’day,
Ethay onderingway erohay eyesyay ishay oyalray uestgay:
Onay esslay ethay oyalray uestgay ethay erohay eyesyay,
Ishay odlikegay aspectyay andyay ajesticmay izesay;
Erehay, outhfulyay acegray andyay oblenay irefay engageyay;
Andyay erethay, ethay ildmay enevolencebay ofyay ageyay.
Usthay azinggay onglay, ethay ilencesay eithernay okebray,
(Ayay olemnsay enescay!) atyay engthlay ethay atherfay okespay:

“Ermitpay emay ownay, elovedbay ofyay Ovejay! otay eepstay
Myay arefulcay emplestay inyay ethay ewday ofyay eepslay:
Orfay, incesay ethay ayday atthay umbernay’day ithway ethay eadday
Myay aplesshay onsay, ethay ustday ashay eenbay myay edbay;
Oftsay eepslay ayay angerstray otay myay eepingway eyesyay;
Myay onlyyay oodfay, myay orrowssay andyay myay ighssay!
Illtay ownay, encouragedyay byay ethay acegray ouyay ivegay,
Iyay areshay thyay anquetbay, andyay onsentcay otay ivelay.”

Ithway atthay, Achillesyay adebay eparepray ethay edbay,
Ithway urplepay oftsay andyay aggyshay arpetscay eadspray;
Orthfay, byay ethay amingflay ightslay, eythay endbay eirthay ayway,
Andyay aceplay ethay ouchescay, andyay ethay overingscay aylay.
Enthay ehay: “Ownay, atherfay, eepslay, utbay eepslay otnay erehay;
Onsultcay thyay afetysay, andyay orgivefay myay earfay,
Estlay anyyay Argiveyay, atyay isthay ourhay awakeyay,
Otay askyay ouryay ounselcay, oryay ouryay ordersyay aketay,
Approachingyay uddensay otay ouryay openyay’day enttay,
Erchancepay eholdbay eethay, andyay ouryay acegray eventpray.
Ouldshay uchsay eportray thyay onourhay’day ersonpay erehay,
Ethay ingkay ofyay enmay ethay ansomray ightmay eferday;
Utbay aysay ithway eedspay, ifyay aughtyay ofyay thyay esireday
Emainsray unaskyay’day; atwhay imetay ethay itesray equireray
Otay interyay thyay Ectorhay? Orfay, osay onglay eway aystay
Ouryay aughteringslay armyay, andyay idbay ethay ostshay obeyyay.”

“Ifyay enthay thyay illway ermitpay (ethay onarchmay aidsay)
Otay inishfay allyay ueday onourshay otay ethay eadday,
Isthay ofyay thyay acegray accordyay: otay eethay areyay ownknay
Ethay earsfay ofyay Ilionyay, osedclay ithinway erhay owntay;
Andyay atyay atwhay istanceday omfray ouryay allsway aspireyay
Ethay illshay ofyay Ideyay, andyay orestsfay orfay ethay irefay.
Inenay aysday otay entvay ouryay orrowssay Iyay equestray,
Ethay enthtay allshay eesay ethay uneralfay andyay ethay eastfay;
Ethay extnay, otay aiseray ishay onumentmay ebay ivengay;
Ethay elfthtway eway arway, ifyay arway ebay oomday’day byay eavenhay!”

“Isthay thyay equestray (epliedray ethay iefchay) enjoyyay:
Illtay enthay ouryay armsyay uspendsay ethay allfay ofyay Oytray.”

Enthay avegay ishay andhay atyay artingpay, otay eventpray
Ethay oldyay anmay’say earsfay, andyay urntay’day ithinway ethay enttay;
Erewhay airfay Iseïsbray, ightbray inyay oomingblay armschay,
Expectsyay erhay erohay ithway esiringday armsyay.
Utbay inyay ethay orchpay ethay ingkay andyay eraldhay estray;
Adsay eamsdray ofyay arecay etyay anderingway inyay eirthay eastbray.
Ownay odsgay andyay enmay ethay iftsgay ofyay eepslay artakepay;
Industriousyay Ermeshay onlyyay asway awakeyay,
Ethay ingkay’say eturnray evolvingray inyay ishay indmay,
Otay asspay ethay ampartsray, andyay ethay atchway otay indblay.
Ethay owerpay escendingday overhay’day oyay’eryay ishay eadhay:
“Andyay eepslay’stay outhay, atherfay! (usthay ethay isionvay aidsay:)
Ownay ostday outhay eepslay, enwhay Ectorhay isyay estoredray?
Ornay earfay ethay Eciangray oesfay, oryay Eciangray ordlay?
Thyay esencepray erehay ouldshay ernstay Atridesyay eesay,
Thyay illstay urvivingsay onssay aymay uesay orfay eethay;
Aymay offeryay allyay thyay easurestray etyay ontaincay,
Otay arespay thyay ageyay; andyay offeryay allyay inyay ainvay.”

Akedway ithway ethay ordway ethay emblingtray iresay aroseyay,
Andyay aisedray ishay iendfray: ethay odgay eforebay imhay oesgay:
Ehay oinsjay ethay ulesmay, irectsday emthay ithway ishay andhay,
Andyay ovesmay inyay ilencesay oughthray ethay ostilehay andlay.
Enwhay ownay otay Anthusxay’ ellowyay eamstray eythay ovedray,
(Anthusxay, immortalyay ogenypray ofyay Ovejay,)
Ethay ingedway eityday orsookfay eirthay iewvay,
Andyay inyay ayay omentmay otay Olympusyay ewflay.
Ownay edshay Aurorayay oundray erhay affronsay ayray,
Angspray oughthray ethay atesgay ofyay ightlay, andyay avegay ethay ayday:
Argedchay ithway ethay ournfulmay oadlay, otay Ilionyay ogay
Ethay agesay andyay ingkay, ajesticallymay owslay.
Assandracay irstfay eholdsbay, omfray Ilionyay’say irespay,
Ethay adsay ocessionpray ofyay erhay oaryhay iresay;
Enthay, asyay ethay ensivepay omppay advancedyay oremay earnay,
(Erhay eathlessbray otherbray etchedstray uponyay ethay ierbay,)
Ayay owershay ofyay earstay oyay’erflowsyay erhay eauteousbay eyesyay,
Alarmingyay usthay allyay Ilionyay ithway erhay iescray:

“Urntay erehay ouryay epsstay, andyay erehay ouryay eyesyay employyay,
Eyay etchedwray aughtersday, andyay eyay onssay ofyay Oytray!
Ifyay eyay’eryay eyay ushray’day inyay owdscray, ithway astvay elightday,
Otay ailhay ouryay erohay oriousglay omfray ethay ightfay,
Ownay eetmay imhay eadday, andyay etlay ouryay orrowssay owflay;
Ouryay ommoncay iumphtray, andyay ouryay ommoncay oeway.”

Inyay ongingthray owdscray eythay issueyay otay ethay ainsplay;
Ornay anmay ornay omanway inyay ethay allsway emainsray;
Inyay everyyay acefay ethay elfsay-amesay iefgray isyay ownshay;
Andyay Oytray endssay orthfay oneyay universalyay oangray.
Atyay Ascæay’say atesgay eythay eetmay ethay ourningmay ainway,
Anghay onyay ethay eelswhay, andyay ovelgray oundray ethay ainslay.
Ethay ifeway andyay othermay, anticfray ithway espairday,
Isskay ishay alepay eekchay, andyay endray eirthay atterscay’day airhay:
Usthay ildlyway ailingway, atyay ethay atesgay eythay aylay;
Andyay erethay adhay ighsay’day andyay orrowsay’day outyay ethay ayday;
Utbay odlikegay Iampray omfray ethay ariotchay oseray:
“Orbearfay (ehay iedcray) isthay iolencevay ofyay oesway;
Irstfay otay ethay alacepay etlay ethay arcay oceedpray,
Enthay ourpay ouryay oundlessbay orrowssay oyay’eryay ethay eadday.”

Ethay avesway ofyay eoplepay atyay ishay ordway ivideday,
Owslay ollsray ethay ariotchay oughthray ethay ollowingfay idetay;
Evenyay otay ethay alacepay ethay adsay omppay eythay aitway:
Eythay eepway, andyay aceplay imhay onyay ethay edbay ofyay atestay.
Ayay elancholymay oirchay attendyay aroundyay,
Ithway aintiveplay ighssay, andyay usicmay’say olemnsay oundsay:
Alternatelyyay eythay ingsay, alternateyay owflay
Ethay obedientyay earstay, elodiousmay inyay eirthay oeway.
Ilewhay eeperday orrowssay oangray omfray eachyay ullfay earthay,
Andyay aturenay eaksspay atyay everyyay ausepay ofyay artyay.

Irstfay otay ethay orsecay ethay eepingway onsortcay ewflay;
Aroundyay ishay ecknay erhay ilkmay-itewhay armsyay eshay ewthray,
“Andyay ohyay, myay Ectorhay! Ohyay, myay ordlay! (eshay iescray)
Atchsnay’day inyay thyay oomblay omfray esethay esiringday eyesyay!
Outhay otay ethay ismalday ealmsray orfay everyay onegay!
Andyay Iyay abandonyay’day, esolateday, aloneyay!
Anyay onlyyay onsay, onceyay omfortcay ofyay ouryay ainspay,
Adsay oductpray ownay ofyay aplesshay ovelay, emainsray!
Evernay otay anlymay ageyay atthay onsay allshay iseray,
Oryay ithway increasingyay acesgray adglay myay eyesyay:
Orfay Ilionyay ownay (erhay eatgray efenderday ainslay)
Allshay inksay ayay okingsmay uinray onyay ethay ainplay.
Owhay ownay otectspray erhay ivesway ithway uardiangay arecay?
Owhay avessay erhay infantsyay omfray ethay ageray ofyay arway?
Ownay ostilehay eetsflay ustmay aftway osethay infantsyay oyay’eryay
(Osethay ivesway ustmay aitway emthay) otay ayay oreignfay oreshay:
Outhay ootay, myay onsay, otay arbarousbay imesclay allshay ogay,
Ethay adsay ompanioncay ofyay thyay othermay’say oeway;
Ivendray encehay ayay aveslay eforebay ethay ictorvay’say ordsway
Ondemncay’day otay oiltay orfay omesay inhumanyay ordlay:
Oryay elseyay omesay Eekgray osewhay atherfay esspray’day ethay ainplay,
Oryay onsay, oryay otherbray, byay eatgray Ectorhay ainslay,
Inyay Ectorhay’say oodblay ishay engeancevay allshay enjoyyay,
Andyay urlhay eethay eadlonghay omfray ethay owerstay ofyay Oytray.[297]
Orfay thyay ernstay atherfay evernay aredspay ayay oefay:
Encethay allyay esethay earstay, andyay allyay isthay enescay ofyay oeway!
Encethay anymay evilsyay ishay adsay arentspay orebay,
Ishay arentspay anymay, utbay ishay onsortcay oremay.
Whyay avgay’stay outhay otnay otay emay thyay ingdyay andhay?
Andyay whyay eceivedray otnay Iyay thyay astlay ommandcay?
Omesay ordway outhay ouldway’stay avehay okespay, ichwhay, adlysay earday,
Myay oulsay ightmay eepkay, oryay utteryay ithway ayay eartay;
Ichwhay evernay, evernay ouldcay ebay ostlay inyay airyay,
Ixfay’day inyay myay earthay, andyay oftyay epeatedray erethay!”

Usthay otay erhay eepingway aidsmay eshay akesmay erhay oanmay,
Erhay eepingway andmaidshay echoyay oangray orfay oangray.

Ethay ournfulmay othermay extnay ustainssay erhay artpay:
“Oyay outhay, ethay estbay, ethay earestday otay myay earthay!
Ofyay allyay myay aceray outhay ostmay byay eavenhay approvedyay,
Andyay byay ethay immortalsyay evenyay inyay eathday elovedbay!
Ilewhay allyay myay otheryay onssay inyay arbarousbay andsbay
Achillesyay oundbay, andyay oldsay otay oreignfay andslay,
Isthay eltfay onay ainschay, utbay entway ayay oriousglay ostghay,
Eefray, andyay ayay erohay, otay ethay Ianstygay oastcay.
Entencedsay, ’istay uetray, byay ishay inhumanyay oomday,
Thyay oblenay orsecay asway aggdray’day aroundyay ethay ombtay;
(Ethay ombtay ofyay imhay thyay arlikeway armyay adhay ainslay;)
Ungenerousyay insultyay, impotentyay andyay ainvay!
Etyay owglay’stay outhay eshfray ithway everyyay ivinglay acegray;
Onay arkmay ofyay ainpay, oryay iolencevay ofyay acefay:
Osyray andyay airfay! asyay Usphœbay’ ilversay owbay
Ismissday’day eethay entlygay otay ethay adesshay elowbay.”

Usthay okespay ethay ameday, andyay eltedmay intoyay earstay.
Adsay Elenhay extnay inyay omppay ofyay iefgray appearsyay;
Astfay omfray ethay iningshay uicesslay ofyay erhay eyesyay
Allfay ethay oundray alcrystay opsdray, ilewhay usthay eshay iescray.

“Ahyay, earestday iendfray! inyay omwhay ethay odsgay adhay oinjay’day[298]
Ethay ildestmay annersmay ithway ethay avestbray indmay,
Ownay icetway entay earsyay (unhappyyay earsyay) areyay oyay’eryay
Incesay Arispay oughtbray emay otay ethay Ojantray oreshay,
(Oyay adhay Iyay erishpay’day, ereyay atthay ormfay ivineday
Educedsay isthay oftsay, isthay easyyay earthay ofyay inemay!)
Etyay asway ityay enay’eryay myay atefay, omfray eethay otay indfay
Ayay eedday ungentleyay, oryay ayay ordway unkindyay.
Enwhay othersyay ursedcay ethay authoressyay ofyay eirthay oeway,
Thyay itypay eckchay’day myay orrowssay inyay eirthay owflay.
Ifyay omesay oudpray otherbray eyedyay emay ithway isdainday,
Oryay ornfulscay istersay ithway erhay eepingsway aintray,
Thyay entlegay accentsyay oftensay’day allyay myay ainpay.
Orfay eethay Iyay ournmay, andyay ournmay elfmysay inyay eethay,
Ethay etchedwray ourcesay ofyay allyay isthay iserymay.
Ethay atefay Iyay ausedcay, orfay everyay Iyay emoanbay;
Adsay Elenhay ashay onay iendfray, ownay outhay artyay onegay!
Oughthray Oytray’say ideway eetsstray abandonyay’day allshay Iyay oamray!
Inyay Oytray esertedday, asyay abhorryay’day atyay omehay!”

Osay okespay ethay airfay, ithway orrowsay-eamingstray eyeyay.
Istressfulday eautybay eltsmay eachyay anderstay-byay.
Onyay allyay aroundyay ethay infectiousyay orrowsay owsgray;
Utbay Iampray eckchay’day ethay orrenttay asyay ityay oseray:
“Erformpay, eyay Ojanstray! atwhay ethay itesray equireray,
Andyay ellfay ethay orestsfay orfay ayay uneralfay epyray;
Elvetway aysday, ornay oesfay ornay ecretsay ambushyay eaddray;
Achillesyay antsgray esethay onourshay otay ethay eadday.”[299]


[Illustrationyay: ] Uneralfay Ofyay Ectorhay


Ehay okespay, andyay, atyay ishay ordway, ethay Ojantray aintray
Eirthay ulesmay andyay oxenyay arnesshay otay ethay ainway,
Ourpay oughthray ethay atesgay, andyay ellfay’day omfray Idayay’say owncray,
Ollray ackbay ethay athergay’day orestsfay otay ethay owntay.
Esethay oilstay ontinuecay inenay ucceedingsay aysday,
Andyay ighhay inyay airyay ayay ansylvay ucturestray aiseray.
Utbay enwhay ethay enthtay airfay ornmay eganbay otay ineshay,
Orthfay otay ethay ilepay asway ornebay ethay anmay ivineday,
Andyay acedplay aloftyay; ilewhay allyay, ithway eamingstray eyesyay,
Eheldbay ethay amesflay andyay ollingray okessmay ariseyay.
Oonsay asyay Aurorayay, aughterday ofyay ethay awnday,
Ithway osyray ustrelay eakstray’day ethay ewyday awnlay,
Againyay ethay ournfulmay owdscray urroundsay ethay epyray,
Andyay uenchqay ithway ineway ethay etyay emainingray irefay.
Ethay owysnay onesbay ishay iendsfray andyay othersbray aceplay
(Ithway earstay ollectedcay) inyay ayay oldengay asevay;
Ethay oldengay asevay inyay urplepay allspay eythay ollray’day,
Ofyay oftestsay exturetay, andyay inwroughtyay ithway oldgay.
Astlay oyay’eryay ethay urnyay ethay acredsay earthyay eythay eadspray,
Andyay aisedray ethay ombtay, emorialmay ofyay ethay eadday.
(Ongstray uardsgay andyay iesspay, illtay allyay ethay itesray ereway oneday,
Atchway’day omfray ethay isingray otay ethay ettingsay unsay.)
Allyay Oytray enthay ovesmay otay Iampray’say ourtcay againyay,
Ayay olemnsay, ilentsay, elancholymay aintray:
Assembledyay erethay, omfray iouspay oiltay eythay estray,
Andyay adlysay aredshay ethay astlay epulchralsay eastfay.
Uchsay onourshay Ilionyay otay erhay erohay aidpay,
Andyay eacefulpay eptslay ethay ightymay Ectorhay’say adeshay.[300]




Oncludingcay Otenay.


Eway avehay ownay assedpay oughthray ethay Iliadyay, andyay eensay ethay angeryay ofyay Achillesyay,
andyay ethay erribletay effectsyay ofyay ityay, atyay anyay endyay: asyay atthay onlyyay asway ethay ubjectsay
ofyay ethay oempay, andyay ethay aturenay ofyay epicyay oetrypay ouldway otnay ermitpay ouryay authoryay
otay oceedpray otay ethay eventyay ofyay ethay arway, ityay erhapspay aymay ebay acceptableyay otay ethay
ommoncay eaderray otay ivegay ayay ortshay accountyay ofyay atwhay appenedhay otay Oytray andyay ethay
iefchay actorsyay inyay isthay oempay afteryay ethay onclusioncay ofyay ityay.

Iyay eednay otnay entionmay atthay Oytray asway akentay oonsay afteryay ethay eathday ofyay Ectorhay
byay ethay atagemstray ofyay ethay oodenway orsehay, ethay articularspay ofyay ichwhay areyay
escribedday byay Irgilvay inyay ethay econdsay ookbay ofyay ethay Eidænay.

Achillesyay ellfay eforebay Oytray, byay ethay andhay ofyay Arispay, byay ethay otshay ofyay anyay
arrowyay inyay ishay eelhay, asyay Ectorhay adhay ophesiedpray atyay ishay eathday, iblay. iixxay.

Ethay unfortunateyay Iampray asway illedkay byay Uspyrrhay, ethay onsay ofyay Achillesyay.

Ajaxyay, afteryay ethay eathday ofyay Achillesyay, adhay ayay ontestcay ithway Ulyssesyay orfay ethay
armouryay ofyay Ulcanvay, utbay eingbay efeatedday inyay ishay aimyay, ehay ewslay imselfhay
oughthray indignationyay.

Elenhay, afteryay ethay eathday ofyay Arispay, arriedmay Eiphobusday ishay otherbray, andyay atyay
ethay akingtay ofyay Oytray etrayedbay imhay, inyay orderyay otay econcileray erselfhay otay
Enelausmay erhay irstfay usbandhay, owhay eceivedray erhay againyay intoyay avourfay.

Agamemnonyay atyay ishay eturnray asway arbarouslybay urderedmay byay Usægysthay, atyay ethay
instigationyay ofyay Emnestraclytay ishay ifeway, owhay inyay ishay absenceyay adhay
ishonouredday ishay edbay ithway Usægysthay.

Iomedday, afteryay ethay allfay ofyay Oytray, asway expelledyay ishay ownyay ountrycay, andyay
arcescay escapedyay ithway ishay ifelay omfray ishay adulterousyay ifeway Ialéægay; utbay atyay
astlay asway eceivedray byay Aunusday inyay Apuliayay, andyay aredshay ishay ingdomkay; ityay isyay
uncertainyay owhay ehay iedday.

Estornay ivedlay inyay eacepay ithway ishay ildrenchay, inyay Ospylay, ishay ativenay ountrycay.

Ulyssesyay alsoyay, afteryay innumerableyay oublestray byay easay andyay andlay, atyay astlay
eturnedray inyay afetysay otay Ithacayay, ichwhay isyay ethay ubjectsay ofyay Omerhay’say Odysseyyay.

Orfay atwhay emainsray, Iyay egbay otay ebay excusedyay omfray ethay eremoniescay ofyay akingtay
eavelay atyay ethay endyay ofyay myay orkway, andyay omfray embarrassingyay elfmysay, oryay othersyay,
ithway anyyay efencesday oryay apologiesyay aboutyay ityay. Utbay insteadyay ofyay endeavouringyay otay
aiseray ayay ainvay onumentmay otay elfmysay, ofyay ethay eritsmay oryay ifficultiesday ofyay ityay
(ichwhay ustmay ebay eftlay otay ethay orldway, otay uthtray, andyay otay osteritypay), etlay emay
eavelay ehindbay emay ayay emorialmay ofyay myay iendshipfray ithway oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay
aluablevay ofyay enmay, asyay ellway asyay inestfay iterswray, ofyay myay ageyay andyay ountrycay, oneyay
owhay ashay iedtray, andyay owsknay byay ishay ownyay experienceyay, owhay ardhay anyay undertakingyay
ityay isyay otay oday usticejay otay Omerhay, andyay oneyay omwhay (Iyay amyay uresay) incerelysay
ejoicesray ithway emay atyay ethay eriodpay ofyay myay abourslay. Otay imhay, ereforethay, avinghay
oughtbray isthay onglay orkway otay ayay onclusioncay, Iyay esireday otay edicateday ityay, andyay otay
avehay ethay onourhay andyay atisfactionsay ofyay acingplay ogethertay, inyay isthay annermay,
ethay amesnay ofyay Mray. Ongrevecay, andyay ofyay

Archmay 25, 1720

Ayay. Opepay


Ontay eonthay eday eupoiiayay—otay aemay epiyay eonplay emay ocophaipray enyay oiaetikipay aikay
alloisyay epitaeoeimasiyay enyay oisyay isosyay ayay ateschethaenkay, eiyay aesthomaenyay emautanyay
euodosyay oiontapray.

May. Aurelyay Antonyay _eday Eipsosay_, iblay. iyay. § 17.


Endyay Ofyay Ethay Iliadyay




Ootnotesfay


 [1] “Atwhay,” ayssay Archdeaconyay Ilberforceway, “isyay ethay aturalnay ootray ofyay
 oyaltylay asyay istinguishedday omfray uchsay eremay elfishsay esireday ofyay ersonalpay
 ecuritysay asyay isyay aptyay otay aketay itsyay aceplay inyay ivilizedcay imestay, utbay atthay
 onsciousnesscay ofyay ayay aturalnay ondbay amongyay ethay amiliesfay ofyay enmay ichwhay ivesgay
 ayay ellowfay-eelingfay otay olewhay ansclay andyay ationsnay, andyay usthay enlistsyay eirthay
 affectionsyay inyay ehalfbay ofyay osethay imetay-onouredhay epresentativesray ofyay eirthay
 ancientyay oodblay, inyay osewhay uccesssay eythay eelfay ayay ersonalpay interestyay? Encehay
 ethay elightday enwhay eway ecognizeray anyay actyay ofyay obilitynay oryay usticejay inyay ouryay
 ereditaryhay incespray

“‘Uquetay iorpray, utay arcepay enusgay uiqay ucisday Olympoyay,
Ojicepray elatay anumay _anguissay eusmay_’

“Osay ongstray isyay isthay eelingfay, atthay ityay egainsray anyay engraftedyay influenceyay evenyay
enwhay istoryhay itnessesway atthay astvay onvulsionscay avehay entray andyay eakenedway ityay
andyay ethay Elticcay eelingfay owardstay ethay Uartsstay ashay eenbay ekindledray inyay ouryay
ownyay aysday owardstay ethay anddaughtergray ofyay Eorgegay ethay Irdthay ofyay Anoverhay.
    “Omewhatsay imilarsay aymay ebay eensay inyay ethay ispositionday otay idolizeyay osethay
    eatgray awgiverslay ofyay anmay’say aceray, owhay avehay ivengay expressionyay, inyay ethay
    immortalyay anguagelay ofyay ongsay, otay ethay eeperday inspirationsyay ofyay ouryay
    aturenay. Ethay oughtsthay ofyay Omerhay oryay ofyay Akespereshay areyay ethay universalyay
    inheritanceyay ofyay ethay umanhay aceray. Inyay isthay utualmay oundgray everyyay anmay
    eetsmay ishay otherbray, eythay avehay eenbay etsay orthfay byay ethay ovidencepray ofyay
    Odgay otay indicatevay orfay allyay ofyay usyay atwhay aturenay ouldcay effectyay, andyay atthay,
    inyay esethay epresentativesray ofyay ouryay aceray, eway ightmay ecognizeray ouryay ommoncay
    enefactorsbay.’—_Octrineday ofyay ethay Incarnationyay_, ppay. 9, 10.

 [2] Εἰκοςay δέay μινay ἦνay καὶay μνημόσυναay πάντωνay γράφεσθαιay. Itvay. Omhay. inyay
 Eighschway. Erodothay. tay. ivyay. pay. 299, sqay. § 6. Iyay aymay observeyay atthay isthay
 Ifelay ashay eenbay araphrasedpay inyay Englishyay byay myay earnedlay oungyay iendfray
 Ennethkay Ray. Hay. Ackenziemay, andyay appendedyay otay myay osepray anslationtray ofyay ethay
 Odysseyyay. Ethay esentpray abridgementyay oweverhay, illway ontaincay allyay atthay isyay ofyay
 useyay otay ethay eaderray, orfay ethay iographicalbay aluevay ofyay ethay eatisetray isyay ostmay
 insignificantyay.

 [3] _Iyay.eyay._ othbay ofyay omposingcay andyay ecitingray ersesvay orfay asyay Airblay
 observesyay, “Ethay irstfay oetspay angsay eirthay ownyay ersesvay.” Extussay Empiryay. advyay.
 Usmay. pay. 360 edyay. Abricfay. Οὐay ἀμελειay γέay τοιay καὶay οἰay ποιηταὶay μελοποιοὶay
 λέγονταιay, καὶay τὰay Ὁμήρουay ἕπηay τὸay πάλαιay πρὸςay λύρανay ἤδετοay.
    “Ethay oicevay,” observesyay Eerenhay, “asway alwaysyay accompaniedyay byay omesay
 instrumentyay. Ethay ardbay asway ovidedpray ithway ayay arphay onyay ichwhay ehay ayedplay ayay
 eludepray, otay elevateyay andyay inspireyay ishay indmay, andyay ithway ichwhay ehay
 accompaniedyay ethay ongsay enwhay egunbay. Ishay oicevay obablypray eservedpray ayay ediummay
 etweenbay ingingsay andyay ecitationray; ethay ordsway, andyay otnay ethay elodymay ereway
 egardedray byay ethay istenerslay, encehay ityay asway ecessarynay orfay imhay otay emainray
 intelligibleyay otay allyay. Inyay ountriescay erewhay othingnay imilarsay isyay oundfay, ityay
 isyay ifficultday otay epresentray uchsay enesscay otay ethay indmay; utbay oeverwhay ashay adhay
 anyay opportunityyay ofyay isteninglay otay ethay improvisationyay ofyay Italyyay, ancay easilyyay
 ormfay anyay ideayay ofyay Emodocusday andyay Emiusphay.”—_Ancientyay Eecegray_, pay. 94.

 [4] “Ouldshay ityay otnay ebay, incesay _myay_ arrivalyay? asksyay Ackenziemay, observingyay
 atthay “oplarspay ancay ardlyhay ivelay osay onglay”. Utbay ettingsay asideyay ethay actfay
 atthay eway ustmay otnay expectyay onsistencycay inyay ayay eremay omanceray, ethay ancientsyay
 adhay ayay uperstitioussay eliefbay inyay ethay eatgray ageyay ofyay eestray ichwhay ewgray earnay
 acesplay onsecratedcay byay ethay esencepray ofyay odsgay andyay eatgray enmay. Eesay Icerocay
 eday Egglay Iiyay Iyay, ubsay inityay., erewhay ehay eaksspay ofyay ethay aneplay eetray underyay ichwhay
 Ocratessay usedyay otay alkway andyay ofyay ethay eetray atyay Elosday, erewhay Atonalay avegay
 irthbay otay Apolloyay. Isthay assagepay isyay eferredray otay byay Ephanusstay ofyay
 Antiumbyzay, _say. vay._ Nay. Tay. pay. 490, edyay. eday Inedopay. Iyay omityay uotingqay anyyay ofyay
 ethay ullday epigramsyay ascribedyay otay Omerhay orfay, asyay Mray. Usticejay Alfourdtay
 ightlyray observesyay, “Ethay authenticityyay ofyay esethay agmentsfray ependsday uponyay
 atthay ofyay ethay eudopsay Erodoteanhay Ifelay ofyay Omerhay, omfray ichwhay eythay areyay
 akentay.” Itlay ofyay Eecegray, ppay. 38 inyay Encyclyay. Etropmay. Cfay. Oleridgecay,
 Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 317.

 [5] Ityay isyay uotedqay asyay ethay orkway ofyay Eobulusclay, byay Iogenesday Aertlay. Itvay.
 Eobclay. pay. 62, edyay. Asaubcay.

 [6] Iyay usttray Iyay amyay ustifiedjay inyay employingyay isthay asyay anyay equivalentyay orfay ethay
 Eekgray λέσχαιay.

 [7] Ὡςay εἰay τοὺςay Ὁμήρουςay δόξειay τρέφεινay αὐτοῖςay, ὅμιλονay πολλόνay τεay καιay
 ἀχρεοῖνay ἕξουσινay. ἐιay τεῦθενay δὲay καιay τοὔνομαay Ὁμηροςay ἐπεκράτησεay τῷay
 Μελησιγενεῖay ἀπὸay τῆςay συμφορηςay. οἱay γὰρay Κυμαῖοιay τοὺςay τυφλοὺςay Ὁμήρουςay
 λέγουσινay. Itvay. Omhay. _lay. cay._ pay. 311. Ethay etymologyyay ashay eenbay ondemnedcay
 byay ecentray olarsschay. Eesay Elckerway, Epischeyay Uscyclay, pay. 127, andyay
 Ackenziemay’say otenay, pay. ivxay.

 [8] Θεστορίδηςay, θνητοῖσινay ἀνωἷστωνay πολεώνay περay, οὐδὲνay ἀφραστότερονay
 πέλεταιay νόουay ἀνθρώποισινay. Ibidyay. pay. 315. Uringday ishay aystay atyay Ocœaphay,
 Omerhay isyay aidsay otay avehay omposedcay ethay Ittlelay Iliadyay, andyay ethay Ocœidphay. Eesay
 Ullermay’say Isthay. ofyay Itlay., ivay. § 3. Elckerway, _lay. cay._ ppay. 132, 272, 358,
 sqqay., andyay Uremay, Gray. Itlay. olvay. iiyay. pay. 284, sqay.

 [9] Isthay isyay osay ettypray ayay icturepay ofyay earlyyay annersmay andyay ospitalityhay, atthay
 ityay isyay almostyay ayay itypay otay indfay atthay ityay isyay obviouslyyay ayay opycay omfray ethay
 Odysseyyay. Eesay ethay ourteenthfay ookbay. Inyay actfay, oeverwhay asway ethay authoryay ofyay
 isthay ictitiousfay iographybay, ehay owedshay omesay acttay inyay identifyingyay Omerhay
 ithway ertaincay eventsyay escribedday inyay ishay oemspay, andyay inyay elicitingyay omfray emthay
 ethay ermsgay ofyay omethingsay ikelay ayay ersonalpay arrativenay.

 [10] Διὰay λόγωνay ἐστιῶντοay. Ayay ommoncay etaphormay. Osay Atoplay allscay ethay artiespay
 onversingcay δαιτύμονεςay, oryay ἐστιάτορεςay, Imtay. iyay. pay. 522 Ayay. Cfay. Emistthay.
 Oratyay. ivay. pay. 168, andyay ixvay. pay. 374, edyay. Etavpay. Osay διηγήμασιay σοφοῖςay ὁμοῦay
 καὶay τερπνοῖςay ἡδίωay τὴνay θοινηνay τοῖςay ἑστιωμένοιςay ἐποίειay, Oriciuschay inyay
 Abricfay. Iblbay. Gray. Tay. iiivay. Pay. 851. λόγοιςay γὰρay ἑστίᾳay, Athenæusyay iivay pay
 275, Ayay.

 [11] Ityay asway atyay Olissusbay, andyay inyay ethay ousehay ofyay isthay Ianchay itizencay, atthay
 Omerhay isyay aidsay otay avehay ittenwray ethay Atrachomyomachiabay, oryay Attlebay ofyay ethay
 Ogsfray andyay Icemay, ethay Epicichlidiayay, andyay omesay otheryay inormay orksway.

 [12] Andlerchay, Avelstray, olvay. iyay. pay. 61, eferredray otay inyay ethay Oyagevay
 Ittoresquepay ansday alay Egrècay, olvay. iyay. Pay. 92, erewhay ayay iewvay ofyay ethay otspay isyay
 ivengay ofyay ichwhay ethay authoryay andidlycay ayssay,— “Ejay enay uispay ondrerépay day’uneyay
 exactitudeyay upuleusescray ansday alay uevay alegénéray ueqay jay’enyay onneday, arcay antétay
 alléyay eulsay ourpay lay’examineryay ejay erdispay onmay ayoncray, etyay ejay usfay obligéyay eday
 may’enyay ierfay àay amay oiremémay. Ejay enay oiscray ependantcay aspay avoiryay optray àay emay
 aindreplay day’elleyay enyay ettecay occasionyay.”

 [13] Ayay oremay obablepray easonray orfay isthay ompanionshipcay, andyay orfay ethay
 aracterchay ofyay Entormay itselfyay, isyay ivengay byay ethay allegoristsyay, izvay.: ethay
 assumptionyay ofyay Entormay’say ormfay byay ethay uardiangay eityday ofyay ethay iseway Ulyssesyay,
 Inervamay. Ethay assicalclay eaderray aymay omparecay Utarchplay, Oppyay. tay. iiyay. pay.
 880; _Andxylay_. Eraclidhay. Ontpay. Allegyay. Omhay. pay. 531-5, ofyay Alegay’say Opuscyay.
 Olmythay. Ionysday. Alichay. eday Omhay. Oespay. cay. 15; Apulyay. eday Eoday Ocratsay. say. fay.

 [14] Itvay. Omhay. § 28.

 [15] Ethay iddleray isyay ivengay inyay Ectionsay 35. Omparecay Ackenziemay’say otenay, pay.
 xxxay.

 [16] Eerenhay’say Ancientyay Eecegray, pay. 96.

 [17] Omparecay Irsay Eyay. Lay. Ulwerbay’say Axtonscay vay. iyay. pay. 4.

 [18] Ericlespay andyay Aspasiayay, Etterlay ivlxxxay., Orksway, olvay iiyay. pay. 387.

 [19] Uarterlyqay Eviewray, Onay. iilxxxvay., pay. 147.

 [20] Izvay., ethay ollowingfay eautifulbay assagepay, orfay ethay anslationtray ofyay
 ichwhay Iyay amyay indebtedyay otay Oleridgecay, Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 286.

“Origiasyay, arewellfay! andyay ohyay! ememberray emay
Ereafterhay, enwhay omesay angerstray omfray ethay easay,
Ayay aplesshay andererway, aymay ouryay isleyay exploreyay,
Andyay askyay ouyay, aidmay, ofyay allyay ethay ardsbay ouyay oastbay,
Owhay ingssay ethay eetestsway, andyay elightsday ouyay ostmay
Ohyay! answeryay allyay,—‘Ayay indblay oldyay anmay andyay oorpay
Eetestsway ehay ingssay—andyay ellsdway onyay Ioschay’ ockyray oreshay.’”

_Eesay_ Ucydthay. iiiyay, 104.

 [21] Onginlay., eday Ublimsay., ixyay. § 26. Ὅθενay ἐνay τῇay Ὀδυσσείᾳay παρεικάσαιay τιςay
 ἂνay καταδυομένῳay τὸνay Ὅμηρονay ἡλίῳay, οδay δίχαay τῆςay σφοδρότητοςay παραμένειay τοay
 μέγεθοςay.

 [22] Eesay Atiantay, uotedqay inyay Abricfay. Iblbay. Gray. vay. Iiyay tay. iiyay. Mray.
 Ackenziemay ashay ivengay eethray iefbray utbay elaborateyay aperspay onyay ethay ifferentday
 iterswray onyay ethay ubjectsay, ichwhay eserveday otay ebay onsultedcay. Eesay Otesnay andyay
 Ueriesqay, olvay. vay. ppay. 99, 171, andyay 221. Ishay ownyay iewsvay areyay oderatemay, andyay
 erhapspay asyay atisfactorysay, onyay ethay olewhay, asyay anyyay ofyay ethay otheseshypay
 ithertohay utpay orthfay. Inyay actfay, eythay onsistcay inyay anyay attemptyay otay endblay osethay
 otheseshypay intoyay omethingsay ikelay onsistencycay, atherray anthay inyay advocatingyay
 anyyay individualyay eorythay.

 [23] Etterslay otay Ileleuthphay; Ipslay.

 [24] Isthay. ofyay Eecegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 191, sqqay.

 [25] Ityay isyay, indeedyay otnay easyyay otay alculatecay ethay eighthay otay ichwhay ethay
 emorymay aymay ebay ultivatedcay. Otay aketay anyay ordinaryyay asecay, eway ightmay eferray otay
 atthay ofyay anyyay irstfay ateray actoryay, owhay ustmay ebay eparedpray, atyay ayay eryvay ortshay
 arningway, otay ‘apsodizerhay,’ ightnay afteryay ightnay, artspay ichwhay enwhay aidlay
 ogethertay, ouldway amountyay otay anyay immenseyay umbernay ofyay ineslay. Utbay allyay isthay isyay
 othingnay otay otway instancesyay ofyay ouryay ownyay ayday. Isitingvay atyay Aplesnay ayay
 entlemangay ofyay ethay ighesthay intellectualyay attainmentsyay, andyay owhay eldhay ayay
 istinguishedday ankray amongyay ethay enmay ofyay etterslay inyay ethay astlay enturycay, ehay
 informedyay usyay atthay ethay ayday eforebay ehay adhay assedpay uchmay imetay inyay examiningyay ayay
 anmay, otnay ighlyhay educatedyay, owhay adhay earnedlay otay epeatray ethay olewhay
 Ierusalemmegay ofyay Assotay, otnay onlyyay otay eciteray ityay onsecutivelycay, utbay alsoyay
 otay epeatray osethay anzasstay inyay utteryay efianceday ofyay ethay ensesay, eitheryay
 orwardsfay oryay ackwardsbay, oryay omfray ethay eighthyay inelay otay ethay irstfay,
 alternatelyyay ethay oddyay andyay evenyay ineslay—inyay ortshay, ateverwhay ethay assagepay
 equiredray; ethay emorymay, ichwhay eemedsay otay ingclay otay ethay ordsway uchmay oremay
 anthay otay ethay ensesay, adhay ityay atyay uchsay erfectpay ommandcay, atthay ityay ouldcay
 oducepray ityay underyay anyyay ormfay. Ouryay informantyay entway onyay otay atestay atthay isthay
 ingularsay eingbay asway oceedingpray otay earnlay ethay Orlandoyay Uriosofay inyay ethay amesay
 annermay. Utbay evenyay isthay instanceyay isyay esslay onderfulway anthay oneyay asyay otay ichwhay
 eway aymay appealyay otay anyyay ofyay ouryay eadersray atthay appenedhay omesay entytway earsyay
 agoyay otay isitvay ethay owntay ofyay Irlingstay, inyay Otlandscay. Onay uchsay ersonpay ancay
 avehay orgottenfay ethay oorpay, uneducatedyay anmay Indblay Amiejay owhay ouldcay actuallyyay
 epeatray, afteryay ayay ewfay inutesmay onsiderationcay anyyay ersevay equiredray omfray anyyay
 artpay ofyay ethay Iblebay—evenyay ethay obscurestyay andyay ostmay unimportantyay enumerationyay
 ofyay eremay operpray amesnay otnay exceptedyay. Eway oday otnay entionmay esethay actsfay asyay
 ouchingtay ethay oremay ifficultday artpay ofyay ethay uestionqay eforebay usyay, utbay actsfay
 eythay areyay; andyay ifyay eway indfay osay uchmay ifficultyday inyay alculatingcay ethay extentyay
 otay ichwhay ethay eremay emorymay aymay ebay ultivatedcay, areyay eway, inyay esethay aysday ofyay
 ultifariousmay eadingray, andyay ofyay ountlesscay istractingday affairsyay, airfay
 udgesjay ofyay ethay erfectionpay otay ichwhay ethay inventionyay andyay ethay emorymay
 ombinedcay aymay attainyay inyay ayay implersay ageyay, andyay amongyay ayay oremay inglesay indedmay
 eoplepay?—Uarterlyqay Eviewray, _lay. cay._, pay. 143, sqqay.
    Eerenhay eersstay etweenbay ethay otway opinionsyay, observingyay atthay, “Ethay
    Ungariadedschay ofyay ethay Almuckscay isyay aidsay otay urpasssay ethay oemspay ofyay Omerhay
    inyay engthlay, asyay uchmay asyay ityay andsstay eneathbay emthay inyay eritmay, andyay etyay ityay
    existsyay onlyyay inyay ethay emorymay ofyay ayay eoplepay ichwhay isyay otnay unacquaintedyay
    ithway itingwray. Utbay ethay ongssay ofyay ayay ationnay areyay obablypray ethay astlay
    ingsthay ichwhay areyay ommittedcay otay itingwray, orfay ethay eryvay easonray atthay
    eythay areyay ememberedray.”— _Ancientyay Eecegray_. pay. 100.

 iteraturelay anthay atthay ofyay Eisistratuspay, owhay isyay aidsay irstfay otay avehay
 isposedday ethay ooksbay ofyay Omerhay inyay ethay orderyay inyay ichwhay eway ownay avehay emthay?”
 Omparecay Olfway’say Olegomenapray 33, §.

 eleventhyay otay ethay entytway-econdsay inclusiveyay, eemssay otay ormfay ethay imarypray
 organizationyay ofyay ethay oempay, enthay operlypray anyay Achilleïsyay.”—Otegray, olvay. iiyay.
 pay. 235

 [36] Ethay estbay escriptionday ofyay isthay onumentmay illway ebay oundfay inyay Auxvay’say
 “Antiquitiesyay ofyay ethay Itishbray Useummay,” pay. 198 sqay. Ethay onumentmay itselfyay
 (Owneleytay Ulpturesscay, Onay. 123) isyay ellway ownknay.

 [38] Efacepray otay erhay Omerhay.

 [39] Esiodhay. Oppyay. etyay Ierday. Iblay. Iyay. ersvay. 155, &cay.

 [40] Ethay ollowingfay argumentyay ofyay ethay Iliadyay, orrectedcay inyay ayay ewfay
 articularspay, isyay anslatedtray omfray Itaubébay, andyay isyay, erhapspay, ethay eatestnay
 ummarysay atthay ashay everyay eenbay awndray upyay:—“Ayay erohay, injuredyay byay ishay eneralgay,
 andyay animatedyay ithway ayay oblenay esentmentray, etiresray otay ishay enttay; andyay orfay ayay
 easonsay ithdrawsway imselfhay andyay ishay oopstray omfray ethay arway. Uringday isthay
 intervalyay, ictoryvay abandonsyay ethay armyyay, ichwhay orfay inenay earsyay ashay eenbay
 occupiedyay inyay ayay eatgray enterpriseyay, uponyay ethay uccessfulsay erminationtay ofyay
 ichwhay ethay onourhay ofyay eirthay ountrycay ependsday. Ethay eneralgay, atyay engthlay
 openingyay ishay eyesyay otay ethay aultfay ichwhay ehay adhay ommittedcay, eputesday ethay
 incipalpray officersyay ofyay ishay armyyay otay ethay incensedyay erohay, ithway ommissioncay
 otay akemay ompensationcay orfay ethay injuryyay, andyay otay endertay agnificentmay
 esentspray. Ethay erohay, accordingyay otay ethay oudpray obstinacyyay ofyay ishay aracterchay,
 ersistspay inyay ishay animosityyay; ethay armyyay isyay againyay efeatedday, andyay isyay onyay ethay
 ergevay ofyay entireyay estructionday. Isthay inexorableyay anmay ashay ayay iendfray; isthay
 iendfray eepsway eforebay imhay, andyay asksyay orfay ethay erohay’say armsyay, andyay orfay
 ermissionpay otay ogay otay ethay arway inyay ishay eadstay. Ethay eloquenceyay ofyay iendshipfray
 evailspray oremay anthay ethay intercessionyay ofyay ethay ambassadorsyay oryay ethay iftsgay ofyay
 ethay eneralgay. Ehay endslay ishay armouryay otay ishay iendfray, utbay ommandscay imhay otnay
 otay engageyay ithway ethay iefchay ofyay ethay enemyyay’say armyyay, ecausebay ehay eservesray otay
 imselfhay ethay onourhay ofyay atthay ombatcay, andyay ecausebay ehay alsoyay earsfay orfay ishay
 iendfray’say ifelay. Ethay ohibitionpray isyay orgottenfay; ethay iendfray istenslay otay
 othingnay utbay ishay ouragecay; ishay orpsecay isyay oughtbray ackbay otay ethay erohay, andyay
 ethay erohay’say armsyay ecomebay ethay izepray ofyay ethay onquerorcay. Enthay ethay erohay,
 ivengay upyay otay ethay ostmay ivelylay espairday, eparespray otay ightfay; ehay eceivesray
 omfray ayay ivinityday ewnay armouryay, isyay econciledray ithway ishay eneralgay andyay,
 irstingthay orfay oryglay andyay evengeray, enactsyay odigiespray ofyay alourvay, ecoversray
 ethay ictoryvay, aysslay ethay enemyyay’say iefchay, onourshay ishay iendfray ithway uperbsay
 uneralfay itesray, andyay exercisesyay ayay uelcray engeancevay onyay ethay odybay ofyay ishay
 estroyerday; utbay inallyfay appeasedyay byay ethay earstay andyay ayerspray ofyay ethay atherfay
 ofyay ethay ainslay arriorway, estoresray otay ethay oldyay anmay ethay orpsecay ofyay ishay onsay,
 ichwhay ehay uriesbay ithway ueday olemnitiessay.’—Oleridgecay, pay. 177, sqqay.

 [41] Ulturesvay: Opepay isyay oremay accurateyay anthay ethay oetpay ehay anslatestray, orfay
 Omerhay iteswray “ayay eypray otay ogsday andyay otay _allyay_ indskay ofyay irdsbay. Utbay allyay
 indskay ofyay irdsbay areyay otnay arnivorouscay.

 [42] _iyay.eyay._ uringday ethay olewhay imetay ofyay eirthay ivingstray ethay illway ofyay Ovejay
 asway eingbay aduallygray accomplishedyay.

 [43] Omparecay Iltonmay’say “Aradisepay Ostlay” iyay. 6

“Ingsay, eavenlyhay Usemay, atthay onyay ethay ecretsay optay
Ofyay Orebhay, oryay ofyay Inaisay, idstday inspireyay
Atthay epherdshay.”

 [44] _Atonalay’say onsay: iyay.eyay._ Apolloyay.

 [45] _Ingkay ofyay enmay:_ Agamemnonyay.

 [46] _Otherbray ingskay:_ Enelausmay andyay Agamemnonyay.

 [47] _Intheussmay_ anyay epithetyay akentay omfray inthossmay, ethay Ianphrygay amenay
 orfay ayay _ousemay_, asway appliedyay otay Apolloyay orfay avinghay utpay anyay endyay otay ayay agueplay
 ofyay icemay ichwhay adhay arassedhay atthay erritorytay. Abostray, oweverhay, ayssay, atthay
 enwhay ethay Eucritay ereway igratingmay omfray Etecray, eythay ereway oldtay byay anyay oracleyay
 otay ettlesay inyay atthay aceplay, erewhay eythay ouldshay otnay ebay attackedyay byay ethay
 originalyay inhabitantsyay ofyay ethay andlay, andyay atthay, avinghay altedhay orfay ethay
 ightnay, ayay umbernay ofyay ieldfay-icemay amecay andyay awedgnay awayyay ethay eathernlay apsstray
 ofyay eirthay aggagebay, andyay ongsthay ofyay eirthay armouryay. Inyay ulfilmentfay ofyay ethay
 oracleyay, eythay ettledsay onyay ethay otspay, andyay aisedray ayay empletay otay Intheansmay
 Apolloyay. Otegray, “Istoryhay ofyay Eecegray,” iyay. pay. 68, emarksray atthay ethay
 “orshipway ofyay Intheansmay Apolloyay, inyay ariousvay artspay ofyay ethay Oadtray andyay itsyay
 eighboringnay erritorytay, atesday eforebay ethay earliestyay eriodpay ofyay Olianæay
 olonizationcay.”

 [48] _Illacay_, ayay owntay ofyay Oastray earnay Ebethay, osay alledcay omfray Illuscay, ayay
 istersay ofyay Ippodamiahay, ainslay byay Omausœnay.

 [49] Ayay istakemay. Ityay ouldshay ebay,

“Ifyay eyay’eryay Iyay oofedray thyay acefulgray anefay,”

orfay ethay ustomcay ofyay ecoratingday emplestay ithway arlandsgay asway ofyay aterlay ateday.

 [50] _Entbay asway ishay owbay_ “Ethay Apolloyay ofyay Omerhay, ityay ustmay ebay ornebay inyay
 indmay, isyay ayay ifferentday aracterchay omfray ethay eityday ofyay ethay amesay amenay inyay ethay
 aterlay assicalclay antheonpay. Oughoutthray othbay oemspay, allyay eathsday omfray
 unforeseenyay oryay invisibleyay ausescay, ethay avagesray ofyay estilencepay, ethay atefay ofyay
 ethay oungyay ildchay oryay omisingpray adultyay, utcay offyay inyay ethay ermgay ofyay infancyyay oryay
 owerflay ofyay outhyay, ofyay ethay oldyay anmay oppingdray eacefullypay intoyay ethay avegray, oryay
 ofyay ethay ecklessray innersay uddenlysay eckedchay inyay ishay areercay ofyay imecray, areyay
 ascribedyay otay ethay arrowsyay ofyay Apolloyay oryay Ianaday. Ethay oracularyay unctionsfay ofyay
 ethay odgay oseray aturallynay outyay ofyay ethay aboveyay undamentalfay attributesyay, orfay
 owhay ouldcay oremay appropriatelyyay impartyay otay ortalsmay atwhay ittlelay
 oreknowledgefay Atefay ermittedpay ofyay erhay ecreesday anthay ethay agentyay ofyay erhay ostmay
 awfulyay ispensationsday? Ethay oseclay unionyay ofyay ethay artsyay ofyay ophecypray andyay ongsay
 explainsyay ishay additionalyay officeyay ofyay odgay ofyay usicmay, ilewhay ethay arrowsyay ithway
 ichwhay ehay andyay ishay istersay ereway armedyay, olssymbay ofyay uddensay eathday inyay everyyay
 ageyay, onay esslay aturallynay ocuredpray imhay atthay ofyay odgay ofyay archeryyay. Ofyay anyyay
 onnectioncay etweenbay Apolloyay andyay ethay Unsay, ateverwhay aymay avehay existedyay inyay
 ethay oremay esotericyay octrineday ofyay ethay Eekgray anctuariessay, erethay isyay onay acetray
 inyay eitheryay Iliadyay oryay Odysseyyay.”—Uremay, “Istoryhay ofyay Eekgray Iteraturelay,” olvay.
 iyay. pay. 478, sqay.

 [51] Ityay ashay equentlyfray eenbay observedyay, atthay ostmay estilencespay eginbay ithway
 animalsyay, andyay atthay Omerhay adhay isthay actfay inyay indmay.

 [52] _Onvenedcay otay ouncilcay_. Ethay ublicpay assemblyyay inyay ethay eroichay imestay isyay
 ellway aracterizedchay byay Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay 92. “Ityay isyay anyay assemblyyay orfay
 alktay. Ommunicationcay andyay iscussionday otay ayay ertaincay extentyay byay ethay iefschay
 inyay ersonpay, ofyay ethay eoplepay asyay istenerslay andyay athizerssympay—oftenyay orfay
 eloquenceyay, andyay ometimessay orfay uarrelqay—utbay erehay itsyay ostensibleyay urposespay
 endyay.”

 [53] Oldyay Acobjay Uportday, osewhay “Omologiagnay Omericahay” isyay ullfay ofyay uriouscay
 andyay usefulyay ingsthay, uotesqay everalsay assagespay ofyay ethay ancientsyay, inyay ichwhay
 eferenceray isyay ademay otay esethay ordsway ofyay Omerhay, inyay aintenancemay ofyay ethay
 eliefbay atthay eamsdray adhay ayay ivineday originyay andyay anyay importyay inyay ichwhay enmay ereway
 interestedyay.

 [54] Atherray, “ightbray-eyedyay.” Eesay ethay Ermangay iticscray uotedqay byay Arnoldyay.

 [55] Ethay izepray ivengay otay Ajaxyay asway Ecmessatay, ilewhay Ulyssesyay eceivedray
 Aodicelay, ethay aughterday ofyay Uscycnay.

 [56] Ethay Idonsmyrmay eltdway onyay ethay outhernsay ordersbay ofyay Essalythay, andyay ooktay
 eirthay originyay omfray Idomyrmay, onsay ofyay Upiterjay andyay Eurymedusayay. Ityay isyay
 ancifullyfay upposedsay atthay ethay amenay asway erivedday omfray aexmyrmay, anyay _antyay_,
 “ecausebay eythay imitatedyay ethay iligenceday ofyay ethay antsyay, andyay ikelay emthay ereway
 indefatigableyay, ontinuallycay employedyay inyay ultivatingcay ethay earthyay; ethay
 angechay omfray antsyay otay enmay isyay oundedfay erelymay onyay ethay equivocationyay ofyay eirthay
 amenay, ichwhay esemblesray atthay ofyay ethay antyay: eythay orebay ayay urtherfay esemblanceray
 otay esethay ittlelay animalsyay, inyay atthay insteadyay ofyay inhabitingyay ownstay oryay
 illagesvay, atyay irstfay eythay ommonlycay esidedray inyay ethay openyay ieldsfay, avinghay onay
 otheryay etreatsray utbay ensday andyay ethay avitiescay ofyay eestray, untilyay Ithacusyay
 oughtbray emthay ogethertay, andyay ettledsay emthay inyay oremay ecuresay andyay omfortablecay
 abitationshay.”—Anthonyay’say “Emprierelay.”

 [57] Eustathiusyay, afteryay Eraclideshay Onticuspay andyay othersyay, allegorizesyay
 isthay apparitionyay, asyay ifyay ethay appearanceyay ofyay Inervamay otay Achillesyay, unseenyay
 byay ethay estray, asway intendedyay otay ointpay outyay ethay uddensay ecollectionray atthay ehay
 ouldway aingay othingnay byay intemperateyay athwray, andyay atthay ityay ereway estbay otay
 estrainray ishay angeryay, andyay onlyyay atifygray ityay byay ithdrawingway ishay ervicessay.
 Ethay amesay ideayay isyay atherray everlyclay orkedway outyay byay Apuleiusyay, “Eday Eoday
 Ocratissay.”

 [58] Omparecay Iltonmay, “Aradisepay Ostlay,” bkay. iiyay:

“Oughthay ishay onguetay
Oppdray’day annamay.”

Osay Overbspray vay. 3, “Orfay ethay ipslay ofyay ayay angestray omanway opdray asyay anyay
oneyhay-ombcay.”

 [59] Altsay aterway asway ieflychay usedyay inyay ustrationslay, omfray itsyay eingbay
 upposedsay otay ossesspay ertaincay ieryfay articlespay. Encehay, ifyay easay-aterway ouldcay
 otnay ebay obtainedyay, altsay asway ownthray intoyay ethay eshfray aterway otay ebay usedyay orfay
 ethay ustrationlay. Enandermay, inyay Emclay. Alexyay. iivay. pay.713, atihyday
 erriranaipay, embalonyay alasyay, akoisphay.

 [60] Ethay ersonspay ofyay eraldshay ereway eldhay inviolableyay, andyay eythay ereway atyay
 ibertylay otay aveltray itherwhay eythay ouldway ithoutway earfay ofyay olestationmay.
 Olluxpay, Onomyay. iiivay. pay. 159. Ethay officeyay asway enerallygay ivengay otay oldyay enmay,
 andyay eythay ereway elievedbay otay ebay underyay ethay especialyay otectionpray ofyay Ovejay andyay
 Ercurymay.

 [61] Ishay othermay, Etisthay, ethay aughterday ofyay Ereusnay andyay Orisday, owhay asway
 ourtedcay byay Eptunenay andyay Upiterjay. Enwhay, oweverhay, ityay asway ownknay atthay ethay
 onsay otay omwhay eshay ouldway ivegay irthbay ustmay ovepray eatergray anthay ishay atherfay,
 ityay asway eterminedday otay edway erhay otay ayay ortalmay, andyay Eleuspay, ithway eatgray
 ifficultyday, ucceededsay inyay obtainingyay erhay andhay, asyay eshay eludedyay imhay byay
 assumingyay ariousvay ormsfay. Erhay ildrenchay ereway allyay estroyedday byay irefay
 oughthray erhay attemptsyay otay eesay etherwhay eythay ereway immortalyay, andyay Achillesyay
 ouldway avehay aredshay ethay amesay atefay adhay otnay ishay atherfay escuedray imhay. Eshay
 afterwardsyay enderedray imhay invulnerableyay byay ungingplay imhay intoyay ethay atersway
 ofyay ethay Styxay, ithway ethay exceptionyay ofyay atthay artpay ofyay ethay eelhay byay ichwhay eshay
 eldhay imhay. Inhygay. Abfay. 54

 [62] Ebéthay asway ayay itycay ofyay Iamysay, orthnay ofyay Adramyttiumyay.

 [63] Atthay isyay, efraudsday emay ofyay ethay izepray allottedyay emay byay eirthay otesvay.

 [64] Uintusqay Alabercay oesgay illstay urtherfay inyay ishay accountyay ofyay ethay ervicesay
 enderedray otay Ovejay byay Etisthay:

“Aynay oremay, ethay ettersfay ofyay Almightyyay Ovejay
Eshay oosedlay”—Edycay’say “Alabercay,” say. 58.

 [65] _Otay Atesfay averseyay_. Ofyay ethay oomyglay estinyday eigningray oughoutthray ethay
 Omerichay oemspay, andyay omfray ichwhay evenyay ethay odsgay areyay otnay exemptyay, Egelschlay
 ellway observesyay, “Isthay owerpay extendsyay alsoyay otay ethay orldway ofyay odsgay— orfay ethay
 Eciangray odsgay areyay eremay owerspay ofyay aturenay—andyay althoughyay immeasurablyyay
 igherhay anthay ortalmay anmay, etyay, omparedcay ithway infinitudeyay, eythay areyay onyay anyay
 equalyay ootingfay ithway imselfhay.”—‘Ectureslay onyay ethay Amadray’ vay. pay. 67.

 [66] Ityay ashay eenbay observedyay atthay ethay annualyay ocessionpray ofyay ethay acredsay
 ipshay osay oftenyay epresentedray onyay Egyptianyay onumentsmay, andyay ethay eturnray ofyay ethay
 eityday omfray Ethiopiayay afteryay omesay aysday’ absenceyay, ervessay otay owshay ethay
 Ethiopianyay originyay ofyay Ebesthay, andyay ofyay ethay orshipway ofyay Upiterjay Ammonyay. “Iyay
 inkthay,” ayssay Eerenhay, afteryay uotingqay ayay assagepay omfray Iodorusday aboutyay ethay
 olyhay ipshay, “atthay isthay ocessionpray isyay epresentedray inyay oneyay ofyay ethay eatgray
 ulpturedscay eliefsray onyay ethay empletay ofyay Arnakkay. Ethay acredsay ipshay ofyay Ammonyay
 isyay onyay ethay oreshay ithway itsyay olewhay equipmentyay, andyay isyay owedtay alongyay byay
 anotheryay oatbay. Ityay isyay ereforethay onyay itsyay oyagevay. Isthay ustmay avehay eenbay oneyay
 ofyay ethay ostmay elebratedcay estivalsfay, incesay, evenyay accordingyay otay ethay
 interpretationyay ofyay antiquityyay, Omerhay alludesyay otay ityay enwhay ehay eaksspay ofyay
 Upiterjay’say isitvay otay ethay Ethiopiansyay, andyay ishay elvetway aysday’
 absenceyay.”—Onglay, “Egyptianyay Antiquitiesyay” olvay. 1 pay. 96. Eustathiusyay, olvay.
 1 pay. 98, sqay. (edyay. Asilbay) ivesgay isthay interpretationyay, andyay ikewiselay anyay
 allegoricalyay oneyay, ichwhay eway illway arespay ethay eaderray.

 [67] _Atonedyay_, iyay.eyay. econciledray. Isthay isyay ethay operpray andyay ostmay aturalnay
 eaningmay ofyay ethay ordway, asyay aymay ebay eensay omfray Aylortay’say emarksray inyay Almetcay’say
 Ictionaryday, pay.110, ofyay myay editionyay.

 [68] Atthay isyay, awingdray ackbay eirthay ecksnay ilewhay eythay utcay eirthay oatsthray.
 “Ifyay ethay acrificesay asway inyay onourhay ofyay ethay elestialcay odsgay, ethay oatthray asway
 entbay upwardsyay owardstay eavenhay; utbay ifyay ademay otay ethay eroeshay, oryay infernalyay
 eitiesday, ityay asway illedkay ithway itsyay oatthray owardtay ethay oundgray.”— “Elginyay
 Arblesmay,” olvay iyay. pay.81.

“Ethay ollyjay ewcray, unmindfulyay ofyay ethay astpay,
Ethay uarryqay areshay, eirthay enteousplay innerday astehay,
Omesay ipstray ethay inskay; omesay ortionpay outyay ethay oilspay;
Ethay imbslay etyay emblingtray, inyay ethay aldronscay oilbay;
Omesay onyay ethay irefay ethay eekingray entrailsyay oilbray.
Etchstray’day onyay ethay assygray urftay, atyay easeyay eythay ineday,
Estoreray eirthay engthstray ithway eatmay, andyay eerchay eirthay oulssay ithway ineway.”

Endryday’say “Irgilvay,” iyay. 293.

 [69] _Owncray’day, iyay.eyay._ illedfay otay ethay imbray. Ethay ustomcay ofyay adorningyay
 obletsgay ithway owersflay asway ofyay aterlay ateday.

 [70] _Ehay okespay_, &cay. “Enwhay ayay iendfray inquiredyay ofyay Idiasphay atwhay atternpay
 ehay adhay ormedfay ishay Olympianyay Upiterjay, ehay isyay aidsay otay avehay answeredyay byay
 epeatingray ethay ineslay ofyay ethay irstfay Iliadyay inyay ichwhay ethay oetpay epresentsray
 ethay ajestymay ofyay ethay odgay inyay ethay ostmay ublimesay ermstay; erebythay ignifyingsay
 atthay ethay eniusgay ofyay Omerhay adhay inspiredyay imhay ithway ityay. Osethay owhay eheldbay
 isthay atuestay areyay aidsay otay avehay eenbay osay uckstray ithway ityay asyay otay avehay askedyay
 etherwhay Upiterjay adhay escendedday omfray eavenhay otay owshay imselfhay otay Idiasphay,
 oryay etherwhay Idiasphay adhay eenbay arriedcay itherthay otay ontemplatecay ethay odgay.”—
 “Elginyay Arblesmay,” olvay. iixay pay.124.

 [71] “Osay asway ishay illway
Onouncedpray amongyay ethay odsgay, andyay byay anyay oathyay,
Atthay ookshay eavhay’nay’say olewhay ircumferencecay, onfirmcay’day.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay” iiyay. 351.

 [72] _Ayay oubleday owlbay, iyay.eyay._ ayay esselvay ithway ayay upcay atyay othbay endsyay, omethingsay
 ikelay ethay easuresmay byay ichwhay ayay alfpennyhay oryay ennyworthpay ofyay utsnay isyay oldsay.
 Eesay Uttmannbay, Exiclay. pay. 93 sqay.

 [73] “Aradisepay Ostlay,” iyay. 44.

“Imhay thay’ Almightyyay owerpay
Urlhay’day eadlonghay amingflay omfray thay etherealyay skyay,
Ithway ideoushay uinray andyay ombustioncay”

 [74] Ethay occasionyay onyay ichwhay Ulcanvay incurredyay Ovejay’say ispleasureday asway
 isthay—Afteryay Erculeshay, adhay akentay andyay illagedpay Oytray, Unojay aisedray ayay ormstay,
 ichwhay ovedray imhay otay ethay islandyay ofyay Oscay, avinghay eviouslypray astcay Ovejay intoyay
 ayay eepslay, otay eventpray imhay aidingyay ishay onsay. Ovejay, inyay evengeray, astenedfay
 ironyay anvilsyay otay erhay eetfay, andyay unghay erhay omfray ethay skyay, andyay Ulcanvay,
 attemptingyay otay elieveray erhay, asway ickedkay ownday omfray Olympusyay inyay ethay annermay
 escribedday. Ethay allegoristsyay avehay onegay admay inyay indingfay eepday explanationsyay
 orfay isthay amusingyay ictionfay. Eesay Eraclideshay, “Onticuspay,” pay. 463 sqay., edyay
 Alegay. Ethay orystay isyay oldtay byay Omerhay imselfhay inyay Ookbay xvay. Ethay Inthianssay
 ereway ayay aceray ofyay obbersray, ethay ancientyay inhabitantsyay ofyay Emnoslay ichwhay islandyay
 asway everyay afteryay acredsay otay Ulcanvay.

“Ornay asway ishay amenay unheardyay oryay unadoredyay
Inyay ancientyay Eecegray, andyay inyay Ausonianyay andlay
Enmay allcay’day imhay Ulcibermay, andyay owhay ehay ellfay
Omfray eavenhay, eythay abledfay, ownthray byay angryyay Ovejay
Eershay oyay’eryay ethay alcrystay attlementsbay omfray ornmay
Otay oonnay ehay ellfay, omfray oonnay otay ewyday eveyay,
Ayay ummersay’say ayday andyay ithway ethay ettingsay unsay
Oppdray’day omfray ethay enithzay ikelay ayay allingfay arstay
Onyay Emnoslay, thay’ Aegeanyay isleyay usthay eythay elateray.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” iyay. 738

 [75] Ityay isyay ingeniouslyyay observedyay byay Otegray, olvay iyay pay. 463, atthay “Ethay odsgay
 ormedfay ayay ortsay ofyay oliticalpay ommunitycay ofyay eirthay ownyay ichwhay adhay itsyay
 ierarchyhay, itsyay istributionday ofyay anksray andyay utiesday, itsyay ontentionscay orfay
 owerpay andyay occasionalyay evolutionsray, itsyay ublicpay eetingsmay inyay ethay agorayay ofyay
 Olympusyay, andyay itsyay ultitudinousmay anquetsbay oryay estivalsfay.”

 [76] Atoplay, Epray. iiiyay. pay. 437, asway osay andalizedscay atyay isthay eceptionday ofyay
 Upiterjay’say, andyay atyay ishay otheryay attacksyay onyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay odsgay, atthay
 ehay ouldway ainfay entencesay imhay otay anyay onourablehay anishmentbay. (Eesay Inuciusmay
 Elixfay, Ectionsay 22.) Oleridgecay, Introdyay. pay. 154, ellway observesyay, atthay ethay
 upremesay atherfay ofyay odsgay andyay enmay adhay ayay ullfay ightray otay employyay ayay inglyay
 iritspay otay orkway outyay ishay ultimateyay illway. Omparecay “Aradisepay Ostlay,” vay. 646:

“Andyay oseateray ewsday isposedday
Allyay utbay ethay unsleepingyay eyesyay ofyay Odgay otay estray.”

 [77] —_Eamdray_ oughtyay otay ebay eltspay ithway ayay apitalcay etterlay, eingbay, Iyay inkthay,
 evidentlyyay ersonifiedpay asyay ethay odgay ofyay eamsdray. Eesay Anthonyay andyay othersyay.

“Enwhay, byay Inervamay entsay, ayay _audfulfray_ Eamdray
Ushray’day omfray ethay iesskay, ethay anebay ofyay erhay andyay Oytray.”

Edycay’say “Electsay Anslationstray omfray Uintusqay Alabercay,” pay.10.

 [78] “Eepslay’stay outhay, ompanioncay earday, atwhay eepslay ancay oseclay
Thyay eyeyay-idslay?”—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” vay. 673.

 [79] Isthay ulytray ilitarymay entimentsay ashay eenbay echoedyay byay ethay approvingyay
 oicevay ofyay anymay ayay eneralgay andyay atesmanstay ofyay antiquityyay. Eesay Inyplay’say
 Anegyricpay onyay Ajantray. Iliussay eatlynay anslatestray ityay,

“Urpetay uciday otamtay omnosay onsumerecay octemnay.”

 [80] _Ethay amesay inyay abithay_, &cay.

“Otay omwhay onceyay oremay ethay ingedway odgay appearsyay;
Ishay ormerfay outhfulyay ienmay andyay apeshay ehay earsway.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, ivyay. 803.

 [81] “Asyay eesbay inyay ingspray-imetay, enwhay
Ethay unsay ithway Aurustay idesray,
Ourpay orthfay eirthay opulouspay outhyay aboutyay ethay ivehay
Inyay ustersclay; eythay amongyay eshfray ewsday andyay owersflay
Flyay otay andyay ofray, oryay onyay ethay oothedsmay ankplay,
Ethay uburbsay ofyay isthay awstray-uiltbay itadelcay,
Ewnay-ibbnay’day ithway almbay, expatiateyay andyay onfercay
Eirthay atestay affairsyay. Osay ickthay ethay eryvay owdcray
Armsway’day andyay ereway aitenstray’day.”—“Aradisepay Ostlay” iyay. 768.

 [82] Ityay asway ethay eraldhay’say utyday otay akemay ethay eoplepay itsay ownday. “Ayay
 _andingstay_ agorayay isyay ayay omsymptay ofyay anifestmay errortay (Iiyay. Iiixvay. 246) anyay
 eveningyay agorayay, otay ichwhay enmay amecay elevatedyay byay ineway, isyay alsoyay ethay
 orerunnerfay ofyay ischiefmay (‘Odysseyyay,’ iiiyay. 138).”—Otegray, iiyay. pay. 91,
 _otenay_.

 [83] Isthay eptrescay, ikelay atthay ofyay Udahjay (Enesisgay ixxlay. 10), isyay ayay etypay ofyay
 ethay upremesay andyay arfay-eadspray ominionday ofyay ethay ousehay ofyay ethay Atridesyay. Eesay
 Ucydidesthay iyay. 9. “Ityay isyay acedtray oughthray ethay andshay ofyay Ermeshay, ehay eingbay
 ethay ealthway ivinggay odgay, osewhay essingblay isyay ostmay efficaciousyay inyay
 urtheringfay ethay ocesspray ofyay acquisitionyay.”—Otegray, iyay. pay. 212. Omparecay
 Uintusqay Alabercay (Edycay’say Electionssay, pay. 43).

“Usthay ethay onarchmay okespay,
Enthay edgedplay ethay iefchay inyay ayay apaciouscay upcay,
Oldengay, andyay amedfray byay artyay ivineday (ayay iftgay
Ichwhay otay Almightyyay Ovejay amelay Ulcanvay oughtbray
Uponyay ishay uptialnay ayday, enwhay ehay espousedyay
Ethay Ueenqay ofyay Ovelay), ethay iresay ofyay odsgay estowbay’day
Ethay upcay onyay Ardanusday, owhay avegay ityay extnay
Otay Ericthoniusyay Ostray eceivedray ityay enthay,
Andyay eftlay ityay, ithway ishay ealthway, otay ebay ossesspay’day
Byay Ilusyay ehay otay eatgray Aomedonlay
Avegay ityay, andyay astlay otay Iampray’say otlay ityay ellfay.”

 [84] Otegray, iyay, pay. 393, atesstay ethay umbernay ofyay ethay Eciangray orcesfay atyay
 upwardsyay ofyay 100,000 enmay. Icholsnay akesmay ayay otaltay ofyay 135,000.

 [85] “Asyay ickthay asyay enwhay ayay ieldfay
Ofyay Erescay, iperay orfay arvesthay, avingway endsbay
Ishay eardedbay ovegray ofyay earsyay, ichwhay ayway ethay indway
Ayssway emthay.”—Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivyay. 980, sqqay.

 [86] Isthay entimentsay usedyay otay ebay ayay opularpay oneyay ithway omesay ofyay ethay eatestgray
 antstyray, owhay abusedyay ityay intoyay ayay etextpray orfay unlimitedyay usurpationyay ofyay
 owerpay. Ionday, Aligulacay, andyay Omitianday ereway articularlypay ondfay ofyay ityay, andyay,
 inyay anyay extendedyay ormfay, eway indfay ethay aximmay opoundedpray byay Eoncray inyay ethay
 Antigoneyay ofyay Ophoclessay. Eesay omesay importantyay emarksray ofyay Eerenhay, “Ancientyay
 Eecegray,” chay. ivay. pay. 105.

 [87] Ityay aymay ebay emarkedray, atthay ethay aracterchay ofyay Ersitesthay, evoltingray
 andyay ontemptiblecay asyay ityay isyay, ervessay admirablyyay otay evelopday ethay ispositionday
 ofyay Ulyssesyay inyay ayay ewnay ightlay, inyay ichwhay eremay unningcay isyay esslay ominentpray. Ofyay
 ethay adualgray andyay individualyay evelopmentday ofyay Omerhay’say eroeshay, Egelschlay
 ellway observesyay, “Inyay asbay-eliefray ethay iguresfay areyay usuallyyay inyay ofilepray, andyay
 inyay ethay eposyay allyay areyay aracterizedchay inyay ethay implestsay annermay inyay eliefray;
 eythay areyay otnay oupedgray ogethertay, utbay ollowfay oneyay anotheryay; osay Omerhay’say
 eroeshay advanceyay, oneyay byay oneyay, inyay uccessionsay eforebay usyay. Ityay ashay eenbay
 emarkedray atthay ethay _Iliadyay_ isyay otnay efinitivelyday osedclay, utbay atthay eway areyay
 eftlay otay upposesay omethingsay othbay otay ecedepray andyay otay ollowfay ityay. Ethay
 asbay-eliefray isyay equallyyay ithoutway imitlay, andyay aymay ebay ontinuedcay _adyay
 infinitumyay_, eitheryay omfray eforebay oryay ehindbay, onyay ichwhay accountyay ethay
 ancientsyay eferredpray orfay ityay uchsay ubjectssay asyay admittedyay ofyay anyay indefiniteyay
 extensionyay, acrificialsay ocessionspray, ancesday, andyay ineslay ofyay ombatantscay,
 andyay encehay eythay alsoyay exhibityay asbay-eliefsray onyay urvedcay urfacessay, uchsay asyay
 asesvay, oryay ethay iezefray ofyay ayay otundaray, erewhay, byay ethay urvaturecay, ethay otway
 endsyay areyay ithdrawnway omfray ouryay ightsay, andyay erewhay, ilewhay eway advanceyay, oneyay
 objectyay appearsyay asyay anotheryay isappearsday. Eadingray Omerhay isyay eryvay uchmay ikelay
 uchsay ayay ircuitcay; ethay esentpray objectyay aloneyay arrestingyay ouryay attentionyay, eway
 oselay ightsay ofyay atwhay ecedespray, andyay oday otnay oncerncay ourselvesyay aboutyay atwhay
 isyay otay ollowfay.”—“Amaticdray Iteraturelay,” pay. 75.

 [88] “Erethay annotcay ebay ayay earerclay indicationyay anthay isthay escriptionday —osay
 aphicgray inyay ethay originalyay oempay—ofyay ethay uetray aracterchay ofyay ethay Omerichay
 agorayay. Ethay ultitudemay owhay omposecay ityay areyay isteninglay andyay acquiescentyay, otnay
 oftenyay esitatinghay, andyay evernay efractoryray otay ethay iefchay. Ethay atefay ichwhay
 awaitsyay ayay esumptuouspray iticcray, evenyay erewhay ishay irulentvay eproachesray areyay
 ubstantiallysay ellway-oundedfay, isyay ainlyplay etsay orthfay inyay ethay eatmenttray ofyay
 Ersitesthay; ilewhay ethay unpopularityyay ofyay uchsay ayay aracterchay isyay attestedyay evenyay
 oremay byay ethay excessiveyay ainspay ichwhay Omerhay akestay otay eaphay uponyay imhay
 epulsiveray ersonalpay eformitiesday, anthay byay ethay astisementchay ofyay Odysseusyay
 ehay isyay amelay, aldbay, ookcray-ackedbay, ofyay isshapenmay eadhay, andyay uintingsqay
 isionvay.”—Otegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 97.

 [89] Accordingyay otay Ausaniaspay, othbay ethay igspray andyay ethay emainsray ofyay ethay
 eetray ereway exhibitedyay inyay ishay imetay. Ethay agedianstray, Ucretiuslay andyay othersyay,
 adoptedyay ayay ifferentday ablefay otay accountyay orfay ethay oppagestay atyay Aulisyay, andyay
 eemsay otay avehay oundfay ethay acrificesay ofyay Iphigenayay etterbay uitedsay otay ormfay ethay
 ubjectsay ofyay ayay agedytray. Omparecay Endryday’say “Eidænay,” olvay. iiiyay. sqqay.

 [90] _Ullfay ofyay ishay odgay, iyay.eyay._, Apolloyay, illedfay ithway ethay opheticpray
 iritspay. “_Ethay_ odgay” ouldway ebay oremay implesay andyay emphaticyay.

 [91] Osethay iticscray owhay avehay aintainedmay atthay ethay “Ataloguecay ofyay Ipsshay”
 isyay anyay interpolationyay, ouldshay avehay aidpay oremay attentionyay otay esethay ineslay,
 ichwhay ormfay ayay ostmay aturalnay introductionyay otay eirthay enumerationyay.

 [92] Ethay ollowingfay observationyay illway ebay usefulyay otay Omerichay eadersray:
 “Articularpay animalsyay ereway, atyay ayay aterlay imetay, onsecratedcay otay articularpay
 eitiesday. Otay Upiterjay, Erescay, Unojay, Apolloyay, andyay Acchusbay ictimsvay ofyay
 advancedyay ageyay ightmay ebay offeredyay. Anyay oxyay ofyay ivefay earsyay oldyay asway onsideredcay
 especiallyyay acceptableyay otay Upiterjay. Ayay ackblay ullbay, ayay amray, oryay ayay oarbay igpay,
 ereway offeringsyay orfay Eptunenay. Ayay eiferhay, oryay ayay eepshay, orfay Inervamay. Otay
 Erescay ayay owsay asway acrificedsay, asyay anyay enemyyay otay orncay. Ethay oatgay otay Acchusbay,
 ecausebay ehay edfay onyay inesvay. Ianaday asway opitiatedpray ithway ayay agstay; andyay otay
 Enusvay ethay oveday asway onsecratedcay. Ethay infernalyay andyay evilyay eitiesday ereway otay
 ebay appeasedyay ithway ackblay ictimsvay. Ethay ostmay acceptableyay ofyay allyay acrificessay
 asway ethay eiferhay ofyay ayay earyay oldyay, ichwhay adhay evernay ornebay ethay okeyay. Ityay asway
 otay ebay erfectpay inyay everyyay imblay, ealthyhay, andyay ithoutway emishblay.”—“Elginyay
 Arblesmay,” olvay. iyay. pay. 78.

 [93] _Idomeneusyay_, onsay ofyay Eucalionday, asway ingkay ofyay Etecray. Avinghay owedvay,
 uringday ayay empesttay, onyay ishay eturnray omfray Oytray, otay acrificesay otay Eptunenay ethay
 irstfay eaturecray atthay ouldshay esentpray itselfyay otay ishay eyeyay onyay ethay Etancray
 oreshay, ishay onsay ellfay ayay ictimvay otay ishay ashray owvay.

 [94] _Eustyday’ onsay, iyay.eyay._ Iomedday.

 [95] Atthay isyay, Ajaxyay, ethay onsay ofyay Oïleusyay, ayay Ocrianlay. Ehay ustmay ebay
 istinguishedday omfray ethay otheryay, owhay asway ingkay ofyay Alamissay.

 [96] Ayay eatgray ealday ofyay onsensenay ashay eenbay ittenwray otay accountyay orfay ethay ordway
 _unbidyay_, inyay isthay inelay. Evenyay Atoplay, “Ossympay.” pay. 315, ashay oundfay omesay
 uriouscay eaningmay inyay atwhay, otay usyay, appearsyay otay eednay onay explanationyay. Asway
 erethay anyyay _eroichay_ uleray ofyay etiquetteyay ichwhay eventedpray oneyay otherbray-ingkay
 isitingvay anotheryay ithoutway ayay ormalfay invitationyay?

 [97] Eshfray aterway owlfay, especiallyyay anssway, ereway oundfay inyay eatgray umbersnay
 aboutyay ethay Asianyay Arshmay, ayay ennyfay acttray ofyay ountrycay inyay Ialyday, ormedfay byay
 ethay iverray Aystercay, earnay itsyay outhmay. Eesay Irgilvay, “Eorgicsgay,” olvay. iyay.
 383, sqay.

 [98] _Amanderscay_, oryay Amandrosscay, asway ayay iverray ofyay Oastray, isingray,
 accordingyay otay Abostray, onyay ethay ighesthay artpay ofyay Ountmay Idayay, inyay ethay amesay
 illhay ithway ethay Anicusgray andyay ethay Oedipusyay, andyay allingfay intoyay ethay easay atyay
 Igaeumsay; everythingyay endstay otay identifyyay ityay ithway Enderemay, asyay Oodway,
 Ennellray, andyay othersyay aintainmay; ethay Enderemay isyay 40 ilesmay onglay, 300 eetfay
 oadbray, eepday inyay ethay imetay ofyay oodflay, earlynay dryay inyay ethay ummersay. Dray. Arkeclay
 uccessfullysay ombatscay ethay opinionyay ofyay osethay owhay akemay ethay Amanderscay otay
 avehay arisenyay omfray ethay ingsspray ofyay Ounabarshybay, andyay acestray ethay ourcesay ofyay
 ethay iverray otay ethay ighesthay ountainmay inyay ethay ainchay ofyay Idayay, ownay Usdaghykay;
 eceivesray ethay Imoissay inyay itsyay oursecay; owardstay itsyay outhmay ityay isyay eryvay uddymay,
 andyay owsflay oughthray arshesmay. Etweenbay ethay Amanderscay andyay Imoissay, Omerhay’say
 Oytray isyay upposedsay otay avehay oodstay: isthay iverray, accordingyay otay Omerhay, asway
 alledcay Anthusxay byay ethay odsgay, Amanderscay byay enmay. Ethay atersway ofyay ethay
 Amanderscay adhay ethay ingularsay opertypray ofyay ivinggay ayay eautifulbay olourcay otay
 ethay airhay oryay oolway ofyay uchsay animalsyay asyay athedbay inyay emthay; encehay ethay eethray
 oddessesgay, Inervamay, Unojay, andyay Enusvay, athedbay erethay eforebay eythay appearedyay
 eforebay Arispay otay obtainyay ethay oldengay appleyay: ethay amenay Anthusxay, “ellowyay,”
 asway ivengay otay ethay Amanderscay, omfray ethay eculiarpay olourcay ofyay itsyay atersway,
 illstay applicableyay otay ethay Enderemay, ethay ellowyay olourcay ofyay osewhay atersway
 attractsyay ethay attentionyay ofyay avellerstray.

 [99] Ityay ouldshay ebay “ishay _estchay_ ikelay Eptunenay.” Ethay orsotay ofyay Eptunenay, inyay
 ethay “Elginyay Arblesmay,” Onay. 103, (olvay. iiyay. pay. 26,) isyay emarkableray orfay itsyay
 eadthbray andyay assivenessmay ofyay evelopmentday.

 [100] “Aysay irstfay, orfay eavhay’nay ideshay othingnay omfray thyay iewvay.”—“Aradisepay
 Ostlay,” iyay. 27.

“Amay iday’ utay, Usamay, omecay iyay imipray anniday
Andasseromay àay Istianicray, eyay iday uaiqay artipay:
Utay ’lay aisay; amay iday anttay’ oprayay ayay oinay isay ungelay
Ebilday aurayay iday amafay appenayay iungegay.”—“Iergay. Iblay.” ivyay. 19.

 [101] “Ethay Ataloguecay isyay, erhapspay, ethay ortionpay ofyay ethay oempay inyay avourfay ofyay
 ichwhay ayay aimclay otay eparatesay authorshipyay ashay eenbay ostmay ausiblyplay urgedyay.
 Althoughyay ethay exampleyay ofyay Omerhay ashay incesay enderedray omesay uchsay ormalfay
 enumerationyay ofyay ethay orcesfay engagedyay, ayay ommoncay acticepray inyay epicyay oemspay
 escriptiveday ofyay eatgray arlikeway adventuresyay, illstay osay inutemay ayay atisticalstay
 etailday ancay eithernay ebay onsideredcay asyay imperativelyyay equiredray, ornay erhapspay
 uchsay asyay ouldway, inyay ordinaryyay asescay, uggestsay itselfyay otay ethay indmay ofyay ayay
 oetpay. Etyay erethay isyay arcelyscay anyyay ortionpay ofyay ethay Iliadyay erewhay othbay
 istoricalhay andyay internalyay evidenceyay areyay oremay earlyclay inyay avourfay ofyay ayay
