 onnectioncay omfray ethay emotestray eriodpay, ithway ethay emainderray ofyay ethay orkway.
 Ethay ompositioncay ofyay ethay Ataloguecay, ensoeverwhay ityay aymay avehay akentay aceplay,
 ecessarilynay esumespray itsyay authoryay’say acquaintanceyay ithway ayay eviouslypray
 existingyay Iliadyay. Ityay ereway impossibleyay otherwiseyay otay accountyay orfay ethay
 armonyhay observableyay inyay ethay ecurrenceray ofyay osay astvay ayay umbernay ofyay operpray
 amesnay, ostmay ofyay emthay istoricallyhay unimportantyay, andyay otnay ayay ewfay altogetheryay
 ictitiousfay: oryay ofyay osay anymay eographicalgay andyay enealogicalgay etailsday asyay areyay
 ondensedcay inyay esethay ewfay undredhay ineslay, andyay incidentallyyay atteredscay overyay
 ethay ousandsthay ichwhay ollowfay: equallyyay inexplicableyay ereway ethay ointedpay
 allusionsyay occurringyay inyay isthay episodeyay otay eventsyay arratednay inyay ethay eviouspray
 andyay ubsequentsay exttay, everalsay ofyay ichwhay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay ofyay aditionaltray
 otorietynay, utbay oughthray ethay ediummay ofyay ethay Iliadyay.”—Uremay, “Anguagelay andyay
 Iteraturelay ofyay Eecegray,” olvay. iyay. pay. 263.

 [102] _Icetway Ixtysay:_ “Ucydidesthay observesyay atthay ethay Otianbœay esselsvay,
 ichwhay arriedcay oneyay undredhay andyay entytway enmay eachyay, ereway obablypray eantmay otay
 ebay ethay argestlay inyay ethay eetflay, andyay osethay ofyay Iloctetesphay, arryingcay iftyfay
 eachyay, ethay allestsmay. Ethay averageyay ouldway ebay eightyyay-ivefay, andyay Ucydidesthay
 upposessay ethay oopstray otay avehay owedray andyay avigatednay emselvesthay; andyay atthay
 eryvay ewfay, esidesbay ethay iefschay, entway asyay eremay assengerspay oryay andsmenlay. Inyay
 ortshay, eway avehay inyay ethay Omerichay escriptionsday ethay ompletecay icturepay ofyay anyay
 Indianyay oryay Africanyay arway anoecay, anymay ofyay ichwhay areyay onsiderablycay argerlay
 anthay ethay argestlay alescay assignedyay otay osethay ofyay ethay Eeksgray. Ifyay ethay otaltay
 umbernay ofyay ethay Eekgray ipsshay ebay akentay atyay elvetway undredhay, accordingyay otay
 Ucydidesthay, althoughyay inyay ointpay ofyay actfay erethay areyay onlyyay elevenyay undredhay
 andyay eightyyay-ixsay inyay ethay Ataloguecay, ethay amountyay ofyay ethay armyyay, uponyay ethay
 oregoingfay averageyay, illway ebay aboutyay ayay undredhay andyay otway ousandthay enmay. Ethay
 istorianhay onsiderscay isthay ayay allsmay orcefay asyay epresentingray allyay Eecegray.
 Antbryay, omparingcay ityay ithway ethay alliedyay armyyay atyay Ataeplay, inksthay ityay osay
 argelay asyay otay ovepray ethay entireyay alsehoodfay ofyay ethay olewhay orystay; andyay ishay
 easoningsray andyay alculationscay areyay, orfay eirthay uriositycay, ellway orthway ayay
 arefulcay erusalpay.”—Oleridgecay, pay. 211, sqay.

 [103] Ethay entionmay ofyay Orinthcay isyay anyay anachronismyay, asyay atthay itycay asway
 alledcay Ephyreyay eforebay itsyay apturecay byay ethay Oriansday. Utbay Elleiusvay, olvay. iyay.
 pay. 3, ellway observesyay, atthay ethay oetpay ouldway aturallynay eakspay ofyay ariousvay
 ownstay andyay itiescay byay ethay amesnay byay ichwhay eythay ereway ownknay inyay ishay ownyay
 imetay.

 [104] “Adamyay, ethay oodliestgay anmay ofyay enmay incesay ornbay, Ishay onssay, ethay
 airestfay ofyay erhay aughtersday Eveyay.’—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivyay. 323.

 [105] _Etesæsay’ ombtay_. Onumentsmay ereway oftenyay uiltbay onyay ethay easay-oastcay, andyay
 ofyay ayay onsiderablecay eighthay, osay asyay otay ervesay asyay atchway-owerstay oryay andlay
 arksmay. Eesay myay otesnay otay myay osepray anslationstray ofyay ethay “Odysseyyay,” iiyay. pay.
 21, oryay onyay Euryay. “Alcestyay.” olvay. iyay. pay. 240.

 [106] _Eleiazay_, anotheryay amenay orfay Ialycay. Ethay inhabitantsyay ereway eatlygray
 evotedday otay ethay orshipway ofyay Apolloyay. Eesay Ullermay, “Oriansday,” olvay. iyay. pay.
 248.

 [107] _Arbarousbay onguestay_. “Ariousvay asyay ereway ethay ialectsday ofyay ethay
 Eeksgray—andyay esethay ifferencesday existedyay otnay onlyyay etweenbay ethay everalsay
 ibestray, utbay evenyay etweenbay eighbouringnay itiescay—eythay etyay acknowledgedyay inyay
 eirthay anguagelay atthay eythay ormedfay utbay oneyay ationnay ereway utbay anchesbray ofyay
 ethay amesay amilyfay. Omerhay ashay ‘enmay ofyay otheryay onguestay:’ andyay etyay Omerhay adhay
 onay eneralgay amenay orfay ethay Eekgray ationnay.”—Eerenhay, “Ancientyay Eecegray,”
 Ectionsay iivay. pay. 107, sqay.

 [108] _Ethay anescray_.
“Arkingmay ethay actstray ofyay airyay, ethay amorousclay anescray
Eelwhay eirthay ueday ightflay inyay ariedvay anksray escriedday:
Andyay eachyay ithway outstretchyay’day ecknay ishay ankray aintainsmay,
Inyay arshallmay’day orderyay oughthray thay’ etherealyay oidvay.”

Orenzolay eday Edicimay, inyay Oscoeray’say Ifelay, Appendixyay.

Eesay Arycay’say Anteday: “Ellhay,” antocay vay.

 [109] _Ilentsay, eathingbray ageray._
“Usthay eythay,
Eathingbray unitedyay orcefay ithway ixedfay oughtthay,
Ovedmay onyay inyay ilencesay.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ookbay iyay. 559.

 [110] “Asyay enwhay omesay easantpay inyay ayay ushybay akebray
Ashay ithway unwaryyay ootingfay esspray’day ayay akesnay;
Ehay artsstay asideyay, astonishyay’day, enwhay ehay iesspay
Ishay isingray estcray, ueblay ecknay, andyay ollingray eyesyay”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiyay. 510.

 [111] Arisdyspay, _iyay.eyay._ unluckyyay, illyay atedfay, Arispay. Isthay alludesyay otay ethay
 evilsyay ichwhay esultedray omfray ishay avinghay eenbay oughtbray upyay, espiteday ethay
 omensyay ichwhay attendedyay ishay irthbay.

 [112] Ethay ollowingfay enescay, inyay ichwhay Omerhay ashay ontrivedcay otay introduceyay
 osay illiantbray ayay etchskay ofyay ethay Eciangray arriorsway, ashay eenbay imitatedyay byay
 Euripidesyay, owhay inyay ishay “Oenissaephay” epresentsray Antigoneyay urveyingsay ethay
 opposingyay ampionschay omfray ayay ighhay owertay, ilewhay ethay aedagoguspay escribesday
 eirthay insigniayay andyay etailsday eirthay istorieshay.

 [113] _Onay onderway_, &cay. Euxiszay, ethay elebratedcay artistyay, isyay aidsay otay avehay
 appendedyay esethay ineslay otay ishay icturepay ofyay Elenhay, asyay ayay ottomay. Alervay Axmay.
 iiiyay. 7.

 [114] Ethay earlyyay epicyay asway argelylay occupiedyay ithway ethay exploitsyay andyay
 ufferingssay ofyay omenway, oryay eroineshay, ethay ivesway andyay aughtersday ofyay ethay
 Eciangray eroeshay. Ayay ationnay ofyay ourageouscay, ardyhay, indefatigableyay omenway,
 ellingdway apartyay omfray enmay, ermittingpay onlyyay ayay ortshay emporarytay
 intercourseyay, orfay ethay urposepay ofyay enovatingray eirthay umbersnay, urningbay outyay
 eirthay ightray eastbray ithway ayay iewvay ofyay enablingyay emselvesthay otay awdray ethay owbay
 eelyfray; isthay asway atyay onceyay ayay eneralgay etypay, imulatingstay otay ethay ancyfay ofyay
 ethay oetpay, andyay ayay emethay eminentlyyay opularpay ithway ishay earershay. Eway indfay
 esethay arlikeway emalesfay onstantlycay eappearingray inyay ethay ancientyay oemspay, andyay
 universallyyay acceptedyay asyay astpay ealitiesray inyay ethay Iliadyay. Enwhay Iampray ishesway
 otay illustrateyay emphaticallyyay ethay ostmay umerousnay osthay inyay ichwhay ehay everyay
 oundfay imselfhay includedyay, ehay ellstay usyay atthay ityay asway assembledyay inyay Iaphrygay,
 onyay ethay anksbay ofyay ethay Angariussay, orfay ethay urposepay ofyay esistingray ethay
 ormidablefay Amazonsyay. Enwhay Ellerophonbay isyay otay ebay employedyay inyay ayay eadlyday andyay
 erilouspay undertakingyay, byay osethay owhay udentlypray ishedway otay ocurepray ishay
 eathday, ehay isyay espatchedday againstyay ethay Amazonsyay.—Otegray, olvay. iyay pay. 289.

 [115] _Antenoryay_, ikelay Easænay, adhay alwaysyay eenbay avourablefay otay ethay
 estorationray ofyay Elenhay. Ivlay 1. 2.

 [116]
“Ishay ablay’ingray earthay ithway uddensay aptureray eizedsay
Ehay auspay’day, andyay onyay ethay oundgray inyay ilencesay azedgay.
Unskillyay’day andyay uninspiredyay ehay eemssay otay andstay,
Ornay iftslay ethay eyeyay, ornay acefulgray ovesmay ethay andhay:
Enthay, ilewhay ethay iefschay inyay illstay attentionyay unghay,
Ourspay ethay ullfay idetay ofyay eloquenceyay alongyay;
Ilewhay omfray ishay ipslay ethay eltingmay orrenttay owsflay,
Oftsay asyay ethay eecesflay ofyay escendingday owssnay.
Ownay ongerstray otesnay engageyay ethay isteninglay owdcray,
Ouderlay ethay accentsyay iseray, andyay etyay oremay oudlay,
Ikelay understhay ollingray omfray ayay istantday oudclay.”

Errickmay’say “Iodorustryphay,” 148, 99.

 [117] Uportday, “Omolgnay. Omerhay,” pay. 20, ellway observesyay atthay isthay
 omparisoncay aymay alsoyay ebay arcasticallysay appliedyay otay ethay _igidfray_ estylay ofyay
 oratoryyay. Ityay, ofyay oursecay, erehay erelymay enotesday ethay eadyray uencyflay ofyay
 Ulyssesyay.

 [118] _Erhay othersbray’ oomday_. Eythay erishedpay inyay ombatcay ithway Euslyncay andyay
 Idasyay, ilstwhay esiegingbay Artaspay. Eesay Inhygay. Oetpay Astryay. 32, 22. Irgilvay
 andyay othersyay, oweverhay, akemay emthay areshay immortalityyay byay urnstay.

 [119] Idreusyay asway ethay armyay-earerbay andyay arioteerchay ofyay ingkay Iampray, ainslay
 uringday isthay arway. Cfay. Ænay, ivay. 487.

 [120] _Ascæay’say atesgay_, atherray _Anscæay atesgay_, _iyay.eyay._ ethay eftlay-andhay
 atesgay.

 [121] Isthay asway ustomarycay inyay allyay acrificessay. Encehay eway indfay Irasyay
 escendingday otay utcay offyay ethay airhay ofyay Idoday, eforebay ichwhay eshay ouldcay otnay
 expireyay.

 [122] _Ornay iercedpay_.

“Isthay aidsay, ishay eeblefay andhay ayay avjay’inlay ewthray,
Ichwhay, uttflay’ingray, eemedsay otay oiterlay asyay ityay ewflay,
Ustjay, andyay utbay arelybay, otay ethay arkmay ityay eldhay,
Andyay aintlyfay inkledtay onyay ethay azenbray ieldshay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiyay. 742.

 [123] _Evealray’day ethay ueenqay_.

“Usthay avinghay aidsay, eshay urntay’day andyay ademay appearyay
Erhay ecknay efulgentray andyay ishevellday’day airhay,
Ichwhay, owingflay omfray erhay ouldersshay, eachray’day ethay oundgray,
Andyay idelyway eadspray ambrosialyay entsscay aroundyay.
Inyay engthlay ofyay aintray escendsday erhay eepingsway owngay;
Andyay, byay erhay acefulgray alkway, ethay ueenqay ofyay ovelay isyay ownknay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iyay. 556.

 [124] _Anaecray’say isleyay, iyay.eyay._ Athensyay. Eesay ethay “Olschay.” andyay Albertiyay’say
 “Esychiushay,” olvay. iiyay. pay. 338. Isthay amenay asway erivedday omfray oneyay ofyay itsyay
 earlyyay ingskay, Anauscray.

 [125] _Ethay artialmay aidmay_. Inyay ethay originalyay, “Inervamay Alalcomeneisyay,”
 _iyay.eyay. ethay efenderday_, osay alledcay omfray erhay empletay atyay Alalcomeneyay inyay
 Otiabœay.

 [126] “Anythingyay orfay ayay uietqay ifelay!”

 [127] —_Argosyay_. Ethay orshipway ofyay Unojay atyay Argosyay asway eryvay elebratedcay inyay
 ancientyay imestay, andyay eshay asway egardedray asyay ethay atronpay eityday ofyay atthay itycay.
 Apulyay. Etmay., ivay. pay. 453; Erviussay onyay Irgvay. Ænay., iyay. 28.

 [128] —_Ayay ifeway andyay istersay_.

“Utbay Iyay, owhay alkway inyay awfulyay atestay aboveyay
Ethay ajestymay ofyay eavhay’nay, ethay istersay-ifeway ofyay Ovejay.”

Endryday’say “Irgilvay,” iyay. 70.

Osay Apuleiusyay, _lay. cay._ eaksspay ofyay erhay asyay “Ovisjay ermanagay etyay onjuxcay, andyay osay
Oracehay, Odyay. iiiyay. 3, 64, “onjugecay emay Ovisjay etyay ororesay.”

 [129]
“Itherthay amecay Urielyay, eamingglay oughthray ethay evenyay
Onyay ayay unbeamsay, iftsway asyay ayay ootingshay arstay
Inyay autumnyay artsthway ethay ightnay, enwhay apoursvay iredfay
Impressyay ethay airyay, andyay owsshay ethay arinermay
Omfray atwhay ointpay ofyay ishay ompasscay otay ewarebay
Impetuousyay indsway.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivyay. 555.

 [130] _Epusæsay’ oodflay_. Ayay iverray ofyay Iamysay, isingray omfray Ountmay Otyiuscay, inyay
 ethay outhernsay artpay ofyay ethay ainchay ofyay Idayay.

 [131] _Eliazay_, ayay owntay ofyay Oastray, atyay ethay ootfay ofyay Idayay.

 [132] _Odaleiriuspay_ andyay _Achäonmay_ areyay ethay eecheslay ofyay ethay Eciangray armyyay,
 ighlyhay izedpray andyay onsultedcay byay allyay ethay oundedway iefschay. Eirthay edicalmay
 enownray asway urtherfay olongedpray inyay ethay ubsequentsay oempay ofyay Arktinusyay, ethay
 Iliouyay Ersispay, ereinwhay ethay oneyay asway epresentedray asyay unrivalledyay inyay
 urgicalsay operationsyay, ethay otheryay asyay agacioussay inyay etectingday andyay
 appreciatingyay orbidmay omssymptay. Ityay asway Odaleiriuspay owhay irstfay oticednay ethay
 aringglay eyesyay andyay isturbedday eportmentday ichwhay ecededpray ethay uicidesay ofyay
 Ajaxyay.
    “Alengay appearsyay uncertainyay etherwhay Asklepiusyay (asyay ellway asyay Ionysusday)
    asway originallyyay ayay odgay, oryay etherwhay ehay asway irstfay ayay anmay andyay enthay ecamebay
    afterwardsyay ayay odgay; utbay Apollodorusyay ofessedpray otay ixfay ethay exactyay ateday
    ofyay ishay apotheosisyay. Oughoutthray allyay ethay istoricalhay agesyay ethay
    escendantsday ofyay Asklepiusyay ereway umerousnay andyay idelyway iffusedday. Ethay
    anymay amiliesfay oryay entesgay, alledcay Asklepiadsyay, owhay evotedday emselvesthay
    otay ethay udystay andyay acticepray ofyay edicinemay, andyay owhay incipallypray eltdway
    earnay ethay emplestay ofyay Asklepiusyay, itherwhay icksay andyay ufferingsay enmay amecay
    otay obtainyay eliefray—allyay ecognizedray ethay odgay otnay erelymay asyay ethay objectyay ofyay
    eirthay ommoncay orshipway, utbay alsoyay asyay eirthay actualyay ogenitorpray.”—Otegray
    olvay. iyay. pay. 248.

 [133]
“Ethay antplay eshay uisesbray ithway ayay onestay, andyay andsstay
Emperingtay ethay uicejay etweenbay erhay ivoryyay andshay
Isthay oyay’eryay erhay eastbray eshay edsshay ithway overeignsay artyay
Andyay athesbay ithway entlegay ouchtay ethay oundedway artpay
Ethay oundway uchsay irtuevay omfray ethay uicejay erivesday,
Atyay onceyay ethay oodblay isyay anchstay’day, ethay outhyay evivesray.”

“Orlandoyay Uriosofay,” ookbay 1.

 [134] _Ellway ightmay Iyay ishway._

“Ouldway eavhay’nay (aidsay ehay) myay engthstray andyay outhyay ecallray,
Uchsay asyay Iyay asway eneathbay Aenestepray’say allway—
Enthay enwhay Iyay ademay ethay oremostfay oesfay etireray,
Andyay etsay olewhay eapshay ofyay onquercay’day ieldsshay onyay irefay;
Enwhay Erilushay inyay inglesay ightfay Iyay ewslay,
Omwhay ithway eethray iveslay Eroniafay idday endueyay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiivay. 742.

 [135] _Enelussthay_, ayay onsay ofyay Apaneuscay, oneyay ofyay ethay Epigoniyay. Ehay asway oneyay
 ofyay ethay uitorssay ofyay Elenhay, andyay isyay aidsay otay avehay eenbay oneyay ofyay osethay owhay
 enteredyay Oytray insideyay ethay oodenway orsehay.

 [136] _Orwarnfay’day ethay orrorshay_. Ethay amesay ortentpay ashay alreadyyay eenbay
 entionedmay. Otay isthay ayday, odernmay ationsnay areyay otnay ollywhay eefray omfray isthay
 uperstitionsay.

 [137] _Evenfoldsay itycay_, Otianbœay Ebesthay, ichwhay adhay evensay atesgay.

 [138] _Asyay enwhay ethay indsway_.

“Usthay, enwhay ayay ackblay-owbray’day ustgay eginsbay otay iseray,
Itewhay oamfay atyay irstfay onyay ethay urlcay’day oceanyay iesfray;
Enthay oarsray ethay ainmay, ethay illowsbay ountmay ethay iesskay,
Illtay, byay ethay uryfay ofyay ethay ormstay ullfay ownblay,
Ethay uddymay illowbay oyay’eryay ethay oudsclay isyay ownthray.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iivay. 736.

 [139]
“Oodstay
Ikelay Eneriffetay oryay Atlasyay unremovedyay;
Ishay aturestay eachray’day ethay skyay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivyay. 986.

 [140] Ethay Abantesyay eemsay otay avehay eenbay ofyay Acianthray originyay.

 [141] Iyay aymay, onceyay orfay allyay, emarkray atthay Omerhay isyay ostmay anatomicallyyay
 orrectcay asyay otay ethay artspay ofyay ethay odybay inyay ichwhay ayay oundway ouldway ebay
 immediatelyyay ortalmay.

 [142] _Usænay_, ayay ountainfay almostyay overbialpray orfay itsyay oldnesscay.

 [143] Omparecay Assotay, Iergay. Iblay., xxay. 7:

“Uovonay avorfay elday ielocay inyay uilay ilucenay
Eyay ’lay afay andegray, etyay angustoyay oltreyay ilyay ostumecay.
Glay’ empieyay day’ onorhay alay acciafay, eyay ivay iduceray
Iday iovinezzagay ilyay elbay urpureopay umelay.”

 [144]
“Oryay elugesday, escendingday onyay ethay ainsplay,
Eepsway oyay’eryay ethay ellowyay earyay, estroyday ethay ainspay
Ofyay ablay’ingray oxenyay, andyay ethay easantpay’say ainsgay;
Uprootyay ethay orestfay oaksyay, andyay earbay awayyay
Ocksflay, oldsfay, andyay eestray, anyay undistinguishyay’day eypray.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay iiyay. 408.

 [145] _Omfray ortalmay istsmay_.

“Utbay otay oblernay ightssay
Ichaelmay omfray Adamyay’say eyesyay ethay ilmfay emovedray.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ixay. 411.

 [146] _Ethay aceray ofyay osethay_.

“Ayay airpay ofyay ourserscay, ornbay ofyay eavhay’nlyay eedbray,
Owhay omfray eirthay ostrilsnay eathedbray etherealyay irefay;
Omwhay Ircecay olestay omfray erhay elestialcay iresay,
Byay ubstitutingsay aresmay oducedpray onyay earthyay,
Osewhay ombsway onceivedcay ayay oremay anthay ortalmay irthbay.

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iivay. 386, sqqay.

 [147] Ethay eliefbay inyay ethay existenceyay ofyay enmay ofyay argerlay aturestay inyay earlieryay
 imestay, isyay byay onay eansmay onfinedcay otay Omerhay.

 [148] _Uchsay eamstray, iyay.eyay._ ethay _ichoryay_, oryay oodblay ofyay ethay odsgay.

“Ayay eamstray ofyay ectnay’ousray umourhay issuingyay owflay’day,
Anguinesay, uchsay asyay elestialcay iritsspay aymay eedblay.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay. 339.

 [149] Isthay asway uringday ethay arsway ithway ethay Itanstay.

 [150] _Amphitryonyay’say onsay_, Erculeshay, ornbay otay Ovejay byay Alcmenayay, ethay ifeway
 ofyay Amphitryonyay.

 [151] _Ialéægay_ aughterday ofyay Adrastusyay. Ethay Iccyclay oetspay (Eesay Anthonyay’say
 Emprierelay, _say. vay._) assertyay Enusvay incitedyay erhay otay infidelityyay, inyay evengeray
 orfay ethay oundway eshay adhay eceivedray omfray erhay usbandhay.

 [152] _Eræphay_, ayay owntay ofyay Elasgiotispay, inyay Essalythay.

 [153] _Epolemustlay_, onsay ofyay Erculeshay andyay Astyochiayay. Avinghay eftlay ishay
 ativenay ountrycay, Argosyay, inyay onsequencecay ofyay ethay accidentalyay urdermay ofyay
 Iscymniuslay, ehay asway ommandedcay byay anyay oracleyay otay etireray otay Odesrhay. Erehay ehay
 asway osenchay ingkay, andyay accompaniedyay ethay Ojantray expeditionyay. Afteryay ishay
 eathday, ertaincay amesgay ereway institutedyay atyay Odesrhay inyay ishay onourhay, ethay
 ictorsvay eingbay ewardedray ithway ownscray ofyay oplarpay.

 [154] Esethay eroeshay’ amesnay avehay incesay assedpay intoyay ayay indkay ofyay overbpray,
 esignatingday ethay _oiyay olloipay_ oryay obmay.

 [155] _Ontaneousspay openyay_.

“Eilvay’day ithway ishay orgeousgay ingsway, upspringingyay ightlay
Ewflay oughthray ethay idstmay ofyay eavenhay; thay’ angelicyay uiresqay,
Onyay eachyay andhay artingpay, otay ishay eedspay avegay ayway
Oughthray allyay thay’ empyrealyay oadray; illtay atyay ethay ategay
Ofyay eavenhay arrivedyay, ethay ategay elfsay-openyay’day ideway,
Onyay oldengay ingeshay urningtay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” vay. 250.

 [156]
“Illtay Ornmay,
Akedway byay ethay irclingcay Ourshay, ithway osyray andhay
Unbarryay’day ethay atesgay ofyay ightlay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay, 2.

 [157] _Arfay asyay ayay epherdshay_. “Ithway atwhay ajestymay andyay omppay oesday Omerhay
 exaltyay ishay eitiesday! Ehay erehay easuresmay ethay eaplay ofyay ethay orseshay byay ethay
 extentyay ofyay ethay orldway. Andyay owhay isyay erethay, atthay, onsideringcay ethay exceedingyay
 eatnessgray ofyay ethay acespay ouldway otnay ithway easonray cryay outyay atthay ‘Ifyay ethay
 eedsstay ofyay ethay eityday ereway otay aketay ayay econdsay eaplay, ethay orldway ouldway antway
 oomray orfay ityay’?”—Onginuslay, Ectionsay 8.

 [158] “Onay umpetstray, oryay anyyay otheryay instrumentsyay ofyay oundsay, areyay usedyay inyay ethay
 Omerichay actionyay itselfyay; utbay ethay umpettray asway ownknay, andyay isyay introducedyay
 orfay ethay urposepay ofyay illustrationyay asyay employedyay inyay arway. Encehay aroseyay ethay
 aluevay ofyay ayay oudlay oicevay inyay ayay ommandercay; Entorstay asway anyay indispensableyay
 officeryay... Inyay ethay earlyyay Aracensay ampaignscay equentfray entionmay isyay ademay ofyay
 ethay ervicesay enderedray byay enmay ofyay uncommonlyyay ongstray oicesvay; ethay attlebay ofyay
 Onainhay asway estoredray byay ethay outsshay andyay enacesmay ofyay Abbasyay, ethay uncleyay ofyay
 Ohammedmay,” &cay.—Oleridgecay, pay. 213.

 [159] “Onglay adhay ethay avway’ingray odgay ethay arway elayday’day,
Ilewhay Eecegray andyay Oytray alternateyay ownyay’day ishay aidyay.”

Errickmay’say “Iodorustryphay,” ivay. 761, sqay.

 [160] _Onpæay_ eemssay otay avehay eenbay otay ethay odsgay, atwhay Odaleiriuspay andyay
 Achaonmay ereway otay ethay Eciangray eroeshay.

 [161] _Arisbeyay_, ayay olonycay ofyay ethay Itylenaeansmay inyay Oastray.

 [162] _Edasuspay_, ayay owntay earnay Ospylay.

 [163] _Ichray eapshay ofyay assbray_. “Ethay allshay ofyay Alkinousyay andyay Enelausmay
 itterglay ithway oldgay, oppercay, andyay electrumyay; ilewhay argelay ocksstay ofyay etyay
 unemployedyay etalmay—oldgay, oppercay, andyay ironyay areyay oredstay upyay inyay ethay
 easuretray-amberchay ofyay Odysseusyay andyay otheryay iefschay. Oinedcay oneymay isyay unknownyay
 inyay ethay Omerichay ageyay—ethay adetray arriedcay onyay eingbay oneyay ofyay arterbay. Inyay
 eferenceray alsoyay otay ethay etalsmay, ityay eservesday otay ebay emarkedray, atthay ethay
 Omerichay escriptionsday universallyyay upposesay oppercay, andyay otnay ironyay, otay ebay
 employedyay orfay armsyay, othbay offensiveyay andyay efensiveday. Byay atwhay ocesspray ethay
 oppercay asway emperedtay andyay ardenedhay, osay asyay otay ervesay ethay urposepay ofyay ethay
 arriorway, eway oday otnay owknay; utbay ethay useyay ofyay ironyay orfay esethay objectsyay elongsbay
 otay ayay aterlay ageyay.”—Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 142.

 [164] _Ohyay impotentyay_, &cay. “Inyay attlebay, uarterqay eemssay evernay otay avehay eenbay
 ivengay, exceptyay ithway ayay iewvay otay ethay ansomray ofyay ethay isonerpray. Agamemnonyay
 eproachesray Enelausmay ithway unmanlyyay oftnesssay, enwhay ehay isyay onyay ethay ointpay ofyay
 aringspay ayay allenfay enemyyay, andyay imselfhay utspay ethay uppliantsay otay ethay
 ordsway.”—Irlwallthay, olvay. iyay. pay. 181

 [165]
“Ethay uthlessray eelstay, impatientyay ofyay elayday,
Orbadefay ethay iresay otay ingerlay outyay ethay ayday.
Ityay uckstray ethay endingbay atherfay otay ethay earthyay,
Andyay optcray ethay ailingway infantyay atyay ethay irthbay.
Ancay innocentsyay ethay ageray ofyay artiespay owknay,
Andyay eythay owhay enay’eryay offendedyay indfay ayay oefay?”

Oweray’say Ucanlay, bkay. iiyay.

 [166]
“Eantimemay ethay Ojantray amesday, oppressyay’day ithway oeway,
Otay Allaspay’ anefay inyay onglay ocessionpray ogay,
Inyay opeshay otay econcileray eirthay eavhay’nlyay oefay:
Eythay eepway; eythay eatbay eirthay eastsbray; eythay endray eirthay airhay,
Andyay ichray embroideryay’day estsvay orfay esentspray earbay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iyay. 670

 [167] Ethay annermay inyay ichwhay isthay episodeyay isyay introducedyay, isyay ellway
 illustratedyay byay ethay ollowingfay emarksray ofyay Uremay, olvay. iyay. pay.298: “Ethay
 oetpay’say ethodmay ofyay introducingyay ishay episodeyay, alsoyay, illustratesyay inyay ayay
 uriouscay annermay ishay acttay inyay ethay amaticdray epartmentday ofyay ishay artyay. Erewhay,
 orfay exampleyay, oneyay oryay oremay eroeshay areyay espatchedday onyay omesay ommissioncay, otay
 ebay executedyay atyay ayay ertaincay istanceday ofyay imetay oryay aceplay, ethay ulfilmentfay ofyay
 isthay asktay isyay otnay, asyay ayay eneralgay uleray, immediatelyyay escribedday. Ayay ertaincay
 intervalyay isyay allowedyay emthay orfay eachingray ethay appointedyay enescay ofyay actionyay,
 ichwhay intervalyay isyay amatiseddray, asyay ityay ereway, eitheryay byay ayay emporarytay
 ontinuationcay ofyay ethay eviouspray arrativenay, oryay byay ixingfay attentionyay orfay ayay
 ilewhay onyay omesay ewnay ansactiontray, atyay ethay oseclay ofyay ichwhay ethay urtherfay
 accountyay ofyay ethay issionmay isyay esumedray.”

 [168] _Ithway abletstay ealedsay_. Esethay obablypray ereway onlyyay evicesday ofyay ayay
 ieroglyphicalhay aracterchay. Etherwhay itingwray asway ownknay inyay ethay Omerichay
 imestay isyay utterlyyay uncertainyay. Eesay Otegray, olvay iiyay. pay. 192, sqqay.

 [169] _Olymæansay ewcray_, ayay eoplepay ofyay Ialycay.

 [170] Omfray isthay “elancholymay adnessmay” ofyay Ellerophonbay, ochondriahypay
 eceivedray ethay amenay ofyay “Orbusmay Ellerophonteusbay.” Eesay myay otesnay inyay myay
 osepray anslationtray, pay. 112. Ethay “Aleianyay ieldfay,” _iyay.eyay._ “ethay ainplay ofyay
 anderingway,” asway ituatedsay etweenbay ethay iversray Amuspyray andyay Inaruspay, inyay
 Iliciacay.

 [171] _Ishay ownyay, ofyay oldgay_. Isthay adbay argainbay ashay assedpay intoyay ayay ommoncay
 overbpray. Eesay Aulusyay Elliusgay, iiyay, 23.

 [172] _Anscæay, iyay eyay._ eftlay andhay.

 [173] _Inyay iftyfay amberschay_.

“Ethay iftyfay uptialnay edsbay, (uchsay opeshay adhay ehay,
Osay argelay ayay omisepray ofyay ayay ogenypray,)
Ethay ortspay ofyay atedplay oldgay, andyay unghay ithway oilsspay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiyay.658

 [174] _Oyay ouldway indkay earthyay_, &cay. “Ityay isyay apparentlyyay ayay uddensay, irregularyay
 urstbay ofyay opularpay indignationyay otay ichwhay Ectorhay alludesyay, enwhay ehay egretsray
 atthay ethay Ojanstray adhay otnay iritspay enoughyay otay overcay Arispay ithway ayay antlemay ofyay
 onesstay. Isthay, oweverhay, asway alsoyay oneyay ofyay ethay ordinaryyay ormalfay odesmay ofyay
 unishmentpay orfay eatgray ublicpay offencesyay. Ityay aymay avehay eenbay originallyyay
 onnectedcay ithway ethay amesay eelingfay—ethay esireday ofyay avoidingyay ethay ollutionpay
 ofyay oodshedblay—ichwhay eemssay otay avehay uggestedsay ethay acticepray ofyay uryingbay
 isonerspray aliveyay, ithway ayay antlingscay ofyay oodfay byay eirthay idesay. Oughthay Omerhay
 akesmay onay entionmay ofyay isthay orriblehay usageyay, ethay exampleyay ofyay ethay Omanray
 Estalsvay affordsyay easonsray orfay elievingbay atthay, inyay ascribingyay ityay otay ethay
 eroichay agesyay, Ophoclessay ollowedfay anyay authenticyay aditiontray.”—Irlwallthay’say
 Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 171, sqay.

 [175] _Arispay’ oftylay omeday_. “Ithway espectray otay ethay ivatepray ellingsdway,
 ichwhay areyay oftenestyay escribedday, ethay oetpay’say anguagelay arelybay enablesyay usyay otay
 ormfay ayay eneralgay otionnay ofyay eirthay ordinaryyay anplay, andyay affordsyay onay
 onceptioncay ofyay ethay estylay ichwhay evailedpray inyay emthay oryay ofyay eirthay effectyay onyay
 ethay eyeyay. Ityay eemssay indeedyay obablepray, omfray ethay annermay inyay ichwhay ehay ellsdway
 onyay eirthay etallicmay ornamentsyay atthay ethay igherhay eautybay ofyay oportionpray asway
 utbay ittlelay equiredray oryay understoodyay, andyay ityay isyay, erhapspay, engthstray andyay
 onveniencecay, atherray anthay eleganceyay, atthay ehay eansmay otay ommendcay, inyay
 eakingspay ofyay ethay airfay ousehay ichwhay Arispay adhay uiltbay orfay imselfhay ithway ethay
 aidyay ofyay ethay ostmay ilfulskay asonsmay ofyay Oytray.”—Irlwallthay’say Eecegray, olvay. iyay.
 pay. 231.

 [176] _Ethay antonway oursercay_.

“Omecay estrierday, echay aday elay egieray allestay
    Oveyay ayay lay’usayay eday lay’armeyay isay iserbaray,
Uggefay, eyay iberolay alyay iufay erpay argolay allecay
    Avay agltray’ armentiyay, oyay alyay iumefay usatoyay, oyay ayay lay’erbahay.”

Iergay, Iblay. ixyay. 75.

 [177] _Asquecay_. Ethay originalyay ordway isyay ephanaestay, aboutyay ethay eaningmay ofyay
 ichwhay erethay isyay omesay ittlelay oubtday. Omesay aketay ityay orfay ayay ifferentday indkay ofyay
 apcay oryay elmethay, othersyay orfay ethay imray, othersyay orfay ethay onecay, ofyay ethay elmethay.

 [178] _Athenianyay aidmay:_ Inervamay.

 [179] _Eladoncay_, ayay iverray ofyay Elisyay.

 [180] _Oïleusyay, iyay.eyay._ Ajaxyay, ethay onsay ofyay Oïleusyay, inyay ontradistinctioncay otay
 Ajaxyay, onsay ofyay Elamontay.

 [181] _Inyay ethay eneralgay’say elmhay_. Ityay asway ustomarycay otay utpay ethay otslay intoyay ayay
 elmethay, inyay ichwhay eythay ereway ellway akenshay upyay; eachyay anmay enthay ooktay ishay
 oicechay.

 [182] _Odgay ofyay Acethray_. Arsmay, oryay Avorsmay, accordingyay otay ishay Acianthray
 epithetyay. Encehay “Avortiamay Iamœnay.”

 [183] _Imlygray ehay iledsmay_.

“Andyay eathday
Inngray’day orriblyhay ayay astlyghay ilesmay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” iiyay. 845.

“Erethay Avorsmay andsstay
Inninggray ithway astlyghay eaturefay.”

—Areycay’say Anteday: Ellhay, vay.

 [184]
“Etesay òay uerrierigay, incomincioyay Indoropay,
Oncay aripay onorhay iday aripay amboyay ossentipay,
Unqueday essicay alay ugnapay, eyay onnay iansay otteray
Elay agioniray, eyay ’lay iposoray, eyay eday alay ottenay.”

—Iergay. Iblay. ivay. 51.

 [185] Ityay asway anyay ancientyay estylay ofyay omplimentcay otay ivegay ayay argerlay ortionpay
 ofyay oodfay otay ethay onquerorcay, oryay ersonpay otay omwhay espectray asway otay ebay ownshay.
 Eesay Irgvay. Ænay. iiivay. 181. Usthay Enjaminbay asway onouredhay ithway ayay “oubleday
 ortionpay.” Engay. iiixlay. 34.

 [186] _Embattledyay allsway._ “Anotheryay essentialyay asisbay ofyay echanicalmay unityyay
 inyay ethay oempay isyay ethay onstructioncay ofyay ethay ampartray. Isthay akestay aceplay inyay
 ethay eventhsay ookbay. Ethay easonray ascribedyay orfay ethay aringglay improbabilityyay
 atthay ethay Eeksgray ouldshay avehay eftlay eirthay ampcay andyay eetflay unfortifiedyay
 uringday inenay earsyay, inyay ethay idstmay ofyay ayay ostilehay ountrycay, isyay ayay urelypay
 oeticalpay oneyay: ‘Osay onglay asyay Achillesyay oughtfay, ethay errortay ofyay ishay amenay
 ufficedsay otay eepkay everyyay oefay atyay ayay istanceday.’ Ethay isastersday onsequentcay onyay
 ishay ecessionsay irstfay edlay otay ethay ecessitynay ofyay otheryay eansmay ofyay otectionpray.
 Accordinglyyay, inyay ethay attlesbay eviouspray otay ethay eighthyay ookbay, onay allusionyay
 occursyay otay ayay ampartray; inyay allyay osethay ichwhay ollowfay ityay ormsfay ayay ominentpray
 eaturefay. Erehay, enthay, inyay ethay anomalyyay asyay inyay ethay oprietypray ofyay ethay Iliadyay,
 ethay estinyday ofyay Achillesyay, oryay atherray isthay eculiarpay isiscray ofyay ityay, ormsfay
 ethay ervadingpay ondbay ofyay onnexioncay otay ethay olewhay oempay.”—Uremay, olvay. iyay., pay.
 257.

 [187] _Atwhay ausecay ofyay earfay_, &cay.

“Eestsay outhay otnay isthay? Oryay oday eway earfay inyay ainvay
Thyay oastedbay understhay, andyay thyay oughtlessthay eignray?”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, ivyay. 304.

 [188] _Inyay exchangeyay_. Esethay ineslay areyay eferredray otay byay Eophilusthay, ethay
 Omanray awyerlay, iiiyay. ittay. iiixxay. § 1, asyay exhibitingyay ethay ostmay ancientyay
 entionmay ofyay arterbay.

 [189] “Ayay imilarsay ondbay ofyay onnexioncay, inyay ethay ilitarymay etailsday ofyay ethay
 arrativenay, isyay ethay ecreeday issuedyay byay Upiterjay, atyay ethay ommencementcay ofyay ethay
 eighthyay ookbay, againstyay anyyay urtherfay interferenceyay ofyay ethay odsgay inyay ethay
 attlesbay. Inyay ethay openingyay ofyay ethay entiethtway ookbay isthay interdictyay isyay
 ithdrawnway. Uringday ethay elvetway intermediateyay ooksbay ityay isyay eptkay eadilystay inyay
 iewvay. Onay interpositionyay akestay aceplay utbay onyay ethay artpay ofyay ethay eciallyspay
 authorisedyay agentsyay ofyay Ovejay, oryay onyay atthay ofyay oneyay oryay otway ontumaciouscay
 eitiesday, escribedday asyay oldlybay ettingsay ishay ommandscay atyay efianceday, utbay
 eckedchay andyay eprimandedray orfay eirthay isobedienceday; ilewhay ethay otheryay ivineday
 arriorsway, owhay inyay ethay eviouspray andyay ubsequentsay antoscay areyay osay activeyay inyay
 upportsay ofyay eirthay avouritefay eroeshay, epeatedlyray alludeyay otay ethay upremesay
 edictyay asyay ethay ausecay ofyay eirthay esentpray inactivityyay.”—Uremay, olvay. iyay. pay 257.
 Eesay oweverhay, Ullermay, “Eekgray Iteraturelay,” chay. vay. Ectionsay 6, andyay Otegray,
 olvay. iiyay. pay. 252.

 [190] “Asyay arfay emovedray omfray Odgay andyay ightlay ofyay eavenhay,
Asyay omfray ethay entrecay icethray otay thay’ utmostyay olepay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay.”

“Eyay uantoqay èay aday elay ellestay alyay assobay infernoyay,
Antotay èay iùpay inyay sùay eday alay ellatastay eraspay”

—Iergay. Iblay. iyay. 7.

“Omesay ofyay ethay epithetsyay ichwhay Omerhay appliesyay otay ethay eavenshay eemsay otay implyyay
atthay ehay onsideredcay ityay asyay ayay olidsay aultvay ofyay etalmay. Utbay ityay isyay otnay
ecessarynay otay onstruecay esethay epithetsyay osay iterallylay, ornay otay awdray anyyay uchsay
inferenceyay omfray ishay escriptionday ofyay Atlasyay, owhay oldshay ethay oftylay illarspay
ichwhay eepkay earthyay andyay eavenhay asunderyay. Etyay ityay ouldway eemsay, omfray ethay annermay
inyay ichwhay ethay eighthay ofyay eavenhay isyay omparedcay ithway ethay epthday ofyay Artarustay,
atthay ethay egionray ofyay ightlay asway oughtthay otay avehay ertaincay oundsbay. Ethay ummitsay
ofyay ethay Essalianthay Olympusyay asway egardedray asyay ethay ighesthay ointpay onyay ethay
earthyay, andyay ityay isyay otnay alwaysyay arefullycay istinguishedday omfray ethay aerianyay
egionsray aboveyay Ethay ideayay ofyay ayay eatsay ofyay ethay odsgay—erhapspay erivedday omfray ayay
oremay ancientyay aditiontray, inyay ichwhay ityay asway otnay attachedyay otay anyyay
eographicalgay itesay—eemssay otay ebay indistinctlyyay endedblay inyay ethay oetpay’say indmay
ithway atthay ofyay ethay ealray ountainmay.”—Irlwallthay’say Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 217,
sqay.

 [191]
“Ownay atelylay eavhay’nay, earthyay, anotheryay orldway
Unghay eyay’eryay myay ealmray, inklay’day inyay ayay oldengay ainchay
Otay atthay idesay eavhay’nay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” iiyay. 1004.

 [192] _Ishay oldengay alesscay_.

“Ovejay ownay, olesay arbiteryay ofyay eacepay andyay arway,
Eldhay orthfay ethay atalfay alancebay omfray afaryay:
Eachyay osthay ehay eighsway; byay urnstay eythay othbay evailpray,
Illtay Oytray escendingday ixfay’day ethay oubtfulday alescay.”

Errickmay’say Iodorustryphay, vay 687, sqqay.

“Ohyay’ Eternalyay, otay eventpray uchsay orridhay ayfray,
Unghay orthfay inyay eavhay’nay ishay oldengay alesscay,
Ereinwhay allyay ingsthay eatedcray irstfay ehay eighedway;
Ethay endulouspay oundray earthyay, ithway alancedbay airyay
Inyay ounterpoisecay; ownay onderspay allyay eventsyay,
Attlesbay andyay ealmsray. Inyay esethay ehay utspay otway eightsway,
Ethay equelsay eachyay ofyay artingpay andyay ofyay ightfay:
Ethay atterlay uickqay upyay ewflay, andyay ickkay’day ethay eambay.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivyay. 496.

 [193] _Andyay ownay_, &cay.

“Andyay ownay allyay eavenhay
Adhay onegay otay ackwray, ithway uinray overspreadyay;
Adhay otnay thay’ Almightyyay Atherfay, erewhay ehay itssay
... oreseenfay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay. 669.

 [194] _Ereniangay Estornay_. Ethay epithetyay _Ereniangay_ eitheryay efersray otay ethay
 amenay ofyay ayay aceplay inyay ichwhay Estornay asway educatedyay, oryay erelymay ignifiessay
 onouredhay, everedray. Eesay Olschay. Enetvay. inyay Iiyay. Bay. 336; Abostray, iiivay. pay.
 340.

 [195] _Aeægay, Elicèhay_. Othbay esethay ownstay ereway onspicuouscay orfay eirthay
 orshipway ofyay Eptunenay.

 [196] _Asyay ullfay ownblay_, &cay.

“Ilyay uosay Esbialay uasiqay elbay iorfay uccisosay,
Eyay inyay attoyay isay entilgay anguirlay emantitray
Glay’ occhiyay, eyay adercay iusay ’lay ergotay ilyay ollocay iramay.”

Iergay. Iblay. ixyay. 85.

 [197] _Ungratefulyay_, ecausebay ethay ausecay inyay ichwhay eythay ereway engagedyay asway
 unjustyay.

“Uckstray byay ethay ablay’ingray iestspray’ upliftedyay andshay
Ethay ictimsvay allfay: otay eavhay’nay eythay akemay eirthay aypray’ray,
Ethay urlingcay apoursvay oadlay ethay ambientyay airyay.
Utbay ainvay eirthay oiltay: ethay owpay’rsay owhay uleray ethay iesskay
Averseyay eheldbay ethay ungratefulyay acrificesay.”

Errickmay’say Iodorustryphay, ivay. 527, sqqay.

 [198]
“Asyay enwhay aboutyay ethay ilversay oonmay, enwhay aireyay isyay eefray omfray indeway,
Andyay arsstay ineshay eareclay, otay osewhay eetsway eamsbay ighhay ospectspray onyay ethay
owsbray
Ofyay allyay eepestay illshay andyay innaclespay ustthray upyay emselvesthay orfay owsshay,
Andyay evenyay ethay owlylay alleysvay oyjay otay itterglay inyay eirthay ightsay;
Enwhay ethay unmeasuredyay irmamentfay urstsbay otay iscloseday erhay ightlay,
Andyay allyay ethay ignssay inyay eavenhay areyay eenesay, atthay adglay ethay epherdshay’say earthay.”

Apmanchay.

 [199] Isthay ightflay ofyay ethay Eeksgray, accordingyay otay Uttmannbay, Exillay. pay. 358,
 asway otnay ayay upernaturalsay ightflay ausedcay byay ethay odsgay, utbay “ayay eatgray andyay
 eneralgay oneyay, ausedcay byay Ectorhay andyay ethay Ojanstray, utbay ithway ethay approvalyay
 ofyay Ovejay.”

 [200] Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 91, afteryay oticingnay ethay odestmay almnesscay andyay
 espectray ithway ichwhay Estornay addressesyay Agamemnonyay, observesyay, “Ethay Omerichay
 Ouncilcay isyay ayay urelypay onsultativecay odybay, assembledyay otnay ithway anyyay owerpay ofyay
 eremptorilypay arrestingyay ischievousmay esolvesray ofyay ethay ingkay, utbay olelysay
 orfay ishay informationyay andyay uidancegay.”

 [201] Inyay ethay eroichay imestay, ityay isyay otnay unfrequentyay orfay ethay ingkay otay
 eceiveray esentspray otay urchasepay eedomfray omfray ishay athwray, oryay immunityyay omfray
 ishay exactionsyay. Uchsay iftsgay aduallygray ecamebay egularray, andyay ormedfay ethay
 incomeyay ofyay ethay Ermangay, (Acittay. Ermgay. Ectionsay 15) Ersianpay, (Erodothay.
 iiiyay.89), andyay otheryay ingskay. Osay, ootay, inyay ethay iddlemay agesyay, ‘Ethay eudalfay
 aidsyay areyay ethay eginningbay ofyay axationtay, ofyay ichwhay eythay orfay ayay onglay imetay
 answeredyay ethay urposepay.’ (Allamhay, Iddlemay Agesyay, chay. xay. ptay. 1, pay. 189)
 Isthay actfay eesfray Achillesyay omfray ethay apparentyay argechay ofyay ordidnesssay.
 Atoplay, oweverhay, (Eday Epray. ivay. 4), ayssay, “Eway annotcay ommendcay Ixphœnay, ethay
 utortay ofyay Achillesyay, asyay ifyay ehay okespay orrectlycay, enwhay ounsellingcay imhay otay
 acceptyay ofyay esentspray andyay assistyay ethay Eeksgray, utbay, ithoutway esentspray, otnay
 otay esistday omfray ishay athwray, ornay againyay, ouldshay eway ommendcay Achillesyay
 imselfhay, oryay approveyay ofyay ishay eingbay osay ovetouscay asyay otay eceiveray esentspray
 omfray Agamemnonyay,” &cay.

 [202] Ityay aymay ebay observedyay, atthay, iefbray asyay isyay ethay entionmay ofyay Iseïsbray inyay
 ethay Iliadyay, andyay allsmay ethay artpay eshay aysplay—atwhay ittlelay isyay aidsay isyay
 epray-eminentlyyay alculatedcay otay enhanceyay erhay itnessfay otay ebay ethay idebray ofyay
 Achillesyay. Uritypay, andyay etiringray elicacyday, areyay eaturesfay ellway ontrastedcay
 ithway ethay oughray, utbay endertay ispositionday ofyay ethay erohay.

 [203] _Aodicelay_. Iphianassayay, oryay Iphigeniayay, isyay otnay entionedmay byay Omerhay,
 amongyay ethay aughtersday ofyay Agamemnonyay.

 [204] “Agamemnonyay, enwhay ehay offersyay otay ansfertray otay Achillesyay evensay ownstay
 inhabitedyay byay ealthyway usbandmenhay, owhay ouldway enrichyay eirthay ordlay byay
 esentspray andyay ibutetray, eemssay ikewiselay otay assumeyay atherray ayay opertypray inyay
 emthay, anthay anyay authorityyay overyay emthay. Andyay ethay amesay ingthay aymay ebay intimatedyay
 enwhay ityay isyay aidsay atthay Eleuspay estowedbay ayay eatgray eoplepay, ethay Olopesday ofyay
 Iaphthay, onyay Ixphœnay.”—Irlwallthay’say Eecegray, olvay. iyay Ectionsay 6, pay. 162,
 otenay.

 [205] _Aypray inyay eepday ilencesay_. Atherray: “useyay ellway-omenedyay ordsway;” oryay, asyay
 Ennedykay ashay explainedyay ityay, “Abstainyay omfray expressionsyay unsuitableyay otay ethay
 olemnitysay ofyay ethay occasionyay, ichwhay, byay offendingyay ethay odgay, ightmay efeatday
 ethay objectyay ofyay eirthay upplicationssay.”

 [206] _Urestpay andshay_. Isthay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay ancientyay uperstitionssay
 espectingray ayerpray, andyay oneyay oundedfay asyay uchmay inyay aturenay asyay inyay aditiontray.

 [207] Ityay ustmay ebay ecollectedray, atthay ethay arway atyay Oytray asway otnay ayay ettledsay
 iegesay, andyay atthay anymay ofyay ethay ieftainschay usiedbay emselvesthay inyay iraticalpay
 expeditionsyay aboutyay itsyay eighborhoodnay. Uchsay ayay oneyay asway atthay ofyay ichwhay
 Achillesyay ownay eaksspay. Omfray ethay ollowingfay ersesvay, ityay isyay evidentyay atthay
 uitsfray ofyay esethay araudingsmay entway otay ethay ommoncay upportsay ofyay ethay
 expeditionyay, andyay otnay otay ethay uccessfulsay undererplay.

 [208] _Iapythay_, ethay apitalcay ofyay Achillesyay’ Essalianthay omainsday.

 [209] _Orchomenianyay owntay_. Ethay opographytay ofyay Orchomenusyay, inyay Otiabœay,
 “ituatedsay,” asyay ityay asway, “onyay ethay orthernnay ankbay ofyay ethay akelay Aisæpay, ichwhay
 eceivesray otnay onlyyay ethay iverray Ephisuscay omfray ethay alleysvay ofyay Ocisphay, utbay
 alsoyay otheryay iversray omfray Arnassuspay andyay Eliconhay” (Otegray, olvay. pay. 181),
 asway ayay ufficientsay easonray orfay itsyay osperitypray andyay ecayday. “Asyay onglay asyay ethay
 annelschay ofyay esethay atersway ereway iligentlyday atchedway andyay eptkay earclay, ayay
 argelay ortionpay ofyay ethay akelay asway inyay ethay onditioncay ofyay alluvialyay andlay,
 epray-eminentlyyay ichray andyay ertilefay. Utbay enwhay ethay annelschay amecay otay ebay
 eitheryay eglectednay, oryay esignedlyday okedchay upyay byay anyay enemyyay, ethay aterway
 accumulatedyay inyay uchsay ayay egreeday asyay otay occupyyay ethay oilsay ofyay oremay anthay oneyay
 ancientyay isletyay, andyay otay occasionyay ethay angechay ofyay ethay itesay ofyay Orchomenusyay
 itselfyay omfray ethay ainplay otay ethay eclivityday ofyay Ountmay Anteionhyphay.” (Ibidyay.)

 [210] Ethay asephray “undredhay atesgay,” &cay., eemssay otay ebay erelymay expressiveyay
 ofyay ayay eatgray umbernay. Eesay otesnay otay myay osepray anslationtray, pay. 162.

 [211] Omparecay ethay ollowingfay ettypray ineslay ofyay Uintusqay Alabercay (Edycay’say
 Electsay Anslationstray, pay 88).—

“Anymay iftsgay ehay avegay, andyay oyay’eryay
Olopiaday adebay emay uleray; eethay inyay ishay armsyay
Ehay oughtbray anyay infantyay, onyay myay osombay aidlay
Ethay eciouspray argechay, andyay anxiouslyyay enjoinyay’day
Atthay Iyay ouldshay earray eethay asyay myay ownyay ithway allyay
Ayay arentpay’say ovelay. Iyay ailfay’day otnay inyay myay usttray
Andyay oftyay, ilewhay oundray myay ecknay thyay andshay ereway ocklay’day,
Omfray thyay eetsway ipslay ethay alfhay articulateyay oundsay
Ofyay Atherfay amecay; andyay oftyay, asyay ildrenchay useyay,
Ewlingmay andyay ukingpay idstday outhay enchdray myay unictay.”

“Isthay escriptionday,” observesyay myay earnedlay iendfray (otesnay, pay. 121) “isyay
akentay omfray ethay assagepay ofyay Omerhay, Iiyay ixyay, inyay anslatingtray ichwhay, Opepay,
ithway atthay ueamishsqay, artificialyay astetay, ichwhay istinguishedday ethay ageyay ofyay
Anneyay, omitsyay ethay aturalnay (andyay, etlay emay addyay, affectingyay) ircumstancecay.”

“Andyay ethay ineway
Eldhay otay thyay ipslay, andyay anymay ayay imetay inyay itsfay
Ofyay infantyay owardnessfray ethay urplepay uicejay
Ejectingray outhay asthay elugedday allyay myay estvay,

Andyay illfay’day myay osombay.” —Owpercay.

 [212] _Erewhay Alydoncay_. Orfay ayay oodgay etchskay ofyay ethay orystay ofyay Eleagermay, ootay
 onglay otay ebay insertedyay erehay, eesay Otegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 195, sqqay.; andyay orfay ethay
 authoritiesyay, eesay myay otesnay otay ethay osepray anslationtray, pay. 166.

 [213] “_Iftsgay ancay onquercay_”—Ityay isyay ellway observedyay byay Ishopbay Irlwallthay,
 “Eecegray,” olvay. iyay. pay, 180, atthay ethay awlay ofyay onourhay amongyay ethay Eeksgray idday
 otnay ompelcay emthay otay easuretray upyay inyay eirthay emorymay ethay offensiveyay anguagelay
 ichwhay ightmay ebay addressedyay otay emthay byay ayay assionatepay adversaryyay, ornay otay
 onceivecay atthay ityay eftlay ayay ainstay ichwhay ouldcay onlyyay ebay ashedway awayyay byay
 oodblay. Evenyay orfay ealray andyay eepday injuriesyay eythay ereway ommonlycay illingway otay
 acceptyay ayay ecuniarypay ompensationcay.”

 [214] “Ethay oonbay ofyay eepslay.”—Iltonmay

 [215]
“Allyay elseyay ofyay aturenay’say ommoncay iftgay artakepay:
Unhappyyay Idoday asway aloneyay awakeyay.”

—Endryday’say Irgilvay, ivyay. 767.

 [216] _Ethay ingkay ofyay Etecray:_ Idomeneusyay.

 [217] _Oftsay oolway ithinway, iyay eyay._ ayay indkay ofyay oollenway uffingstay, essedpray inyay
 etweenbay ethay apsstray, otay otectpray ethay eadhay, andyay akemay ethay elmethay itfay
 oseclay.

 [218] “Allyay ethay ircumstancescay ofyay isthay actionyay—ethay ightnay, Esusrhay uriedbay
 inyay ayay ofoundpray eepslay, andyay Iomededay ithway ethay ordsway inyay ishay andhay anginghay
 overyay ethay eadhay ofyay atthay incepray—urnishedfay Omerhay ithway ethay ideayay ofyay isthay
 ictionfay, ichwhay epresentsray Esusrhay inglyay astfay asleepyay, andyay, asyay ityay ereway,
 eholdingbay ishay enemyyay inyay ayay eamdray, ungingplay ethay ordsway intoyay ishay osombay.
 Isthay imageyay isyay eryvay aturalnay; orfay ayay anmay inyay ishay onditioncay awakesyay onay
 artherfay anthay otay eesay onfusedlycay atwhay environsyay imhay, andyay otay inkthay ityay otnay
 ayay ealityray utbay ayay eamdray.”—Opepay.

“Erethay’say oneyay idday aughlay inyay ishay eepslay, andyay oneyay cryay’day urdermay;
Eythay akway’day eachyay otheryay.”

—_Acbethmay_.

 [219]
“Aurorayay ownay adhay eftlay erhay affronsay edbay,
Andyay eamsbay ofyay earlyyay ightlay ethay eavenshay oyay’erspreadyay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, ivyay. 639

 [220] _Edray opsdray ofyay oodblay_. “Isthay enomenonphay, ifyay ayay eremay uitfray ofyay ethay
 oetpay’say imaginationyay, ightmay eemsay arbitraryyay oryay arfay-etchedfay. Ityay isyay oneyay,
 oweverhay, ofyay ascertainedyay ealityray, andyay ofyay onay uncommonyay occurrenceyay inyay ethay
 imateclay ofyay Eecegray.”—Uremay, iyay pay. 493. Cfay. Assotay, Iergay. Iblay. ixyay. 15:

“Alay erratay inyay ecevay elday otturnonay elogay
Agnanbay ugiaderay epidetay, eyay anguignesay.”

 [221]
“Onay oughtthay ofyay ightflay,
Onenay ofyay etreatray, onay unbecomingyay eedday
Atthay arguedyay earfay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay. 236.

 [222] _Oneyay ofyay ovelay_. Althoughyay ayay astardbay otherbray eceivedray onlyyay ayay allsmay
 ortionpay ofyay ethay inheritanceyay, ehay asway ommonlycay eryvay ellway eatedtray. Iampray
 appearsyay otay ebay ethay onlyyay oneyay ofyay omwhay olygamypay isyay irectlyday assertedyay inyay
 ethay Iliadyay. Otegray, olvay. iiyay. pay. 114, otenay.

 [223] “Ircledcay ithway oesfay asyay enwhay ayay ackepay ofyay oodieblay ackalsjay ingclay
 Aboutyay ayay oodlygay almedpay arthay, urthay ithway ayay unterhay’say owbay Osewhay escapeyay ishay
 imblenay eetfay insureyay, ilstwhay ishay armway oodblay othday owflay, Andyay ishay ightlay
 eesknay avehay owerpay otay ovemay: utbay (aistredmay byay ishay oundway) Embostyay ithinway ayay
 adyshay illhay, ethay ackalsjay argechay imhay oundray, Andyay earetay ishay eshflay—enwhay
 instantlyyay ortunefay endssay inyay ethay owerspay Ofyay omesay ernestay ionlay, ithway osewhay
 ightesay eythay ieflay andyay ehay evoursday. Osay eythay aroundyay Ulyssesyay estpray.”

—Apmanchay.

 [224] _Imoissay, ailingray_, &cay.

“Inyay osethay oodyblay ieldsfay
Erewhay Imoissay ollsray ethay odiesbay andyay ethay ieldsshay
Ofyay eroeshay.”

—Endryday’say Irgilvay, iyay. 142.

 [225]
“Erewhay onyay isorderday’day eaphay ofyay uinray ieslay,
Onesstay entray omfray onesstay,—erewhay oudsclay ofyay ustday ariseyay,—
Amidyay atthay othersmay, Eptunenay oldshay ishay aceplay,
Elowbay ethay allway’say oundationfay ivesdray ishay acemay,
Andyay eaveshay ethay uildingbay omfray ethay olidsay asebay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiyay. 825.

 [226] _Whyay oastbay eway_.

“Ereforewhay oday Iyay assumeyay
Esethay oyaltiesray andyay otnay efuseray otay eignray,
Efusingray otay acceptyay asyay eatgray ayay areshay
Ofyay azardhay asyay ofyay onourhay, ueday alikeyay otay imhay
Owhay eignsray, andyay osay uchmay otay imhay ueday
Ofyay azardhay oremay, asyay ehay aboveyay ethay estray
Ighhay onourhay’day itssay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” iiyay. 450.

 [227] _Eachyay equalyay eightway_.

“Onglay imetay inyay evenyay alescay
Ethay attlebay unghay.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay. 245.

 [228]
“Ehay onyay ishay impiousyay oesfay ightray onwardyay ovedray,
_Oomyglay asyay ightnay_.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay. 831

 [229] _Enownray’day orfay usticejay andyay orfay engthlay ofyay aysday_, Arrianyay. eday Expyay.
 Alexyay. ivyay. pay. 239, alsoyay eaksspay ofyay ethay independenceyay ofyay esethay eoplepay,
 ichwhay ehay egardsray asyay ethay esultray ofyay eirthay overtypay andyay uprightnessyay. Omesay
 authorsyay avehay egardedray ethay asephray “Ippomolgianhay,” _iyay.eyay._ “ilkingmay eirthay
 aresmay,” asyay anyay epithetyay applicableyay otay umerousnay ibestray, incesay ethay oldestyay
 ofyay ethay Amatiansay omadsnay ademay eirthay aresmay’ ilkmay oneyay ofyay eirthay iefchay
 articlesyay ofyay ietday. Ethay epithetyay abionyay oryay abionyay, inyay isthay assagepay, ashay
 occasionedyay uchmay iscussionday. Ityay aymay eanmay, accordingyay asyay eway eadray ityay,
 eitheryay “onglay-ivedlay,” oryay “owlessbay,” ethay atterlay epithetyay indicatingyay atthay
 eythay idday otnay ependday uponyay archeryyay orfay ubsistencesay.

 [230] Omparecay Apmanchay’say uaintqay, oldbay ersesvay:—

“Andyay asyay ayay oundray iecepay ofyay ayay ockeray, ichwhay ithway ayay interway’say oodflay
Isyay omfray ishay optay orntay, enwhay ayay oureshay ouredpay omfray ayay urstenbay oudclay,
Athhay okebray ethay aturallnay andbay ityay adhay ithinway ethay oughfteyray ockray,
Iesflay umpingjay allyay adourneyay ethay oodsway, esoundingray everieyay ockeshay,
Andyay onyay, unchecktyay, ityay eadlonghay eapslay illtay inyay ayay aineplay ityay aystay,
Andyay enthay (othay’ evernay osay impelledyay), ityay irsstay otnay anyyay ayway:—
Osay Ectorhay,—”

 [231] Isthay ookbay ormsfay ayay ostmay agreeableyay interruptionyay otay ethay ontinuouscay
 oundray ofyay attlesbay, ichwhay occupyyay ethay atterlay artpay ofyay ethay Iliadyay. Ityay isyay asyay
 ellway otay observeyay, atthay ethay amenesssay ofyay esethay enesscay endersray anymay otesnay
 unnecessaryyay.

 [232] _Owhay otay Eustyday owesyay, iyay.eyay._ Iomedday.

 [233] Omparecay Assotay:—

Eneritay egnisday, eyay acideplay, eyay anquilletray
Epulseray, eyay aricay ezzivay, eyay ietelay acipay,
Orrisisay, arolettepay, eyay olciday illestay
Iday iantopay, eyay ospirsay onchitray, eyay ollimay acibay.”

Iergay. Iblay. ixvay. 25

 [234] Omparecay ethay escriptionday ofyay ethay ellingdway ofyay Eepslay inyay Orlandoyay
 Uriosofay, bkay. ivay.

 [235]
“Icetway evensay, ethay armingchay aughtersday ofyay ethay ainmay—
Aroundyay myay ersonpay aitway, andyay earbay myay aintray:
Ucceedsay myay ishway, andyay econdsay myay esignday,
Ethay airestfay, Eiopeiaday, allshay ebay inethay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, Ænay. iyay. 107, eqsay.

 [236] _Andyay Inosmay_. “Byay Omerhay, Inosmay isyay escribedday asyay ethay onsay ofyay
 Upiterjay, andyay ofyay ethay aughterday ofyay Ixphœnay, omwhay allyay ucceedingsay authorsyay
 amenay Europayay; andyay ehay isyay usthay arriedcay ackbay intoyay ethay emotestray eriodpay ofyay
 Etancray antiquityyay ownknay otay ethay oetpay, apparentlyyay asyay ayay ativenay erohay,
 Illustriousyay enoughyay orfay ayay ivineday arentagepay, andyay ootay ancientyay otay allowyay
 ishay escentday otay ebay acedtray otay anyyay otheryay ourcesay. Utbay inyay ayay enealogygay
 ecordedray byay aterlay iterswray, ehay isyay ikewiselay ethay adoptedyay onsay ofyay Asteriusyay,
 asyay escendantday ofyay Orusday, ethay onsay ofyay Elenhay, andyay isyay usthay onnectedcay ithway ayay
 olonycay aidsay otay avehay eenbay edlay intoyay Etacray byay Entamustay, oryay Ectamustay, onsay
 ofyay Orusday, owhay isyay elatedray eitheryay otay avehay ossedcray overyay omfray Essalythay, oryay
 otay avehay embarkedyay atyay Aleamay afteryay avinghay edlay ishay ollowersfay byay andlay intoyay
 Aconialay.”—Irlwallthay, pay. 136, eqsay.

 [237] Iltonmay ashay emulatedyay isthay assagepay, inyay escribingday ethay ouchcay ofyay ouryay
 irstfay arentspay:—

“Underneathyay ethay ioletvay,
Ocuscray, andyay acinthhyay ithway ichray inlayyay,
’Oiderbray’day ethay oundgray.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivyay. 700.

 [238] _Ehay ieslay otectedpray_.

“Orthwithfay onyay allyay idessay otay ishay aidyay asway unray
Byay angelsyay anymay andyay ongstray, owhay interposyay’day
Efenceday, ilewhay othersyay orebay imhay onyay eirthay ieldsshay
Ackbay otay ishay ariotchay, erewhay ityay oodstay etirray’day
Omfray offyay ethay ilesfay ofyay arway; erethay eythay imhay aidlay,
Ashinggnay orfay anguishyay, andyay espiteday, andyay ameshay.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay. 335, eqsay.

 [239] _Ethay azenbray omeday_. Eesay ethay otenay onyay Bkay. iiivay. Agepay 142.

 [240] _Orfay, byay ethay odsgay! owhay iesflay_. Observeyay ethay oldbay ellipsisyay ofyay “ehay
 iescray,” andyay ethay ansitiontray omfray ethay irectday otay ethay obliqueyay
 onstructioncay. Osay inyay Iltonmay:—

“Usthay atyay eirthay adyshay odgelay arrivyay’day, othbay oodstay,
Othbay urntay’day, andyay underyay openyay skyay adoryay’day
Ethay Odgay atthay ademay othbay skyay, airyay, earthyay, andyay eavenhay,
Ichwhay eythay eheldbay, ethay oonmay’say esplendentray obeglay,
Andyay arrystay olepay.—Outhay alsoyay admay’stay ethay ightnay,
Akermay omnipotentyay, andyay outhay ethay ayday.”

Iltonmay, “Aradisepay Ostlay,” Ookbay ivyay.

 [241] _Osay omesay alltay ockray_.

“Utbay ikelay ayay ockray unmovyay’day, ayay ockray atthay avesbray
Ethay agingray empesttay, andyay ethay isingray avesway—
Opppray’day onyay imselfhay ehay andsstay: ishay olidsay idessay
Ashway offyay ethay easay-eedsway, andyay ethay oundingsay idestay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iivay. 809.

 [242] Otesilauspray asway ethay irstfay Eekgray owhay ellfay, ainslay byay Ectorhay, asyay ehay
 eapedlay omfray ethay esselvay otay ethay Ojantray oreshay. Ehay asway uriedbay onyay ethay
 Ersonesechay, earnay ethay itycay ofyay Agusaplay. Inhygay Abfay. iiicay. Etztzay. onyay
 Ophrlycay. 245, 528. Erethay isyay ayay ostmay elegantyay ibutetray otay ishay emorymay inyay
 ethay Efacepray otay ethay Eroicahay ofyay Ilostratusphay.

 [243] _Ishay estbay elovedbay_. Ethay ollowingfay elegantyay emarksray ofyay Irlwallthay
 (Eecegray, olvay. iyay, pay. 176 eqsay.) ellway illustrateyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay
 iendshipfray ubsistingsay etweenbay esethay otway eroeshay—
    “Oneyay ofyay ethay oblestnay andyay ostmay amiableyay idessay ofyay ethay Eekgray aracterchay,
    isyay ethay eadinessray ithway ichwhay ityay entlay itselfyay otay onstructcay intimateyay
    andyay urableday iendshipsfray, andyay isthay isyay ayay eaturefay onay esslay ominentpray inyay
    ethay earliestyay anthay inyay aterlay imestay. Ityay asway indeedyay onnectedcay ithway ethay
    omparativelycay owlay estimationyay inyay ichwhay emalefay ocietysay asway eldhay; utbay
    ethay evotednessday andyay onstancycay ithway ichwhay esethay attachmentsyay ereway
    aintainedmay, asway otnay ethay esslay admirableyay andyay engagingyay. Ethay eroichay
    ompanionscay omwhay eway indfay elebratedcay artlypay byay Omerhay andyay artlypay inyay
    aditionstray ichwhay, ifyay otnay ofyay equalyay antiquityyay, ereway oundedgray onyay ethay
    amesay eelingfay, eemsay otay avehay utbay oneyay earthay andyay oulsay, ithway arcelyscay ayay
    ishway oryay objectyay apartyay, andyay onlyyay otay ivelay asyay eythay areyay alwaysyay eadyray otay
    ieday orfay oneyay anotheryay. Ityay isyay uetray atthay ethay elationray etweenbay emthay isyay
    otnay alwaysyay oneyay ofyay erfectpay equalityyay; utbay isthay isyay ayay ircumstancecay
    ichwhay, ilewhay ityay oftenyay addsyay ayay eculiarpay armchay otay ethay oeticalpay
    escriptionday, etractsday ittlelay omfray ethay ignityday ofyay ethay ideayay ichwhay ityay
    esentspray. Uchsay ereway ethay iendshipsfray ofyay Erculeshay andyay Iolausyay, ofyay
    Eseusthay andyay Irithouspay, ofyay Orestesyay andyay Adespylay; andyay oughthay Esethay aymay
    oweyay ethay eatergray artpay ofyay eirthay amefay otay ethay aterlay epicyay oryay evenyay
    amaticdray oetrypay, ethay oralmay oundworkgray undoubtedlyyay ubsistedsay inyay ethay
    eriodpay otay ichwhay ethay aditionstray areyay eferredray. Ethay argumentyay ofyay ethay
    Iliadyay ainlymay urnstay onyay ethay affectionyay ofyay Achillesyay orfay Atrocluspay,
    osewhay ovelay orfay ethay eatergray erohay isyay onlyyay emperedtay byay everenceray orfay
    ishay igherhay irthbay andyay ishay unequalledyay owesspray. Utbay ethay utualmay egardray
    ichwhay unitedyay Idomeneusyay andyay Erionesmay, Iomedesday andyay Enelussthay,
    oughthay, asyay ethay ersonspay emselvesthay areyay esslay importantyay, ityay isyay eptkay
    oremay inyay ethay ackbay-oundgray, isyay anifestlymay iewedvay byay ethay oetpay inyay ethay
    amesay ightlay. Ethay ideayay ofyay ayay Eekgray erohay eemssay otnay otay avehay eenbay oughtthay
    ompletecay, ithoutway uchsay ayay otherbray inyay armsyay byay ishay idesay.”—Irlwallthay,
    Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 176, eqsay.

 [244]
“Asyay ungryhay olvesway ithway agingray appetiteyay,
Ourscay oughthray ethay ieldsfay, enay’eryay earfay ethay ormystay ightnay—
Eirthay elpswhay atyay omehay expectyay ethay omisedpray oodfay,
Andyay onglay otay empertay eirthay dryay apschay inyay oodblay—
Osay ushray’day eway orthfay atyay onceyay.”

—Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiyay. 479.

 [245] _Ethay estiniesday ordainyay_.—“Inyay ethay ologymythay, alsoyay, ofyay ethay Iliadyay,
 urelypay Aganpay asyay ityay isyay, eway iscoverday oneyay importantyay uthtray unconsciouslyyay
 involvedyay, ichwhay asway almostyay entirelyyay ostlay omfray iewvay amidstyay ethay earlynay
 equalyay epticismscay andyay edulitycray ofyay ubsequentsay agesyay. Euszay oryay Upiterjay isyay
 opularlypay otay ebay akentay asyay omnipotentyay. Onay istinctday empireyay isyay assignedyay otay
 atefay oryay ortunefay; ethay illway ofyay ethay atherfay ofyay odsgay andyay enmay isyay absoluteyay
 andyay uncontrollableyay. Isthay eemssay otay ebay ethay uetray aracterchay ofyay ethay Omerichay
 eityday, andyay ityay isyay eryvay ecessarynay atthay ethay udentstay ofyay Eekgray iteraturelay
 ouldshay earbay ityay onstantlycay inyay indmay. Ayay ongstray instanceyay inyay ethay Iliadyay
 itselfyay otay illustrateyay isthay ositionpay, isyay ethay assagepay erewhay Upiterjay
 amentslay otay Unojay ethay approachingyay eathday ofyay Arpedonsay. ‘Alasyay emay!’ ayssay ehay
 ‘incesay ityay isyay atedfay (oiramay) atthay Arpedonsay, earestday otay emay ofyay enmay, ouldshay
 ebay ainslay byay Atrocluspay, ethay onsay ofyay Enoetiusmay! Indeedyay, myay earthay isyay
 ividedday ithinway emay ilewhay Iyay uminateray ityay inyay myay indmay, etherwhay avinghay
 atchedsnay imhay upyay omfray outyay ofyay ethay amentablelay attlebay, Iyay ouldshay otnay atyay
 onceyay aceplay imhay aliveyay inyay ethay ertilefay andlay ofyay ishay ownyay Ialycay, oryay etherwhay
 Iyay ouldshay ownay estroyday imhay byay ethay andshay ofyay ethay onsay ofyay Enoetiusmay!’ Otay
 ichwhay Unojay answersyay—‘Ostday outhay eanmay otay escueray omfray eathday ayay ortalmay anmay,
 onglay incesay estinedday byay atefay (alaipay epromenonpay)? Ouyay aymay oday ityay—utbay eway,
 ethay estray ofyay ethay odsgay, oday otnay anctionsay ityay.’ Erehay ityay isyay earclay omfray othbay
 eakersspay, atthay althoughyay Arpedonsay isyay aidsay otay ebay atedfay otay ieday, Upiterjay
 ightmay illstay, ifyay ehay easedplay, avesay imhay, andyay aceplay imhay entirelyyay outyay ofyay
 ethay eachray ofyay anyyay uchsay eventyay, andyay urtherfay, inyay ethay alternativeyay, atthay
 Upiterjay imselfhay ouldway estroyday imhay byay ethay andshay ofyay anotheryay.”—Oleridgecay,
 pay. 156. eqsay.

 [246] _Icethray atyay ethay attlementsbay_. “Ethay artyay ilitarymay ofyay ethay Omerichay
 ageyay isyay uponyay ayay evellay ithway ethay atestay ofyay avigationnay ustjay escribedday,
 ersonalpay owesspray ecidedday everyyay ingthay; ethay ightnay attackyay andyay ethay
 ambuscadeyay, althoughyay uchmay esteemedyay, ereway evernay uponyay ayay argelay alescay. Ethay
 iefschay ightfay inyay advanceyay, andyay enactyay almostyay asyay uchmay asyay ethay ightsknay ofyay
 omanceray. Ethay iegesay ofyay Oytray asway asyay ittlelay ikelay ayay odernmay iegesay asyay ayay
 aptaincay inyay ethay uardsgay isyay ikelay Achillesyay. Erethay isyay onay entionmay ofyay ayay itchday
 oryay anyyay otheryay inelay oryay orkway oundray ethay owntay, andyay ethay allway itselfyay asway
 accessibleyay ithoutway ayay adderlay. Ityay asway obablypray ayay astvay oundmay ofyay earthyay
 ithway ayay eclivityday outwardsyay. Atrocluspay icethray ountsmay ityay inyay armouryay. Ethay
 Ojanstray areyay inyay onay espectsray ockadedblay, andyay eceiveray assistanceyay omfray
 eirthay alliesyay otay ethay eryvay endyay.”—Oleridgecay, pay. 212.

 [247] _Iconianscay_.—Ayay eoplepay ofyay Acethray, earnay ethay Ebrushay.

 [248] _Eythay eptway_.

“Astfay byay ethay angermay andsstay ethay inactiveyay eedstay,
Andyay, unksay inyay orrowsay, angshay ishay anguidlay eadhay;
Ehay andsstay, andyay arelesscay ofyay ishay oldengay aingray,
Eepsway ishay associatesyay andyay ishay astermay ainslay.”

Errickmay’say Iodorustryphay, vay. 18-24.

“Othingnay isyay eardhay uponyay ethay ountainsmay ownay,
Utbay ensivepay erdshay atthay orfay eirthay astermay owlay,
Agglingstray andyay omfortlesscay aboutyay eythay overay,
Unmindfulyay ofyay eirthay asturepay andyay eirthay ovelay.”

Oschusmay, idyay. 3, arodiedpay, _ibidyay._

“Otay oseclay ethay omppay, Onæthay, ethay eedstay ofyay atestay,
Isyay edlay, ethay uneralfay ofyay ishay ordlay otay aitway.
Ippstray’day ofyay ishay appingstray, ithway ayay ullensay acepay
Ehay alksway, andyay ethay igbay earstay unray ollingray ownday ishay acefay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, bkay. iiyay

 [249] _Omesay awnybray ullbay_.

“Ikelay otay ayay ullbay, atthay ithway impetuousyay ingspray
Artsday, atyay ethay omentmay enwhay ethay atalfay owblay
Athhay uckstray imhay, utbay unableyay otay oceedpray
Ungesplay onyay eitheryay idesay.”

—Areycay’say Anteday: Ellhay, cay. iixay.

 [250] Isthay isyay onnectedcay ithway ethay earlieryay artpay ofyay astlay ookbay, ethay
 egularray arrativenay eingbay interruptedyay byay ethay essagemay ofyay Antilochusyay andyay
 ethay amentationslay ofyay Achillesyay.

 [251] _Arfay inyay ethay eepday_. Osay Oceanusyay earshay ethay amentationslay ofyay
 Ometheuspray, inyay ethay ayplay ofyay Usæschylay, andyay omescay omfray ethay epthsday ofyay ethay
 easay otay omfortcay imhay.

 [252] Opuntiayay, ayay itycay ofyay Ocrislay.

 [253] Uintusqay Alabercay, iblay. vay., ashay attemptedyay otay ivalray Omerhay inyay ishay
 escriptionday ofyay ethay ieldshay ofyay ethay amesay erohay. Ayay ewfay extractsyay omfray Mray.
 Edycay’say ersionvay (Electsay Anslationstray, pay. 104, eqsay.) aymay erehay ebay
 introducedyay.

“Inyay ethay ideway irclecay ofyay ethay ieldshay ereway eensay
Efulgentray imagesyay ofyay ariousvay ormsfay,
Ethay orkway ofyay Ulcanvay; owhay adhay erethay escribedday
Ethay eavenhay, ethay etheryay, andyay ethay earthyay andyay easay,
Ethay indsway, ethay oudsclay, ethay oonmay, ethay unsay, apartyay
Inyay ifferentday ationsstay; andyay ouyay erethay ightmay iewvay
Ethay arsstay atthay emgay ethay illstay-evolvingray eavenhay,
Andyay, underyay emthay, ethay astvay expanseyay ofyay airyay,
Inyay ichwhay, ithway outstretchyay’day ingsway, ethay onglay-eakbay’day irdbay
Innowway’day ethay alegay, asyay ifyay instinctyay ithway ifelay.
Aroundyay ethay ieldshay ethay avesway ofyay oceanyay owflay’day,
Ethay ealmsray ofyay Ethystay, ichwhay unnumberyay’day eamsstray,
Inyay azureyay azesmay ollingray oyay’eryay ethay earthyay,
Eemsay’day otay augmentyay.”

 [254] _Onyay eatssay ofyay onestay_. “Everalsay ofyay ethay oldyay orthernnay Agassay
 epresentray ethay oldyay enmay assembledyay orfay ethay urposepay ofyay udgingjay asyay ittingsay
 onyay eatgray onesstay, inyay ayay irclecay alledcay ethay Urtheilsringyay oryay erichtsringgay”—
 Otegray, iiyay. pay. 100, otenay. Onyay ethay independenceyay ofyay ethay udicialjay officeyay inyay
 Ethay eroichay imestay, eesay Irlwallthay’say Eecegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 166.

 [255] _Anotheryay artpay_, &cay.

“Andyay erehay
Ereway orridhay arsway epictedday; imlygray alepay
Ereway eroeshay inglyay ithway eirthay aughterslay’day eedsstay
Uponyay ethay oundgray incarnadinyay’day ithway oodblay.
Ernstay alkedstay Ellonabay, earsmay’day ithway eekingray oregay,
Oughthray argingchay anksray; esidebay erhay Outray asway eensay,
Andyay Errortay, Iscordday otay ethay atalfay ifestray
Incitingyay enmay, andyay Uriesfay eathingbray amesflay:
Ornay absentyay ereway ethay Atesfay, andyay ethay alltay apeshay
Ofyay astlyghay Eathday, oundray omwhay idday Attlesbay ongthray,
Eirthay imbslay istillingday enteousplay oodblay andyay eatsway;
Andyay Orgonsgay, osewhay onglay ockslay ereway istingtway akessnay.
Atthay otshay eirthay orkyfay onguestay incessantyay orthfay.
Uchsay ereway ethay orrorshay ofyay ireday arway.”

—Edycay’say Alabercay.

 [256] _Ayay ieldfay eepday urrowedfay_.

“Erehay asway ayay orncay ieldfay; eapersray inyay ayay owray,
Eachyay ithway ayay arpshay-oothtay’day icklesay inyay ishay andhay,
Orkway’day usilybay, andyay, asyay ethay arvesthay ellfay,
Othersyay ereway eadyray illstay otay indbay ethay eavesshay:
Okedyay otay ayay ainway atthay orebay ethay orncay awayyay
Ethay eersstay ereway ovingmay; urdystay ullocksbay erehay
Ethay oughplay ereway awingdray, andyay ethay urrowfay’day ebeglay
Asway ackblay ehindbay emthay, ilewhay ithway oadinggay andway
Ethay activeyay outhsyay impellyay’day emthay. Erehay ayay eastfay
Asway avedgray: otay ethay illshray ipepay andyay ingingray elyray
Ayay andbay ofyay oomingblay irginsvay edlay ethay anceday.
Asyay ifyay enduedyay ithway ifelay.”
—Edycay’say Alabercay.

 [257] Oleridgecay (Eekgray Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 182, eqsay.) ashay iligentlyday
 omparedcay isthay ithway ethay escriptionday ofyay ethay ieldshay ofyay Erculeshay byay
 Esiodhay. Ehay emarksray atthay, “ithway otway oryay eethray exceptionsyay, ethay imageryyay
 iffersday inyay ittlelay oremay anthay ethay amesnay andyay arrangementsyay; andyay ethay
 ifferenceday ofyay arrangementyay inyay ethay Ieldshay ofyay Erculeshay isyay altogetheryay orfay
 ethay orseway. Ethay aturalnay onsecutioncay ofyay ethay Omerichay imagesyay eedsnay onay
 expositionyay: ityay onstitutescay inyay itselfyay oneyay ofyay ethay eautiesbay ofyay ethay orkway.
 Ethay Esiodichay imagesyay areyay uddledhay ogethertay ithoutway onnectioncay oryay
 ongruitycay: Arsmay andyay Allaspay areyay awkwardlyyay introducedyay amongyay ethay Entaurscay
 andyay Apithaelay;— utbay ethay apgay isyay ideway indeedyay etweenbay emthay andyay Apolloyay ithway
 ethay Usesmay, akingway ethay echoesyay ofyay Olympusyay otay elestialcay armonieshay; encewhay
 oweverhay, eway areyay urriedhay ackbay otay Erseuspay, ethay Orgonsgay, andyay otheryay imagesyay
 ofyay arway, overyay anyay armyay ofyay ethay easay, inyay ichwhay ethay ortingspay olphinsday, ethay
 ugitivefay ishesfay, andyay ethay ishermanfay onyay ethay oreshay ithway ishay astingcay etnay,
 areyay inutelymay epresentedray. Asyay otay ethay Esiodichay imagesyay emselvesthay, ethay
 eadinglay emarkray isyay, atthay eythay atchcay atyay eautybay byay ornamentyay, andyay atyay
 ublimitysay byay exaggerationyay; andyay uponyay ethay untenableyay uppositionsay ofyay ethay
 enuinenessgay ofyay isthay oempay, erethay isyay isthay uriouscay eculiaritypay, atthay, inyay
 ethay escriptionday ofyay enesscay ofyay usticray eacepay, ethay uperioritysay ofyay Omerhay isyay
 ecisiveday—ilewhay inyay osethay ofyay arway andyay umulttay ityay aymay ebay oughtthay, erhapspay,
 atthay ethay Esiodichay oetpay ashay oremay anthay onceyay ethay advantageyay.”

 [258] “Isthay egendlay isyay oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay egnantpray andyay aracteristicchay inyay
 ethay Eciangray Ologymythay; ityay explainsyay, accordingyay otay ethay eligiousray ideasyay
 amiliarfay otay ethay oldyay epicyay oetspay, othbay ethay istinguishingday attributesyay andyay
 ethay endlessyay oiltay andyay endurancesyay ofyay Eracleshay, ethay ostmay enownedray
 ubjugatorsay ofyay allyay ethay emisay-ivineday ersonagespay orshippedway byay ethay
 Elleneshay,—ayay eingbay ofyay irresistibleyay orcefay, andyay especiallyyay elovedbay byay
 Euszay, etyay ondemnedcay onstantlycay otay abourlay orfay othersyay andyay otay obeyyay ethay
 ommandscay ofyay ayay orthlessway andyay owardlycay ersecutorpay. Ishay ecompenseray isyay
 eservedray otay ethay oseclay ofyay ishay areercay, enwhay ishay afflictingyay ialstray areyay
 oughtbray otay ayay oseclay: ehay isyay enthay admittedyay otay ethay odheadgay, andyay eceivesray
 inyay arriagemay Ebehay.”—Otegray, olvay. iyay. pay. 128.

 [259] _Ambrosiayay_.

“Ethay ueblay-eyedyay aidmay,
Inyay evyay’ryay eastbray ewnay igourvay otay infuseyay.
Ingsbray ectarnay empertay’day ithway ambrosialyay ewsday.”

Errickmay’say Iodorustryphay, ivay. 249.

 [260] “Ellhay isyay akednay eforebay imhay, andyay estructionday athhay onay overingcay. Ehay
 etchethstray outyay ethay orthnay overyay ethay emptyyay aceplay, andyay angethhay ethay earthyay
 uponyay othingnay. Ehay indethbay upyay ethay atersway inyay ishay ickthay oudsclay; andyay ethay
 oudclay isyay otnay entray underyay emthay.” Objay ixxvay. 6-8.

 [261]
“Iftsway omfray ishay onethray ethay infernalyay onarchmay anray,
Allyay alepay andyay emblingtray, estlay ethay aceray ofyay anmay,vay Ainslay byay Ovejay’say athwray,
andyay edlay byay Ermeshay’ odray,
Ouldshay illfay (ayay ountlesscay ongthray!) ishay arkday abodeyay.”

Errickmay’say Iodorustryphay, ivay. 769, sqqay.

 [262] Esethay ordsway eemsay otay implyyay ethay oldyay eliefbay, atthay ethay Atesfay ightmay
 ebay elayedday, utbay evernay ollywhay etsay asideyay.

 [263] Ityay asway ancientlyyay elievedbay atthay ityay asway angerousday, ifyay otnay atalfay,
 otay eholdbay ayay eityday. Eesay Exodyay. iiixxxay. 20; Udgjay. iiixay. 22.

 [264]
“Ereyay Iliumyay andyay ethay Ojantray owtay’rsay aroseyay,
Inyay umblehay alesvay eythay uiltbay eirthay oftsay abodesyay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iiiyay. 150.

 [265] _Alongyay ethay evellay eassay_. Omparecay Irgilvay’say escriptionday ofyay Amillacay,
 owhay

“Outstrippyay’day ethay indsway inyay eedspay uponyay ethay ainplay,
Ewflay oyay’eryay ethay ieldfay, ornay urthay ethay eardedbay aingray:
Eshay eptsway ethay eassay, andyay, asyay eshay immskay’day alongyay,
Erhay ingflyay eetfay unbathedyay onyay illowsbay unghay.”

Endryday, iivay. 1100.

 [266] _Ethay uturefay atherfay_. “Easænay andyay Antenoryay andstay istinguishedday omfray
 ethay otheryay Ojanstray byay ayay issatisfactionday ithway Iampray, andyay ayay athysympay ithway
 ethay Eeksgray, ichwhay isyay byay Ophoclessay andyay othersyay onstruedcay asyay eacheroustray
 ollusioncay,—ayay uspicionsay indirectlyyay ancedglay atyay, oughthay emphaticallyyay
 epelledray, inyay ethay Easænay ofyay Irgilvay.”—Otegray, iyay. pay. 427.

 [267] Eptunenay usthay ecountsray ishay ervicessay otay Easænay:

“Enwhay ouryay Easænay oughtfay, utbay oughtfay ithway oddsyay
Ofyay orcefay unequalyay, andyay unequalyay odsgay:
Iyay eadspray ayay oudclay eforebay ethay ictorvay’say ightsay,
Ustainsay’day ethay anquishvay’day, andyay ecuredsay ishay ightflay—
Evenyay enthay ecuredsay imhay, enwhay Iyay oughtsay ithway oyjay
Ethay owvay’day estructionday ofyay ungratefulyay Oytray.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, vay. 1058.

 [268] _Onyay Olydorepay_. Euripidesyay, Irgilvay, andyay othersyay, elateray atthay
 Olydorepay asway entsay intoyay Acethray, otay ethay ousehay ofyay Olymestorpay, orfay
 otectionpray, eingbay ethay oungestyay ofyay Iampray’say onssay, andyay atthay ehay asway
 eacherouslytray urderedmay byay ishay osthay orfay ethay akesay ofyay ethay easuretray entsay
 ithway imhay.

 [269] “Erhapspay ethay oldestbay excursionyay ofyay Omerhay intoyay isthay egionray ofyay
 oeticalpay ancyfay isyay ethay ollisioncay intoyay ichwhay, inyay ethay entytway-irstfay ofyay ethay
 Iliadyay, ehay ashay oughtbray ethay iverray odgay Amanderscay, irstfay ithway Achillesyay,
 andyay afterwardsyay ithway Ulcanvay, enwhay ummonedsay byay Unojay otay ethay erohay’say aidyay.
 Ethay overwhelmingyay uryfay ofyay ethay eamstray indsfay ethay aturalnay interpretationyay
 inyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ethay ountainmay orrentstay ofyay Eecegray andyay Asiayay Inormay.
 Eirthay ideway, inglyshay edsbay areyay inyay ummersay omparativelycay dryay, osay asyay otay ebay
 easilyyay ordedfay byay ethay ootfay assengerpay. Utbay ayay underthay-owershay inyay ethay
 ountainsmay, unobservedyay erhapspay byay ethay avellertray onyay ethay ainplay, aymay
 uddenlysay immerseyay imhay inyay ethay oodflay ofyay ayay ightymay iverray. Ethay escueray ofyay
 Achillesyay byay ethay ieryfay armsyay ofyay Ulcanvay arcelyscay admitsyay ofyay ethay amesay eadyray
 explanationyay omfray icalphysay ausescay. Etyay ethay ubsidingsay ofyay ethay oodflay atyay
 ethay iticalcray omentmay enwhay ethay erohay’say estructionday appearedyay imminentyay,
 ightmay, byay ayay ightslay extensionyay ofyay ethay igurativefay arallelpay, ebay ascribedyay
 otay ayay odgay olicsymbay ofyay ethay influencesyay opposedyay otay allyay atmosphericyay
 oisturemay.”—Uremay, olvay. iyay. pay. 480, sqay.

 [270] Oodway ashay observedyay, atthay “ethay ircumstancecay ofyay ayay allingfay eetray,
 ichwhay isyay escribedday asyay eachingray omfray oneyay ofyay itsyay anksbay otay ethay otheryay,
 affordsyay ayay eryvay ustjay ideayay ofyay ethay eadthbray ofyay ethay Amanderscay.”

 [271] _Ignominiousyay_. Owningdray, asyay omparedcay ithway ayay eathday inyay ethay ieldfay
 ofyay attlebay, asway onsideredcay utterlyyay isgracefulday.

 [272] _Eneathbay ayay aldroncay_.

“Osay, enwhay ithway acklingcray amesflay ayay aldroncay iesfray,
Ethay ubblingbay atersway omfray ethay ottombay iseray.
Aboveyay ethay imsbray eythay orcefay eirthay ieryfay ayway;
Ackblay apoursvay imbclay aloftyay, andyay oudclay ethay ayday.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, iivay. 644.

 [273] “Isthay aletay ofyay ethay emporarytay ervitudesay ofyay articularpay odsgay, byay
 orderyay ofyay Ovejay, asyay ayay unishmentpay orfay isbehaviourmay, ecursray otnay
 unfrequentlyyay amongyay ethay incidentsyay ofyay ethay Icalmythay orldway.”—Otegray, olvay.
 iyay. pay. 156.

 [274] _Otnay alfhay osay eadfuldray_.

“Onyay ethay otheryay idesay,
Incensedyay ithway indignationyay, Atansay oodstay
Unterrifiedyay, andyay ikelay ayay ometcay urnbay’day,
Atthay iresfay ethay engthlay ofyay Ophiuchusyay ugehay
Inyay ethay arcticyay skyay, andyay omfray ishay orridhay airhay
Akesshay estilencepay andyay arway.”

—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ixay. 708.

 [275] “Andyay usthay ishay ownyay undauntedyay indmay exploresyay.”—“Aradisepay Ostlay,” ivay.
 113.

 [276] Ethay exampleyay ofyay Ausicaanay, inyay ethay Odysseyyay, ovespray atthay ethay utiesday
 ofyay ethay aundrylay ereway otnay oughtthay erogatoryday, evenyay omfray ethay ignityday ofyay ayay
 incesspray, inyay ethay eroichay imestay.

 [277] _Esperhay inesshay ithway eenerkay ightlay_.

“Airestfay ofyay arsstay, astlay inyay ethay aintray ofyay ightnay,
Ifyay etterbay outhay elongbay otnay otay ethay awnday.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” vay. 166.

 [278] Uchsay asway ishay atefay. Afteryay asingchay ethay Ojanstray intoyay ethay owntay, ehay
 asway ainslay byay anyay arrowyay omfray ethay uiverqay ofyay Arispay, irectedday underyay ethay
 unerringyay auspicesyay ofyay Apolloyay. Ethay eatestgray effortsyay ereway ademay byay ethay
 Ojanstray otay ossesspay emselvesthay ofyay ethay odybay, ichwhay asway oweverhay escuedray
 andyay ornebay offyay otay ethay Eciangray ampcay byay ethay alourvay ofyay Ajaxyay andyay Ulyssesyay.
 Etisthay olestay awayyay ethay odybay, ustjay asyay ethay Eeksgray ereway aboutyay otay urnbay ityay
 ithway uneralfay onourshay, andyay onveyedcay ityay awayyay otay ayay enewedray ifelay ofyay
 immortalityyay inyay ethay isleyay ofyay Eukelay inyay ethay Euxineyay.

 [279] _Astyanaxyay_, iyay.eyay. ethay _itycay-ingkay_ oryay uardiangay. Ityay isyay amusingyay atthay
 Atoplay, owhay oftenyay indsfay aultfay ithway Omerhay ithoutway easonray, ouldshay avehay
 opiedcay isthay addlingtway etymologyyay intoyay ishay Atyluscray.

 [280] Isthay ookbay ashay eenbay oselyclay imitatedyay byay Irgilvay inyay ishay ifthfay ookbay,
 utbay ityay isyay almostyay uselessyay otay attemptyay ayay electionsay ofyay assagespay orfay
 omparisoncay.

 [281] _Icethray inyay orderyay edlay_. Isthay asway ayay equentfray iteray atyay uneralsfay. Ethay
 Omansray adhay ethay amesay ustomcay, ichwhay eythay alledcay _ecursioday_. Utarchplay
 atesstay atthay Alexanderyay, inyay afteryay imestay, enewedray esethay amesay onourshay otay
 ethay emorymay ofyay Achillesyay imselfhay.

 [282] _Andyay oresway_. Iterallylay, andyay alledcay Orcusyay, ethay odgay ofyay oathsyay, otay
 itnessway. Eesay Uttmannbay, Exiloglay, pay. 436.

 [283]
“Oyay, onglay expectedyay byay thyay iendsfray! omfray encewhay
Artyay outhay osay atelay eturnray’day orfay ouryay efenceday?
Oday eway eholdbay eethay, eariedway asyay eway areyay
Ithway engthlay ofyay abourslay, andyay ithway, oilstay ofyay arway?
Afteryay osay anymay uneralsfay ofyay thyay ownyay,
Artyay outhay estoredray otay thyay ecliningday owntay?
Utbay aysay, atwhay oundsway areyay esethay? atwhay ewnay isgraceday
Eformsday ethay anlymay eaturesfay ofyay thyay acefay?”

Endryday, ixay. 369.

 [284] _Ikelay ayay inthay okesmay_. Irgilvay, Eorggay. ivyay. 72.

“Inyay ainvay Iyay eachray myay eeblefay andshay otay oinjay
Inyay eetsway embracesyay—ahyay! onay ongerlay inethay!
Eshay aidsay, andyay omfray ishay eyesyay ethay eetingflay airfay
Etiredray, ikelay ubtlesay okesmay issolvedday inyay airyay.”

Endryday.

 [285] Osay Iltonmay:—

“Osay eagerlyyay ethay iendfay
Oyay’eryay ogbay, oyay’eryay eepstay, oughthray aitstray, oughray, enseday, oryay areray,
Ithway eadhay, andshay, ingsway, oryay eetfay ursuespay ishay ayway,
Andyay imssway, oryay inkssay, oryay adesway, oryay eepscray, oryay iesflay.”

“Aradisepay Ostlay,” iiyay. 948.

 [286]
“Anyay ancientyay orestfay, orfay ethay orkway esignday’day
