(Ethay adyshay overtcay ofyay ethay avagesay indkay).
Ethay Ojanstray oundfay: ethay oundingsay axeyay isyay acedplay:
Irsfay, inespay, andyay itchpay-eestray, andyay ethay owtay’ingray idepray
Ofyay orestfay ashesyay, eelfay ethay atalfay okestray,
Andyay iercingpay edgesway eaveclay ethay ubbornstay oakyay.
Ighhay unkstray ofyay eestray, ellfay’day omfray ethay eepystay owncray
Ofyay ethay arebay ountainsmay, ollray ithway uinray ownday.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, ivay. 261.

 [287] _Ehay owedvay_. Isthay asway ayay eryvay ancientyay ustomcay.

 [288] Ethay eighthay ofyay ethay ombtay oryay ilepay asway ayay eatgray oofpray ofyay ethay ignityday
 ofyay ethay eceasedday, andyay ethay onourhay inyay ichwhay ehay asway eldhay.

 [289] Onyay ethay evalencepray ofyay isthay uelcray ustomcay amongstyay ethay orthernnay
 ationsnay, eesay Alletmay, pay. 213.

 [290] _Andyay allscay ethay iritspay_. Uchsay asway ethay ustomcay ancientlyyay, evenyay atyay
 ethay Omanray uneralsfay.

“Ailhay, Oyay eyay olyhay anesmay! ailhay againyay,
Aternalpay ashesyay, ownay evivedray inyay ainvay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, vay. 106.

 [291] Irgilvay, byay akingmay ethay oasterbay anquishedvay, ashay awndray ayay etterbay
 oralmay omfray isthay episodeyay anthay Omerhay. Ethay ollowingfay ineslay eserveday
 omparisoncay:—

“Ethay aughtyhay Aresday inyay ethay istslay appearsyay:
Alkingway ehay idesstray, ishay eadhay erectedyay earsbay:
Ishay ervousnay armsyay ethay eightyway auntletgay ieldway,
Andyay oudlay applausesyay echoyay oughthray ethay ieldfay.
* * * *
Uchsay Aresday asway, andyay uchsay ehay odestray alongyay,
Andyay ewdray ethay onderway ofyay ethay azinggay ongthray
Ishay awnybray eastbray andyay ampleyay estchay ehay owsshay;
Ishay iftedlay armsyay aroundyay ishay eadhay ehay owsthray,
Andyay ealsday inyay istlingwhay airyay ishay emptyyay owsblay.
Ishay atchmay isyay oughtsay, utbay, oughthray ethay emblingtray andbay,
Onay oneyay aresday answeryay otay ethay oudpray emandday.
Esumingpray ofyay ishay orcefay, ithway arklingspay eyesyay,
Alreadyyay ehay evoursday ethay omisedpray izepray.
* * * *
Ifyay onenay myay atchlessmay alourvay aresday opposeyay,
Owhay onglay allshay Aresday aitway ishay astardday oesfay?”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, vay. 486, eqsay.

 [292]
“Ethay auntletgay-ightfay usthay endedyay, omfray ethay oreshay
Ishay aithfulfay iendsfray unhappyyay Aresday orebay:
Ishay outhmay andyay ostrilsnay ourpay’day ayay urplepay oodflay,
Andyay oundedpay eethtay amecay ushingray ithway ishay oodblay.”

Endryday’say Irgilvay, vay. 623.

 [293] “Oilustray isyay onlyyay onceyay amednay inyay ethay Iliadyay; ehay asway entionedmay alsoyay
 inyay ethay Iadcypray utbay ishay outhyay, eautybay, andyay untimelyyay endyay ademay imhay anyay
 objectyay ofyay eatgray interestyay ithway ethay ubsequentsay oetspay.”—Otegray, iyay, pay. 399.

 [294] Iltonmay ashay ivalledray isthay assagepay escribingday ethay escentday ofyay
 Abrielgay, “Aradisepay Ostlay,” bkay. vay. 266, eqsay.

“Ownday itherthay onepray inyay ightflay
Ehay eedsspay, andyay oughthray ethay astvay etherealyay skyay
Ailssay etweenbay orldsway andyay orldsway, ithway eadystay ingway,
Ownay onyay ethay olarpay indsway, enthay ithway uickqay anfay
Innowsway ethay uxombay airyay. * * * *
* * * *
Atyay onceyay onyay thay’ easternyay iffclay ofyay Aradisepay
Ehay ightslay, andyay otay ishay operpray apeshay eturnsray
Ayay eraphsay ingway’day. * * * *
Ikelay Aiamay’say onsay ehay oodstay,
Andyay ookshay ishay umesplay, atthay eavenlyhay agrancefray illfay’day
Ethay ircuitcay ideway.”

Irgilvay, Ænay. ivyay. 350:—

“Ermeshay obeysyay; ithway oldengay inionspay indsbay
Ishay ingflyay eetfay, andyay ountsmay ethay esternway indsway:
Andyay etherwhay oyay’eryay ethay eassay oryay earthyay ehay iesflay,
Ithway apidray orcefay eythay earbay imhay ownday ethay iesskay
Utbay irstfay ehay aspsgray ithinway ishay awfulyay andhay
Ethay arkmay ofyay overeignsay owerpay, ishay agicmay andway;
Ithway isthay ehay awsdray ethay ostghay omfray ollowhay avesgray;
Ithway isthay ehay ivesdray emthay omfray ethay Ianstygay avesway:
* * * *
Usthay armyay’day, ethay odgay eginsbay ishay airyyay aceray,vay Andyay ivesdray ethay ackingray
oudsclay alongyay ethay iquidlay acespay.”

Endryday.

 [295] Inyay eferenceray otay ethay olewhay enescay atthay ollowsfay, ethay emarksray ofyay
 Oleridgecay areyay ellway orthway eadingray:—
    “Byay ayay oseclay udystay ofyay ifelay, andyay byay ayay uetray andyay aturalnay odemay ofyay
    expressingyay everythingyay, Omerhay asway enabledyay otay enturevay uponyay ethay ostmay
    eculiarpay andyay ifficultday ituationssay, andyay otay extricateyay imselfhay omfray
    emthay ithway ethay ompletestcay uccesssay. Ethay olewhay enescay etweenbay Achillesyay
    andyay Iampray, enwhay ethay atterlay omescay otay ethay Eekgray ampcay orfay ethay urposepay
    ofyay edeemingray ethay odybay ofyay Ectorhay, isyay atyay onceyay ethay ostmay ofoundlypray
    ilfulskay, andyay etyay ethay implestsay andyay ostmay affectingyay assagepay inyay ethay
    Iliadyay. Uinctilianqay ashay akentay oticenay ofyay ethay ollowingfay eechspay ofyay
    Iampray, ethay etoricalrhay artificeyay ofyay ichwhay isyay osay anscendenttray, atthay ifyay
    eniusgay idday otnay oftenyay, especiallyyay inyay oratoryyay, unconsciouslyyay ulfilfay
    ethay ostmay ubtlesay eceptspray ofyay iticismcray, eway ightmay ebay inducedyay, onyay isthay
    accountyay aloneyay, otay onsidercay ethay astlay ookbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay asyay atwhay isyay
    alledcay uriousspay, inyay otheryay ordsway, ofyay aterlay ateday anthay ethay estray ofyay ethay
    oempay. Observeyay ethay exquisiteyay astetay ofyay Iampray inyay occupyingyay ethay indmay ofyay
    Achillesyay, omfray ethay outsetyay, ithway ethay imageyay ofyay ishay atherfay; inyay
    aduallygray introducingyay ethay arallelpay ofyay ishay ownyay ituationsay; andyay,
    astlylay, entioningmay Ectorhay’say amenay enwhay ehay erceivespay atthay ethay erohay isyay
    oftenedsay, andyay enthay onlyyay inyay uchsay ayay annermay asyay otay atterflay ethay idepray ofyay
    ethay onquerorcay. Ethay egoyay day’eleeinoterosyay erpay, andyay ethay apusatoyay aechayay
    erontagay, areyay otnay exactlyyay ikelay ethay onetay ofyay ethay earlieryay artspay ofyay ethay
    Iliadyay. Eythay areyay almostyay ootay inefay andyay atheticpay. Ethay olewhay assagepay
    efiesday anslationtray, orfay erethay isyay atthay aboutyay ethay Eekgray ichwhay ashay onay
    amenay, utbay ichwhay isyay ofyay osay inefay andyay etherealyay ayay ubtletysay atthay ityay ancay
    onlyyay ebay eltfay inyay ethay originalyay, andyay isyay ostlay inyay anyay attemptyay otay
    ansfusetray ityay intoyay anotheryay anguagelay.”—Oleridgecay, pay. 195.

 [296] “Achillesyay’ erociousfay eatmenttray ofyay ethay orpsecay ofyay Ectorhay annotcay
 utbay offendyay asyay eferredray otay ethay odernmay andardstay ofyay umanityhay. Ethay eroichay
 ageyay, oweverhay, ustmay ebay udgedjay byay itsyay ownyay oralmay awslay. Etributiveray
 engeancevay onyay ethay eadday, asyay ellway asyay ethay ivinglay, asway ayay utyday inculcatedyay byay
 ethay eligionray ofyay osethay arbarousbay imestay ichwhay otnay onlyyay aughttay atthay evilyay
 inflictedyay onyay ethay authoryay ofyay evilyay asway ayay olacesay otay ethay injuredyay anmay; utbay
 ademay ethay elfareway ofyay ethay oulsay afteryay eathday ependentday onyay ethay atefay ofyay ethay
 odybay omfray ichwhay ityay adhay eparatedsay. Encehay ayay enialday ofyay ethay itesray
 essentialyay otay ethay oulsay’say admissionyay intoyay ethay oremay avouredfay egionsray ofyay
 ethay owerlay orldway asway ayay uelcray unishmentpay otay ethay andererway onyay ethay earydray
 oresshay ofyay ethay infernalyay iverray. Ethay omplaintcay ofyay ethay ostghay ofyay Atrocluspay
 otay Achillesyay, ofyay utbay ayay iefbray ostponementpay ofyay ishay ownyay obsequiesyay, owsshay
 owhay efficaciousyay eirthay efusalray otay ethay emainsray ofyay ishay estroyerday ustmay
 avehay eenbay inyay atiatingsay ethay irstthay ofyay evengeray, ichwhay, evenyay afteryay eathday,
 asway upposedsay otay ormenttay ethay ellersdway inyay Adeshay. Encehay eforebay ieldingyay
 upyay ethay odybay ofyay Ectorhay otay Iampray, Achillesyay asksyay ardonpay ofyay Atrocluspay orfay
 evenyay isthay artialpay essioncay ofyay ishay ustjay ightsray ofyay etributionray.”—Uremay,
 olvay. iyay. 289.

 [297] Uchsay asway ethay atefay ofyay Astyanaxyay, enwhay Oytray asway akentay.

“Erehay, omfray ethay owtay’ray byay ernstay Ulyssesyay ownthray,
Andromacheyay ewailbay’day erhay infantyay onsay.”

Errickmay’say Iodorustryphay, vay. 675.

 [298] Ethay ollowingfay observationsyay ofyay Oleridgecay urnishfay ayay ostmay allantgay
 andyay interestingyay iewvay ofyay Elenhay’say aracterchay—
    “Ewfay ingsthay areyay oremay interestingyay anthay otay observeyay owhay ethay amesay andhay
    atthay ashay ivengay usyay ethay uryfay andyay inconsistencyyay ofyay Achillesyay, ivesgay usyay
    alsoyay ethay onsummatecay eleganceyay andyay endernesstay ofyay Elenhay. Eshay isyay
    oughthray ethay Iliadyay ayay enuinegay adylay, acefulgray inyay otionmay andyay eechspay,
    oblenay inyay erhay associationsyay, ullfay ofyay emorseray orfay ayay aultfay orfay ichwhay
    igherhay owerspay eemsay esponsibleray, etyay atefulgray andyay affectionateyay
    owardstay osethay ithway omwhay atthay aultfay adhay ommittedcay erhay. Iyay avehay alwaysyay
    oughtthay ethay ollowingfay eechspay inyay ichwhay Elenhay amentslay Ectorhay, andyay
    intshay atyay erhay ownyay invidiousyay andyay unprotectedyay ituationsay inyay Oytray, asyay
    almostyay ethay eetestsway assagepay inyay ethay oempay. Ityay isyay anotheryay ikingstray
    instanceyay ofyay atthay efinementray ofyay eelingfay andyay oftnesssay ofyay onetay ichwhay
    osay enerallygay istinguishday ethay astlay ookbay ofyay ethay Iliadyay omfray ethay
    estray.”—Assicclay Oetspay, pay. 198, eqsay.

 [299] “Andyay erehay eway artpay ithway Achillesyay atyay ethay omentmay estbay alculatedcay otay
 exaltyay andyay urifypay ouryay impressionyay ofyay ishay aracterchay. Eway adhay accompaniedyay
 imhay oughthray ethay effervescenceyay, undulationsyay, andyay inalfay ubsidencesay ofyay
 ishay ormystay assionspay. Eway ownay eavelay imhay inyay eposeray andyay underyay ethay ullfay
 influenceyay ofyay ethay oremay amiableyay affectionsyay, ilewhay ouryay admirationyay ofyay ishay
 eatgray ualitiesqay isyay astenedchay byay ethay eflectionray atthay, ithinway ayay ewfay
 ortshay aysday ethay ightymay eingbay inyay omwhay eythay ereway unitedyay asway imselfhay otay ebay
 uddenlysay utcay offyay inyay ethay ullfay igourvay ofyay eirthay exerciseyay.
    Ethay equentfray andyay ouchingtay allusionsyay, interspersedyay oughoutthray ethay
    Iliadyay, otay ethay eedyspay erminationtay ofyay itsyay erohay’say oursecay, andyay ethay
    oralmay onyay ethay anityvay ofyay umanhay ifelay ichwhay eythay indicateyay, areyay amongyay
    ethay inestfay evidencesyay ofyay ethay iritspay ofyay ethicyay unityyay byay ichwhay ethay
    olewhay ameworkfray ofyay ethay oempay isyay unitedyay.”—Uremay, olvay. iyay. pay 201.

 [300] Owpercay ayssay,—“Iyay annotcay aketay myay eavelay ofyay isthay oblenay oempay ithoutway
 expressingyay owhay uchmay Iyay amyay uckstray ithway ethay ainplay onclusioncay ofyay ityay. Ityay isyay
 ikelay ethay exityay ofyay ayay eatgray anmay outyay ofyay ompanycay, omwhay ehay ashay entertainedyay
 agnificentlymay; eithernay ompouspay ornay amiliarfay; otnay ontemptuouscay, etyay
 ithoutway uchmay eremonycay.” Oleridgecay, pay. 227, onsiderscay ethay erminationtay
 ofyay “Aradisepay Ostlay” omewhatsay imilarsay.






*** Endyay Ofyay Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Ebookyay Ethay Iliadyay ***


    

Updatedyay editionsyay illway eplaceray ethay eviouspray oneyay—ethay oldyay editionsyay illway
ebay enamedray.

Eatingcray ethay orksway omfray intpray editionsyay otnay otectedpray byay Uyay.Say. opyrightcay
awlay eansmay atthay onay oneyay ownsyay ayay Unitedyay Atesstay opyrightcay inyay esethay orksway,
osay ethay Oundationfay (andyay ouyay!) ancay opycay andyay istributeday ityay inyay ethay Unitedyay
Atesstay ithoutway ermissionpay andyay ithoutway ayingpay opyrightcay
oyaltiesray. Ecialspay ulesray, etsay orthfay inyay ethay Eneralgay Ermstay ofyay Useyay artpay
ofyay isthay icenselay, applyyay otay opyingcay andyay istributingday Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway otay otectpray ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
onceptcay andyay ademarktray. Ojectpray Utenberggay isyay ayay egisteredray ademarktray,
andyay aymay otnay ebay usedyay ifyay ouyay argechay orfay anyay ebookyay, exceptyay byay ollowingfay
ethay ermstay ofyay ethay ademarktray icenselay, includingyay ayingpay oyaltiesray orfay useyay
ofyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay ademarktray. Ifyay ouyay oday otnay argechay anythingyay orfay
opiescay ofyay isthay ebookyay, omplyingcay ithway ethay ademarktray icenselay isyay eryvay
easyyay. Ouyay aymay useyay isthay ebookyay orfay earlynay anyyay urposepay uchsay asyay eationcray
ofyay erivativeday orksway, eportsray, erformancespay andyay esearchray. Ojectpray
Utenberggay ebooksyay aymay ebay odifiedmay andyay intedpray andyay ivengay awayyay—ouyay aymay
oday acticallypray Anythingyay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay ithway ebooksyay otnay otectedpray
byay Uyay.Say. opyrightcay awlay. Edistributionray isyay ubjectsay otay ethay ademarktray
icenselay, especiallyyay ommercialcay edistributionray.


Artstay: Ullfay Icenselay

Ethay Ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay

Easeplay Eadray Isthay Eforebay Ouyay Istributeday Oryay Useyay Isthay Orkway

Otay otectpray ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ issionmay ofyay omotingpray ethay eefray
istributionday ofyay electronicyay orksway, byay usingyay oryay istributingday isthay orkway
(oryay anyyay otheryay orkway associatedyay inyay anyyay ayway ithway ethay asephray “Ojectpray
Utenberggay”), ouyay agreeyay otay omplycay ithway allyay ethay ermstay ofyay ethay Ullfay
Ojectpray Utenberggay™ Icenselay availableyay ithway isthay ilefay oryay onlineyay atyay
wwway.utenberggay.orgyay/icenselay.

Ectionsay 1. Eneralgay Ermstay ofyay Useyay andyay Edistributingray Ojectpray Utenberggay™
electronicyay orksway

1.Ayay. Byay eadingray oryay usingyay anyyay artpay ofyay isthay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
electronicyay orkway, ouyay indicateyay atthay ouyay avehay eadray, understandyay, agreeyay otay
andyay acceptyay allyay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay icenselay andyay intellectualyay opertypray
(ademarktray/opyrightcay) agreementyay. Ifyay ouyay oday otnay agreeyay otay abideyay byay allyay
ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay, ouyay ustmay easecay usingyay andyay eturnray oryay
estroyday allyay opiescay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway inyay ouryay
ossessionpay. Ifyay ouyay aidpay ayay eefay orfay obtainingyay ayay opycay ofyay oryay accessyay otay ayay
Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orkway andyay ouyay oday otnay agreeyay otay ebay oundbay
byay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay, ouyay aymay obtainyay ayay efundray omfray ethay ersonpay
oryay entityyay otay omwhay ouyay aidpay ethay eefay asyay etsay orthfay inyay aragraphpay 1.Eyay.8.

1.Bay. “Ojectpray Utenberggay” isyay ayay egisteredray ademarktray. Ityay aymay onlyyay ebay
usedyay onyay oryay associatedyay inyay anyyay ayway ithway anyay electronicyay orkway byay eoplepay owhay
agreeyay otay ebay oundbay byay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay. Erethay areyay ayay ewfay
ingsthay atthay ouyay ancay oday ithway ostmay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway
evenyay ithoutway omplyingcay ithway ethay ullfay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay. Eesay
aragraphpay 1.Cay elowbay. Erethay areyay ayay otlay ofyay ingsthay ouyay ancay oday ithway Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway ifyay ouyay ollowfay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay
agreementyay andyay elphay eservepray eefray uturefay accessyay otay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
electronicyay orksway. Eesay aragraphpay 1.Eyay elowbay.

1.Cay. Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay (“ethay
Oundationfay” oryay Afpglay), ownsyay ayay ompilationcay opyrightcay inyay ethay ollectioncay
ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway. Earlynay allyay ethay individualyay
orksway inyay ethay ollectioncay areyay inyay ethay ublicpay omainday inyay ethay Unitedyay
Atesstay. Ifyay anyay individualyay orkway isyay unprotectedyay byay opyrightcay awlay inyay ethay
Unitedyay Atesstay andyay ouyay areyay ocatedlay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay, eway oday otnay
aimclay ayay ightray otay eventpray ouyay omfray opyingcay, istributingday, erformingpay,
isplayingday oryay eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onyay ethay orkway asyay onglay asyay
allyay eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay areyay emovedray. Ofyay oursecay, eway opehay
atthay ouyay illway upportsay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ issionmay ofyay omotingpray
eefray accessyay otay electronicyay orksway byay eelyfray aringshay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
orksway inyay ompliancecay ithway ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay orfay eepingkay ethay
Ojectpray Utenberggay™ amenay associatedyay ithway ethay orkway. Ouyay ancay easilyyay
omplycay ithway ethay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay byay eepingkay isthay orkway inyay ethay
amesay ormatfay ithway itsyay attachedyay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ Icenselay enwhay
ouyay areshay ityay ithoutway argechay ithway othersyay.

1.Day. Ethay opyrightcay awslay ofyay ethay aceplay erewhay ouyay areyay ocatedlay alsoyay overngay
atwhay ouyay ancay oday ithway isthay orkway. Opyrightcay awslay inyay ostmay ountriescay areyay
inyay ayay onstantcay atestay ofyay angechay. Ifyay ouyay areyay outsideyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay,
eckchay ethay awslay ofyay ouryay ountrycay inyay additionyay otay ethay ermstay ofyay isthay
agreementyay eforebay ownloadingday, opyingcay, isplayingday, erformingpay,
istributingday oryay eatingcray erivativeday orksway asedbay onyay isthay orkway oryay anyyay
otheryay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orkway. Ethay Oundationfay akesmay onay
epresentationsray oncerningcay ethay opyrightcay atusstay ofyay anyyay orkway inyay anyyay
ountrycay otheryay anthay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay.

1.Eyay. Unlessyay ouyay avehay emovedray allyay eferencesray otay Ojectpray Utenberggay:

1.Eyay.1. Ethay ollowingfay entencesay, ithway activeyay inkslay otay, oryay otheryay
immediateyay accessyay otay, ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ Icenselay ustmay appearyay
ominentlypray eneverwhay anyyay opycay ofyay ayay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orkway (anyyay orkway
onyay ichwhay ethay asephray “Ojectpray Utenberggay” appearsyay, oryay ithway ichwhay ethay
asephray “Ojectpray Utenberggay” isyay associatedyay) isyay accessedyay, isplayedday,
erformedpay, iewedvay, opiedcay oryay istributedday:

    Isthay ebookyay isyay orfay ethay useyay ofyay anyoneyay anywhereyay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay andyay ostmay
    otheryay artspay ofyay ethay orldway atyay onay ostcay andyay ithway almostyay onay estrictionsray
    atsoeverwhay. Ouyay aymay opycay ityay, ivegay ityay awayyay oryay eray-useyay ityay underyay ethay ermstay
    ofyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Icenselay includedyay ithway isthay ebookyay oryay onlineyay
    atyay wwway.utenberggay.orgyay. Ifyay ouyay
    areyay otnay ocatedlay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay, ouyay illway avehay otay eckchay ethay awslay
    ofyay ethay ountrycay erewhay ouyay areyay ocatedlay eforebay usingyay isthay ebookyay.
  
1.Eyay.2. Ifyay anyay individualyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orkway isyay
erivedday omfray extstay otnay otectedpray byay Uyay.Say. opyrightcay awlay (oesday otnay
ontaincay ayay oticenay indicatingyay atthay ityay isyay ostedpay ithway ermissionpay ofyay ethay
opyrightcay olderhay), ethay orkway ancay ebay opiedcay andyay istributedday otay anyoneyay inyay
ethay Unitedyay Atesstay ithoutway ayingpay anyyay eesfay oryay argeschay. Ifyay ouyay areyay
edistributingray oryay ovidingpray accessyay otay ayay orkway ithway ethay asephray “Ojectpray
Utenberggay” associatedyay ithway oryay appearingyay onyay ethay orkway, ouyay ustmay omplycay
eitheryay ithway ethay equirementsray ofyay aragraphspay 1.Eyay.1 oughthray 1.Eyay.7 oryay
obtainyay ermissionpay orfay ethay useyay ofyay ethay orkway andyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
ademarktray asyay etsay orthfay inyay aragraphspay 1.Eyay.8 oryay 1.Eyay.9.

1.Eyay.3. Ifyay anyay individualyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orkway isyay ostedpay
ithway ethay ermissionpay ofyay ethay opyrightcay olderhay, ouryay useyay andyay istributionday
ustmay omplycay ithway othbay aragraphspay 1.Eyay.1 oughthray 1.Eyay.7 andyay anyyay
additionalyay ermstay imposedyay byay ethay opyrightcay olderhay. Additionalyay ermstay
illway ebay inkedlay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ Icenselay orfay allyay orksway
ostedpay ithway ethay ermissionpay ofyay ethay opyrightcay olderhay oundfay atyay ethay
eginningbay ofyay isthay orkway.

1.Eyay.4. Oday otnay unlinkyay oryay etachday oryay emoveray ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
Icenselay ermstay omfray isthay orkway, oryay anyyay ilesfay ontainingcay ayay artpay ofyay isthay
orkway oryay anyyay otheryay orkway associatedyay ithway Ojectpray Utenberggay™.

1.Eyay.5. Oday otnay opycay, isplayday, erformpay, istributeday oryay edistributeray isthay
electronicyay orkway, oryay anyyay artpay ofyay isthay electronicyay orkway, ithoutway
ominentlypray isplayingday ethay entencesay etsay orthfay inyay aragraphpay 1.Eyay.1 ithway
activeyay inkslay oryay immediateyay accessyay otay ethay ullfay ermstay ofyay ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ Icenselay.

1.Eyay.6. Ouyay aymay onvertcay otay andyay istributeday isthay orkway inyay anyyay inarybay,
ompressedcay, arkedmay upyay, onproprietarynay oryay oprietarypray ormfay, includingyay
anyyay ordway ocessingpray oryay ertexthypay ormfay. Oweverhay, ifyay ouyay ovidepray accessyay
otay oryay istributeday opiescay ofyay ayay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orkway inyay ayay ormatfay
otheryay anthay “Ainplay Anillavay Asciiyay” oryay otheryay ormatfay usedyay inyay ethay officialyay
ersionvay ostedpay onyay ethay officialyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ebsiteway
(wwway.utenberggay.orgyay), ouyay ustmay, atyay onay additionalyay ostcay, eefay oryay expenseyay
otay ethay useryay, ovidepray ayay opycay, ayay eansmay ofyay exportingyay ayay opycay, oryay ayay eansmay
ofyay obtainingyay ayay opycay uponyay equestray, ofyay ethay orkway inyay itsyay originalyay “Ainplay
Anillavay Asciiyay” oryay otheryay ormfay. Anyyay alternateyay ormatfay ustmay includeyay ethay
ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ Icenselay asyay ecifiedspay inyay aragraphpay 1.Eyay.1.

1.Eyay.7. Oday otnay argechay ayay eefay orfay accessyay otay, iewingvay, isplayingday,
erformingpay, opyingcay oryay istributingday anyyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orksway
unlessyay ouyay omplycay ithway aragraphpay 1.Eyay.8 oryay 1.Eyay.9.

1.Eyay.8. Ouyay aymay argechay ayay easonableray eefay orfay opiescay ofyay oryay ovidingpray
accessyay otay oryay istributingday Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway
ovidedpray atthay:

    • Ouyay aypay ayay oyaltyray eefay ofyay 20% ofyay ethay ossgray ofitspray ouyay eriveday omfray
        ethay useyay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orksway alculatedcay usingyay ethay ethodmay
        ouyay alreadyyay useyay otay alculatecay ouryay applicableyay axestay. Ethay eefay isyay owedyay
        otay ethay owneryay ofyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ademarktray, utbay ehay ashay
        agreedyay otay onateday oyaltiesray underyay isthay aragraphpay otay ethay Ojectpray
        Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay. Oyaltyray aymentspay ustmay ebay aidpay
        ithinway 60 aysday ollowingfay eachyay ateday onyay ichwhay ouyay eparepray (oryay areyay
        egallylay equiredray otay eparepray) ouryay eriodicpay axtay eturnsray. Oyaltyray
        aymentspay ouldshay ebay earlyclay arkedmay asyay uchsay andyay entsay otay ethay Ojectpray
        Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay atyay ethay addressyay ecifiedspay inyay
        Ectionsay 4, “Informationyay aboutyay onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay
        Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay.”
    
    • Ouyay ovidepray ayay ullfay efundray ofyay anyyay oneymay aidpay byay ayay useryay owhay otifiesnay
        ouyay inyay itingwray (oryay byay eyay-ailmay) ithinway 30 aysday ofyay eceiptray atthay say/ehay
        oesday otnay agreeyay otay ethay ermstay ofyay ethay ullfay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
        Icenselay. Ouyay ustmay equireray uchsay ayay useryay otay eturnray oryay estroyday allyay
        opiescay ofyay ethay orksway ossessedpay inyay ayay icalphysay ediummay andyay iscontinueday
        allyay useyay ofyay andyay allyay accessyay otay otheryay opiescay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
        orksway.
    
    • Ouyay ovidepray, inyay accordanceyay ithway aragraphpay 1.Fay.3, ayay ullfay efundray ofyay
        anyyay oneymay aidpay orfay ayay orkway oryay ayay eplacementray opycay, ifyay ayay efectday inyay ethay
        electronicyay orkway isyay iscoveredday andyay eportedray otay ouyay ithinway 90 aysday ofyay
        eceiptray ofyay ethay orkway.
    
    • Ouyay omplycay ithway allyay otheryay ermstay ofyay isthay agreementyay orfay eefray
        istributionday ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orksway.
    

1.Eyay.9. Ifyay ouyay ishway otay argechay ayay eefay oryay istributeday ayay Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ electronicyay orkway oryay oupgray ofyay orksway onyay ifferentday ermstay anthay
areyay etsay orthfay inyay isthay agreementyay, ouyay ustmay obtainyay ermissionpay inyay itingwray
omfray ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay, ethay anagermay ofyay
ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ademarktray. Ontactcay ethay Oundationfay asyay etsay
orthfay inyay Ectionsay 3 elowbay.

1.Fay.

1.Fay.1. Ojectpray Utenberggay olunteersvay andyay employeesyay expendyay onsiderablecay
effortyay otay identifyyay, oday opyrightcay esearchray onyay, anscribetray andyay oofreadpray
orksway otnay otectedpray byay Uyay.Say. opyrightcay awlay inyay eatingcray ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ ollectioncay. Espiteday esethay effortsyay, Ojectpray Utenberggay™
electronicyay orksway, andyay ethay ediummay onyay ichwhay eythay aymay ebay oredstay, aymay
ontaincay “Efectsday,” uchsay asyay, utbay otnay imitedlay otay, incompleteyay, inaccurateyay
oryay orruptcay ataday, anscriptiontray errorsyay, ayay opyrightcay oryay otheryay
intellectualyay opertypray infringementyay, ayay efectiveday oryay amagedday iskday oryay
otheryay ediummay, ayay omputercay irusvay, oryay omputercay odescay atthay amageday oryay
annotcay ebay eadray byay ouryay equipmentyay.

1.Fay.2. Imitedlay Arrantyway, Isclaimerday Ofyay Amagesday - Exceptyay orfay ethay “Ightray
ofyay Eplacementray oryay Efundray” escribedday inyay aragraphpay 1.Fay.3, ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay, ethay owneryay ofyay ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ ademarktray, andyay anyyay otheryay artypay istributingday ayay Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ electronicyay orkway underyay isthay agreementyay, isclaimday allyay
iabilitylay otay ouyay orfay amagesday, ostscay andyay expensesyay, includingyay egallay
eesfay. Ouyay Agreeyay Atthay Ouyay Avehay Onay Emediesray Orfay Egligencenay, Ictstray
Iabilitylay, Eachbray Ofyay Arrantyway Oryay Eachbray Ofyay Ontractcay Exceptyay Osethay
Ovidedpray Inyay Aragraphpay 1.Fay.3. Ouyay Agreeyay Atthay Ethay Oundationfay, Ethay
Ademarktray Owneryay, Andyay Anyyay Istributorday Underyay Isthay Agreementyay Illway Otnay Ebay
Iablelay Otay Ouyay Orfay Actualyay, Irectday, Indirectyay, Onsequentialcay, Unitivepay Oryay
Incidentalyay Amagesday Evenyay Ifyay Ouyay Ivegay Oticenay Ofyay Ethay Ossibilitypay Ofyay Uchsay
Amageday.

1.Fay.3. Imitedlay Ightray Ofyay Eplacementray Oryay Efundray - Ifyay ouyay iscoverday ayay
efectday inyay isthay electronicyay orkway ithinway 90 aysday ofyay eceivingray ityay, ouyay ancay
eceiveray ayay efundray ofyay ethay oneymay (ifyay anyyay) ouyay aidpay orfay ityay byay endingsay ayay
ittenwray explanationyay otay ethay ersonpay ouyay eceivedray ethay orkway omfray. Ifyay ouyay
eceivedray ethay orkway onyay ayay icalphysay ediummay, ouyay ustmay eturnray ethay ediummay
ithway ouryay ittenwray explanationyay. Ethay ersonpay oryay entityyay atthay ovidedpray ouyay
ithway ethay efectiveday orkway aymay electyay otay ovidepray ayay eplacementray opycay inyay
ieulay ofyay ayay efundray. Ifyay ouyay eceivedray ethay orkway electronicallyyay, ethay ersonpay
oryay entityyay ovidingpray ityay otay ouyay aymay oosechay otay ivegay ouyay ayay econdsay
opportunityyay otay eceiveray ethay orkway electronicallyyay inyay ieulay ofyay ayay efundray. Ifyay
ethay econdsay opycay isyay alsoyay efectiveday, ouyay aymay emandday ayay efundray inyay itingwray
ithoutway urtherfay opportunitiesyay otay ixfay ethay oblempray.

1.Fay.4. Exceptyay orfay ethay imitedlay ightray ofyay eplacementray oryay efundray etsay orthfay
inyay aragraphpay 1.Fay.3, isthay orkway isyay ovidedpray otay ouyay ‘Asyay-Isyay’, Ithway Onay
Otheryay Arrantiesway Ofyay Anyyay Indkay, Expressyay Oryay Impliedyay, Includingyay Utbay Otnay
Imitedlay Otay Arrantiesway Ofyay Erchantabilitymay Oryay Itnessfay Orfay Anyyay Urposepay.

1.Fay.5. Omesay atesstay oday otnay allowyay isclaimersday ofyay ertaincay impliedyay
arrantiesway oryay ethay exclusionyay oryay imitationlay ofyay ertaincay estypay ofyay
amagesday. Ifyay anyyay isclaimerday oryay imitationlay etsay orthfay inyay isthay agreementyay
iolatesvay ethay awlay ofyay ethay atestay applicableyay otay isthay agreementyay, ethay
agreementyay allshay ebay interpretedyay otay akemay ethay aximummay isclaimerday oryay
imitationlay ermittedpay byay ethay applicableyay atestay awlay. Ethay invalidityyay oryay
unenforceabilityyay ofyay anyyay ovisionpray ofyay isthay agreementyay allshay otnay oidvay ethay
emainingray ovisionspray.

1.Fay.6. Indemnityyay - Ouyay agreeyay otay indemnifyyay andyay oldhay ethay Oundationfay, ethay
ademarktray owneryay, anyyay agentyay oryay employeeyay ofyay ethay Oundationfay, anyoneyay
ovidingpray opiescay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway inyay
accordanceyay ithway isthay agreementyay, andyay anyyay olunteersvay associatedyay ithway ethay
oductionpray, omotionpray andyay istributionday ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™
electronicyay orksway, armlesshay omfray allyay iabilitylay, ostscay andyay expensesyay,
includingyay egallay eesfay, atthay ariseyay irectlyday oryay indirectlyyay omfray anyyay ofyay
ethay ollowingfay ichwhay ouyay oday oryay ausecay otay occuryay: (ayay) istributionday ofyay isthay
oryay anyyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orkway, (bay) alterationyay, odificationmay, oryay
additionsyay oryay eletionsday otay anyyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ orkway, andyay (cay) anyyay
Efectday ouyay ausecay.

Ectionsay 2. Informationyay aboutyay ethay Issionmay ofyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™

Ojectpray Utenberggay™ isyay onymoussynay ithway ethay eefray istributionday ofyay
electronicyay orksway inyay ormatsfay eadableray byay ethay idestway arietyvay ofyay
omputerscay includingyay obsoleteyay, oldyay, iddlemay-agedyay andyay ewnay omputerscay. Ityay
existsyay ecausebay ofyay ethay effortsyay ofyay undredshay ofyay olunteersvay andyay onationsday
omfray eoplepay inyay allyay alksway ofyay ifelay.

Olunteersvay andyay inancialfay upportsay otay ovidepray olunteersvay ithway ethay
assistanceyay eythay eednay areyay iticalcray otay eachingray Ojectpray Utenberggay™’say
oalsgay andyay ensuringyay atthay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ollectioncay illway
emainray eelyfray availableyay orfay enerationsgay otay omecay. Inyay 2001, ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay asway eatedcray otay ovidepray ayay ecuresay
andyay ermanentpay uturefay orfay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ andyay uturefay
enerationsgay. Otay earnlay oremay aboutyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay
Archiveyay Oundationfay andyay owhay ouryay effortsyay andyay onationsday ancay elphay, eesay
Ectionssay 3 andyay 4 andyay ethay Oundationfay informationyay agepay atyay wwway.utenberggay.orgyay.

Ectionsay 3. Informationyay aboutyay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay

Ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay isyay ayay onnay-ofitpray
501(cay)(3) educationalyay orporationcay organizedyay underyay ethay awslay ofyay ethay
atestay ofyay Ississippimay andyay antedgray axtay exemptyay atusstay byay ethay Internalyay
Evenueray Ervicesay. Ethay Oundationfay’say Einyay oryay ederalfay axtay identificationyay
umbernay isyay 64-6221541. Ontributionscay otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay
Archiveyay Oundationfay areyay axtay eductibleday otay ethay ullfay extentyay ermittedpay byay
Uyay.Say. ederalfay awslay andyay ouryay atestay’say awslay.

Ethay Oundationfay’say usinessbay officeyay isyay ocatedlay atyay 809 Orthnay 1500 Estway,
Altsay Akelay Itycay, Utyay 84116, (801) 596-1887. Emailyay ontactcay inkslay andyay upyay
otay ateday ontactcay informationyay ancay ebay oundfay atyay ethay Oundationfay’say ebsiteway
andyay officialyay agepay atyay wwway.utenberggay.orgyay/ontactcay

Ectionsay 4. Informationyay aboutyay Onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay
Iterarylay Archiveyay Oundationfay

Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ependsday uponyay andyay annotcay urvivesay ithoutway idespreadway
ublicpay upportsay andyay onationsday otay arrycay outyay itsyay issionmay ofyay
increasingyay ethay umbernay ofyay ublicpay omainday andyay icensedlay orksway atthay ancay ebay
eelyfray istributedday inyay achinemay-eadableray ormfay accessibleyay byay ethay idestway
arrayyay ofyay equipmentyay includingyay outdatedyay equipmentyay. Anymay allsmay onationsday
($1 otay $5,000) areyay articularlypay importantyay otay aintainingmay axtay exemptyay
atusstay ithway ethay Irsyay.

Ethay Oundationfay isyay ommittedcay otay omplyingcay ithway ethay awslay egulatingray
aritieschay andyay aritablechay onationsday inyay allyay 50 atesstay ofyay ethay Unitedyay
Atesstay. Ompliancecay equirementsray areyay otnay uniformyay andyay ityay akestay ayay
onsiderablecay effortyay, uchmay aperworkpay andyay anymay eesfay otay eetmay andyay eepkay upyay
ithway esethay equirementsray. Eway oday otnay olicitsay onationsday inyay ocationslay
erewhay eway avehay otnay eceivedray ittenwray onfirmationcay ofyay ompliancecay. Otay Endsay
Onationsday oryay etermineday ethay atusstay ofyay ompliancecay orfay anyyay articularpay atestay
isitvay wwway.utenberggay.orgyay/onateday.

Ilewhay eway annotcay andyay oday otnay olicitsay ontributionscay omfray atesstay erewhay eway
avehay otnay etmay ethay olicitationsay equirementsray, eway owknay ofyay onay ohibitionpray
againstyay acceptingyay unsolicitedyay onationsday omfray onorsday inyay uchsay atesstay owhay
approachyay usyay ithway offersyay otay onateday.

Internationalyay onationsday areyay atefullygray acceptedyay, utbay eway annotcay akemay
anyyay atementsstay oncerningcay axtay eatmenttray ofyay onationsday eceivedray omfray
outsideyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay. Uyay.Say. awslay aloneyay ampsway ouryay allsmay affstay.

Easeplay eckchay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay ebway agespay orfay urrentcay onationday
ethodsmay andyay addressesyay. Onationsday areyay acceptedyay inyay ayay umbernay ofyay otheryay
aysway includingyay eckschay, onlineyay aymentspay andyay editcray ardcay onationsday. Otay
onateday, easeplay isitvay: wwway.utenberggay.orgyay/onateday.

Ectionsay 5. Eneralgay Informationyay Aboutyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™ electronicyay orksway

Ofessorpray Ichaelmay Say. Arthay asway ethay originatoryay ofyay ethay Ojectpray
Utenberggay™ onceptcay ofyay ayay ibrarylay ofyay electronicyay orksway atthay ouldcay ebay
eelyfray aredshay ithway anyoneyay. Orfay ortyfay earsyay, ehay oducedpray andyay
istributedday Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ebooksyay ithway onlyyay ayay ooselay etworknay ofyay
olunteervay upportsay.

Ojectpray Utenberggay™ ebooksyay areyay oftenyay eatedcray omfray everalsay intedpray
editionsyay, allyay ofyay ichwhay areyay onfirmedcay asyay otnay otectedpray byay opyrightcay inyay
ethay Uyay.Say. unlessyay ayay opyrightcay oticenay isyay includedyay. Usthay, eway oday otnay
ecessarilynay eepkay ebooksyay inyay ompliancecay ithway anyyay articularpay aperpay
editionyay.

Ostmay eoplepay artstay atyay ouryay ebsiteway ichwhay ashay ethay ainmay Pgay earchsay
acilityfay: wwway.utenberggay.orgyay.

Isthay ebsiteway includesyay informationyay aboutyay Ojectpray Utenberggay™,
includingyay owhay otay akemay onationsday otay ethay Ojectpray Utenberggay Iterarylay
Archiveyay Oundationfay, owhay otay elphay oducepray ouryay ewnay ebooksyay, andyay owhay otay
ubscribesay otay ouryay emailyay ewsletternay otay earhay aboutyay ewnay ebooksyay.
